Title: EXP LEJ HUB - DG Toolkit
Description: All relevant information are stored in SharePoint-Lists (available Stock, count of trainings and participants). This solution provides detailed views to this information. With this stored information the users can do a 4-eyes principle check so the trainings are compliant, the tool provides different stats about the trainings and calculates the stock.
Problem it Solves: A manual inventory always had to be carried out for the used materials in order to trigger the ordering process in good time. The past training courses are checked in a 4-eyes principle check, statistics are kept and documented in various Office solutions.  This solution will calculate the stock for training resources automatically. it provides all information about past trainings so team members can do a 4-eyes principle check to be fully compliant. It provides all relevant KPIs, OKR and stats.
Benefits: No manual stock check needed anymore which saves time. On point ordering of materials for trainings to reduce garbage. All information in one place. Possible failures will be shown fast and can be resolved to increase KPI and OKR
Members: Christian Goldschmidt, Jean-Luc Eggeling, Oliver Bergmann, Susi Schuetz

Title: DUBGTW Sorter Visualization Reporting
Description: Use snowflake, dataiku, streamlit and  the data hub to connect to Ireland DUBGTW sorter data and generate daily Power BI visuals on sorting status. There are 2 daily tables generated from HIS. 1. Parcel Lookup - shipment detail data 2. Parcel Data Manifest - how the piece was sorted information. To have a daily feed from the HIS ( HUB information system) to the data hub where the data can be connected to via power BI and exit chute, video coding, rework chute reports extracted. There are approximately 20,000 rows per day for each table. To keep 90 days of rolling data.
Problem it Solves: The current DUBGTW sorter Reporting platform is end of life.  This solution will replace the HIS reporting database with one click refresh visuals to provide update to date status information on the Dublin Gateway sorted pieces.
Benefits: Ireland DUBGTW sorter manages sorting to correct courier routes and chutes, flagging pre 9's to dedicated chute,  Saturday deliveries, ensures security checks,  holding denied parties shipments, holding shipments without data, holding customs exam shipments and ICS2 intercepts. specific  customers are managed using their Eircode.   The accuracy of the sort is dependent on ability to extract how a shipment is sorted and view certain exit chute criteria. customer label quality failures can also be extracted.
Tags: 21stcenturyreporting, DAAssistance, dataanalysis, DataAnalytics, dataquality, datascience, datavisualization, datawarehouse, GenAI, PowerPlatform, SnowDash2023

Title: Post Clearance modification tool
Description: The PCM tool was created for case handling and control. When an error in a declaration is found, by a customer, it must be logged as a potential post clearance modification (PCM). All relevant details must be captured in an fast and easy way, perhaps while you have the customer on the phone. This step is about creating a PCM case. After some analysis and relevant approvals the PCM is ready to be processed; the declaration is changed and the change is filed with customs authorities. When they revert back, the case is updated with the outcome, the caller is informed and the case is closed.
Problem it Solves: When an error in a declaration is found it needs to be logged. if there is no system support for this it can end up in an excel sheet or even on a piece of paper with no follow up or control. The logged entry is called a post clearance modification (PCM) and it is processed at a certain rate by a dedicated team. If no system support, the team does not really know what to work on nor do they know their backlog or process speed. A correction request is sent to Customs Authorities and it can take months before there is a reply. Without system support it is very hard to keep track of PCM status.
Benefits: The benefit with the PCM tool is that it gives and overview of the PCM backlog and a status on each individual PCM case. If there are customer queries, the agent can always inform the customer about his case based on the information in the system. The system also gives possibilities to control the process assigning more resources should the backlog increase. The reporting capabilities of the tool helps management to control the full PCM process.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Dilshan Makavitage, Mai Ly Nguyen, Raul Benitti

Title: CTP-Customer Re-Activate Rqst
Description: re-activation of montlhy accounts for requests coming from salesteam to Finance department
Problem it Solves: RE-open request for customer de-activated accounts from sales to Finance department
Benefits: Automation, visibility and direct communication from sales and fiance team

Title: Inventory asset disposal app
Description: The app digitizes the entire process of disposing of inventory assets, from entering the asset to be disposed of into the form to generating an electronic asset disposal report.
Problem it Solves: paper process, lengthy approvals, lack of clarity in assets,...
Benefits: clarity, fast approval, clear process rules, automatically generated email notifications, faster and automated communication between departments that need asset disposal data.

Title: Trial evaluation form
Description: PowerApps app to help HR staff send queries to employees and managers. Automated notifications to managers, HR person. Different view of the app by role.
Problem it Solves: After the probationary period, certain forms must be completed by both the employee and the manager. The HR department is involved in the process. The current process is not digitized, everything is paper-based.
Benefits: The whole process will be digitized, with no paper forms, no scanning, and no additional archiving. Everything will be in one application and two MS Forms.

Title: OBS - OutBoundSort
Description: OBS checks GLS for GREF sort code and displays to user. Useful for sites with no autosort or bufferslides that are before OCNT scanning happens.
Problem it Solves: Sorting to correct ULDs for outbound shipments. Checking if there are RW, DG checkpoint (for DG shipments), IA for dutible.
Benefits: Employees will not have to read lists or know IATA codes by heart.

Title: LT1- (LT1 Dash)
Description: Using LT1 API it fetches all sort data for an array of sites and injects to local database where they can be used to display detailed graphics for example Finger load of hospital rejects.
Problem it Solves: Visualize LT1 event data
Benefits: No manual input. Near realtime data (1 min delay)

Title: IBRS - Inbound Route Sort
Description: IBRS uses zip codes to sort inbound material
Problem it Solves: Where to sort inbound shipments in the morning operation
Benefits: Display sort to user but also it works with Sort2light and it will also listen to ODD so it will show correct route for latest ODD. IBRS will also check so dutiable material is released and highlight for example Pre9 material.

Title: VDMT - Vehicle Damage Management Tool
Description: VDMT keeps track of damages and related cost to our vehicles. VDMT also registers events (Service, battery replace etc etc) You can also register milage, keep track of fuel cards and their PIN codes, create checklists, view charts, upload pictures of damages etc etc
Problem it Solves: Cost control of our vehicles
Benefits: VDMT keeps track of costs to vehicles

Title: TULL
Description: TULL sends inventory reports on our dutiable ACS material to Swedish customs. Reducing time spent by DHL staff by automating data gathering.
Problem it Solves: TULL sends inventory reports on our dutiable ACS material to Swedish customs.
Benefits: Greatly reducing time spent on each shipment by DHL staff by automating a manual process

Title: HG&EXP IT - Symposium
Description: The application allows you to manage the Symposium Italy event and have a view on the calendar for all users
Problem it Solves: Manage symposium event
Benefits: The colleagues participating in the symposium event will be drive to the experience
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: IE HR Forms - App
Description: We've developed a forms application for managing local HR data. Power Apps will serve as the platform where employees can access, complete, and submit HR forms. SharePoint Lists will function as our database for storing this data. Our Power App solution sends a notification email to our mailbox when a new form is received, including a preview of the submission. Additionally, there is an admin area for HR, where forms can be reviewed, PDF documents can be exported, and records can be managed and updated.
Problem it Solves: We previously used an outsourced platform to manage various data submissions from our employees.  However, by transitioning to Power Apps and developing our own local 'HR Forms App,' we aim to streamline data collection and reduce costs. Our previous subscription had rising annual costs, so this shift will not only help us cut expenses but also enhance our data management capabilities and give us more control with a more tailored solution.
Benefits: Enhances operational efficiency through cost reduction by allowing us to manage workflows locally. Improves employee experience as there is a more user friendly appearance.
Tags: form, hr, Microsoft, office, powerapps, powerautomate, PowerPlatform, RPA, workflow

Title: Bulk Global Imaging Download
Description: As part of a seperate global Duty Drawback Blockchain solution, they developed a tool where you can drop AWBs into a website and it will send a link to batch download all of these. IT would be good to revive this part of the project to help solve our problem and save FTE and costs
Problem it Solves: As part of our HMRC post entry reclaims process where we submit claims to HMRC for overpayments of GB Imports (Duty VAT), HMRC will ask for documentation to support the claim. This will include but not limited to, AWB, entry documents, commercial invoices which are all scanned on Global Imaging. We have a schedule process where we can submit 250 awbs in one email but they will want around 10% of these to have documents.  Currently we are assigning 1 FTE to download these 1 by 1. As part of a seperate global Duty Drawback Blockchain solution, they developed a tool where you can drop AWBs
Benefits: LEss FTE, more producitvity, potential automation to be able to assign resource effectively elsewhere. This abililty will allow us to focus on more important tasks with resource. Additionally it will help streamline the reclaims process with HMRC and speed up sending of documents and repayments to DHL for our overpayment claims. Happy to discuss further on the phone if needs be.  Haig in Local GB IT is aware of the Global Imaging tool

Title: Automating the process of payroll accounting
Description: An integration is developed that is accessible only to the person who will post the accounting journals. Thanks to this interface, the cost center and account codes registered in the system are matched and a transfer file containing all the necessary information that the accounting system can read and run is designed. The user can download this file from the interface every month-end and transfer it to the accounting system automatically.
Problem it Solves: For the accounting journals, an excel file containing the total payroll items is sent to the Finance team every month by HR team. The incoming file is posted to the relevant accounting accounts by performing manual calculations and mappings. This process is open to human errors and waste of time.
Benefits: There is no need for the file shared by the HR team. The calculation and mapping processes that the finance team performs manually every month are eliminated from the process and possible errors are prevented. This contributed to employee productivity and time savings.

Title: Shipment tracking script
Description: We created script which process provided list of shipments and seek for particular event.  For Customs purpose script is processing XML files from Customs API and then check for RR event.  For Operations script process movement manifest from MS4 (XML format) and check for particular event which in our case is SI (Security inspected) with remark XRAYED. Script can be adopted to check other request events/checkpoints. Events are tracked using ESB.
Problem it Solves: 1. Customs dep required tool to check whether all Customs released shipments got RR (RLS) status. 2. Operations required tool to check whether all Export shipments were captured with event SI (Security inspected). As alternative OPMS report was considered, but this does not fit because report is needed right after departure of aircraft.
Benefits: KPI monitoring; Ensuring GSOP compliance;

Title: PDF Compression Service
Description: We created Windows Service which consume "ghostscript" library for PDF file compression. Users uploading files to specific network folder and service picks it up for processing in couple seconds. Our service is set to process file until it will be smaller than 3Mb.  This solution allowed to save cost (alternative would be Adobe Pro license for whole dep) and increased user satisfaction and performance.
Problem it Solves: Customs Clearance department expressed need for PDF file compression, because Customs authorities API do not accept files larger than 3Mb and due to the tightening of sanctions, the amount of required documents is increasing.
Benefits: Cost saving - no need to purchase Adobe Pro license for whole department Employee satisfaction, time saving Reduce paper waste - trying to compress files users were printing documents and trying to scan it again
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Customer Segmentation and Churn with Generative AI
Description: In this project, approaches based on large language models will be developed to solve the problems of customer segmentation and churn prediction. Thus, unstructured data such as customer complaints and comments will be used in solving the problem. With the hybrid approaches to be developed, both the clustering quality and the accuracy of the churn-prone customer predictions will be improved. Within the scope of this project, it is aimed to use large language models together with classification and clustering algorithms based on generative artificial intelligence to solve customer segmentation
Problem it Solves: Currently, although key performance indicators such as the number of new customers, customer turnover rate, and churn rate are monitored by business units for customer analytics, no analytical solution approach based on data mining and machine learning is used for customer segmentation and churn analysis. This prevents dynamic tracking of customers who tend to leave and timely actions to prevent churn.
Benefits: Reduce customer churn rate by at least 20% Increase customer turnover rate by at least 10% Improve customer response rate to campaigns by at least 20% Improve average time between shipments by at least 30%
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: ai, churn, customer, GenAI, generativeai, sales, segmentation

Title: Access Request Guide
Description: In the list in sharepoint, there is a column for each application explaining which link to request from, and there is a word file explaining how to fill in the blanks when making the request.
Problem it Solves: It prevents users from being misdirected regarding the tickets they will open. Allows users who want to request access to know where and how to open a ticket
Benefits: This solution shortens the resolution time of access tickets and reduces unnecessary workload by preventing users from being misdirected.

Title: Split .pdf by barcode and upload to CIA
Description: Poweer-shell script/app that will parse a folder of pdf's  - read pdf pages and read barcode (POC completed from a page) - split by specified barcode value in multiple documents - read in every split for barcode of 10 digits - rename split by AWB and standard CIA naming - upload to CIA shod work without entire CIA app, just the service (and move to a server)
Problem it Solves: CIA Application is pretty old. It works from physical scanner. My intention is to automatize the functionalities from pdf files instead of scanner.  Current process is print the pdf and scan into CIA. I will split large pdf by barcode separator and rename documents reading barcode WAYBILL. Upload to CIA using just the upload service from CIA app from a server.
Benefits: No print and scan for electronic documents
Tags: cia, gia, RPA, scan, Scanning, script

Title: Correcting Shipping Address Errors
Description: The Dispatch team needs to verify all errors one by one on different sites. Instead of such manual corrections and checks, correct address information will be automatically suggested with an accuracy rate with artificial intelligence algorithms.
Problem it Solves: The Manifesting Service data (MS data) is shared with dispatch teams before the cargo aircraft reaches Turkey. This team manually corrects address errors in the sent data before the sort starts. When the manual correction is not completed before the sort time, the sort starts with the wrong address information.
Benefits: The dispatch team manually checks approximately 7000 shipment data every morning. Out of 7000 shipments, an average of 1200 shipment data are corrected per day. A total of 4 man/hours are spent on this process per day. Thanks to this project, it is planned to take an average of 5 minutes to check 7000 shipments with artificial intelligence. It is expected that the total daily comparison and checking of the correct address data will be 1 man/hour.
Tags: DataAnalytics, dispatch, manifestservice, operation, operationalefficiency, operationdigi, sort, standardization

Title: Termination Flow
Description: A flow was designed in the local human resources application. The flow starts with the notification of the person leaving the human resources team. Then, the actions that need to be taken for this person (for example, closing LDAPs for IT, etc.) are sent to the relevant teams. When they complete the actions, they check the boxes and the information is sent to HR teams. If the actions are not completed, an e-mail is sent to the relevant team every other day.
Problem it Solves: When an employee leaves work, many departments (IT, Security, HR, etc.) need to take action. The responsibility for following up on these actions lies with HR teams. The human resources team had to provide separate information to the relevant teams and follow up manually. It was a process open to human error. It caused a lot of emails.
Benefits: While multiple e-mail flows are carried out between human resources and business units, e-mails are sent automatically through the system thanks to the flow. This prevents possible errors and time losses. The process has been standardized.

Title: Automatic adding of overtime fee during invoicing
Description: Regarding the overtime fee, we defined certain fees for certain hours in the system, €80 from 17:30 to 19:00 on weekdays, €100 between 19:00 and 21:00 on weekdays etc. During invoicing, when it is 17:30 on weekdays, the system will bring the overtime line item on the invoicing person's screen and add another €80 fee. Thus, the person making the invoice will continue to issue the invoice without doing any extra work and will be able to continue the process without manually adding the overtime item. In addition, since the system works on an hourly basis, it also eliminates incorrect invoicing
Problem it Solves: Until now, overtime payments were made manually, which resulted in underpayment or overpayment. Overpayment by customers also caused dissatisfaction. This situation was automated by making definitions in the system based on hours.
Benefits: Thus, the invoicing person will continue to issue their invoice without doing any extra work and will be able to continue their process without manually adding the overtime item. In addition, since the system works on an hourly basis, it also eliminates incorrect invoicing. This led to employee satisfaction and more profitable operations.

Title: Extra charges for DG shipments
Description: First of all, we determined the service codes for the shipments to be invoiced as DG, we saw that we could detect them through the ESB service, (with HK and HE service codes) When these service codes were seen on the invoicing screen in the local customs application, we increased the storage fee for DG shipments by 50% by multiplying the amount by 1.5 with the function of increasing the fee by 1.5.
Problem it Solves: DG shipments with the issue of not paying extra storage amount for shipments until now. The issue even went as far as invoicing outside of working hours and came up with the situation of "since overtime is being worked, we should charge for it".
Benefits: In addition to obtaining a good income, the automatic execution of this transaction pleased our invoicing colleagues.

Title: SVC Induction
Description: This app removes paper and allows the information to be recorded securely and accessed easily.
Problem it Solves: Currently all site inductions within the UK are completed on paper.
Benefits: Saves time, Saves paper, Data recall is easy, and more cost effective.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: EXP FI CI STEP COUNT LOGGING
Description: The PowerApp provides an easy solution for employees to record monthly averages of their daily step count with visual evidence, facilitating possible future activity challenges or competitions on team, function or country level. The app will record input to a SharePoint Online List, which is then utilized in reporting.
Problem it Solves: Without Virgin Pulse, there is no easy way to log and report physical activity for the purpose of driving health & well-being through team/function/country level challenges and competitions.
Benefits: We will have a way to drive health & well-being through physical activity

Title: Extract files from SFTP server to Sharepoint
Description: A PowerAutomate flow would connect to the SFTP server that extracts the files, places them in a sharepoint folder which PowerBI could connect to and automatically refresh.
Problem it Solves: It takes time to keep manually downloading the data from IQSMS and copying into a file for PowerBI to take from. This would make the process automatic and allow to get the latest data.
Benefits: It means you won't have to manually extract the data which saves time and allows people to see the latest data improving quality.

Title: Rewards Gateway Membership Refresh
Description: The proposed solution involves automating the process of updating the employee reward and recognition platform, Rewards Gateway, by integrating it with the eHR system. This will be achieved through a series of automated steps that ensure the members list is always current, accurate, and reflective of the organizational structure.
Problem it Solves: Our current employee reward and recognition platform, Rewards Gateway, necessitates regular updates to its members list to ensure accuracy. This involves HR manually deactivating employees who have left, adding new starters, and updating existing employee data and approvers. This process is time-consuming, prone to human error, and diverts HR resources from more strategic tasks.
Benefits: Error-Free Data: By automating the data update process, the likelihood of errors in employee information is minimized. This reduces instances where employees might feel overlooked or incorrectly categorized, which can be frustrating. Seamless Onboarding and Offboarding: New starters will be added to the Rewards Gateway platform without delay, and those who leave will be promptly removed, ensuring that the system reflects current staff accurately. Correct Approver Levels: The calculation of approver levels based on the N-x hierarchy ensures that the right individuals are approving rewards

Title: Internal storage calculator
Description: The calculator effectively addresses these concerns by providing a clear and concise explanation of the storage fee calculation. By retrieving relevant shipment data from the LCA by using the AWB or the "Delay certificate", the calculator accurately determines the applicable fees based on factors such as arrival date, package weight, storage rate, and method. This transparent approach empowers customers to understand the rationale behind the charges and fosters greater trust in the billing process.
Problem it Solves: Packages stored in the terminal for over three days incur storage charges. Due to the lack of transparent billing details, we frequently receive inquiries about the calculation process. To address this, customer service representatives or FL agents input the AWB or delay certificate into the calculator. This tool retrieves shipment data and calculates terminal storage fees based on arrival date, package weight, storage rate, and method. Within seconds, customers receive a detailed explanation of the billing calculation, including the relevant dates, weights, rates, and storage methods.
Benefits: By automating the process, we save waste and precious representative time in searching for information, prevent errors due to manual calculation, prevent unnecessary refunds, and streamline the process by providing an answer to the customer for the first time, without the need to return to the customer in a second conversation.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, General Management, Pricing
Tags: access, algorithm, application, AutomatedFlow, automation, calculate, calculator, storage

Title: Inbound Gateway Prealert
Description: This produces an easy to read overview of Import / Inbound shipments to facility staff to assist resource management in satellite service centers and ULD unload planning in gateways. The solution provides an overview that is similar to a combination of Sherloc's; (Movement Content) Station and Facility view, Movement Content view, and Container Summary view.  This aids offload planners an easy method to prioritise container offload based on priorities and current workload within the facility. Further filters allow infinite options for prioritisation.
Problem it Solves: Facility staff had no easy method of seeing what content is inbound to the facility. Planning and managing ULD unload prioritisation on the fly to ensure a consistent workload across workstations within the facility. Sherloc offers various views that allow staff members to see certain details at Container Summary or Container Details level but nothing that gives staff a full station overview. This was an issue that we addressed back in 2015.
Benefits: Assists ULD unload prioritisation to ensure we meet service commitments. Assist workload balance at various stations within the facility. Combination of above ultimately leading to improved gateway KPI's on COA, COT and Connectivity.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Car Mileage Log
Description: Need to create a tool/app where the car users can automatically update their mileage, taking the process away from the facilities manager.
Problem it Solves: Facilities manager currently sends a monthly reminder to anyone with a company car to send in their mileage. They in turn mail the mileage back & facilities manager needs to manually update an excel file with the mileage from the emails
Benefits: Replacing a manual process with an automated one. It will improve the employees experience as the facilities manager will not have to manually chase the car & log their mileage manually. & the car users do not need to wait for email reminders to log their miles.
Tags: carmileage, carmiles, companycar, Facilities, mileagetracker, PowerPlatform

Title: Centralizing Broker Info to DHL Accounts
Description: Queries Team get lots of queries rebilling to Broker, or Broker's may query their charges. CMF is the Finance tool used for finding customer Accs.  Linking data for a Broker to accounts on this central file location either CMF/ACC Enquiry tool would alleviate a lot of issues between Departments.
Problem it Solves: This suggestion may avoid confusion, billing errors.  Reducing AR collection times in incorrect invoices being billed.  This would be handy lookup tool to verify when rebilling etc.  If current systems we use cannot be updated could a new enquiry tool be created.
Benefits: This would avoid billing errors, administration time in rebilling, reduce queries, reduce AR collection times and reduce unnecessary communication within different Departments to confirm the correct Broker.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Operational efficiency, Employee experience

Title: Service Recovery Portal
Description: An online portal that allows a Service Recovery request to be made in one simple step. Eliminates need for emails sent separately to target depots and prevents duplication of tasks by linking up with Gema to log complaint no call back. Allows tracking and trending of Service Recovery events.
Problem it Solves: An application that would replace the current process of logging a complaint on Gema and a seperate mail being sent to target depot. New application would capture relevant information needed.
Benefits: Pre-determined fields means no vital information missed. Correct depot team and relevant Customer Care and CS Supervisors targeted. Anyone can check status of request meaning if someone finished shift other colls can be kept updated. Prevents duplication of work. Reduced AHT/ACW.
Tags: aht, customerservice, digitalization, efficiency, focus, fw, gema, greatplacetowork, motivatedpeople, operations, pgq, rightfirsttime

Title: Heavyweight Pre-Alert
Description: A portal that would allow requests to be sent which can be viewed by all CS and Ops team. Status update visible eg. pending, approval confirmed. Different teams targets automatically so no need to enter emails address and pre-populated fields which must have all required details before submitting.
Problem it Solves: Currently agents must send a Heavyweight approval form to IECOG before we can book pick up. If info is missing on the form, mail sent to wrong email address or agent off this can result in a delay for our customer in collecting their shipments and frustration for both CS, Dispatch and Ops.
Benefits: All teams kept up to date on status of request and can be check even if requesting agent out of office. Less chance of errors due to auto targeting of CS, Ops etc. No unnecessary delays for customer.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: customerexperience, digitalization, efficiency, inovation, internalcommunications, operationalefficiency, operations, rightfirsttime, solutionoriented

Title: Extend email window in DCE
Description: Maybe in a DCE update this window could be extended or maybe auto scroll to show all details in the window
Problem it Solves: On the email window on DCE it only shows a certain amount of characters. Sometimes if multiple mail addresses there some can be missed.
Benefits: Move shipments along quicker that might not get the email sent that should of been due to being missed

Title: Remove multiple item lines at once on DCE
Description: Add an option to select multiple lines at once to delete
Problem it Solves: On large multi-line shipments the lines need to be removed 1 at a time and can be time consuming. Having a bulk select option would be quicker
Benefits: Less time wasted

Title: Hand Over Protocol FA (Fixed Assets) Application
Description: This app is built on Microsoft PowerApps and contain Power Automate Approval flow. Every user in the company can access the app and to use it (upon share request with the relevant permissions).  There are security permission to enable to view/edit the hand over protocols in the SharePoint list.
Problem it Solves: All hand over protocols will be held in one place - easy access and reports. Easy and fast way to create such FA protocols.
Benefits: Completely removes paper from current process. Align with Go-green policy and Digitalization initiative. Saving costs for storage of current paper documents.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: Automatic GR done for fixed services
Description: We need to trigger an automated GR for services that have a fixed amount per month. for example, for costs where we have a fixed amount per month agreed with the vendor. This way the person raising the PO doesn't have to do the GR, the accountant doesn't need to do the manual release, and the controller can trust that all the correct amounts are booked in the correct month. This saves time in the operation, in accounting and also in controlling.
Problem it Solves: for annual POs for fixed amounts for services, example Cleaning, The GR is fully booked for the full year. Then the costs are manually booked to a balance sheet. Then a GL accountant releases the monthly costs to the P&L. The Person who checks the P&L needs to make corrections in cases where this goes wrong. this is labor intensive and there is a high risk in creating errors. By creating an automated GR this would minimize the risk of errors and will save time with the Creator of the PO, the GL accountant and the Controller of the P&L.
Benefits: This Campfire will lead to less work for the people raising the PO as the GR is done automatically. The costs end up in the correct month for the correct amounts. GL accountant doesn't have to be involved anymore, and the controller of the P&L doesn't have to make corrections as this is a first-time right process. Therefore, a lot of people can benefit from this initiative which can be used not only in the entity I work for but maybe even on a braider scale.
Tags: account, accountability, MST, purchase, purchasing, RPA

Title: Free of Charge (FOC) Shipment Approval. LT
Description: User will register each shipment in Sharepoint List and select FOC account. All shipment data will be recorded from DHL systems and approval request will be sent to manager. User needs to enter only awb and acc. All data is easy accessible for audits.
Problem it Solves: All FOC consignments need to be validated, and there is currently no easy way to register and receive validations without a lot of manual data entry and subsequent manual verification.
Benefits: Less manual work, partially automated process.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: Create mass return labels
Description: We created a website to manage the creation of mass return labels. We use MyDHLAPI to generate labels.  URL: https://ereturn.dhl.fr
Problem it Solves: Our pharmaceutical and medical customers want to create mass return labels to return medical equipment or analyses of various samples.  Example our client CEPHEID : their engineers must return the defective equipment to their repair center.  Our standard DHL tools do not offer this functionality.
Benefits: Customer satisfaction :  - User-friendly solution - Response to customer needs Additional revenue :  - Gain market share in these customer sector (pharmaceutical and medical) - +20 customers use this solution, +21000 labels generated in the last six months - Turnover 2024: 476k€
Tags: api, applications, businessfocused, cfit, CustomerDevelopment, customerExperience, DHLDigitalSolutions, dhlexpress, esi, ess, label

Title: Automated NCY TUP PIC capture on RW
Description: PIDIMG solution allows the Mettler Toledo Octo solution to drop images to the server where PIDIMG can then encode a file for upload to GIA via ESB. As long as the scale image capture solution includes the PID in the naming convention of the file than PIDIMG could be used for uploading any image to GIA. This solution allows for the storage of all images for NCY pieces receiving a RW to be uploaded to GIA and not just NSP cases.
Problem it Solves: In a claims and complaints matter, our Finance Billing Query team had no source for evidence of shipment integrity or proof for NSP surcharge. Two major customers demanded photographic evidence before accepting any NSP surcharge on a piece. This was a lengthy process for Finance to request still photo capture from our CCTV footage by the local security agent based on RW timestamp. Having a solution that use photos from any RW scale equipment provider loaded to a server for further upload to GIA as TUP doc type provides Finance with evidence searchable by PID or account number.
Benefits: Automated upload of NCY images to GIA based on RW. Providing Finance and CS teams easy access to evidence in case of claims or invoice challenges.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: OFTare: Onforwarding booking solution Freight
Description: DHL Express Sweden already had a local solution for assisting Operations which destination ONF shipments should be sorted to and which corresponding DHL Freight product should be used for each shipment based on ODD responses.  OFTare was essentially upgraded to a IB sort and booking solution to automatically translate ODD customer requirements seamlessly to Freight API shipment creation for onforwarding shipments. Using Freight's own API services ensures our shipment creation process is more robust with a much higher level of support (Freight CFIT) if something were to go wrong.
Problem it Solves: Our method for creating DHL Freight shipments to onforwarding areas relied on the classic DCG Manifesting BPI process for certain GTW movements and a legacy solution on DHL Freight (Sweden) side for injestion of the data. Unfortunately, the solution on Freight side regularly crashed (ave 1 - 2 times/month). This older solution had very few resources within Freight that could support when failures occured and often resulted in (min) 24hr delay on shipment progress.
Benefits: Utilising Freight API's has proven more robust. From 1-2 system crashes/month previously to zero incidents since launch Dec 2023 till now. New process eliminates two physical scans per shipment (including containerization and movement departure steps). Ops savings ~60 secs / shipment. ODD customer instructions are now included in the Freight shipment data providing our service partner couriers visibility of these instructions directly in Freight courier scanners.
Members: Garth Wilkinson, Olof Ljungberg, Thomas NEILL

Title: Departure Route Alert (DRA)
Description: A dashboard that presents a view of all routes at a location. The dashboard collects shipment data per route based on WC checkpoint. It presents total physical weight of the shipments loaded to the route and highlighted if a generic weight limit is exceeded. By selecting a specific vehicle for a route then the weight alerts reflect the actual vehicles gross/tare weight details. It also shows total WPX shipments and alerts the reviewer if any WPX shipments are still unreleased. This provides Ops teamleaders and couriers piece of mind that they are within the vehicles weight limit.
Problem it Solves: It is the driver (courier) that incurs a personal fine if the vehicle they are driving is found to be overweight by local traffic police. It is DHL's responsibility to send our couriers out on route safely and according to regulatory requirements. Until we have DISCO deployed at each site, we have no easy method to determine the total physical weight loaded onto our vehicles. Two sites have a vehicle scale solution that requires placement under each tyre to calculate the total weight of the vehicle, this is a cumbersome process. No sites in Sweden have a total vehicle scale system.
Benefits: Ensures couriers depart on route safely and according to regulations.

Title: CUS Import Automation based on CIN (H7)
Description: Customs declarants are processing CIN data just partially and mostly manually. Local customs app eCOLKO is capable to process B2C shipments with their value less than 150€ in fully automated mode. With automation we can effectively save one customs agent. RPA H7 (SRDS) solution is priority for SK approved by EUMB for next period.
Problem it Solves: Aim to utilize collected digital CIN Data related to imported shipments. Execute fully automated preparation of H7 (SRDS) declarations and submissions to customs office (RPA solution).  All B2C import shipments with value less than 150€ can be processed in unmanned mode delivered digitally to Customs Administration.
Benefits: We will cover with this H7 automation all imported B2C shipments <150€, declared parcel content and validated CIN data control. In mid-term horizon 2Y we will save up to 1 FTE. Development of this CIN Data automation will extend current LCA functionality and deliver digitalization in CUS OPS dept. incl. raise of productivity (DPH – declaration per hour) and cost saving
Members: Ivana Jurkovicova, Miroslav Kando, Miroslav Simek, Roman Dobsovic

Title: Power App 121 form
Description: To address the current challenges in 121 meeting documentation, we propose the implementation of a comprehensive solution leveraging the capabilities of PowerApps, PowerFlow, and SharePoint. -Centralized PowerApp for Effortless Data Entry -Integration with PowerBI for Performance Insights -Dynamic 121 Document Design -Data Collation for Appraisals and Development Plans -Centralized Management for Easy Updates -Time Savings for Coaches
Problem it Solves: Inefficient Documentation Process for 121 Meetings: Current organizational framework, monthly 121 meetings are burdened by a cumbersome documentation process. The use of spreadsheets, each containing 14 tabs with built-in formulas, has proven to be time-consuming for both coaches and coachees. The multi-step data entry process, coupled with the need for manual updates across potentially thousands of individual worksheets, is impeding the efficiency of our coaching and development initiatives.
Benefits: Our proposed solution not only addresses the current inefficiencies in 121 meeting documentation but also transforms the coaching process into a dynamic and data-driven experience, empowering both coaches and coachees for enhanced professional development. The simplified data entry process and streamlined documentation workflow result in significant time savings for coaches. This time can be redirected towards quality coaching interactions, fostering a more engaging and impactful coaching experience.
Tags: DataAnalytics, digitalforms, efficiency, employee, performance, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, productivity

Title: My Vehicle App
Description: MY Vehicle App is an electronic defect reporting process that feeds the info for the drivers to the local office and removes the need for paper defect books which is a legal requirement for the uk and also is part of the GSOP processes
Problem it Solves: Removes the need for paper defect reporting process and aids with DVSA Earned Recognition
Benefits: Moves away from paper and a more efficient process that will save time and moves forward our Digitalization platforms

Title: LCA export arrival based on PU
Description: Our local web server already receives data and checkpoints related to Swedish shipments via Send. Web server identifies PU on dutiable shipments and sends a SS01 message to our LCA via MQ services. This allows the submission of a declaration to customs as soon as the declaration is completed by an export customs clearance agent.
Problem it Solves: Until recently, Swedish Customs Authority only permitted the submission of Export declarations to them when a shipment was physically available in an approved (bonded) warehouse. After negotiations, the Swedish Customs Authority now accepts DHL courier vehicles as "an other approved location" sufficiently under our control that warrants the submission of Export declarations. We need a method to subscribe to PU checkpoint on outbound dutiable shipments and provide these shipment details to the local customs application so customs clearance is fully complete before outbound processing begins.
Benefits: Dutiable shipments no longer need to be staged separately at the PUD finger waiting physical arrival capture and release. Dutiable shipments can be immediately loaded onto MHE upon arrival to facility. Reduction of (min) two physical scans per dutiable shipment. 60% of all dutiable shipments cleared and released prior to arrival to facility (30mins - 8hr earlier release).

Title: Lock screen for displaying important information
Description: The employees assigned to a particular group of work would receive important information displayed on their lock screen to reinforce the communication of particular events, or risk mitigation purpose.
Problem it Solves: This initiative has not been developed to solve a particular issue, but to introduce a clear benefit : Underlining important pieces of information that should reach the employee at their desk on a large group scale.  examples could be upcoming audit exercises, reminding the employees of particular surveys, communicating on data protection risks to enhance the user awareness.
Benefits: broader reached employees with information related to their group of work

Title: My Trip - Vehicle State & Mileage Tracker
Description: The My Trip app is a Power Apps application designed for access on smartphones.making it easier than ever to manage essential information when using a service car. With the app, users can effortlessly log important details like vehicle condition and mileage directly from their phones. This data is then automatically synced to a SharePoint list, ensuring that records are accurate and up-to-date. Additionally, the app streamlines communication by automatically sending critical trip details to the user’s manager, saving time and reducing errors.
Problem it Solves: The My Trip app enhances our process for managing service car information. By automating the collection and communication of data. Instead of relying on post-trip emails, which can be time-consuming and prone to mistakes, this app automates the entire process. It ensures that all necessary information is collected and communicated in real-time, making the experience faster, easier, and more reliable.
Benefits: The My Trip app will enhance the employee experience by simplifying and automating data collection, improve operational efficiency through real-time updates and reduced errors, contribute to customer experience by ensuring reliable service, and support sustainability goals by promoting better service vehicle maintenance and efficiency.
Tags: AutomatedReporting, DataAutomatio, datacollection, EmployeeEfficiency, mobileapp, PowerPlatform, ServiceVehicle, TripManagement, vehiclemanagement

Title: GPI Mass mail to Customer (DE)
Description: Automate the sending of mass mails to Customers with individual attachments (e.g. contracts, price lists, zoning, services & surcharges, etc.). The automate process also takes care of merging the e-mails send as well the attachments and upload them in GIA as PDF documents.
Problem it Solves: Replacing the External Agency doing this task (=Cost saving, Data Protection), and replace manual effort required by Agent.
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Automatic Cancelation of Pickups
Description: I strongly believe that implementing an automated cancellation process for pickups in our booking system and delivery phones when a package receives SA/SI scan or PU scan would be a game-changer for our operations. This change would not only save us valuable time and resources but also enhance the overall experience for our customers. By eliminating unnecessary trips to companies where packages have already been scanned or picked up, we can optimize our operations, reduce costs, and provide a more streamlined and efficient service.
Problem it Solves: I work at DHL in Iceland, I go over futile pickups every day and I've noticed an opportunity for improvement. It seems that there are a significant number of futile pickups, where parcels have already been collected the day before or customers have personally dropped them off at a DHL service point. This presents a valuable opportunity for us to optimize our courier's time, as they have limited hours to complete pickups and deliveries. we can enhance efficiency and ensure that our couriers can focus on essential tasks, ultimately improving our overall service quality.
Benefits: Implementing an automated cancellation process for pickups when a package receives SA/SI scan or PU scan brings several benefits. It saves time and resources, reduces costs, enhances the customer experience, allows for optimal resource allocation, improve operational efficiency, increase customer satisfaction while keeping the planet green in the meantime.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Network Operations
Tags: drivingtime, Opportunity, pickup, pickupbooking, PickupException, RPA, RPAAssistance

Title: CEU Recruitment Requests Application
Description: The new solution is going to be Power Apps Application with many filters and options for the countries to check their flows. Meantime there will be not limitation in workflow duration.
Problem it Solves: The recruitment requests for 14 countries are created with Sharepoint Form (JavaScript) form with Power Automate Approval workflow which is introducing some limitations, like 28 days duration period of the workflow.
Benefits: better user experience; no limitation in workflow duration; one sharepoint list used as DB, instead of 15 lists and replications of the data;
Countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Iceland, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Ukraine

Title: Self-clearance customers electronic process
Description: FI Customs Authorities allow a direct message exchange with Self clearance customers (i.e. the B2C receivers who perform the declaration themselves). Improving DHL and customer process, Removing manual work
Problem it Solves: Slow manual process  in customs team to validate and request confirmation from the receiving customer.
Benefits: Removing manual work and reducing error in B2C customs team. Reducing manual work for customer
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: EXP FI FLOW TO SEND CUSTOMER EMAIL
Description: Old script which has to move to power automate platform. Removal of old excel macros and standalone files.  Removal of dependency for shared network drive dependency
Problem it Solves: Old script which has to move to power automate platform. Relates to cases where shipment record does not have a mobile phone number and emails need to be sent in bulk as a request for customer to act. GCCP will eventually replace this but this initiative will help to remove old excel macro setup and support moving the whole process to more modern automated one.
Benefits: Script send email to customers and ask more information to clearance (depend what customs clearance information needed).

Title: Mobile Time and Attendance management
Description: Legacy Time and Attendance management did not allow flexible online access and working on mobile devices. Replaced the old one with a more suitable system, enabling at the same time mobile access from phones/tablets. SaaS solution
Problem it Solves: Non-flexible options to record time and attendance , especially with remote work.
Benefits: mobile access to recording time and attendance + approvals

Title: Automated process for recruitment approvals
Description: Moving from paperbased recruitment approval process to a fully digital one. All handled within the HR system .
Problem it Solves: Recruitment approval process was manual. Papers with signatures of manager, head of function and HR head circulated in internal mail or from person to another.
Benefits: Faster process, clearer visibility of approvals

Title: eForms Platform
Description: Migrate to HP FileBound and Intelligent Workflow electronic forms and storage solution.
Problem it Solves: Express UK currently uses an electronic form capture system (Formstack) hosted in US which is not GDPR compliant (without Contract or Controller-Processor Agreement). The system has ~40 forms (including Recruitment Request, New Starter, Change of Details, Return to Work, Leaver Forms, Exit Interviews etc), many that capture sensitive PII data, such as salaries, medical, financial. The data is not solely contained within Formstack - once approved, forms are downloaded and emailed to the People Services Team to action. This process leads to increased risk of breach and liability exposure.
Benefits: - GDPR compliant, EU hosting. Rules to govern document retention / deletion policy. - Forms easily built using included eForms designer. - Ability to streamline processing and remove manual intervention with 'end-2-end process management' ... 'Workflow' - Unlimited users at no cost... charging is Software as a Service, pay for what you use... 27p / document stored. Scaleable storage. - Future Proof HR Digital Capability Roadmap (future phase). The solution is scaleable and will grow with us.       Content repository is a consideration for replacement SAP Employee File Management.

Title: Hold Instruction for Dutiable shipments in DCVS
Description: Using RPA to create a shipment hold instruction for all export dutiable shipments immediately when data arrives to DCVS would eliminate the issue completely, ensuring we are able to stop all dutiable export shipments unless they are specifically released. Investigated already the option of DCVS having functionality to operate for dutiable export shipments rather based on "default hold" than "default free" setting in DCVS with EU Ops Programs team and no solution at the moment. (Proposal is to implement roughly similar idea as producing SI checkpoint for DG shipments currently)
Problem it Solves: Currently Dutiable shipments do not automatically get a Hold (HI) instruction but need to wait for DCE:n customs status SU01 / RGPRO i.e. RR-checkpoint. Given the way HEL GTW operates, the DCE handling instruction comes in too late for latest arriving export material. This leads to a non-compliance (customs and ops process) of loading shipments to containers as there is not a default hold setting in DCVS but all shipments by definition are ready unless a hold is created by DCE.
Benefits: All dutiable shipments shipments having default Hold code in DCVS would stop uncleared dutiable shipments upon arrival to exit GTW so they can be appropriately ensured for loading only after the export clearance is OK.
Tags: customsclearance, DCE, dcvs, export, RPA, RPAAssistance

Title: CIN Availability Forecast (PowerBi, monthly)
Description: Forecasting Country full year CIN Availability KPI development - now possible within a click.  GER has created a KPI forecast BI reporting that provides transparency on e.g. upcoming customer activation dates and the related KPI impact, brings transparency on local TRB excemptions and target resolution dates, etc. All based on up to date shipment volumes via Data Factory/SnowFlake. Forecast gives an estimate on country full year KPI performance and provides transparency on how to close the gap to 100% CIN Availability on country level.
Problem it Solves: Lack of transparency and insights regarding future CIN Availability Development; no automated forecasting;  limited understanding of Road to 100% CIN Availability Compliance.
Benefits: Transparency and forecastability, improved decision-making process to focus on customers with highest country impact, automated and time-efficient (Data refresh takes 10 minutes as Data Factory is used)
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, General Management, IT
Tags: cin, CINDataAvailability, Customscompliance, DataAnalytics, DataFactory, forecasting, kpi, KPIReporting, powerbi

Title: PRE Brief App
Description: The PRE Brief app is built within the power apps platform. It replaces the paper records with a user friendly digital option, that covers the Pre Brief and Pre Departure Check element of the senior courier role. The data is stored via SharePoint, and can be displayed and reported via power BI.
Problem it Solves: The PRE Brief app has the potential to eliminate over 250,000 sheets a paper per year. It will also improve productivity as managers have access to the declared stop count data, and can compare this to actual stop counts.
Benefits: Massive reduction in paper. Improved reporting, which could lead to improved productivity and cost saving.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: UK DHL Express Mentoring Hub
Description: Setup a UK DHL Express Mentoring Hub Sharepoint site using Power Apps with automation and workflows to facilitate the mentoring process and journey for Express users
Problem it Solves: Reduce the manual effort required in communicating with potential mentees and mentors by introducing a certain amount of self-service capability for both. Making the program more accessible to the workforce by empowering both mentees and mentors to engage in the activity without HR getting directly involved.
Benefits: With a dedicated Mentoring Hub Sharepoint site there will be improved support of the Mentoring process in UK DHL Express. Utilizing automation through Power Apps to automate tasks and workflows to reduce the current manual effort of co-ordination and administration by the HR team. Enpowering mentees and mentors through the mentoring hub aiming to   improve uptake of the mentoring programme with an effective system in place to manage and support the process
Tags: 21stcenturymanager, coaching, dhlexpress, dhlexpressapp, digitalforms, digitalization, employeeexperience, engagement, Mentoring, motivatedpeople, paperless, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, selfservice, sharepoint, Sharepointforms
Members: James Aquino, Karch Yuen, Lara Brill, Leona Tillotson

Title: Proview, Extra Information required
Description: ​Currently customers who are set up on Proview would have registered to receive email or SMS notifications for a number of events, one being clearance event in customs. When the customer receives the email notification it would just state Clearance Event and no further specifi details to clarify what the actual issue is thats causing the shipment to be held through customs. There fore the customs contacts their acc manager, acc manager gets on to imports if its local or if not a trace through GEMA needs to be opened in order to provide information on why its held and what is required to clear.
Problem it Solves: If the reason for the clearance event was better explained and not as vague, this would give the customer a better reason as to why its held and it could possible reduce emails to sales and then on to Imports or then on to CS
Benefits: more insight to the customer, they have a better understanding on the reason for the hold in customs , with a better description they may not have to make contact

Title: Data Quality Customer Reporting
Description: Referring to Customs Data Quality as one of the IT Priorities 2024 & Glob. Mask Compliance as one of the central EU CFIT KPIs, GER identified the need of an automated COMMERCIAL reporting, which provides a holistic CUSTOMER overview. All global mask related issues are consolidated on CUSTOMER level with up to date AWB examples of the last 7 days. This was enabled through the connection to data factory via Snowflake & usage of local customer data. It provides a solid basis for Sales & CFIT to agree on a solution approach with the CUSTOMER. Data is available in German & English.
Problem it Solves: Lack of holistic, target group-friendly reporting at CUSTOMER level for Sales and CFIT, in order to prep info for a SLNB customer meeting and present data quality issues for customs-related shipments to the customer. Time-consuming data lookup in several internal DHL applications and missing information regarding error relevance, impact of errors on business areas as well as responsibilities and To-Dos are now solved in one reporting.
Benefits: Ease of Use: User-friendly and target group-oriented reporting; IT and Sales no longer have to search for data quality issues in multiple tools.  Transparency: Pre-filtering for relevant errors (Global Mask Compliance); daily data (last 7 days) at AWB level to view the errors in detail.  Simplicity: Dashboard design allows Sales and IT to send easily a screenshot of the report via email and can be shared in customer meetings to give the customer a perfect overview on their individual level of customs compliance.
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, IT, Sales
Tags: cin, CINDataQuality, dataquality, GlobalMaskCompliance, ITPriorities2024, powerbi, PowerPlatform, qualitymonitoring, reporting, ShipmentDetailQuality, slnb

Title: Address Finder Validation
Description: using an address finder and a macro that can automatically copy and paste the full correct collection address will ensure that the address is correct, improve on the customers experience along with improving the employees experience.
Problem it Solves: Using a postcode finder and/or having to manually type in full collection addresses. This will also help to improve on customer experience and reduce the number of errors.
Benefits: customer experience employee experience

Title: Proof of attempt of delivery
Description: Couriers taking pictures upon attempt of delivery of consignees driveway/doors so we can confirm that courier tried to deliver.
Problem it Solves: Customers are calling stating that couriers didnt made attempt of delivery as they receiving messages from DHL advising we tried to deliver your shipment and they are being scanned as NH but customers state that drivers were not in the area, didnt knocked or called intercoms.
Benefits: It will help us to confirm if drivers tried to deliver and it will also benefit customers as they will be able to confirm that driver definitely was in correct area and it will decrease amount of calls stating driver was not in area.

Title: Non-Account Customer Receipts
Description: This initiative will offer a customer the choice of how they would like to receive their receipt. Email/SMS or both, this would be sent to all customers during their booking in process.
Problem it Solves: Removes the requirement for CS advisors to manually complete/email customer word document receipts.
Benefits: Improve on customer experience.  Improve on OE  Better employee experience
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: CZ SSC OSR Portal
Description: Creating a platform with all the links in one place. An application which would allow colleagues to offer items to each other using Sharepoint lists.
Problem it Solves: Having all the links to internal reports and other useful links for SSC colleagues in one place. A "marketplace" for SSC colleagues.
Benefits: Links are in one place - employees will not have to save or lookup where to find any internal report, useful information or organization scheme of the SSC. Together with the marketplace, this will add to the employee experience and great place to work.

Title: Idea generation platform "Out of the box"
Description: The "Out of the box" platform will address the problem by providing a dedicated space for employees to share their ideas on how to improve our company. It creates an inclusive environment where every employee has a voice and can contribute their unique perspectives and insights. By tapping into the collective knowledge and creativity of our workforce, we can uncover innovative solutions and drive positive change across various aspects of our organization. The platform facilitates idea-sharing, collaboration, and feedback, allowing for the refinement and implementation of the best ideas.
Problem it Solves: This  is a platform that promotes employee engagement and idea-sharing within our company. It allows every employee to contribute their ideas on how to improve our organization. This initiative harnesses the collective knowledge and creativity of our workforce, facilitating the identification of innovative solutions and driving positive change across various areas of our company. By providing a platform for employee ideas, the "Out of the box" platform cultivates a culture of continuous improvement and empowers individuals to actively contribute to our company's growth and success.
Benefits: The platform benefits our organization in several ways. It increases employee engagement by providing a space for idea-sharing, fostering ownership and motivation. It encourages collaboration and breaks down silos, promoting teamwork. The platform taps into employee creativity, leading to innovative ideas and improvements. It facilitates continuous improvement by identifying optimization opportunities. Additionally, it empowers employees and recognizes their contributions, enhancing job satisfaction. Lastly, the platform fosters a positive organizational culture of openness and inclusivity.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Others, Pricing, Sales
Tags: awards, businessfocused, communications, ContinuousImporovement, costefficiency, costsaving, customer, daily, digital, identifypotentials, PowerPlatform, sharing
Members: Arvis Aleckis, Baiba Zviedre, Karlis Bicans, Karlis Rozentals

Title: SPARK
Description: Efficiency: instead send an email the agent can just assign the case to the correct department, and the system will assign IT automatically. - Reduce email ping-pong: less send of emails, and if an agent is sick, the other can easily do the backup - data transparency all the information is saved and visible in the system - Customer Experience increases because each department can see what has already been done
Problem it Solves: Implementing SPARK in most possible departments, the communication between departments will be: - efficiently,  - Reduce email ping-pong - data transparency all the information is saved and visible in the system - Customer Experience increases because each department can see what has already been done
Benefits: will help to increase Quality (Customer Experience) and efficiency with automated Notification to customers, automated Case creation and notification if the customer fills out the Web form for Tracking, Claim and Complaint Already in SPARK implemented department full or partial: - Customer Service - CCCG Customs  - VAT QH - All OPS facilities - Finance in Germany (to do C & C disbursements) Looking to implement other departments. Adding OPS, helps us to do differents processes like UNDELS (INTL & DOMESTIC), and Query communication using 1 tool.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Finance, Hubs & Gateways, Network Operations, Others
Members: Bettina Hauck, Jeremie MEZZAROBBA, Marco SCHNEITER

Title: Live Chat - CCCG Customs Department
Description: With the MCT Live Chat, the CS Agent after seeing that the customer would communicate with the customs department, we can transfer the live chat directly to them.
Problem it Solves: Some customer which do live chat with Customer Service, after checking the needs, the CS Agent see that the Customer would like to contact the CCCG -. Customs Group.
Benefits: Customer Experience increasing - increase the Efficiency without losing time

Title: Reduce NSP rejection
Description: I think it may help to resolve the issue if there is a better process on the scanner. Such as when an ops agent is applying a non-stack scan to a shipment the scanner should automatically ask the agent to take a picture, which is then uploads the image of the shipment to Global Imaging. I believe this will reduce the amount of credits being raised for the NSP surcharge.
Problem it Solves: We are currently facing a lot a rejections from operations when it comes to the non-stackable surcharge , some stations advise that they do not have access to cctv or that after a certain period of time they are unable to check as the cctv data does not go back this far. Due to this reason lots of non-stackable surcharge are being credited as we are unable to provide images to the customer to support the charge.
Benefits: It will reduce the amount of credits being raised for the non-stackable surcharge. If pictures are uploaded for every shipment with this scan applied to we will be able to justify the charges to the customer meaning invoices can been processed for payment. If pictures are uploaded to global imaging when the scan is applied this mean queries that are logged regarding this charged can be action in a timely manner which protect revenue.

Title: OPS Systems Help Page
Description: A simple and intuitive Sharepoint page will make recurring help topics are easily accessible. It provides up-to-date shortcuts to the tools used by the OPS users and manuals for the hardware that is deployed in their department.  There are direct links to GSD Forms for raising issues, which create service tickets that are allocated directly to the correct team.
Problem it Solves: Operations users often contact OPS Systems with the same questions and problems, generating unnecessary workload. Creation of service tickets can be complicated and lead to incomplete details and inaccurate allocation.
Benefits: Users in Operations have a one-stop shop with a single easy to remember URL for all questions and issues they might have about the IT systems they are using. Users will be able to solve common issues themselves, and when they do need help it will be easy and fast to reach the responsible team.
Tags: forms, helppage, manuals, operations, opssystems, servicetickets, sharepoint, support

Title: Local IT support website on Sharepoint
Description: This website centralizes all information required for the employees. By utilizing the forms on the website to make tickets they are automatically routed to the appropriate resolver groups avoiding extra cost by bypassing ITS Servicedesk.
Problem it Solves: Business didn't know where to find all relevant IT information related to the country and legal entity. Business also didn't know how to submit certain types of requests or incidents.
Benefits: Tickets are immediately and correctly assigned and thereby solved more quickly. Users don't lose time looking for information on several locations., they have one single website with everything centralized.  They only need to remember one single URL  ithelp.dhl.com Cost decrease because of bypassing ITS Servicedesk.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: Customs authorizations pick up Portal
Description: The solution will allow you to order a courier and prepare a waybill that the sender will print before the courier's arrival
Problem it Solves: Ordering a courier to collect documents and authorizations for the purpose of customs clearance of an import shipment.
Benefits: fully digital and automatic handling of providing a complete set of necessary documents for customs clearance
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
