Title: Price estimator
Description: Possibility of simulating the ideal offer for the customer
Problem it Solves: Problem It Solves Creating a quick price estimate for the customer. DHL offers have many predefined price lists. Sales representatives have trouble proposing a specific price list to meet customer needs. The appraiser allows to simulate pricing from multiple price lists based on specific criteria: sender and recipient addresses, weight, dimensions, etc. Benefits Speed in creating a price estimate for customers that meets their need.
Benefits: Speed in creating a price offer for customers that meets their needs
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Members: Dariusz Molski, Kacper Kolak, Krystian Kregiel

Title: Google maps for servicepoint locations on scanners
Description: Since GCA doesn’t support the redirection to the nearest Service Point in case of a NH, couriers were struggling to find the nearest location to bring undelivered shipments to. The option offered by DHL  (locator.dhl.com) had some downsides, and therefore I looked for an alternative.
Problem it Solves: give courier easy access to service point locations
Benefits: Courier delivers shipments to the nearest servicepoint

Title: Notification of guests to the security department
Description: Lack of control of people visiting facilities
Problem it Solves: Inform security department and prepare gatehouse for visiting people
Benefits: Visibility of people visting our facilities and protection against entry by unauthorized persons.   Meeting the requirements of the TAPA certificate.

Title: KAD (PCS) Profile App
Description: Inefficient documentation process for KAD profiles. Current organizational framework; PCS Profiles are burdened by a cumbersome documentation process. The use of spreadsheets or word documents, each containing multiple tabs with built-in formulas, has proven to be time-consuming for KAD advisors and leaders to manage. The multi-step data entry process, coupled with the need for regular manual updates across potentially thousands of individual worksheets, is impeding efficiency, data protection and in addition the current storage in teams means that visibility is limited.
Problem it Solves: To address the current challenges in KAD (PCS) Profile management, we propose the implementation of a comprehensive solution leveraging the capabilities of PowerApps, PowerFlow, and SharePoint. Centralized PowerApp for effortless data entry and management. Dynamic profile design, centrally reactive to changing customer needs and country requirements will ensure that KAD customer profiles can be effectively maintained.  Data visibility for the Advisors and Manager who manage KAD customers, centralized management for easy updates and instantaneous availability. Time savings for advisor and TM
Benefits: Our proposed solution not only addresses the current inefficiencies in KAD profile documentation but also transforms the Profile into a dynamic and data-driven experience, empowering both KAD advisors and Leadership for better customer integration and experience for our Key Account customers. The simplified data entry process and streamlined documentation workflow result in significant time savings for advisors. The centralised data allows for visibility for Team leaders; especially beneficial to observe profile updates, changes and when advisors change teams in a fluid KAD environment
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: digitalforms, efficency, employee, powerapp, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, productivity

Title: my.dhlexpress.nl online booking tool
Description: Online booking tool to support easy booking for non-account holders with Click&Bring (First Mile via ServicePoint) service offering Tool can be accessed via my.dhlexpress.nl (also in English language) Ownership, development and support is managed by DHL eCS NL in-house IT team
Problem it Solves: Offer express shipping to non-accountholders combining eCS (Parcel) and Express (TDI) offer in one place fully mobile-optimised (PWA technology)
Benefits: Revenue Customer Experience

Title: Training-Booking-Tool
Description: Our Booking Tool streamlines the creation, management, and organization of On-Site meetings for our training department. They'll have access to an overview of all available meeting rooms, including capacity and facilities. Additionally, they can assign participants to specific meetings to ensure the preservation of their qualifications. With our tool, the trainings department can optimize the planning and execution of meetings. Users can also conveniently register for meetings through an overview page as needed.
Problem it Solves: Our training department manages all On-Site meetings in a group mailbox. The offered meetings are manually entered and presented on a SharePoint page, and promoted via email announcements. This takes more time and it is prone to errors.
Benefits: The training department can easily set up On-Site meetings and efficiently manage all ongoing meetings. Users are provided with an overview of available trainings and have the ability to register themselves for a training session.
Members: Franz Raab, Marvin Schreiber, Susann Laurent

Title: Digital Check-In/Out for Flex Workers
Description: The Campfire solution introduces a comprehensive digital check-in/check-out system, built using Microsoft PowerApps, to replace the existing paper-based process. This solution leverages QR code technology and web access to streamline the registration process for flex workers at DHL facilities. The system captures essential data such as name, company, date & time of entry, time of exit, and car license plate information, storing it in a secure SharePoint list.
Problem it Solves: The current process for tracking the presence of flex workers within facilities is primarily paper-based. This method is inefficient, prone to errors, and lacks real-time accessibility. Additionally, it poses challenges in accurately monitoring the in-and-out movements of personnel, leading to potential security issues and administrative burdens. Furthermore, the reliance on paper contributes to environmental waste, conflicting with our organizational commitment to sustainability.
Benefits: The digital check-in/out system at the facilities enhances operational efficiency by automating processes, reducing errors, and saving time. It boosts security with real-time monitoring and a reliable audit trail, while ensuring GDPR compliance. The solution supports sustainability by eliminating paper use, thus reducing environmental impact and aligning with DHL's eco-friendly goals. Additionally, it provides a convenient, user-friendly experience for employees, enhancing satisfaction and fostering a more efficient, secure, and sustainable workplace.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: UK Customs Post-Clearance Amendment Log
Description: By using a Power Apps solution, new data will be stored in Sharepoint, greatly increasing the efficiency of searching & updating older records. A PowerBI-based dashboard will then use these figures to provide real-time reporting for the senior leaders of the department. For the end-user, their experience utilising this application will be far smoother than the current method, resulting in less daily crashes, and an overall more user-friendly way of working.
Problem it Solves: The PCA Log is intended to replace old Access Database versions of the Post-Clearance Amendment log, which is slow, outdated and difficult to update/maintain. This work is part of the ongoing push to digitise various works in the UK Customs department, and has been sourced by obtaining feedback from the members of the PCA team.
Benefits: For our users on the PCA team, the improved UI will make logging amendments a more efficient & enjoyable task compared to the current Access Database. Updating previous records with new information will also be far easier, due to an improved search function in contrast to the limited "AWB only" search available in Access. The enhanced PowerBI level of reporting will make analysis of customer trends far easier for the senior stakeholders of the team, as well as the ability to monitor agent interactions with the tool.
Members: Chloe-Jayne Richardson, Jacob Price, Sophie Hallatt

Title: Automatic Notification for Customs Shipment
Description: System sends SMS message and mail to customers automatically when the notification time comes. It checks the customers with customs shipment and notifies them.
Problem it Solves: Manual notifications to customers cause workload and loss of time. When we automate the system, both of these problems disappear
Benefits: The benefits of the automated notification process include time savings, easier tracking of the work done, and reduced workload.

Title: Controlled issue of goodies
Description: To ensure controlled dispensing, the requirements are first identified.  Based on these quantities, a receipt authorisation is generated for each team in the form of a PDF containing a QR code. The authorisation is presented in order to receive the goodies (the qr code can also be displayed digitally). When the QR code is scanned, the system displays which team is involved, how many goodies the team receives and whether the team has already received the goodies.  On issue, the status is changed to collected to ensure that each team receives the reported quantity.
Problem it Solves: Addresses the issue of uncontrolled and inefficient distribution of MAB Goodies. Automates the distribution process, ensures fairness, enhances operational efficiency, and supports our sustainability efforts.
Benefits: The solution ensures that the distribution of MAB goodies within the organisation is fair and transparent. By giving each team leader a unique code and preventing duplicate collections, fair distribution is guaranteed. In addition, long waiting times are minimised by knowing the collection quantities in advance so that employees from the issuing department can prepare the deliveries. Employees in the issuing department have significantly more certainty, as they know exactly whether a team has already received or not. Frequently asked questions are are displayed on the PDF.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Tags: 0365, digital, digitalhub, digitalization, office365, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, quality, smartworking, smartworkspace

Title: Outlook File Templates
Description: The External Communications Team, intend to create a brand compliant Outlook File Template which can be used by Sales using the Dreamweaver software. The template will include imagery and relevant logos to ensure that our customers receive messages that are consistent with all of the assets and channels that they use to engage with the DHL Express brand. DHL Express UK is the market leader and therefore protecting our brand equity is extremely important.
Problem it Solves: Sales have approached Marketing to provide email templates which can be used for customer facing communications. In some cases, Sales have produced their own and although well intentioned, the templates and copywriting are not in line with DHL Brand Guidelines. Therefore, there is an opportunity to support Sales by providing them with a template that is in line with our branding to ensure our customers receive professional looking communications whilst maintaining our brand equity and image in the market.
Benefits: This campfire could lead to the following benefits:  (1) A better customer experience as our audience will receive consistent communications that are brand compliant.  (2) An improved employee experience as our External Communications Team will spend less time having to re-work communications which do not meet the brand guidelines.  (3) This initiative could support sustainability as the Outlook File Template is electronic and therefore we are using less paper to send out external communications.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Sustainability Impact

Title: HG MXP - DDT PDF
Description: make creation and send of a PDF to the vendor that need DDT quick and simply
Problem it Solves: Create and send immediately a PDF to vendor fro shipment that need repair
Benefits: Make the DDT PDF request by vendor more easy to create and send
Members: Andrea ROSSINI, Fabrizio Gorini, Leo Femia

Title: Customs CMF Creation Tool
Description: By using a Power App frontend, this solution works to massively reduce the number of emails sent on a daily basis, as well as to ensure a standardised template is utilised for CMF creations.
Problem it Solves: The Customs CMF Tool works to streamline the current process of Customs Clearance Agents to send CMF updates to the CMF Team. Emails are the current method of sending an update to the CMF team, which can vary in both template & content quality.
Benefits: The user experience for our teams is much greater since using the tool, and the process by which the CMF Team themselves create new CMF's is both easier and more efficient.

Title: EXP BE - Robotic account for HR flows
Description: HR colleagues now host flows which benefit the entire department under their personal account.
Problem it Solves: With the creation of a dedicated business HR robotic account, all business HR flows can be hosted under one managed environment thereby ensuring continuity
Benefits: With the creation of a managed robotic account, we can guarantee that HR flows which serve both business as well as the internal department, are correctly managed within the organization

Title: IT service request application
Description: The solution enables users from business to have a single point of entry, receive feedback on their project request and have easily available access to information on IT equipment. The validation process is less time consuming.
Problem it Solves: Manual and tidious process for projects requests and validation. Not easily accessible and tied to personal accounts.
Benefits: Reduce time spend on service requestts validation Single point of information and enquiries for PM  Better visibility on projects follow up

Title: Found Cash Programme
Description: The UK Found Cash process had been put into place as there was many areas of non-compliance around unidentified cash at the Service Centres. A log (OF09) has been created to log all Found Cash from all Service Centres, which is a manual process, where the QE Team need to spend time reviewing and cleansing the data every few days. By having a standardize platform or app to use to ensure all required details are entered by SVCs, it helps remove room for any errors and a supportive tool for  Auditing purposes and will make the process much more efficient!
Problem it Solves: With the current Found Cash Process, we are dealing with a very long drawn out, manual process of logging all Found Cash from all UK Service Centres with the information all added to 1 excel spreadsheet which is accessible and editable for many users, causing hours towards admin/cleansing data.  The log needs checked by the Audit team on a daily basis to ensure the process is being followed correct at all Service Centres. If there is any missing information, we need to then contact each SVC to ensure the log is up-to-date, so causing a lot of time spent chasing up the correct information.
Benefits: It will increase Operational efficiency by having a specific platform to gather the data,  it will improve the tracking of data as it removes the manual process to prevent errors in data entry. With having a streamlined process like this, it will not only benefit Operations but the Security Team, QE Team and the Finance Department.  It will increase Employee experience by improving productivity and it will ensure processes are managed and followed correctly accordingly to Global SOP, along with doing our part as a business as already we have donated roughly £862.00 to RNIB!

Title: NCTS5 - E2OPEN - VITBIQ linehaul
Description: Local IT developed a stored procedure connecting multiple sources: iSeries (CDS+AHS+AIRACS), middleware for the ICS processes, local customs application for summary declarations (ACMEDI) and the local customs application for clearance (DHLTRANS). The most challenging fields to get were related to Precedence Document which should contain the incoming movement into the hub, and the HS codes to 8 digits.
Problem it Solves: NCTS5 was deployed without having an interface among AHS/OCNT - BTI - E2OPEN. E2OPEN brings the option to upload the information needed in excel/csv format to create and send the electronic messages to the Spanish Customs.
Benefits: Service Quality EU approved +1 in transit time as local customs was unable to do it in time. We checked other options like other linehauls into BIQ (BOD-BIQ) but it was not possible. With the initiative, we recovered the service vs pre-NCTS5 situation serving BIQ the same day the aircrafts land in VIT. On the other hand, we split the outgoing movements in several bags of information preventing orange/red circuits to the whole content, we're able to get non-green circuits for the selected shipments based on HScodes and descriptions.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: AIRACS, DataAnalytics, E2OPEN, HSCode, NCTS, NCTS5, SQLServer
Members: David Fraga Tamayo, Jorge Rico, Lucas Galipolo Uriarte, Tomas HOLGADO

Title: Auto email to customer following pickup exception
Description: Automatically sends an email or text notification to a customer following a pickup exception. Alerting the customer should a problem arise at the time of requested collection. They can then contact the Customer Service team to find out why collection was not successful and reschedule. This makes for a better customer experience and will highlight any problems straight away, instead of the customer finding out their shipment was not picked up till later on.
Problem it Solves: Currently, when a booking is scanned as pickup exception by driver, our Dispatch team send the booking back to Customer Services by email through an MCT mailbox. A Customer Service agent will then make contact with the customer to inform them of the exception (futile pickup). However, as the emails from Dispatch are pushed to a Customer Service adviser through MCT they are not seen immediately and there can be a delay in informing the customer of the failed collection. This can result in the customer being dissatisfied that they were not notified straight away.
Benefits: Customers informed of a failure to pick up their shipment straight away, allowing them time to contact the Customer Service team, resolve outstanding problems, and rebook for a time and date that suits them. Saves the Dispatch team time as they will no longer need to send the Problem Pickup emails to the Customer Service team. Also, saves the Frontline Customer Service team from having to make an outbound call to the customer to alert them to the failure, meaning they can stay available to answer incoming calls.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: automatedemails, Booking, collections, customer, CustomerExprience, customerservice, RPA, RPAAssistance

Title: Telesales mobile numbers presentation on GCCU
Description: Adding mobile phones numbers to GCCU allow Telesales Team calls to be identify by customers as mobile numbers and increased response rate.
Problem it Solves: Customers in Poland are not keen to answer calls from land lines numbers. Some even block all the unknown land line numbers and the phone reject them automatically. This situation in Poland is caused by a large number of annoying marketing calls. Thats why Telesales Team has started using mobile phones instead of GCCU. This is suboptimal as this calls are not recorded and no reports are available for them.
Benefits: Increased number of calls answered by customers which lead to higher usage of GCCU and better reporting and understanding the business.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: noMSExcel Shifts and Vacation Tracker
Description: the solution will be based on M365 / MSTeams / Shifts solution. This solution solves the mobility and accessibility requirements but still has to use MSExcel for reporting purposes in an ugly format. We got success connecting PowerBI with Shifts, the idea is to get rid of MSExcel in a modern and more comprehensive way to see your shift, request changes, request holidays, track the remaining days of holidays, etc
Problem it Solves: Shifts and Vacation tracker now based on MSExcels worksheets managed by Supervisors. Very manual procedure to assign shifts, request holidays, report sickness days... and the communication to the employees.
Benefits: paperless environment, mobile access to the application instead of going through the supervisor(s), less manual workload, option to jump onto a workforce planning tool
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations
Tags: holiday, M365, msteams, noExcel, o365, powerbi, PowerPlatform, pwer, shiftplanning, Shifts
Members: Alicia MARBAN INGELMO, David Fraga Tamayo, Jonathan Apilanez Bartolome, Lucas Galipolo Uriarte, Maria Jose GONZALEZ ZAZO, Tania MANGANA JARA, Tomas HOLGADO

Title: Online Booking for Service Centre Meeting Rooms
Description: Bookings can be made online so Operations don't have to stop tasks to help others consult the paper based diaries. Employees wishing to book a meeting room can view availability online and reserve their required date. Eg if i wanted to book a meeting in Scotland I would have to reach out to EDI service centre and GLA to see which meeting rooms were available. If there was a method to do so  online, I could easily view this and not have to contact both Ops teams to check availability or reserve dates.
Problem it Solves: Paper based, localised meeting room booking process - At the moment this is managed locally at each service centre and  at GLA & EDI in particular this is done by form of a paper diary.  Introducing an online booking system for all UK service centres increase our digitaization and make the process a lot easier for any employees who require to book a service center meeting room. It will save the operations team time and effort of having to check paper diaries any time anyone wishes to book a meeting.  This will also reduce paper in the form of paper diaries.
Benefits: Saves paper, moving us towards more digitalisation and makes the booking process for meeting rooms a more efficient process for all employees.
Most impacted Functions: General Management, IT, Network Operations, Others, Sales

Title: Speech to Text - Multiple Attendees
Description: A software is required that will dictate meetings with multiple attendees either in person, via teams or a mixture into a format that can be used to provide to all parties present as minutes that can be presented a a true record of the meeting held. This will benefit HR departments, management teams and employees to determine what has been said, when and by whom. The software needs to be able to clearly identify multiple users and provide an accurate dictation of who has said what.
Problem it Solves: Currently either the Business Partners, HRPS or a member of a management team will need to take non-verbatim minutes for meetings that require documentation, this is a timely process and requires significant resources across all functions of the Organisation which is not efficient and can lead to delays and errors being produced. This Campfire would allow for minutes to be minuted without the requirement of additional resource and enable an accurate record of meetings and reduce the time required to ensure they meet the required standard.
Benefits: This will lead to a more efficient production of records of meetings through the use of minutes and provide an accurate true reflection of meetings that have been held. This will be able to be used with people who are holding formal meetings, wellbeing meetings or any meeting that should be documented for the benefit of the employee and the DHL.
Tags: hr, HRmadeeasy, HumanResources, managementmadeeasy, Notetakingmadeeasy, RPA

Title: CoPilot for 365
Description: Using Copilot 365 embeds within our Microsoft ecosystem using all of our apps - PowerPoint, word, PDF, Power Bi, teams etc.  This will use AI technology to help our team managers within our organization manage their time better and improve on efficiency. In turn this will provide our team managers with more time to focus on of people and coach advisors to provide a better customer experience.
Problem it Solves: Using Copilot 365 will aid out team managers within Customer Service to be more efficient and creative. Reducing the time spent to arrange meetings, taking minutes, create slides and create communication.
Benefits: Improve on communication that is sent to our people. Allow managers to be more creative with communication and presentations to capture the audiences attention better. Allow team managers to quickly schedule meetings, take meeting notes and arrange follow up meetings. Prepare presentations quickly. Extract information from our process documents such as GSOP for quick summaries. Work with our SharePoint pages again to extract information quickly.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: SME Program - Rate Presentation
Description: I am proposing that we have to digitalize this process, moving away from documentation to a system based solution that shows a customer a simple price based on entering some key criteria. When an existing customer prepares a shipment on MyDHL+ it is linked to the rate engine and can display the price based on destination, weight, service etc. I would like to have a similar solution for new customers. This campfire would hopefully solve the problem by simplifying the view of our pricing for  customer to have maximum confidence that the price they see is the price that they will pay.
Problem it Solves: Within Sales, our documentation for presenting pricing to new and existing customers is very complicated. It generally includes pages of zone tables, and rate tables for the various services that we provide. This makes it extremely difficult to present to a customer especially for our Telesales team, or anyone explaining rates to a customer over the phone. This results in low confidence from a customer on understanding the prices they will pay, and subsequently this affects conversion rates from prospect to customer, and revenue.
Benefits: The benefits of this campfire will be for employees as it makes the process of explaining pricing easier to a customer. And for customers, as they gain confidence from simplicity, rather than being confused by multiple zone tables and rate tables, they can just enter in the weight and dims and choose the destination and service and a rate is displayed subject to surcharges etc - This in turn will lead to more new customers and more revenue.

Title: Operation Training Matrix and Digital TAF Complete
Description: The new solution would be an app allowing all trainers to see what training employees require and also complete the TAF assessment form within the same application. this would then generate a PDF assessment form with all the information and signatures and would store the document under the employees record.
Problem it Solves: Current EMA Operation Trainers use excel Matrix's to keep track of all operations area training and complete paper based TAF assessment forms.
Benefits: This will make training in the operation more efficient and will remove all paper based forms allowing for all training to be completed digitally. This system will be able to send automatics notification emails to the sort trainers listing employees whos training expires soon.  A Power Bi dashboard can be made giving the trainers real time data for all sort training and automatically updating PD boards with training information
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: AI based internal chatbot for Customs ES
Description: Chat GPT is a tool that is used both in a work and an off-work basis. Creating something similar for Customs related queries can be a great opportunity to increase the user experience, avoid speed losses due to knowledge sharing, standardize and control the information shared. The solution should work similar to Chat GPT, but it is crucial the ES team can control what is being uploaded to train the solution to make sure the output is up to date and valid.
Problem it Solves: The ES Customs team consists of > 300 colleagues and Customs is a rather complex field. Hence, on a daily basis, a significant amount of internal queries are being made. Currently the ES team stores their training material, supporting documents, work instructions and guidelines on an internal drive. Knowledge is shared between the agents. Some documents are outdated. Customs employees can benefit from having an AI based chat bot they can ask their questions to, making sure that knowledge is standardized and speed losses due to knowledge sharing can be limited.
Benefits: If this solution can be used as the Go to tool for employees to ask, this will decrease the hours spent on training and knowledge sharing. This will have a positive impact on productivity and costs. It can also impact the quality of the Customs declarations submitted, decreasing the need for Post Clearance modifications, fines and penalties as well as write offs.
Tags: ai, chatbot, chatbotvirtualassistant, customs, customsclearance, DAAssistance, DataAnalytics, GenAI, GenAIAssistance, machinelearning

Title: Message Teams Channel
Description: Creating a workflow which accepts an http request as a trigger then posts a message to a teams channel seems like the appropriate solution. We can then use the current method of posting messages by changing the url.
Problem it Solves: We currently send server maintenance notifications to teams channels via webhooks eg patch and reboot of a server. As per the message below this functionalty will stop working so we need an alternative.  "Action Required: O365 connectors within Teams will be deprecated and notifications from this service will stop."
Benefits: There will be other services using webhooks to send messages to teams channels,  this flow can be used as a template for the others.

Title: EXP BE Service Center Presenter
Description: The existing Digital Performance Dialogue large screens are only utilized for a very short amount of time during the day and are shut down for the remainder of the day.  By attaching a computer which displays a powerpoint slideshow which is maintained by the local supervisors of which the onscreen displayed content is refreshed every 15 minutes, the supervisors are able to reach all local staff by means of non-verbal digital interaction outside of PD times.
Problem it Solves: It is difficult for couriers to stay informed on local content (contained to one service center) outside of the relatively short PD meetings and wallboards which mostly contain printed content. Smart connect only shows general content, no continuously up-to-date feedback concerning courier activities or performance or any detailed route or road information.
Benefits: Couriers stay up to date by receiving tailored content which is readily available throughout the day by which they are better informed to do their jobs and which makes it possible for supervisors to provide real-time feedback without physical engagement with each individual courier. Content can be brought in an animated way which makes information stick better better compared to trying to get the message across by utilizing words only during the relatively short PD meetings.

Title: MyBill - Billing Weight Query Reduction
Description: This would aid query reduction massively and would free up the DHL colleagues to concentrate their resource on matters that require a more hands on approach, because we would currently need a front line agent to log the query and then a backline agent to send out the billing data and close the query off. there is no perceived need in my view for multiple and/or teams to be involved in such a basic task, as we can leverage DHL's digitalization platform to prevent the need for this to query to be raised at source.
Problem it Solves: I'd like to suggest if there is any way we could implement billing weight audit data which we can pull from Sherloc, into DHL MyBill on the client side, so that the customer is able to obtain copies of the final DHL billing weights/dimensions on their end.
Benefits: Benefits for the customer would include, better convenience, accessibility and a reduced workload for them, it would also reduce the number of queries we receive for weights which would help to drive query numbers down and improve the quality of the employees experience as it would reduce the workload and allow them to spend more time and resource on deeper rooted customer issues or queries.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Automated PDN Notifications through ESB
Description: This is integrated through calling ESB  Shipment Auto Track API,as to register these messages again with Excel VBA Http web requests which can also be delivered by other tools or even by Power Automate Http Requests. While this Campfire designed for Express Turkey usage it can be expanded to a regional / global solution. Similar to below campfires Automated PDN registration but completed https://campfire.dhl.com/detail/1a75c677-67c3-4105-a7b6-575829f8dbc5 Populate Sherloc Shipment Notifications https://campfire.dhl.com/detail/0e039cac-f8e3-452a-a7ba-386d81abccf9
Problem it Solves: As Customer Service department has a PDN Proactive Delivery Notification Service as to offer to customers this service as there are too many shipments to notify either means of SMS and email. As previously the process automated through leveraging NPTS - Network Proactive Tracking System's , PDN entry screen with web entry automation through Excel VBA, after sunset of NPTS this is integrated through calling ESB - Enterprise Service Bus service Shipment Auto Track API.
Benefits: This initiative helps automation and standardizing the process with improving all customer/employee/operational experiences.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Members: Alpay UTKU, Aytun CAKIR, Nurdan OZGUNER

Title: Perfect Fleet
Description: One of the products I have been looking into (Coats) is a camera system that sits either side of the of the vehicle entrance.  This will film the vehicle body as it leaves and then do the same when it returns.  It will also show who is driving the vehicle on that day.  Each day we can then compare each van for accumulated damage and move forward with investigations and repairs in a timely manner.  This will also put a name to the person responsible allowing us to put Golden Hour claims in or to charge the costs to any Agencies that were responsible for supplying the driver to the business.
Problem it Solves: The damage to vehicles and costs incurred in maintaining a well cared for fleet are very high and a lot of the problems lie with not being able to allocate blame in order to recover costs.  It is difficult to monitor both ends of a shift and keep an eye on day to day damage, especially when not reported.  This idea will automatically inspect the vehicles as they leave the site and when they return allowing fleet to allocate blame where required also giving proof to claims.
Benefits: The process will allow the business to claim back costs related to damage repairs much more speedily and will make the drivers act in a more responsible way in reporting all damage.  The cameras will be constantly monitoring so that nothing is missed.  This will ultimately speed up repairs and pay outs from insurance companies and result in a healthy looking fleet.  Our fleet is our mobile branding and maintaining the look of the fleet is very important.

Title: EXP LT - Robotic account for Business IT flows
Description: With the creation of a dedicated business IT robotic account, all business IT flows can be hosted under one managed environment thereby ensuring continuity
Problem it Solves: Business IT colleagues now host flows which benefit the entire department under their personal account.
Benefits: With the creation of a managed robotic account, we can guarantee that IT flows which serve both business as well as the internal department, are correctly managed within the organisation

Title: Self Service Rack for IT Hardware
Description: My Campfire is able to provide a 24/7 and 365 days solution for a specific kind of hardware exchange. Our customers are not tied to our IT team in case of hardware defects or collecting spare/loan devices. The "vending" machine is deployed with a generic user that has access to my self service tool (Power Apps); within the app there is a simple GUI that allows the customer to select the needed product. The customer can see the availability from the product; and after the confirmation the location from the product. We're also able to relive the local service desk team from repetitive work.
Problem it Solves: Due to spontaneous defect of technical equipment from our customers it is mandatory to provide spare devices within a short time. These defects can occur during any time and related to the fact that we're a global acting airline we need a solution that is not connected to any number of employees, sick leaves or unstaffed offices (during the on-call time). My Self Service Rack aims to distribute basic IT hardware eg. Keyboards, Mouses, Headsets and basic wiring for OPS related equipment.
Benefits: My Campfire could save up to three hours of work in one month.  Related to our internal GSN ticket system we could outsource up to 200 work tasks.  *Numbers related to GSN Report - we will add more KPI's.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: 0365, EAT, ITAutomation, powerapps, PowerPlatform, RPA, selfservice
Members: Franz Raab, Justin Tschiedel, Robert Konn

Title: EXP BE - Robotic account for Business IT flows
Description: With the creation of a dedicated business IT robotic account, all business IT flows can be hosted under one managed environment thereby ensuring continuity
Problem it Solves: Business IT colleagues now host flows which benefit the entire department under their personal account.
Benefits: With the creation of a managed robotic account, we can guarantee that IT flows which serve both business as well as the internal department, are correctly managed within the organisation

Title: Power Automate http request
Description: Designing Power Automate flow that will do the work automatically.
Problem it Solves: Saves time and human resources by automating data flow from C360 system to Sharepoint Document Libraries.
Benefits: Save time, automate process, free up human resources

Title: Ticket App
Description: We propose a Power Apps-based ticketing system, linked to a SharePoint list for centralized ticket management. This system, incorporating a Power Automate process for automated responses as well as a manager's approval feature will speed up communication and resolution times. The user-friendly submission page, designed in Power Automate, will allow for comprehensive data collection, resulting in a simplified and transparent ticket submission process.
Problem it Solves: Our current ticketing system lacks a seamless interface, making the process of responding to and managing tickets quite complex. As a result, it's challenging to conduct analysis on factors such as completion times and frequency of tickets submitted by individuals. These issues can lead to inefficiencies in operations and communication, and not all teams have access to a suitable solution for these challenges.
Benefits: With the proposed Power Apps-based ticketing system, both efficiency and transparency will significantly improve. Through automated responses facilitated by Power Automate, communication and resolution times will be expedited, leading to improved operational productivity. The user-friendly submission page allows comprehensive data collection, enabling better analysis and decision-making. Furthermore, the SharePoint-linked system offers centralized ticket management, simplifying the process for all teams.

Title: etichettatrici_approval
Description: Each request where done via mail . Cumbersome and outdated way of getting an approval.  We now have records stored in SharePoint and an updated inventory list.
Problem it Solves: We created a powerapps, in which user/customer will fill the requested data and raise a request to be approved by his manager. then the manager can access directly via deeplink and review the request, once is done. he will decide to approve or reject and then if approved will be sent an email to a specific person which will fill other more values and approve it
Benefits: By providing a single platform for submitting and tracking requests, we aim to create a more cohesive, efficient, and transparent process. This application will enable us to better log, track, and manage these requests, ensuring that all ideas are duly considered and none are overlooked. We believe that this step will further empower our teams, encourage innovation, and foster a culture of continuous improvement. We are excited about the potential this holds for all of us in the DHL Group.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: LEJ Hub E-Learning
Description: Flexible, modular, attractively designed and multimedia e-learning modules make learning at the LEJ Hub more efficient.
Problem it Solves: The LEJ Hub has a wide range of training requirements that either need to be modernized or created.
Benefits: Time and costs can be optimized through flexible, relevant training courses. Self-efficacy, safety culture, proper and professional behavior are enhanced.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Others

Title: Minor Non-Comformities registry
Description: Every member of the organization can access the registry and log any minor non-comnformity they encounter, an automated e-mail then goes to the supervisors/managers of the team, that has created this action and can be either immediately solved or saved for a team meeting. Also, every month, during ICCC committee meeting, the problems, that occurred the most, are brought before the members and an action plan is created to adrress those issues in a constructive and sustainable way.
Problem it Solves: Every day there are minor non-comformities or deviations from our SOPs, that do not become claims, but impact the experience of our customers or fellow colleagues, resulting TIMWOOD. It's hard to keep track of them or measure the scale of the problem to be able to make discissions - do we need to look at the whole process, redefine how we do things, or just have coaching sessions, adrress the problem in a PD etc.
Benefits: Every member of the organization is able to express their issues and they are addressed in a timely and visible manner
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Finance, Hubs & Gateways, IT, Sales

Title: Address Intelligence - Bad Address/Stops
Description: Via the SMARTDelivery platform, operators will get an excel file in which all the inbound shipments addresses are matched to various governmental and open source databases to determine an accuracy score. Those which are determined to be at risk will be put forward so that an operator can start the process of identifying the correct address. The system will also evaluate the expected number of stops per route to deliver all these shipments. Doing this as early as possible in the day will enable operators to be proactive rather than reactive when confronted with these issues.
Problem it Solves: Anticipating Bad Adresses ahead of courier departure will result in a significant drop in Delivery Exceptions and streamline operations. Advance only covers BAs which have been already experienced. Anticipating the number of Stops during sorting operations will help with route balancing. DISCO is far from being availbale to all facilities.
Benefits: Anticipating Bad Adresses before they leave the facility should reduce the number of occurences where they lead to actual delivery failures. Dealing with these before the courier is on route will put less time pressure, shipments with wrong route allocation will be able to be caught before leaving the facility. Inceasing SPR prediction accuracy will give more time to supervisors to balance shipments across routes.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Tags: api, ba, badaddress, DeliveryExceptionsUndel, excel, Facilities, manifestservice, regex, route, routeoptimization, RPA, spr, stops
Members: Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Julien EDERY, Wesley Ochoa

Title: Courier Rates - Polish digressive model
Description: The new tool will eliminate errors caused by the number of complicated formulas (the application will perform calculations). The tool is much easier to use, and new users can be trained much faster and more effectively, which will ensure business continuity even in a crisis situation. Automation of issuing annexes with new rates will significantly reduce the labor intensity of the entire process of changes in the PUD.
Problem it Solves: The current tool for calculating courier rates is a very complicated Excel file. Adding or removing routes in the PUD plan involves manually adding new rows in the Excel file. A very large number of formulas makes the tool prone to errors and is operated by only one person. Which creates a risk of business continuity in the event of the person's unplanned absence. Currently, preparing annexes to the contract with new rates is a time-consuming, manual process.
Benefits: Significant acceleration of calculating the financial and operational impact of PUD changes. Elimination of errors caused by manual introduction of PUD changes in the current tool. Reducing the time for preparing annexes with new rates to 0. Ensuring business continuity by simplifying and automating the process of introducing changes to the PUD, which will allow the tool to be operated by new users.

Title: Last Mile - Drone delivery B2B
Description: Shipments to and from selected B2B customers can be made by air via a professional cargo drone DJI FlyCart30 that is already commercially available. Legislation that will enable the unmanned operation of drones along a defined and approved route should be approved in 2024. The first test flights with the drone and standardized box DHL shipments went well.
Problem it Solves: In Slovakia, we have at least four industrial customers (B2B) who are located near our warehouses (<10 km) and we make daily deliveries for them. DHL couriers visit these locations every day to pick up or deliver a shipments with a total weight of less than 20 kg. This routine, notoriously repetitive activity has the potential to be automated and at the same time implemented in an ecological way in the spirit of the GoGreen philosophy.
Benefits: Last mile zero-emission delivery with the most modern and progressive technology without the need for a small truck (VAN) to go out with a courier.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: CEU Lord of The Ring 2024 Application
Description: Two apps for Lord of The Ring 2024. Used for scorekeeping and displaying results.
Problem it Solves: Two apps for Lord of The Ring 2024. Used for scorekeeping and displaying results.
Benefits: Two apps for Lord of The Ring 2024. Used for scorekeeping and displaying results.

Title: GB Customs - Performance Hub
Description: The Performance Hub allows our Customs Clearance Agents to track their own performance throughout the day as well as on a 3-6 month basis, something they would need to manually request before it. For Senior Agent levels & above, they can effectively monitor the performance based on clusters across the department.
Problem it Solves: Will ultimately cut down on the number of outdated Excel-based reports in order to provide performance reporting/monitoring to all levels of the GB Customs Department. All while looking quite nice.
Benefits: Removing three outdated excel-based reports that are increasingly difficult to maintain, buckle under large volumes of data and aren't freely shareable for multiple concurrent users will save time, and headaches. All while providing our Clearance Agents a readily available report that they can access at any time to view only their own performance.

Title: OPO Workstations Review
Description: Instead of using an excel sheet on the mobile phone or using the laptop in the warehouse, this power app is easier and faster to use. It is also, more accurate. It was created this week and we performed tests with good feedback from the onsite users.
Problem it Solves: We need to perform regular checkups to workstations on the terminal. A power app was created to facilitate this process. Power app was created for test purpose on my personal environment and now needs to be migrated.
Benefits: Ease of use, speed, and tracking capabilities. The user interface is designed with simplicity in mind, ensuring that even those with minimal technical skills can navigate and operate it effortlessly. This ease of use reduces the learning curve, saving time and resources that would otherwise be spent on extensive training. It operates more swiftly than current options, enabling faster data processing and real-time updates. This increased efficiency can significantly enhance productivity.

Title: External Database Validator
Description: This is an excel tool, what can compare data in COMET with any kind of external datasourse. This has 2 way of  compararison.  1. After a sanitiy check try to find matches and add the GSFA Customer ID to the external datasource 2. After a sanity check try to find matches based on Jaro-Winkler methodology and add GSFA Customer ID to the external datasource   After that user can decide what other COMET data needs to add the datasource, and the tool can fill in.
Problem it Solves: All the time when sales managers would like to create a call list to sales reps, they often use external company databases. In these case we need to compare it with COMET and sign in case of match and fill some additional information (contact details, opportunity details etc.) This generates big extra workload, because most of the time the external data are slightly different like data in COMET. e.g: "Szabó és Társa kft." vs "Szabó és Társa korlátolt felelősséggű társaság"
Benefits: We are able to find more matches in less time. Before that one exercise takes around 20 min, now it takes 5.  We found around 30% more matches, so we has 30% less duplications, and sales can save time with in terms of manual check.

Title: Customs Petition requests workflow
Description: Workflow built on sharepoint using Office 365 flow+forms.  Customer sends an e-mail to GCCP with the request for customs petition. Then GCCP agents records it on a predefined form. Automatic e-mail gets sent to the customer about the request registration.
Problem it Solves: Tracking all customs petitions to Customs Authorities (regarding corrections in customs declaration)
Benefits: Automates workflow for customs Clients got information about whole process automaticly

Title: Customs Portal for receivers
Description: The portal  takes customs statuses from Local Customs Application and when the documents are required, it sends SMS to shipment receiver with a link.  Under the link the customer can obtain information about customs clearance status and information how to upload missing documents.
Problem it Solves: Necessary information to WPX receivers about the need to upload missing customs documents.
Benefits: Automates GCCP work Speeds up clearance process for clients

Title: AD checklists digitalization (Falcony)
Description: The Falcony URL for AD forms is available on courier scanners via the browser Sotisurf at all times. It saves them time as they do not have to fill information as it is retreived from our system by scanning the PID. We are compliant with DNV audits. The facilities and central OPs have real time information and can do their analysis much more upstream. The information is shared as it is centrally archived on the Falcony platform.
Problem it Solves: Before the implementation of digital AD closing checklists, central ops and supervisors would collect the information about a consignee's closing times a posteriori with information that may not be accurate (i.e. customer's name or address). It was a cumbersome job to analyze and neutralize some KPIs retroactively. Moreover there could be some loss of information as it was done on a paper sheet and this process was not compliant with mandatory control processes.
Benefits: This solution is GoGreen compliant as we do not have to print paper anymore for our more than 1000 couriers.  We will also be compliant with the DNV audits.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Members: Ayoub ATFANE, Evelyne ACHI, SANA SOUSSI

Title: AI imaging recognition for found shipment center
Description: With an imaging recognition software, we could feed a picture of the thing we are missing, and it would search through and compare it to the images uploaded in FSC instead of guessing what whomever found it has described it as.
Problem it Solves: When we have something that is missing in our network, one of the challenges we faces can be what the person who found it would label it as in FSC, as this will vary from person to person and is depending on if the person can recognize what it is
Benefits: I believe, if we were able to implement this, more missing shipments would be located in the database faster, leading to customer satisfactions, as well as better employee experience as it will decrease the labor of searching through the database manually. In addition, this leads to a shorted hold time for shipments, and quicker trace resolution. The more shipments we are able to get out of FSC and into the network, the less shipments we will have to abandon, which will be more sustainable.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Problem it Solves: Detect customer opportunities that haven't unveil their full potential Make the FS channel customer prospecting process more efficient
Benefits: Increased Sales Productivity: Sales teams receive a curated list of high-potential prospects from the analytics team, eliminating the need for manual searches. Enhanced Customer Insights: Prospects come with detailed insights, enriching the sales team's understanding of customer behavior and preferences Discovery of Hidden Opportunities: Advanced analytics reveal untapped opportunities within our existing portfolio. Goal Achievement Tools: Sales teams are provided with tools and resources to help meet their monthly sales goals.
Members: Huy Hoang Nguyen, Luis HERMES, Pilar ARBEO

Title: Uk H&G Yard Management System
Description: UK H&G Yard Management System will consist of a number of applications. Gatehouse will be able to assign movements to bays / Parking and then the warehouse will be notified when a truck has been allocated. Warehouse will also be able to confirm when the movement is now on bay. The system will keep time stamps to track the movement progress and will issue warnings when a certain amount of time has passed.  There will also be overview apps to allow all bays / movements to monitored easily, this app will display where movements are and which bays are free.
Problem it Solves: UK Hubs currently have no way to monitor movements within the hub or the status of bays / parking bays.
Benefits: Using these application will allow the operation to better monitor all movement in and out of the hub. Custom warning can be set to movements so people are alerted when required.  The warehouse teams will be able to see when a movement has been allocated to a bay giving them chance to prepare. it will also allow gatehouse to track all movements giving them clear visibility. The system will record the time the to offload a movement which will help the team monitor their performance .
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR

Title: eCs Return Shipments in Express Network

Problem it Solves: Many customers are coming to DHL Service points wanting to return a DHL shipment. For the customer it does not matter if the shipment is eCs or EXP. Because the systems of eCs and EXP are not integrated EXP cannot accept these shipments.

Title: EXP MST - HR Approval New Temps
Description: Using a PowerApps to capture the required info for HR to determine if a request is valid; Automatically send this data in an approval flow towards the HR BP for processing; Trigger approval or reject mail either to the requestor; Trigger request email to contracted agencies to begin candidate search; Agency offering candidate by form (with unique ID), providing required data on applicant Automatically trigger an approval flow for Hiring Manager, HR BP and Controlling to approve the request Automatically inform requestor/agency on outcome, provide data for invoicing Admin functions for HR BP
Problem it Solves: Proper communication, data collection and approval framework in place for requesting new temp agents. Ensuring the right people sign off a request and capture this before reaching out to an agency. Enabling HR BP's to better identify the need for a temp and match this with the departmental FTE plan, structuring the communication flow in a standard format towards the agencies which is triggered automatically upon approval. Ensuring agency reports the required data and receives required data to send accurate invoices. Automatically remind managers on expiring contracts and ask for extending.
Benefits: Correct data for internal approvals DHL (4 eyes principle) Standard way of requesting and approving new temps Less administrative work, no more manual email/approval/signoff messaging and different documentation Correct data for agencies to send correct invoices towards DHL Automatically trigger renewal/approval process on extending contracts
Members: Lian Van der Merwe, Stefan Terpstra

Title: Service Point Timed Out Shipments
Description: Mitigates the number of missing shipments, missing NC scans, better scanning compliance. Reductions in the number of claims and security investigations. Increase SVP helpline productivity and efficiency.
Problem it Solves: Have an automatic text/email system in place, that will notify SVP Partners if they have a timed-out shipment in their inventory in Partner Lite. Giving them instruction on what to do.
Benefits: Sending by email/text means user that are not actively checking the system will still be notified. Automated solution to an issue which is creating extra work for Partner Support, Network Ops, CS claims and the security team.

Title: AI ServicePoint Prospect Validation

Problem it Solves: Use AI integration validate and auto reject SVP Prospects that apply via online application form that do not meet the criteria. Saving time manually entering unsatisfactory prospect into COMET. Saving time for field execs calling locations rejecting locations manually.

This process is not only time-consuming but also prone to human errors which can impact team productivity and morale. Employees often lack visibility into their team members' schedules and responsibilities, making collaboration and coordination challenging.

Title: PT Sales Regular Pick-Up Work
Description: This solution is being used to automate a flow for Regular Pick-Ups. It was made on the beginning of SharePoint migration and must be redefined to use a proper automation account.  Current solution: https://dpdhl.sharepoint.com/sites/expptsls/Lists/RecolhasRegulares2/Galeria.aspx Current user: workflow.approval@dhl.com
Problem it Solves: Current workflow was disabled and it's not working on a compliant way.
Benefits: Process was previously made with a paper sheet passing hand by hand during the approval flow.

Title: Gemba Sharepoint list improvement
Description: Mapping our action owner's concerns and ways of working right now, we see that everyone has to manually add their action to their To Do list and it's up to them whether they remember to add it or not. Some don't even use To Do list and mark the action down on a sticky note. That makes Gemba improvement actions implementation time many times longer and the action owner just forgets to implement the improvements.
Problem it Solves: EU Team has created a Sharepoint list to document Gembas on Country level. Improvement will create a Planner task that can be viewed from your To Do list so you will never miss your Gemba improvement action and the improvements are implemented as soon as possible. Also if needed then the sub-tasks are possibly tracked. One possible solution to implement it would be with Power Automate.
Benefits: Assigning Gemba actions through Planner tasks provides us with a clearer understanding of responsibilities and serves as a reminder for the assignees. This approach enhances our ability to track progress and significantly reduces the "time-to-market" for new solutions and improvements. Our goal is to consistently enhance our processes, and by streamlining our methods, we can deliver excellence to our customers. We believe in continuous improvement, striving to get a little bit better each day.
Tags: continuousimprovement, efficiency, firstchoice, gemba, gembawalk, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform

Title: Absence Reporting Line
Description: Automated sick line which will be open 24/7, 7 days a week and will require no staff to answer the phone resulting in more productive hours.
Problem it Solves: Calls are taken manually within the team at EMA and the Sort Control team at LHR. Cover results in less unproductive hours. EMA calls are only taken during a certain period and are not 24/7, 7 days a week. Verbal communication so sometimes errors can be made when reporting to the relevant manager / supervisor.
Benefits: Customer Experience - Straight forward instruction to input there GID numbers into the keypad. Employee Experience - Can call at anytime. Operational Efficiency - More productive hours being used in the buisness
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: H&G UK PMO Tool
Description: The PMO management tool that enables all information regarding programmes to be in one place. This includes the investment request form, finances and project timelines/tracking standardizing the current process increasing visibility catering for stakeholder and management visibility/reporting. - Digitalises the capture and maintenance of all the projects/investments within the programmes team. - Provides concise up to date information regarding the investments available to stakeholders all in one place. - Increases investments viability, improving accuracy. -Streamlines our current processes.
Problem it Solves: At present, H&G UK Programmes team relies on a manual process to document all information related to investments. This involves using multiple tools, including Microsoft Excel and Teams. The existing method is time-consuming due to the need for manual project reporting, which leads to inconsistencies and a higher likelihood of human error. Consequently, this impacts the visibility and accuracy of information for stakeholders.
Benefits: Simplify - Reduce effort and time, Focused information, Clarity of data, Uniform Process implemented.  Visibility  - Improved accuracy, Data consistency and capability on all the projects/investments to view time critical projects, Transparency, projects with visually impactful views. Compliance -  Data Quality, Generates Notifications, Transparency, Readily available data. Value Generation - Digitalisation, Simplified Tools, Drive outcome, Stakeholder satisfaction
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, IT
Tags: Capex, DataAnalytics, Investments, monitoring, PowerPlatform, ProgramManagementOfficePMO, RPA, visibility

Title: Wellbeing -  healthy office air with CO2 meter
Description: We borrowed an IoT unit hi-tech with the possibility of measure the CO2 level. After 2 months of testing, it became clear that the critical values ​​of the CO2 level occur regularly during working hours from 9:00 to 11:00 and then in the afternoon from 13:00 to 15:00. Based on these findings, we have permanently installed CO2 level displays with clear CO2 amount visualisation . If the CO2 level exceeds the critical limit of 1600 ppm, the device also emits a tsar beep. Thanks to this, the employees learned to ventilate regularly, briefly and intensively through open windows.
Problem it Solves: Temperature conditions in the offices are controlled by digital thermometers in each office, open space and meeting room. During the summer season, the temperature in the office is reduced by air condition, during the winter season it is used a central heating panel system. The overall feeling of the employees about the environmental conditions is satisfactory. But they have no reason to open windows for fresh air. Due this there is a high risk of high CO2 concentration (>800 ppm) which can result in headaches, dizziness, drowsiness and low concentrations. Current HVAC can't deliver fresh air.
Benefits: Employees in offices and meeting rooms with a low CO2 level in the air (<<800 ppm) perform efficiently mentally, morec focused and have a significantly lower error rate in administrative work. In addition these employees enjoying facts based well-being, short and intensive ventilation saves energy (HVAC) needed for cooling during summer period or heating during winter period.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Finance, Human Resources

Title: Sales Master Dashboard
Description: Combine the existing dataset into a MasterDashboard. With that solution the maintenance time, number of reports are reduced significantly, and we are able to combine different dataset easly.
Problem it Solves: Maintenance of local reports take around 70 hours per month, on sales reps and manager level. In actual structure reports are working separately without connections (Revenue, Offer, Opportunity, Pricing, STP etc). Hard to keep in mind that a specific data where to find, and this situation in some cases generates duplication of reports. On the other hand, sales functions suffer from number of reports. Finally in some special case, where we need to combine different datasets, too complicate to populate report (eg: how much revenue is coming from a specific group of offers in actual year)
Benefits: - Sales functions get clearer view of actual performance.  - Production team save around 50 hours per month - Sales management get better insights

Title: Opportunity Tracker
Description: Create a simplified view of Top opportunity, what contains all needed information for review. The source of the view is COMET extract, and the refreshment process is automated. The view can display the top opportunities, and sales reps. are able to add comment, and save the actual status, and managers have a summary view of opportunities, and see the history of them. Finally sales reps. just need to update the opps. In COMET so no need double work at all.
Problem it Solves: Top opportunity review is part of weekly TPS. List of top opportunity had been made by manualy by sales executive weekly bases. Most of the time COMET has not been updated properly, and they have to update opportunity details twice (once in the manual list, second in COMET). It generates 30 min extra work per executive per week. (9.5 hours/week). There is no proper view of opportunity, where sales reps. and managers are able to view the Top opportunities and discuss the actual status of opportunity.
Benefits: During TPS sales reps and managers are able to review the top opportunities without extra workload. Discrepancy has beed purged and data are up to date in COMET.

Title: Lead Intelligence - Customer Segmentation - PoC
Description: In response to our customer acquisition challenges, we propose a comprehensive solution. We will shift our lead generation strategy to embrace lead intelligence, utilizing data-driven insights for more targeted engagement. Additionally, a refined lead profiling system will be developed to categorize leads based on unsupervised ML-Clustering. This nuanced understanding will guide personalized interactions. To prioritize leads effectively, a scoring system will be implemented, directing higher-scoring leads, indicative of greater potential, directly to our Sales team.
Problem it Solves: We are currently facing challenges in our customer acquisition process. The issues include insufficient quantity and quality of leads, ineffective lead analysis, a lack of a clear method for prioritizing leads, and inadequate resources for reaching out and qualifying leads, even when we have a decent pool of potential customers. Additionally, the absence of a structured lead generation plan is hindering our ability to optimize and grow our customer base. These combined challenges are impacting our overall effectiveness in acquiring new customers and expanding our business.
Benefits: This integrated approach aims to enhance the efficiency of our customer acquisition, ensuring a more focused and personalized engagement with potential customers.
Members: Marvin Modde, Nicole Bremicker, Vera Kravchenko, Zuhal Yaman

Title: Live Draws: Where Excitement Meets Transparency
Description: Implementing live draws with visible and transparent processes, as described above, can positively impact the employee experience in several ways: Increased Engagement and Excitement Transparency and Trust Inclusivity Positive Perception of Rewards Inclusivity By enhancing the transparency, engagement, and inclusivity of the draw processes, the proposed approach contributes to a more positive and interactive employee experience.
Problem it Solves: Every month, multiple draws occur across the business. The Employee Prize Draw is shared on Smart Connect, but the actual draw process is not visible.  Similarly, the Hospitality Draw used to be publicly announced, but now only the winners receive direct notifications. Implementing live draws for both using suitable technology would enhance transparency. Given the abundance of videos on Smart Connect, transforming this process into a video and launching it on the platform monthly or during the draw event would not only add excitement but also allow everyone to witness the process firsthand.
Benefits: Boost Employee Morale: The excitement generated by live draws can positively impact employee morale. Employees who feel valued and engaged are likely to be more motivated and satisfied in their roles. Strengthen Employee Trust: Transparent live draws build trust among employees. Adaptation to Modern Workplace Trends: Embracing live draws aligns with modern workplace trends. Improved Employee Retention: A positive and engaging work experience, including visible reward processes, can contribute to employee retention.
Tags: dhlexpress, employeeengagement, happyemployees, HumanResources, initiative, innovation, internalcommunications, TransparencyinWorkplace

Title: NOEP Supervisor Journey
Description: Many supervisors are not aware of the NOEP model and the support it provides.  This forum introduces the supervisor to NOEP methods, standards & tools available that will support their operation.  Each module acts as a reference point the supervisor can utilize for operational improvement and/or quality control.  The Supervisor Journey also allows new supervisors to become acquainted with NOEP methodology in their training phase.  For seasoned supervisors, the Journey will also act as a “refresh” into NOEP standards.
Problem it Solves: NOEP Supervisory Journey is a platform dedicated to achieving a mindset for success in the role of a supervisor.  Its objective is to engage those that directly influence the operation – the supervisor. In addition, this platform promotes supervisory awareness of the NOEP model as well as enhances the importance behind leadership qualities.   This forum is broken down into 6 modules covering: Health & Safety / Facility Mgt, Forecast Evaluation, Manpower Requirement, Operation Planning, PUD Planning, PUD Optimization, & Quality Control. Active Supervision is the essence behind each module.
Benefits: Improved leadership qualities linked to Active Supervision Gains in KPI’s via tools & methods introduced throughout the Supervisor Journey  Knowledge transfer of analytical procedures required for any impact to the operation Enhanced understanding of action planning / root cause analysis Application of NOEP best practices to the operation
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: efficiency, journey, noep, Noeptools, Operationplanning, optimization, platform, pud, supervisor
Members: Alina Oprea, Elio Pola, Ingo Hindersmann, Massimo BAGGI

Release the time of the SDesk agent to answer repetitive emails back to the user. This time could be used to fulfil more productive tasks to cover DHL’s compromise to support customers. The user would also receive a faster response.
Benefits: Releasing the time of the SDesk agent to answer repetitive emails back to the user. This time could be used in more productive tasks to support customers and the internal user would also receive a faster response. If the request IT can be  opened the productivity increases also.

Title: Power apps Inventory management
Description: Our Campfire will solve the problem by developing an integrated app for facility management. This app will centralize and digitize all inventory and maintenance processes, providing real-time updates and accurate stock knowledge. It will include features for tracking inventory movement, setting alerts for low stock, and forecasting supply needs based on usage patterns. By streamlining communication and automating manual tasks, the app will reduce errors, improve efficiency, and lower operational costs. This solution will enhance resource management, ensure timely maintenance, and support susta
Problem it Solves: The problem our Campfire addresses is the reliance on outdated methods like paper and spreadsheets for facility management, leading to doubtful stock knowledge, difficulties tracking inventory movement, and almost no capability to anticipate new supply orders. This causes operational inefficiencies, increased spending, and resource mismanagement. An integrated app will streamline processes, enhance communication, provide real-time updates, and improve stock accuracy and forecasting, reducing unnecessary spending and waste. This will result in a more efficient, productive, and sustainable work
Benefits: Operational Efficiency: The app will streamline inventory and maintenance processes, reducing errors and improving workflow speed. Cost Reduction: Accurate stock management and automated supply forecasting will prevent overstocking and shortages, cutting costs. Resource Optimization: Real-time updates ensure timely maintenance and efficient resource use, reducing waste. Employee Satisfaction: Streamlined processes and improved communication will enhance job satisfaction and productivity. Sustainability: Reduced waste and optimized resource use support DHL's sustainability goals.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Tags: costreduction, DatadrivenDecisionMaking, employeesatisfaction, facilitymanagement, inventorymanagement, operacionalefficiency, PowerPlatform, realtimeupdates, Ressourceoptimization, RPA, Stockcontrol, sustainability

Title: Engaging with Competitors / Membership Workflow

Additionally, it removes the need for utilizing a paper form, thus positively impacting our GoGreen strategy.
Problem it Solves: Requests for approval for employees to take part in activities where competitors may be present need to be submitted to Corporate Compliance by the local Compliance team. Gathering the relevant information for each request is time-consuming and complex.
Benefits: Since we are drastically reducing the amount of time required to process a request, employees' workload is reduced, allowing them to focus on other, more value-adding activities. Reducing paper is a core aim of our local and global strategy.
