Title: LEJ-HUB-HR High Volume Recruiting - Anonymization
Description: The data records created should be retained for evaluation beyond the deletion concept. In doing so, we enforce anonymization of the data records after 5 months. We will delete identification-relevant information via our workflow. The remaining data record will also be numbered and retained. There is therefore no link between the numbering and the original data record.
Problem it Solves: The deletion concept in terms of data protection requires the deletion or anonymization of data records. This prevents a comprehensible annual overview of the planning of our starters. We need these evaluations to make adjustments for quality assurance. This includes decisions in the marketing area, process adjustments in onboarding or in training.
Benefits: Our Campfire will ensure that we comply with data protection regulations. This solution enables us to maintain the information in an analyzable form. This enables us to make the right marketing decisions or make process adjustments. Our aim is to increase or improve the quality of onboarding.
Tags: dataanalysis, dataprotection, marketing, onboarding, PowerPlatform, sharepoint

Title: LEJ-HUB-HR High Volume Recruiting - Automation
Description: To avoid accessing the entire list, we will duplicate the data records and store them in individual tabs that can only be viewed by the interface. These tabs are individualized and can only be viewed/edited by the relevant interfaces. The overall list will remain and will continue to be used as an input/editing center.
Problem it Solves: We plan the start dates of new employees in Sharepoint. Several interfaces have access to these data records in the overall list. Each interface therefore also has access to the data that is not relevant to it. This poses a data protection problem.
Benefits: Our Campfire will ensure that we maintain data protection. With this solution, we manage to enter the information once in a closed overall list and then make it available individually only to the relevant interface. This also makes the data collection process more effective for the interfaces that enter the data.
Tags: dataprotection, efficency, employeeexperience, onboarding, PowerPlatform, sharepoint

Title: Additional Debrief Power App
Description: We are looking to streamline the process and are looking to capture any errors by either adding the additional questions to the Debrief Tool or by introducing a Power App to run alongside the Debrief Tool to be able to ask the relevant questions and ensure all points captured as per Global SOP and reduce the need for Paper Forms.  Checking with other European Countries they also have a Spreadsheet that they check on a daily basis. It has been noted that Robert Gribbin SVC Manager in SOT has already created a similar Power App for Prebrief & PDC which downloads into a Sharepoint page each day.
Problem it Solves: Currently not all Global SOP requirements/questions are covered in the Debrief Tool. This can lead to delays to customers shipments potential security risk if a security inspection is missed. Currently within the UK the Debriefer's use the Debrief Tool alongside the Debrief Tool they have a form that they complete, checking for the examples below;  - Number of DG Shipments - SI Shipments - Time Deliveries handled correctly - Equipment & Vehicle Logs completed.  - Defect Sheets Completed correctly. - LRT Cards Completed correctly. - Manual Paperwork  - UN Sanction Countries Checked.
Benefits: Potential reduction in Shipment delays as all the relevant checks will have been completed.  A more streamlined process will ensure more efficient use of time for Debriefers. Reduction in Paper wastage which will be more environmentally friendly.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Chatbot for empl. onboarding and blended learnings
Description: Provide learners and new employees with individual support and guidance - Relieve the workload of trainers and HR staff and improve the Efficiency of blended learning and onboarding - increase learner motivation, learning success, and employee satisfaction
Problem it Solves: in blended learning environments, There is often a lack of individual support and guidance for learners - new employees need support and orientation during onboarding - trainers and HR staff are often overloaded and cannot give each learner or new employee the attention they need - learners and new employees need access to information and support outside of face-to-face sessions or the onboarding process
Benefits: a ready-to-use chatbot that can be used as a virtual coach in blended learning environments and as a virtual onboarding contact person - improved support and guidance for learners and new employees - Relieved trainers and HR staff and increased Efficiency of blended learning and onboarding - increased learner motivation, learning success, and employee satisfaction

Title: Digital Booking System
Description: I would like to see an online/ digital calendar where colleagues can search availability of meeting rooms on a searched date. The online calendar provides details of the room facility (room size/ technology available etc. ). I would also like to see a function, where a meeting room can be booked online, and once a room is booked, on the digital platform the meeting room will show as unavailable. There also needs to be an option to cancel, to make sure meeting rooms can be opened up to others and this will ensure there is s full user booking experience.
Problem it Solves: The current process to book a meeting room is a very time consuming process and there are no digital processes available.   There is no current system in which you can view which meeting rooms are available and it is not easy to book a meeting room  A digital self booking system would give ownership to the employee to manage their own booking processes and eliminate the number of Emails (current process).
Benefits: The employee will have full control of the booking process and will be able to make an informed choice with the options made available to them. This will provide ownership , and ensure that the best possible meeting room/ facility will be able to be booked which could result in a greater meeting experience.  I feel this will also improve efficiency, at the current time, the process in convoluted as, there are a number of Emails which go back and forth between Reception and the booker, so this will improve  efficiency for both colleagues at Reception and the teams who are booking.

Title: Customer appointment booking
Description: The aim is to have a tool that avoids communication problems and enables customers to book appointments easily in the sales rep's available slots, with an appointment reason to give context and a meeting time adapted to the request. It also enables us to keep track of exchanges. The tool will enable the customer to book a slot with the sales rep and, via the automation of a Power Automate process, a Microsoft Teams link with a meeting synchronized in the sales rep's Outlook calendar will be created. The aim is to make the process more efficient, without disrupting the customer journey.
Problem it Solves: The aim is to improve reachability with customers by offering an accessible, easy-to-use platform.  This came about as a result of a Voice Of Customer (VOC) issue, in which customers were complaining about complicated contact with sales representatives. Currently, making appointments can be complicated when sales reps are back-ups, when a rep changes or when there are several contacts.  The aim is to have a tool that avoids these communication issues and enables customers to book appointments easily in the sales rep's available slots.
Benefits: The project will streamline the customer journey and exchanges between the customer and his sales rep. In addition, it will enable sales reps to optimize their organization, plan their appointments more effectively, and consequently be more efficient and productive.
Tags: appointment, meeting, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, reachability, sales, voc
Members: Marine Cordier, Maximilien Brault, Myriam GHAZ, Thierry KAUFFMANN

Title: ArcGis - Field geolocation Tool
Description: The development of this solution means that our sales staff have a clearer picture of their portfolio, and can optimise the number of days they spend visiting customers by making more appointments in the same area. Whether in the city or the provinces, the solution can be applied.  In addition, we also load lists of suspects for sales staff who are comfortable using the tool. They can therefore target pure prospects in their sector, based on predefined industries or types of company. ArcGis also helps us with the territorial breakdown to predefine the allocation of zones by sales rep.
Problem it Solves: We observed that certain sales representatives could find themselves in similar areas. We also realised that new sales staff sometimes had difficulty getting to know all the areas in their portfolio. ArcGis is a geolocation tool that for collecting, managing, analyzing and distributing geographic information. ArcGIS enables geographic information to be published so that it can be accessed and used by our field professionals. They can visualize companies in their area. The strength of the tool is also enabling sales reps to get to know their customers better.
Benefits: The solution helps to increase the number of appointments, with an average of one more visit per day per user. It has also optimised appointment scheduling and improved the customer sizing process. The aim is to have an average of 1 more new business acquisition per user than the rest of the sales force. The tool should also enable all incoming sales staff to get to grips with their portfolios more quickly, and therefore to get to know their sector more quickly.

Title: Proxipick
Description: Proxipick is a mobile application developed by our collaborative partner TousFacteurs. The objective of this application is to provide a live support tech to help couriers decrease their delivery failure.
Problem it Solves: With facilities that do not have Fix Exeption, Proxipick offers a live support to courriers who encounter difficulties when delivering a customer (incidents related : NH, BA, RD, ND, CM​).
Benefits: Reduce delivery exceptions by :  Offering live support tech to help drivers decrease delivery failures.​ Offering a digital and a real time interaction with customer in case delivery difficulty faced.​
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Staff HUB
Description: It uses MS forms and power automate to send the user requests to the correct managers for approval.  Data is stored securely within SharePoint and only shared with the relevant managers. Currently all these tasks are completed using paper copies.
Problem it Solves: A digital solution for ops staff to book holidays, notify their managers of completed overtime, order uniform and provide EOS feedback amongst other things.
Benefits: Improved data security. Massive reduction in paper. Improved user experience for all staff.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: PDF Folder Document viewer (like GIA)
Description: JavaScript Client side Webb Application. It scans an URL for files; get the URL of each file; open at the same time all .pdf files; extract and show pages offering features like rearrange, rotate, zoom.  Is like browsing all GIA images
Problem it Solves: Visualize all pages from all PDF from a web published folder
Benefits: Fast and modern interface for reading documents. Can be integrated in any application that require reading/printing/organizing documents. Processing is just in Client side.

Title: e-signature solution for HR
Description: Brings automation to our workflows to improve customer/employee experience. Strengthens compliance and enables us to request signatures and have our digital documents signed anytime and anywhere. Also would fall under #GoGreen
Problem it Solves: ​This solution allows us to capture digital signatures on contracts and other employee correspondence. This was very manual and required employees to print off contracts to sign and return to HR.
Benefits: ​Brings automation to our workflows to improve customer/Employee experience. Strengthens compliance and enables us to request signatures and have our digital documents signed anytime and anywhere. Also would fall under #GoGreen
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Company vehicle fuel report
Description: Makes the process digital instead of A4 paper sumbissions each month. Implements data gather from Fuel charge station monthly invoices includes info such as when a vehicle has refueled, the transaction ammount, the price per gallon, which would be needed to be filled manually. This integration ensures seamless data flow and reduces the need for manual data entry. Automated Reports and Notifications
Problem it Solves: By leveraging digital technologies, we can develop a comprehensive application that transforms the current physical fuel discharge process into a streamlined digital system. This application will facilitate the recording, tracking, and reporting of fuel usage for company vehicles in real-time, enhancing accuracy and efficiency.
Benefits: Reduced paper usage. Reduced manually data entry for employees. Data quality benefit, because of input restrictions & defined workflow.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Sales Lead - tax company communication
Description: streamline communication between DHL Country Sales - Regional point of contact and  and the TAX company. - Provide real-time monitoring of Performance and compliance. - Enhance collaboration and work quality. - Keep track of records
Problem it Solves: To build a seamless and automated process for Sales Lead exchange under the new Project "Partnership with a Tax Company for excise duties fulfilment to allow shipping DHL alcoholic beverages intra EU27 B2C"  . Delays, lack of tracking, and errors hinder productivity. Our proposed tool streamlines communication, provides real-time monitoring, and ensures compliance, benefiting all stakeholders.
Benefits: Streamline communication between regional sellers and the TAX company. Provide real-time monitoring of performance and compliance. Enhance collaboration and work quality.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Andrea ROSSINI, Fabrizio Gorini, Giorgio ZINI, Lukas Varini

Title: Clearance shipment automatization - Outbound
Description: Our solution will use the following dependencys: Sharepoint for document / information storage; Teams approvals for approving process; Power automate for defining backend process. Removes the need for manual work with excel in a process that is well defined.
Problem it Solves: Currently involves a lot of manual copy / pasting / e-mailing / working in excel. Relieve workload of from CCPU business unit, by automating this task, therefore gaining 0,3 FTE (full time employment)
Benefits: Streamline the process for easier and faster information submission. Will improve data quality and provide reliable source for information. Will improve response time to shipment clearance, to gateway department.

Title: Courier daily checklist
Description: Our solution will use the following dependencys: Sharepoint for document / information storage; Teams approvals for approving process; Power automate for defining backend process. Removes the need for pysical paper forms, by allowing couriers to fill the same information via their scanners.
Problem it Solves: Currently all of our fleet couriers fill out 1 A4 paper page each day, the goal is to get rid of pysical paper usage while also streamlining the process. Easier to fill out submit data for couriers Easier for managers to view and approve the filled out information.
Benefits: Reduce the paper and ink amount used for printing forms. Streamline the process for easier and faster information submission. Will improve data quality and provide reliable source for external / internal audits.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Inventory management system
Description: Using these systems: Sharepoint for storage; Teams/outlook for approval; Power automate as backend workflow logic.
Problem it Solves: Automating request and issue management of inventory replacing existing email based/ over phone request and issue management. Bringing bulk purchases under tracking and monitoring. Has the option to generate issue documents approved by Inventory managers. Has the option to assing inventar for utilization by qualified service provider.
Benefits: It will improve accountability during audits, manage inventory more precisely, as well as document it with issuing documents generated before approval. Clean up and centralize document storage, improve data quality and improves the ease of use.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Hubs & Gateways, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: E-Docs digitalization
Description: Using sharepoint as document storage and power automate as backed to run workflows, which sends selected documents to qualified signature provider "Dokobit". Each user has the ability to create a private folder in sharepoint, which is shareable, but initially is only accessible to the user who created the folder. Once the document is signed it is returned to sharepoint private user folder.
Problem it Solves: Digitalizes documents which needed qualified e-signature. Removes the struggle of needing safe storage for signed paper documents while also improves the document lifecycle and makes signing process more streamlined and  effective.
Benefits: Digital document storage according to the new M365 workspace vision. Uses the benefits of sharepoint and whole M365 environment for manual process automazitaion. Streamlines qualified signature process, while also giving back realtime status updates.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Tags: digital, paperless, PowerPlatform, RPA, simplification, streamline

Title: Non Stackable Prediction
Description: Create a predictive model which outputs proportion of NSP in a given network and can make accurate predictions based on a single piece’s data. This gives visibility of amount of NSP in the network for benchmarking performance and, linked to reweigh equipment, gives increased operator awareness of potential NSP at point of use.
Problem it Solves: Non Stackable Products (NSP) require a customer surcharge, tracked by a checkpoint applied by DHL. This checkpoint is often not applied and visibility of how many should be checkpointed is poor. Who DHL What Revenue lost through NSP surcharge not being applied Where At sorting facilities Why To be able to benchmark checkpointing performance against predicted amounts of NSP in the network and prompt operators when a shipment has high chance of being NSP
Benefits: Visibility of amount of NSP in the network for benchmarking performance Increased operator awareness of NSP

Title: Create teams meeting invite
Description: Notifications are currently sent via email with an ical attachment, the attachment can then be used to add a reminder to calendars. Instead of sending an email the intention is to trigger a flow on Power Platform (possibly via an https request) which will create a Teams meeting and send invites to the business owners and other involved parties. The flow should accept timings, invitees and details about the maintenance to add to the Teams meeting.
Problem it Solves: Notifying business owners that the servers on which their applications are running will undergo maintenance during a specific maintenance window . There is a requirement whereby during this maintenance the business owners and other involved parties need to coordinate their activities during this period e.g. testing the application is still functional after update.  Teams meetings are the preferred method of coordinating these activities but scheduling the meetings is a manual task.
Benefits: Reduces the manual tasks involved in arranging server maintenance windows and allows the maintenance to be performed in a manner to which the business owners are already familiar.

Title: HR CRISP Control Automation Flow #MST
Description: Our automation flow incorporates automation elements using Power Automate, Sharepoint, Adaptive Cards, Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Teams to allow for streamlined evidence gathering (with approval processes included) and uploading of evidence to a centralized local folder.
Problem it Solves: The reason for building and implementing these CRISP Automation Flows is the simplification and time savings which are achieved through the automatization of the CRISP Processes, especially with regards to the evidence collection, checks and necessary approvals.
Benefits: Increased time savings Streamlined evidence collection Reduction in potential human error Increased visibility over evidence collection process (Microsoft Planner)
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Visibility of customs clearance status
Description: CS Visibility of shipment status and communication between customs dept. and customer during customs clearance.
Problem it Solves: Local Customs Application (LCA) for submitted activities between Customs team and Customer. All members of Customs Team can access and update local database for each customer during clearance process. With CS having access to LCA and visibility of necessary information, all customer, tracing and complaint requests can be resolved faster without waiting for customs department feedback.
Benefits: Provided information easier and faster have influence on great customer experience and employee satisfaction. Using LCA app., it is faster to get the detailed information for network response, customer complaints, customer queries as most of the queries are related to customs issues. It makes job more efficient than before in both Customs and CS departments!
Members: Aleksandra STOJANOVIC, Milena ALEKSIC, Vladimir Arsenijevic

Title: PDF TurboTools
Description: Customs Agent (Runner)  - Instead of printed DVI we download from RoAuth the PDF  - We read from PDF the MRN and AWB   - send release message to DHL (in progress)  - send DVI to GIA and put it in Billing queue Billing  - make invoice  - add PDF invoice to DVi  - verify payment (shown in application from account extract)  - send to Warehouse queue Warehouse  - one click print DVI+INV for each AWB   - on header of documents, AWB and bond location is added (feature in progress)  - stick on package and scan "OUT"  - application eliminates from "printed" queue when AWB is scanned with "OUT"
Problem it Solves: After DVI release by Authorities there are lots of manual operations until delivery between CCP-Billing-Warehouse. The application digitalizes this workflow using PDF instead of paper. The PDF is moved from a workstation to another, add pages and finally print all package. Previous processes after Authorities release:  - Register Release checkpoint in DHL CDS  - Print DVI and physical give to Billing  - Make invoice and print it  - Match DVI+INV for each shipment  - Physical give paper to Warehouse  - stick DVI+INV to parcels  - scan "OUT"
Benefits: Assure optimum electronic documents flow between the 3 depart Delays of billing of H7 s2s - eliminated Delays from billing to warehouse - eliminated Missing documents for parcels between – eliminated Mismatched DVI and Invoice for shipments – eliminated H1 DVI upload to GIA - automatically Missing DVI in GIA - eliminated H1 direct from RoAuth - no errors DHL physical archive - eliminated Live tracking billing dept - introduced Live tracking warehouse dept - introduced manual DDP report - eliminated tracked processed by billing vs 'out' from warehouse - automated search for payment - automated
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Finance, General Management, IT, Network Operations
Tags: ACA, BOND, digitalization, DVI, gia, invoice, pdf, print

Title: PDF Organizer
Description: I design a cloud application with interface to see the PDF pages and manipulate them  I published the documents folder on web (similar with OneDrive files) I made a cloud JavaScript Application which: open all PDF from a folder (can also be loaded manual from computer). It splits PDFs in pages. Allows zoom, rotate, drag and drop rearrange, remove page, print/save selected pages. Processing is in Client side. The server just give access to files and allow client(user) to load the application. To increase speed, it opens files asynchronous in paralel - at the same time.
Problem it Solves: On Customs, we have multiple documents sent by clients in order to complete the Custom Clearing process  Not all of them are correct or used in the next processes. We have to select only relevant documents to attach or print them for the Import DVI To do this manually, took a lot of time, and produce lot of waste paper due to printing of all documents than manually select relevant ones.
Benefits: less waste with printing easy to use much faster

Title: Shipping of passports
Description: Have a centralised department where we can either physically send or digitally upload images of shipments containing passports. Passports are reported via MOU as 'hidden' if they have not been declared on waybills. Shippers will often put business documents as a general cover all for documentation and passports within a shipment. The passports are not hidden and are being sent legitimately. The shipper will put this general description through lack of DHL knowledge and advice. We then have to wait weeks or months for UKBF to attend, only to be told they are happy for them to be sent.
Problem it Solves: Important application times cut for visa requests, verification sped up on identity checks and no wait for UKBF to attend service centre.
Benefits: Customers will no longer face delays and the risk of travel restriction due to MOU referrals. A centralised area would mean fewer man hours and miles expended by UKBF. Customer satisfaction will increase and there would be less phone calls to customer services querying shipments that have been held for weeks on end. That in turn would lead to a decrease in phone calls by customer services to service centre staff.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, General Management, Network Operations, Others, Sales
Tags: accountability, brandLoyalty, callavoidance, cashcustomers, cashshipments, customer, customercontact, customerengagment, CustomerExprience, CUSTOMERFIRST, customerloyalty, customerservice, delayedshipments

Title: Campfire Benefits Tracker
Description: The app addresses the challenge of disjointed solution management within organizations With this app, initiative owners can seamlessly assign mature solutions to designated business owners. These owners can then efficiently document the benefits, including any scaling to other countries. This streamlined approach fosters collaboration, accountability, and the realization of tangible benefits across diverse business units and geographic regions
Problem it Solves: By employing a centralized platform via PowerApps, this initiative addresses the problem of accurately measuring the benefits of implemented solutions. Tracking these benefits, particularly across the EU region, has been challenging. However, with this app, owners can assign solutions to the appropriate business owners and effortlessly monitor initiative benefits. Additionally, they can assess if the solutions are upscaled to any other countries. This streamlined process encourages collaboration and enhances accountability among stakeholders.
Benefits: This app brings several advantages to the table. Firstly, it simplifies solution management by enabling owners to seamlessly assign solutions to business owners, streamlining the implementation process.  Additionally, it empowers stakeholders by allowing them to accurately track the benefits of these solutions.  Furthermore, the app provides valuable insights into the effectiveness of solutions, aiding in decision-making regarding scaling and adaptation. Moreover, by centralizing solution management, it fosters collaboration among team members, leading to improved communication and efficiency.

Title: Trucking Tool
Description: Comparing on hold data from a reference week with actual on hold material and schedules outbounds within a PowerApp Tool.
Problem it Solves: Reduced time for comparing data if extra trucks are needed depending on schedules, expected volumes and on hold material.
Benefits: Deduct the workload by making the comparison of data much faster by the tool.

Title: Submit new supplier
Description: We have created a form where requestor can choose basics options and add new supplier request form with support document. After this initiates an approval flow for responsible managers and their replies saved in SharePoint portal list with documents provided by requestor. This table has limited access for procurement and could be used as a proof of process.
Problem it Solves: We need to check and approve every new supplier for Basware and Sunaccount systems. Also, we need to have footprint of this process for procurement and finance team for CRISP reporting
Benefits: No need to manually request each responsible manager. No need to print support document for signing or storing for future checks from procurement team.

Title: HG MXP - NCG Report
Description: Create an automation to compile the report that actually is written on World.
Problem it Solves: NCG Team using World for most of the report activities, it takes very much time to write and share the report and takes some FTE to do that. With this solution it could takes a much less time to do this activity.
Benefits: Efficiency on safe time, effort and make the process faster.
Members: Andrea ROSSINI, Leo Femia, Lukas Varini

Title: E-CMR
Description: Our Campfire introduces an e-CMR system, enhanced by RPA, to digitize and automate the transfer of transport documents. RPA bridges the NMIV and third-party app, ensuring accurate, secure data exchange, reducing manual entry errors, and saving time. This shift to digital reduces paper use, aligning with our sustainability goals, and improves document accessibility, making it easier to retrieve CMRs when needed. This solution streamlines operations, benefits the environment, and meets the needs of customers and employees, marking a significant step in our digital and ecological transformation.
Problem it Solves: Our Campfire addresses the inefficiency and environmental impact of paper-based CMR processes by introducing an e-CMR system. This transition streamlines the sharing and management of transport documents, significantly reducing paper use, thus aligning with our green initiative. It also solves the problem of quickly locating CMR documents when required by institutions, enhancing operational efficiency. This relevance spans across customer satisfaction, employee convenience, operational smoothness, and our commitment to sustainability, marking a pivotal step in our digital transformation journe
Benefits: Implementing our e-CMR system, powered by RPA, offers multifaceted benefits to DHL Express. It enhances operational efficiency by streamlining document management, reducing time spent on manual data entry and retrieval. This digital transformation supports our sustainability objectives by significantly cutting down paper usage, contributing to environmental conservation. Additionally, it improves compliance and reduces errors, leading to better customer service and satisfaction. Overall, this initiative aligns with DHL's innovation and sustainability goals, positioning us as a leader in eco-fr
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Members: Najet Guizani, Patrick MARTINS DA SILVA, Valerie Regragui

Title: DEBIT/CREDIT NOTE requests
Description: Requests have a single format, all requests can be found and processed in one place. You can track the status. Rejection of the paper version of the explanatory notes. Admin panel for the employee processing the application Notification by mail about the current status
Problem it Solves: There is no single format No Database   Complicated mail approval process     Paper explanatory notes.          There is no single place to store documents  It's easy to miss the details of the process.
Benefits: Rejection of the paper version, a single database, Simplified query.  The approval process in Stems, Access from any device. The current status of the request is visible More convenient Reduces the execution time

Title: Vendor master form
Description: The approval process takes place in Teams Unified application form List of queries in Sharepoint Progress bar for each application Notifications about the status of applications by email A convenient form for those processing the application Quick access
Problem it Solves: A complex approval process. There is no data on the approval of applications. A difficult-to-understand form of information presentation. There is no single format. It is not known at what stage the request is.
Benefits: Quick access Rejection of the paper version Faster request approval A single request form Employees no longer need to write emails, search for a form, the form is available to all KZ employees on the Sharppoint site
Tags: 0365, List, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, sharepoint, Sharepointforms

Title: Automated linking of IDOX and Frontline Systems.
Description: The creation of an automated import of data, potentially through an API or RPA vector, to update purchase order information consistently and automatically against the work orders as they are tracked within our central facility management software system.
Problem it Solves: At the moment, there is no automated link of data between the centralised facility management (CAFM) software we use and the software that our contracted help-desk function uses. The help-desk is currently raising and resolving purchase orders for us, but there is no automated link for that purchase order information to get back to our centralised CAFM database. Somebody instead has to navigate to each file, copy, and then paste information across from one system to the facility management software.
Benefits: The amount of manual effort involved is significant. The automation of that process would save several hours a month of work being carried out, and mean that data entry mistakes were reduced. Having consistent access to reference data, like purchase order numbers, in a centralised place makes it easier to track and manage works.
Members: David Morgan, Debbie Lehane, Grant Foster

Title: Robotic account for Power Automate flow ownership
Description: 1) Power Automate will send an email alert for upcoming events through the Power BI dashboard. 2) Business users will be able to refresh the dataset for the Power BI dashboard via Power Automate, even without access to the workspace.
Problem it Solves: To automate the processes listed below through the Power Platform, a robotic account is required: 1) Power Automate will send an email alert for upcoming events through the Power BI dashboard. 2) Business users will be able to refresh the dataset for the Power BI dashboard via Power Automate, even without access to the workspace.
Benefits: This will help stakeholders to remind themselves of upcoming events and help them manage expectations better. The alert trigger is out of the box solution with power automate that can be adjusted as per needs like what event needs to trigger the alert
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: EXP DE SMT Performance Dashboard
Description: All Performance data is displayed in an interactive PowerBi report to enable SMT Members to discuss performance
Problem it Solves: Eliminates preparation time for the weekly Senior Management Team Performance Dialog.  Automatically provides KPIs for all involved functions electronically.
Benefits: Performance KPIs graphs are shown directly through PowerBI - meaning less preparation time for the team lead, and clickable, drillable reports for better discussions. Always available and up to date via eletronic devices.

Title: LT OPS. AFOW: Application for ordering workwear
Description: Transferring accounting from several separate, unstructured Excel files to Power Apps and Sharepoint List.
Problem it Solves: The Operations Department has to issue workwear to staff, track balances, replenish stocks, etc.
Benefits: Easy and fast ordering of clothes from your local warehouse. Clear clothing balances, reminders to replenish stock, order history.

Title: Preferential origin detection in customs documents
Description: The solution will help to identify that a document exists, which contains information about the preferential origin.
Problem it Solves: All European countries have the option to use preferential origin statements for duty relief. The challenge is to identify the statement on the invoice or to identify the additional documents that contain this information. This is especially difficult as there is no electronic identification available today for this information. The challenge is experienced during the customs clearance process. By not completing the declaration correctly, the customers have to pay more duties, which would result in unhappy customers.
Benefits: Reduced number of complaints from customers. Reduced resource requirement from DHL employees. Success could be measured by the number of reversals that had to be done due to this error.
Members: Larissa Silva Pombo, Paula Razminovica, Thomas MOERKERKE

Title: CFIT Ai Bot
Description: We look for an AI bot that reads technical documentation, selects topics per CFIT application and provides technical or functional information how to solve the issue via a chat function. The bot completes the answer and is verified initially by an operator, later autonomously. The bot asks for more info  per application, screens, version, topic, customs, labels etc via drop down menu or free text field. After every intervention a customer feedback is requested, below 80% score we revalidate and upgrade the content. The bot uses ML to improve itself.
Problem it Solves: CFIT receives loads of request for support to perform something, find something, configure something in a file or find a functionality in an application. Those request come in via mail, chat, phone, verbally. We distribute them via available resources or a selection on a application; forwarded into a queue to be picked up. The speed of response is variable on the workload & the quality  of response variable on the expertise. Requests are hence forwarded multiple times without a view for the requester where he is in the progress to obtain a solution.
Benefits: Ai supported responses on CFIT matters decrease response times, improve the quality of feedback, level out knowledge differences between employees, can provide a huge support for manned helpdesks , decrease our operational costs in helpdesk support and free up resources to improve data quality and focus on customer onboarding. IT support will be more professional and offer a monitor on customer feedback via feedback mechanisms. It is also suitable to keep recors of responses per customer to use in business reviews or as a basis for CR towards current applications.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
EGAP System: CAMPFIRE, DHL Express Mobile, Digital Assistant, EasyShip, eCase, ELP, Emailship, ePOD, ESB, GLS, MCT, MyDHL API, MyDHL+, ProView, XML-PI, WSB
Tags: ai, AIResolution, analytics, applicationrequest, backline, capability, cfit, CFITsupportrequest, chat, chatbot, chatbotvirtualassistant, chatbox, ChatGPT, cin, communicationeffectiveness, complaints, customer, customercontact, customerdata, customerengagment, customerExperience, customerfacingsolution, customerloyalty, customeronboarding, customers, customerservice, customertoolkit, GenAI, GenAIAssistance

Title: NCTS WareHouse Billing
Description: With this project, the storage fee, which was not previously collected for NCTS shipments, can be calculated in Evrim(LCA on TR) ,  and can be paid online by the customer.
Problem it Solves: NCTS WareHouse Billing
Benefits: It will facilitate customers' online payment transactions, thus eliminating customer satisfaction and customer time loss. The transactions of DHL employees who do invoicing with online transactions will be reduced and the workload on them will be reduced. When customers and brokers direct their shipments to automatic transfer, their transactions will be accelerated operationally. In this way, both time and paper will be saved, employees with reduced workload will be directed to different jobs, and their contribution to the business will be maximized.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Members: Berna Simsek, MESUT SIMSIT, Serdar DILMEN

Title: Introduction of OKR management software Viva Goals
Description: Microsoft Viva Goals is a digital platform designed to assist teams in setting, tracking, and achieving their objectives. A primary advantage of Microsoft Viva Goals lies in its seamless integration with other Microsoft productivity tools, such as Teams and Outlook. This integration allows teams to set up each OKR cycle themselves individually. Furthermore, it features a robust task management system. Objectives can be split into actionable tasks and delegated to employees or different teams. This process facilitates a focused implementation of our strategy and empowers employees to support it
Problem it Solves: OKR (Objective & Key Results) Method ensure the drill down and understanding of organization strategic targets to operational business, x-functional alignment  and involving and motivation all levels of employees - OKRs are expressly not intended to replace individual targets. With OKR mindset you follow a growth mindset, define focused and measurable team goals.  This process is conducted in three-month cycles, during which Excel templates must be duplicated and created for each of the nine teams manually. Current OKR sheets are not user-friendly and there is no target link between teams.
Benefits: The goal management software Microsoft Viva Goals, utilized in conjunction with the OKR method, incorporates all employees into the strategic development of DHL Express. Simultaneously, it enhances collaboration and enables measurable implementation of the strategy.
Members: Franziska Hoffmann, Patrick Schier, Petra Lehmann

Title: Company Pool Car  and Vehicle Pre-check System
Description: The aim of the request is:  -Develop a tool for pool car booking, where the employees can directly see the availability of the cars; -Direct approval workflow to minimize the email communication; -Deploy a vehicle pre-check system to avoid paper based solution and deploy a digitalized solution.
Problem it Solves: We have currently 3 passenger and 4 commercial vehicle pool cars, that is available for use by employees on a shared basis. Currently the employees sending their pool car request to Infrastructure/Fleet team and requesting in an email an approval by their direct supervisor. After the approval the request added to a shared excel working. The vehicle pre-checks done on paper basis and very time consuming to scan all the documents. The above solution is not ideal and causing extra work for the team.
Benefits: Digitalized solution for company pool car management and vehicle pre-checks.
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Customs, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Others, Sales
Members: Denes Magyar, Szilard Stahl, Viktor Galambos

Title: ULD Rebuild Request Tool
Description: A tool within Microsoft Teams will solve this problem to have an overview about the to dos and the completed tasks. An automation will notify the reload colleagues if there is a new entry in the tool and an automated excel sheet with the mirrored data from the MS Teams list will be helpful to review the workload for the extra tasks.
Problem it Solves: The current communication between reloads and NCC/RTC via email for crossloads or other rebuilds is not state of the art and also confusing if several requests were sent during day for different tasks.
Benefits: Mail communication will be reduced, reloads can provide data for extra work they do during day and the rebuild requests will get a uniform format.

Title: Damage Reporting Form
Description: The new process eliminates the need to fill in a hardcopy Damage Report. The report is now completed in MS Forms and picture(s) of the damage can be added too. Once submitted, this creates and saves a pdf version of the Damage Form and images on a SharePoint, ready to be attached to a Trace in (CSM) SPARK.  A Damage Report is also available in Power BI which allows a review of damage trends by type and by shipper for further investigation.
Problem it Solves: The Damage Report was previously completed in hardcopy format. The completed report had to be scanned to create a softcopy. Images were captured separately and saved manually to a Drive to be attached to the Trace in (CSM) SPARK.  Little or no reporting on trends.
Benefits: We've reduced the processing time to create the Damage Report from 7-8 minutes down to about 1 minute. It's also a much easier process for Warehouse OPS to complete the Damage Report. Just some of the Feedback we've received ...  "Everything is working really well. It takes only a minute per shipment and files Sync to my folders just fine" "The current process has been a joy to work with and I hope we can continue to streamline it" There are less manual steps involved reducing the amount of paper used to zero and energy spent in creating the report
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Courier quiz in GCA scanners
Description: Couriers will take a courier quiz, which will then be evaluated and receive feedback.
Problem it Solves: Enhancing operational knowledge with a digital test available in the GCA scanner.
Benefits: Saving time and training costs with a digital test.

Title: CCPU Counter for manual work (Power App)
Description: We already have a working solution with Power Apps connected in teams so the agents can easily enter the information. This form is mainly for robotic account in Power Apps.
Problem it Solves: Here at CCPU Sweden we have a few manual work that we need to track as the LCA currently cant give out the information. So we created Microsoft List with a Power app to easier tally up the amount of manual work (shipments etc) are done.
Benefits: So we can track the amount of manual work that is being done outside of LCA.

Title: GVA - Fallback Analysis  Tool
Description: Power Query Text Analysis Tool: •Counts occurences of certain phrases •Produses ready to use training phrases including  coding required for use  of synonyms  • Simply to use and automated, based on „Fallbacks with details” report data
Problem it Solves: Difficulties with effective analysis of Fallbacks: •Time-consuming process  •Importance of Training Phrases based on subjective judgment of reviewer •Slow progress in reducing Fallbacks
Benefits: Employe: •Acceleration and improvement of the Fallback Review process • Less Live Chat Transfer to CS Agents Customer: • Better accuracy of answers provided by GVA
Tags: da, DataAnalytics, digitalassistant, fallbacks, gva, tph, trainingphrase

Title: Local IS - BackMan
Description: BackMan is an app made in Godot Engine. It is designed to streamline the process of executing backup tasks through a user-friendly interface. Users can define their backup tasks once, within .json files, and then easily trigger the execution of these tasks through the app's interface. This automation saves time and effort by eliminating the need for manual intervention in the backup process.
Problem it Solves: One of the main problems that BackMan solves is the inconsistency of backups. By providing a standardized approach and a user-friendly interface, BackMan ensures that backups are executed consistently and accurately. This eliminates the risk of human error or oversight in the backup/restore process, improving data reliability and integrity.
Benefits: BackMan streamlines backups with a user-friendly interface, saving time. It ensures consistent backups, reducing the risk of data loss. The app automates the backup and restore process, eliminating manual intervention. These benefits empower the IT team to efficiently manage backups and ensure data reliability.

Title: 3S - Safety Security Scanner - support for Courier
Description: To overcome Olympics Games pressure on Paris area, we plan to use a 3rd party Service & Application . Application, on scanner, will allow Couriers to contact a dedicated Hotline. This is a 3rd party service, not a DHL desk. The application will offer, after proper logon, a simple interface for starting a dialog with an hotline, or direct buttons for alerting the central team, inside the 3rd party supplier, that there is an ongoing problem/urgency. The Supplier have direct connections with Rescue & Police forces. This Supplier is constantly keeping DHL aware of ongoing incidents.
Problem it Solves: With the advent of Olympics, Paris area will be under great pressure, limiting vehicules movements, and Couriers may have to perform more pedestrian deliveries. We also want to allow our Courier's to a better and simpler access to Rescue & Police forces. We also need to ensure that if Couriers raise Alert, then they can be helped on their location. Of course, this also allow for detecting, proactively, suspicious behaviors, and raise alerts. Courier's Scanner is their primary working tool, it seemed a good medium for this mission.
Benefits: less robberies - less health& safety incidents

Title: Auto text to customers with self-help portal link
Description: ​​By sending a link to the customer via text when they call in, it can benefit the GOS as that's one less call queueing. It can also benefit operational efficiency in CS as it may encourage the customer to use self-help features more often, as it's a quicker way to get the issue resolved whereas if they are not aware of the feature, they may not make contact at all as they may not have time for a phone call.
Problem it Solves: ​During busy periods calls queue and we lose the GOS. We can send a link to the customer to direct them to online self-help portal to get the query resolved faster.
Benefits: ​​​By sending a link to the customer via text when they call in it can benefit the GOS as that's one less call queueing, but it can also benefit operational efficiency in CS as it may encourage the customer to use the self help feature more often. This is because it's a quicker way to get the issue resolved whereas if they are not aware of the feature, they may not make contact at all as they may not have time for a phone call. It also saves the customer valuable time during busy call periods.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: CMR digitalization
Description: Store and retrieve digital document is simpler and cheaper. ITS added relevant document types in the CIA configuration file.  But it was not possible to store the images in Global Imaging (GIA) as CMR documents are not yet formally described in G-SOP.  Currently we use a local file server.
Problem it Solves: All DHL locations that receive linehauls (DPDHL or commercial) have to deal with CMR documents. (for road transport) Those documents are stored in paper format and at 3rd party storage companies, as these documents have a legal status. this is costly and searching old documents is time consuming. Update April 2024; GIA has approved storage of CMR documents in GIA, so we can switch our local storage to central GIA storage.
Benefits: Employees are used to using CIA, so no extra training needed. By digitalization we eliminate the need to maintain paper storage (local and at 3rd parties)
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Lead Forensics
Description: Lead Forensics can offer to track traffic on our website, and match the data to our CRM so potentially we can be provided with leads of businesses who we have a record of in our CRM that have viewed specific parts of our website, that would indicate an interest in certain services or products such as sustainability. This lead is warmer as we have activity to refer to and a call then can be made to the customer or prospect to support their requirement for information on this subject.
Problem it Solves: We are currently seeing a decline in the number of new customers being onboarded in Sales, and in certain areas we feel that higher quality leads would provide a better chance of conversion, and subsequently more customers and revenue. The better quality the information within the lead would usually contribute towards a higher conversion rate and a faster speed of the lead actually becoming a customer.
Benefits: This could potentially improve customer experience, being that we proactively contact a customer to support further on information they may not have found on the website. Also on employee experience, as we can provide warmer leads to Sales. And also potentially the sustainability impact as if it were to be related to GoGreen Plus it could mean more customers using this product and us helping each other to reduce emissions.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Sustainability Impact

Title: High Value Insurance Portal
Description: The use of a portal will mean everyone can check on a shipments approval status e.g. Sales, Secuity etc.  Users receive notification when an update occurs, or approval is granted. Mandatory fields mean that no request can be submitted without all the necessary information being given. This would prevent approval being withheld due to lack of details on shipment, saving valuable time. The portal would help to identify customers that regularly send high value shipments helping Sales to better support these customers.
Problem it Solves: Eliminates need to complete a High Value Insurance Approval form which then has to be saved before it can be sent to the relevant parties. With a High Value Insurance portal, we can save time as fields can have drop down options. No missed responses if the Requestor is out of office and no access to their Outlook as everyone will be able to review approval progress once they have shipment id or customer account number.
Benefits: No delay for the customer - now if a High Approval response is sent back to the requesting agent and they are out of office, no one else can see this approval as no visibility to colleague's mail. With the portal all employees with access can see the status and any comments, so no delay in shipping. Ease of requesting approval for users, no more sending emails through outlook. Drop down and mandatory fields mean all details needed for approval are provided and make submitting information easy and efficient.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Hubs & Gateways, Sales

Title: Customer Allocation App - Simplify the process!
Description: With the help of an App (Power Apps), the regular customer allocation process will be simplified and made more efficient for every employee involved. The planned functionalities include 	• Search function to find customers quickly 	• Access administration: Sales managers will only have access to customers in their region 	• Approval function 	• Mapping of the history 	• Display of deadlines 	• Export to Excel to create COMET / GLOBUSS tickets Future Outlook: After migration to STELLAR a direct data connection could be an option
Problem it Solves: The monthly and annual customer allocation process currently requires a lot of time and manpower. We are currently working with an Excel template which is very complex. Errors can occur when entering data (e.g. incorrect GSFA ID) and the approval of team/sales managers for the customer allocation cannot be traced exactly. As a result, the current process is very error-prone and requires a lot of manual effort to correctly create the tickets for COMET and GLOBUSS.
Benefits: The app will help to increase employee productivity and experience. Sales perspective: Instead of first searching for all the necessary data in COMET and then entering it into Excel, they can select the desired customer directly in the app and obtain the manager's approval for the customer allocation. COMET Support perspective: The data entered by Sales no longer needs to be checked. After approval, the customers are automatically added to the allocation list and the Excel file for the COMET/GLOBUSS tickets can be exported directly. The processing status is transparent at all times.
Tags: allocation, app, application, comet, globuss, powerapps, PowerPlatform, salestools, simplification

Title: FUEL CONTROL APP
Description: An app is created that allows scanning of the equipment and recording the liters refueled in the tank. This data is automatically uploaded to a List, and in this way we ensure that the data reaches its final destination and avoid errors regarding the assignment of liters to one or another device. We will also avoid losing the data written down on paper, or forgetting it due to having written it down mentally. The APP is simple: It records the date automatically, scans the equipment field thanks to a barcode placed on the equipment, and records the liters refueled.
Problem it Solves: We use large equipment, which can’t go to the gas station, since it is located far from our facility.This is why we have a small tank installed in our facility. In order to calculate the degree of energy efficiency of each equipment, we need to record the refueling of each equipment in this tank. This record is made on a sheet of paper, or mentally, which facilitates human error and makes the final result NOT RELIABLE. This doesn’t happen with equipment that can go to the gas station and whose refueling is automatically recorded in an accounting. This is why we need to improve the data quality
Benefits: With this APP the data will be of quality and reliable, so we will be able to make energy efficiency calculations, and work with these calculations, to operate more efficiently and taking care of the planet, prioritizing the most efficient equipment, etc. We are certified in ISO 14001; 9001 and 50001 and all of them request data analysis and its reliability, which is why we cannot leave data as significant as fuel consumption aside from human error.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: CBAM report to customers
Description: we'll get the information from several sources (LCA for clearance [DHLTRANS], regional repositories [AIRACS], regional applications [CDS]) to create the list with the fields needed to be sent by e-mail. There will be 2 process, 1 for regular customers and other for the rest, in case of certain HS codes defined by the business. The middleware connected to all abovementioned sources will create the e-mail body and sends out the communication to the customer(s), avoiding any manual interaction from the business.
Problem it Solves: starting April'24, there is an obligation to inform the DHL Express customers about the clearances of the shipments subject to CBAM (Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism). More information about this project on https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en
Benefits: the expected 2 resources needed to fulfill this new regulatory requirement will be now zero, the process will be automatic on a list of regular customers given by the local customs team; and daily basis for those non-regular based on the importer's mails declared in the CFIT applications. There will be a demand from other customers to get the same solution, the estimation from the business about the people needed was increased to 4 FTEs.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: CarbonBorderAdjustmentMechanism, CBAM, customs, db2, gccr, informix, middleware, regulatory, SQLServer, tsql
Members: ALICIA MARTIN SANCHEZ, David Fraga Tamayo, Diar Kader, Francisco Jose Gomez Barquin, JIRI KOSTAL KRUTINA, Jorge Rico, Jose Ignacio MARTINEZ DE OLCOZ

Title: Paperwork via Email and upload to GIA
Description: This solution will take the documents from a mailbox and upload to GI.
Problem it Solves: Customer is not PLT ready and needs more time to implement fully automated PLT flow in his systems. OPS needs to image all document (CIA Capture) after shipment arrival. Customer can deliver the document via email already.
Benefits: Time consuming process of CIA will be reduced for DHL empfloyee. Process is more efficient than manual work. Workarounds like printing from email to utilise CIA are not needed. Customer is happy to have a temporary solution.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: UKHUBAPPLICATION Developer Log
Description: Solution is 2 excel sheets within a SharePoint, a Microsoft form and 4 power flows. The form link is provided to all relevant agents who can complete the form which contains all required data for a challenge. This form flows into the spreadsheet for the developers to access and try and solve the challenge.  Within the spreadsheet, the developers can escalate the challenge which will automatically email relevant people or they can advise their involvement is complete which will email the initial raiser details of the challenge and how to proceed. Within the spread sheet challenges will archive
Problem it Solves: Current process for developers involves manual reporting of challenges experienced within customs by a daily excel sheet emailed across. developers then add to another excel log and manually assign tasks. Following completion of the task the developer will email the team that emailed updates on their challenges who will then email specific agents how to proceed.
Benefits: streamlined process of reporting challenges and allow for users to actively report challenges through the day, enabling developers to investigate sooner and provide quicker feedback on the challenge. this will save developers time, make their operation simpler and allow them to focus on challenges rather then spreadsheet management and admin. This will also enable held freight to be released faster when a system challenge is preventing reload or customs clearence.

Title: Route Master (Power Platform version)
Description: Route Master in Power Platform is a suite of apps that provides to local OPS and Engineering key PUD information and useful tools to optimize them. Migrating it from Access to Power Platform will increase the app response speed making it now useful for large facilities and allowing the addition of new integrated mobile tools such Gemba Ride app or a specific PUD Loader app for information about arriving NCY volume, flexing collaboration or a direct-load-assistant tool.
Problem it Solves: The current version of Route Master was developed in MS Access, which is a feasible solution for medium and small facilities but too slow for large ones with many airplane movements and shipments. Besides, the Access solution only works on desktop and laptop computers and not in mobile devices. Finally, Access is not part of the NWOW DHL strategy.
Benefits: The benefits of the current Route Master, such as homogeneous PUD data and daily route optimization, will be available for all facilities in the country, including the ones located in hubs such as Madrid. Besides, it will take advantage from the greater stability of a cloud storage environment, the automation of data uploading with Power Automate and the flexibility of new mobile apps for PUD loaders and couriers. Altogether, improving one step further OPS productivity, employee engagement and cost containment.
Tags: am, courier, GembaRide, IBPreAlert, inbound, optimization, PowerPlatform, pud, route, RouteMaster, tacticalplan

Title: Route Master (MS Access version)
Description: Route Master is a tool that provides to local OPS and Engineering: - A repository of key PUD information including a complete route census, tactical plans, digital route designs and load charts. - IB PreAlert tool that delivers a summary of arriving pieces, shipments and estimated stops per route before the movement arrives at the facility. Breakdown of FLY/COY/NCY and MED/Pre9/Pre12/EoD shipments and stops per route. Flexing-on-the-air. Indication of overloaded routes and compliance to the tactical plan. - Specific reports that highlight outdated route data or not meeting the tactical plan.
Problem it Solves: Route Master gives solution to common PUD route organization challenges: -	Need for a one-stop and country-wide repository for PUD census, tactical plans, route designs and load charts. -	Need for detailed inbound volume information before the movements (airplanes or trucks) arrive at the facility.  -	Need for specific reports that highlight outdated route data or targets. -	One easy and common source of PUD information for everyone. -	Collaborative maintenance of PUD data, between local OPS and country Engineering.
Benefits: Local OPS and Engineering will have easy access to key up-to-date PUD information. A common repository guarantees homogeneous data for everyone and better control. Besides this solution allow for collaborative update of the information, making it more efficient and less time consuming. The IB PreAlert allows to proactively plan the Inbound process, advice route loaders about NCY shipments, earlier PUD route departure, reduce the number of ad hoc routes, identify overloaded vehicles and missorted pieces.
Tags: census, engineering, flexing, IBPreAlert, inboundsort, loadchart, localops, movements, optimization, pud, Repository, route, tacticalplan

Title: CS Automated report gathering
Description: Reports are scheduled to a shared mailbox, Power Automate is used to transform the files to something readable by Power BI. Power BI then further cleans up the data into a data-set that is automatically refreshed on a daily basis.
Problem it Solves: For forecasting, performance management and analysis, CS is working with four data-sources which aren't interlinked. Daily, weekly and monthly reports are scheduled to be pulled from these sources, and then pooled together before visualizing them. This manual, repetitive, labour can be automated so resources can focus on the analysis, rather than on data gathering.
Benefits: Repetitive work is reduced, and done exactly the same on a daily basis. This reduces the risk of human error, and increases time spent on value added tasks.
Tags: 0365, automation, DataAnalytics, Powerautomate, powerbi, PowerPlatform, RPA

Title: DHL PLANET
Description: webapplication destinated to: 1. guarantee the onboarding process (including contract automated signature, automated money transfer agreement signature) 2. Single point of contact for service point (including managing communication from n to Service Points) 3. Training site integrated 4. Electronic invoice system integration (including managing and maintaining Service Points compensation plans) 5. Integrated chatbot with basic AI functionalities capable of managing FAQ and first time resolution requests 6. Automated service points lead qualification (integrated with mydhl+ page)
Problem it Solves: consequently to the shut down of DHL24 for retail business has been needed to have an integrated platform capable of taking place and support functionalities that otherwise would have been lost and forced to be performed manually.
Benefits: onbarding process automation avoiding manual reworks increasing partner efficiency through sharing operational invo process improvement for retail personnel
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: ai, app, automation, communications, contentmanagement, continuousimprovement, digitalization, employeeexperience, onboarding, retail, sales, servicepoint
Members: Alessandro Bertazzolo, GIANELLA ALESSANDRA SUAREZ VALENCIA, Manuela PANNULLO, Marco FERIOLI, Valerio RUSSO

Title: Walk in their shoes tracker
Description: Provides updates to when staff are planning or have completed the walk in their shoes task, and will provide SMT/mangers a detailed report from the Power App.
Problem it Solves: Tracks and monitors staffs monthly plans for walk in their shoes meetings.
Benefits: Benefit to creating this app is to remove unnecessary usage of excel files, thus allowing it to be streamlined into one application.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR

Title: RPA - Web Trace Creation
Description: By allowing customers to be able to open their own traces via our web provides a much better customer experience whilst removing the requirement for them to actually talk to a human. The bot will also ensure that all of the information to conduct a proper investigation is captured every time.
Problem it Solves: Reduces the number of manually opened traces and the need to chat/call into the contact centre. Using RPA will open the tracing file and email the customer with confirmation.
Benefits: improve on OE, improve on customer and employee experience.

Title: LT1 Dashboard EXP EU
Description: With the development of an integrated Power BI App. NL facilities now daily analyze their sorting performance. This also includes two manual sites, providing them with detailed analysis for the first time in years.
Problem it Solves: For multiple years, NL SATS sites used the Pie-graph from SATS to do basic analysis on their sorter performance. With the introduction of LT1 the need for accurate reporting became clear since FLY/NCY sort was also done using LT1.
Benefits: Detailed perfomance analysis. Deep-dive on issues and day-to-day improvement in sort window span.
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customs, Hubs & Gateways, IT, Network Operations

Title: ImpAct Tool
Description: The Power Apps application, used already in Belgium (EXP), will help to enter the initiatives easily and track them automatically.
Problem it Solves: ImpAct initiatives are not entered and flowed in a smart way. Too much manual work
Benefits: Easy way for the employees to track their activities related to the ImpAct

Title: RU Approved List
Description: the app facilitates the RU IB process for the Embargo analysts, it has all the approved entities and items that can be shipped to RU. And it was create instead of using more than 6 excel files to search for the entities or the items, or the contact approved list... to make their life easier.
Problem it Solves: the app facilitates the RU IB process for the Embargo analysts, it has all the approved entities and items that can be shipped to RU. And it was create instead of using more than 6 excel files to search for the entities or the items, or the contact approved list... to make their life easier
Benefits: streamline the process and make it faster and easier.

Title: DHL-ScanControl Suite
Description: ScanControl transmits the scanned information to the AHS containerization system and stops the scanner in the event of an error message. Provides LEJ OPS management with the option of issuing instructions for reloading employees for each AHS error message displayed in ScanControl. Supervises the scanning of the SI checkpoint after the X-ray for LEJ-HUB Prevents unauthorised barcodes from being read by the scanner. Provides the OPS Managemnt the possibility to send an automatical e-mail if a specific AHS error message was detected . e.g.: Embargo shipments, Customes Blocks
Problem it Solves: So that error messages are not overlooked 1.6.9 ready for Handling Instructions H&G.   So that the employee is shown the correct action for each of over 1500 errors. to prevent unnecessary delays (6 sec per interruption) caused by the scanning of unauthorised barcodes so that the management can immediately initiate the correct action for critical messages
Benefits: DF Checkpoint comliance SI Checkpoint Compliance PPH Shipment Handling

Title: DWH Report - Scanner Device Lookup
Description: Search for scanner devices by detecting the last scan
Problem it Solves: to be able to return accidentally sent devices to the owner.
Benefits: Cost saving

Title: Android Reload Scanner | AHS ScannerStopped Functi
Description: Migration of the 19 AHS error messages for ScannerStopped function from WinCE system to Android . Extension of AHS error messages for ScannerStopped function from WinCE system to Android Velocity.
Problem it Solves: So that error messages are not overlooked
Benefits: DF Checkpoint comliance NCY/ACS

Title: DHL ULD Crossloading Station AHS | WIN
Description: Controls the Offload and Reload of shipments in the AHS system with one work step if crossloading ULDs
Problem it Solves: staff can be saved during unloading and loading loading errors can be avoided
Benefits: DF Checkpoint compliance, staff costs

Title: DHL-Reload Information System (RIS) - LEJ OPS Desk
Description: Applications included:  - OPS Desktop Frame Client 1.2.x for Windows OS [BUILD] - Addon: Addon: BagDisplay Client for Desktop Frame [BUILD] - Addon: BagDisplay Dashboard Webpage [RUN] - Addon: ChuteDisplay Client for Desktop Frame [PLAN] - Addon: Management Information Display Client for Desktop Frame [PLAN] Provides a clean screen desktop for Reload employees, in which various important applications are arranged. Displays unloaded bags for the respective chute in the OPS DesktopFrame. Shows the chute availability of the respective chute Displays management information of the current OPS
Problem it Solves: So that as much information as possible is displayed to the employee without applications overlapping or having to be clicked on separately. So that incorrectly loaded flyer bags can be identified and processed. So that problems during loading can be identified and recirculation in the sorter can be prevented. So that information such as cut-off extensions and late bounces can be quickly communicated to the employee.
Benefits: DF Checkpoint compliance, PPH, OPS Management

Title: DWH Report - Reload Scan Interruptions
Description: Analysis of scan events by location
Problem it Solves: to initiate improvements
Benefits: PPH, DF Checkpoint compliance

Title: CustomsInspectionApp
Description: The solution consists of two parts: a SharePoint site where customs inspection cases are initiated and closed by customs colleagues, and the 'Beschautool' for OPS colleagues. Depending on which GTW (Gateway) a case has been opened for, that case is visible in the 'Beschautool' only to the respective users. OPS colleagues now have the option to assign themselves a case and forward the necessary information by completing the case to the customs department. A completed case is no longer visible to OPS but only to the customs department. If everything is ok, the case will be archived by customs.
Problem it Solves: Our customs department requires specific information, such as a description of contents, images, etc., as part of a customs inspection. Instead of physically going to the Warehouse to collect this information, our customs colleagues receive support from the OPS department. The 'Beschautool' serves as an information and communication platform in this regard.
Benefits: Efficiency enhancement - simplifying and optimizing the Customs inspection procedures - archiving of cases - Tracking and transparency throughout the entire process - communication between Customs department and OPS
Tags: Beschau, CCPU, customs, customsclearance, CustomsClerance, customsinspestion, PowerPlatform, Zollbeschau

Title: H&G UK  EOS Room Booking Application
Description: To bridge this gap and streamline the booking process, a solution has already been created and trialed using Power Apps. This solution is designed with simplicity and user-friendliness at its core. We have developed a bespoke, automated booking service that eliminates the current manual coordination challenges with minimal interaction or maintenance. This digital transformation initiative delivers a seamless booking experience available via MS Teams, Web Link or Power Apps Mobile
Problem it Solves: H&GG UK operate communal areas across several sites for employees without Smart Connect or access to a pc to complete the survey. As we currently have no room booking service in operation there is a requirement for a seasonal booking service that can minimise admin and ensure all required parties have access to information across multiple shifts.
Benefits: Solution provides a completely automated process that needs next to no daily input from the admin team. Users receive formatted html email confirmations, updates & calendar invites, all in line with corporate branding, complete with deep linking features to take them back to specific bookings straight from an email. Admin users receive access to synchronised Outlook calendar ensuring everyone has the same, up-to-date info. EOS timeline/schedule also included for extra visibility to users.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR

Title: Sumup and ECIS- cash discrepancy
Description: There will be no discrepancies between real amount customer has to pay and what is entered in the system.
Problem it Solves: Wrong amount entered in Sumup or ECIS. As of today the amount has to be entered by staff manually.
Benefits: Minimize manual labor; easier for employee and customer; Error avoidance; follow up and further invoicing avoidance;

Title: NL CS Express - Daily Online KPI
Description: By utilizing Power Automate and Power BI, we can make sure daily KPI data for email and chat are updated and accessible for our teams.
Problem it Solves: The Key Account Desk, Backline and Frontline within Customer Service all have KPI's on email and chat but daily accurate data is not accessible for everyone. In order to protect quality and efficiency KPI's need to be accessible at all times.
Benefits: As of now KPI's need to be manually calculated in Excel and sent to the different teams, the time this dashboard can be provided is highly dependent of how busy the performance team is that week. By automating small KPI reports like these the data will be accessible so Traffic and supervisors can intervene if needed.
