Title: Registration of customs documents
Description: Creating a new database will facilitate the availability of data for each document. It will be possible to group them according to e.g. document type, company data, etc., which will significantly speed up the process of verifying the completeness of documents. A form adapted to the document will reduce data redundancy and will be more user-friendly. Creating a new database will allow you to control and monitor this process, which will translate into fewer customs clearance delays, which will also benefit the customer.  Additionally the project will support electronic signed documents.
Problem it Solves: The currently operating database of customs documents is not transparent, it is difficult to find information in it, and there is a problem with only partial archiving of files. The Forms used is not adapted to the type of document being kept. In its current state, we have no control over documents (authorizations) that have never reached us in their original version - which is required. The scale of monitoring authorizations is really large, as it reaches approximately 3,000 documents per month, not counting documents such as declarations regarding sanctions, data changes, etc.
Benefits: 1. Customer Experience - less delays due to customs clearance 2. Sustainability Impact - less paper used to print the docs.  - less fuel used to collect the docs from the customer 3. Employee Experience - more digitally singed documents which are easier to proceed - more user-friendly interface  - easier way to find what they are looking for  4.  Operational Efficiency - automatized creating records in database  - project is open to be developed in future if needed - reducing errors in data archiving
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Network Operations, Others
Tags: attachments, automation, b2b, bigdata, customer, CustomerExprience, customs, DataAnalytics, dhlexpress, documentarchiving, documenthandling, documents, iccc, innovation, input, PowerPlatform, RPA, sharepoint, Sharepointforms, storage, streamline

Title: Leihliste EAT IT

Title: Mail merge automation
Description: Instead of the credit collection agent having to create statement extracts manually and sending out reminder emails manually. The new process improves the efficiency by 150 times and reduces time spend on especially on CSPL.
Problem it Solves: The problem is that a credit collector is losing a lot of time creating statements and sending reminder emails instead of calling the customers.

Title: RPA - Supporting documents (available in GI)
Description: The RPA would automatically recover / retrieve the impacted shipments and help with reducing the amount of time needed to action these requests. Thus, allowing for more time to perform root cause analysis.
Problem it Solves: Query handlers are regularly confronted with supporting paperwork requests. In some instances, depending on the size of the customer, these disputes may impact hundreds of invoices.  Mybill allows you to re-submit / re-trigger invoices younger than 30 days old. Please note as well that we have an internal rule which prevents EWBs from being submitted to the customer.  By creating an RPA that retrieves supporting documents (e.g., EWB, DUTY PPWK, COMMERCIAL INVOICES) for all European countries under the EKAD portfolio, we can significantly reduce the amount of time needed to action these tasks
Benefits: By implementing an RPA, Query Handlers can benefit from: 1. Reducing the amount of time needed to action supporting document disputes.  2. Creating time and space for query handlers to focus on more pressing tasks.  3. Improving customer experience 4. Collectors will be able to follow up on disputes invoices at an earlier point in time and would have more time to escalate to higher management in case invoices are not pushed through the auditing workflow on time (Reducing cashflow risk).
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: HR - Training Management
Description: Collecting training needs - Competence development plan - Organisation and logistics for training sessions - Inscription and followup of trainings - Financial and 0perational piloting of the trainings -  Statistics and decision helper - Generation of legal documents.
Problem it Solves: Single referential for all trainings
Benefits: Follow up of trainings - Easier scheduling of training sessions - Recycling of recurrent security trainings - Legal documents automatically generated.
Members: AURELIEN MARTIN, Marie COLLIGNON, Thierry KAUFFMANN, Yvan Omnes

Title: LT-SLS-Estimated price calculator
Description: During the visit, the sales manager can make live changes to the calculator settings. For example: can use an already loaded price list with a certain discount, can apply a discount of x % on the standard price, can use ECOM and BOOST price lists, can change the fuel surcharge %, can change Oversize and Overweight charges. It is also possible to set up a specific price list and send the file to the customer to calculate it himself
Problem it Solves: Sellers discuss prices for future shipments with the customer before signing a contract. It is very difficult to calculate the price with only price lists. It is necessary to find out what the receiver country zone is, whether the volumetric weight is greater than the weight, whether there will be any additional surcharges and so on. This calculator makes everything much faster and can be forwarded to the customer so that they can take the time to calculate their own parcel prices based on the assigned price list.
Benefits: This tool helps the sales manager to save time and provide information to the prospective customer faster and more clearly. No need to print price lists and manually calculate prices.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Follow-up management
Description: By centralizing fixed tasks we can automate communicating to agent back-ups to ensure follow-up. Protentional to link with holiday planner and further automate.
Problem it Solves: Semi automated follow-up of escalations, agent task and back-ups. For example in case of absence due to sickness or holiday.
Benefits: Ensure follow-up of tasks and escalations, easier overview for management, clear overview of all tasks.
Tags: escalation, followup, MST, overview, PowerPlatform, task, teammanagement

Title: Combined IT ticket request

Problem it Solves: Set up a standard set of IT requirements for each of the various positions in the department so that only one ticket needs to be raised for new starters.
Benefits: reduce the time spend on logging various tickets for a new starter

The app streamlines the request submission process, eliminating the inefficiencies of manual procedures and reducing the likelihood of errors. It establishes a centralized repository where all travel requests are logged, providing a unified platform for both employees and administrators to access and manage information.

Title: Customer and agent Conversation summary (chat)

Title: GIVR Intent Analysis
Description: By implementing GIVR intent analysis CS will able to capture insights into why our customers are calling us on every call. This will give us the starting point of where we can improve on the GIVR and offer more self service options to customers.
Problem it Solves: Improve the GIVR and why our customers are contacting us. Will help to solve the problem of a low success rate within GIVR usage. Solution will help us to improve areas of the GIVR and potentially add new options for our customers to self serve.
Benefits: This will help us to improve customer satisfaction, we can find out what customers requirements are and then in turn improve on the GIVR. This will also help our advisors, we will be able to remove more repetitive tasks allowing advisors to focus more on complex queries.

Title: GIT - User Access Management Form

A lot of channels are being used to provide curtain information (MS teams chat; email , etc), if is insufficient because you will lose track of the request, where the action is now and this will lead to frustration and the lack of transparency with the end-user.  2. Title: Digital approval tool - Logistics purchase orders
Description: The digital approval tool replaces a paper-based process and enables all involved parties to monitor and work on approvals independent of time and location, as well as improving transparency. Throughout the process, all steps are visible​ to relevant parties. Utilizing a combination of MS Power Automate and Power Apps, the approval flow is made available to all involved parties.
Problem it Solves: Currently, the purchase order approval process in EAT Logistics consists of numerous manual steps, involving a significant amount of labor and paper.
Benefits: Increases transparency of the approval process, helping to expedite steps where necessary. Automation reduces the amount of manual labor and reduces paper consumption. With the implementation of this digital solution we are able to better face current and future business requirements.

Title: CRISP 3.8.1 extract
Description: Automate the extraction with the categorization prefilled.
Problem it Solves: The evidence for the CRISP control 3.8.1 is an extract with all the journals (SA ZA SB) posted in a month categorized in "automated" "DET" or "direct entry". This extract for some countries can be huge and all the information mentioned in this file are manual.
Benefits: Save time to GL agent for this non added value task

Title: Gemba ride application. PowerApps
Description: OPMS data will be uploaded weekly by the OPS P&P employee to an excel file that is stored in Sharepoint. SPRV opens the application, creates a new record specifying the route and the day of the week. After saving, the historical data is automatically loaded from the excel file. During the route, SPRV enters observations through the app. After the route, notes are discussed with the courier, signed via the app. Following these steps creates a PDF file with all Gemba ride information and staff signatures. Gemba ride information and PDF file is archived.
Problem it Solves: The existing Gemba ride process is outdated. The SPRV must manually download the necessary historical data from the OPMS, output the averages. Print the paper Gemba ride form, enter the data. Data is recorded by hand during the route. The SPRV and the courier add signatures, the form is scanned and stored in the archive. Gemba ride app brings all this to a mobile application.
Benefits: A significantly more convenient and faster way to perform Gemba ride, automatic loading of historical data, signing in the app, automatic data archiving, no need to print paper.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Advance Managment System
Description: I would suggest a application that's provides visibility to all staff members where they can book holidays remotely or even put the request in.  The app could also give visibility to all staff members if overtime become available so they can book themselves on OT from the app on their days off. I would suggest looking into app like unityx
Problem it Solves: If you need a holiday or check if you can book holidays in the future or if you like to book a day off just before your shift, it currently  requires manager/supervisor  approval. it is not almost possible/ appropriate to reach the management team out of their duty hours. Similarly business need overtime to keep up customers demand. when this happens not everyone get the visibility of available overtime this could be due to you roasted off on the day when OT became available.
Benefits: Employee experience would be great as employee would be able to book holidays remotely if application is able to work out how holidays are given just like how managers/ supervisor work out how holidays are given. It will also give operation excellency as people being on holidays or off sick would provide visibility to those on their days off about overtime visibility and if these staff book themselves on overtime it will bring the PPH to where it needs to be and DHL will be delivering the service quality to customers without worrying about sickness and staff being off.
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Customs, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations

Title: Attachments from SharePoint in Explorer folder
Description: The workflow automatically saves the attachments of a SharePoint entry in the list in a Windows Explorer folder. The file is automatically named after the corresponding ID. The attachments are automatically saved in a folder with the corresponding ID at a certain time cycle and are therefore easy to find. To save it to a folder in the drive that is accessible to everyone, I need a gateway in the "Create File" action in the file system and an associated generic username and password. (See photos)
Problem it Solves: The SharePoint list is limited to a maximum of 5,000 entries per view. This means that if this limit is exceeded, it is difficult for employees to find the corresponding entry and so the received mail cannot be properly documented.
Benefits: The workflow means that there are no problems with the limit of 5,000 entries and so clarity is not lost. The attachments are automatically archived and can still be found after a long time. This means that no documents are lost and the workflow improves the quality of our customs department.

With this new idea, it will allow mass allocations across multiple invoices using multiple payments. This is needed when using our holding accounts

Title: EU Infrastructure PM Reporting
Description: We are aiming to digitalize the process, using a Power Apps application, linked to SharePoint lists and a related form, which would allow us to avoid excel files and manual work, reducing the amount of time dedicated to the reporting process. We could focus only on data check and validation, instead of dealing with files management.
Problem it Solves: Monthly projects' reporting is still managed using excel files, precisely 2 templates: 1 for the status report and 1 for the finance report. We have around 30-50 infrastructure projects to manage on a yearly basis, meaning we deal with a lot of reports and a lot of manual work.
Benefits: Better management of time and effort, with a consequent increase of efficiency and lower likelihood to make mistakes. Moreover, data collected via Power Apps/SharePoint lists can feed other dashboards with updated data real time.

Problem it Solves: We'll gain the control over our supplies in real time - the stock numbers, supplies location and the inventory. We'll have all necessary information on one place.

Title: EXP H&G BRUHUB Work Instructions
Description: Work instructions are guidelines or procedures that provide step-by-step instructions for performing specific tasks or activities. By digitizing these work instructions in SharePoint Online, DHL Brussels Hub can centralize and organize them in a standardized manner, making them easily accessible to employees across different functions. The combination of SharePoint Online and the PowerApp tool provides a digital solution for managing work instructions, ensuring consistency and efficiency across different functions within the DHL Brussels Hub Environment
Problem it Solves: By centralizing the work instructions in SharePoint Online and providing a standardized interface through the PowerApp, DHL Brussels Hub can ensure that all employees across different functions are accessing the same set of instructions. This promotes consistency in work processes and reduces the chances of errors or inconsistencies due to varying instructions.  The PowerApp can be configured to include automated review processes, reminding users to regularly check their work instructions and update them as necessary. This helps to keep the instructions up to date.
Benefits: The Work Instructions App increases productivity by providing employees with a tool that streamlines the process of accessing, viewing, and updating work instructions. With a user-friendly interface and interactive features, employees can quickly find the information they need, reducing errors and improving task efficiency. The use of the Work Instructions App demonstrates DHL Express' commitment to sustainability. By promoting digitalization and reducing paper-based processes. the EXP H&G BRUHUB Work Instructions App leads to benefits for DHL Express by enhancing the employee experience.
Tags: 0365, digitalization, employeeexperience, GSOP, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, productivity, standardization, workinstructions

Description: Designed to provide access to phone numbers of employees who have company phones. It is primarily used by the IT, security, HR, and equipment room departments. The application connects to an internal Sharepoint list that contains detailed information about the SIM card and smartphone assigned to each employee or department. In terms of data access, the application ensures that sensitive information, such as SIM card information and other confidential details, is only available to the IT department. Problem it Solves: solves the problem of scattered and decentralized storage of employee phone number information. By centralizing the phone number information in an internal Sharepoint list, the PowerApp provides a single source of truth for this data. This streamlines the process of retrieving information, saving time and effort that would otherwise be spent searching through various sources. Real-time Updates: The tool can facilitate real-time updates to phone number information. When changes occur, such as new phone assignments or updates to existing numbers, authorized personnel can quickly update the Sharepoint list. This ensures that the information remains up-to-date and avoids confusion or mi

Title: EXP H&G BRUHUB Recruitment Requests
Description: This tool resolves this issue by automating and digitalizing the approvals/requests. Approvals/requests can no longer get misplaced, no longer have to chase people for signatures, as each person has a dashboard overview of all their requests/approvals. This helps speeding up the process of replacement/new hires. Electronic request forms inside this PowerApp help the requestor from making mistakes, as each field is a dropdown selection that gets pre-filtered based on previous choices. Making it quite simple to fill one out. Automated approvals and update mails notify recruitment once complete.
Problem it Solves: Paper based Approvals/Requests for replacement hires/ new hires. Requests can get lost/misplaced, manual work and paper waste for each request. Due to it being paper based and having to fill this in manually, creates the opportunity to fill this in wrong. Manual repetitive paper based tasks need to be digitalized to help us towards a paperless future. This tool eliminates all aforementioned issues with the way we were working.
Benefits: Your tool automates and digitalizes approvals/requests, resulting in multiple benefits for DHL. It contributes to sustainability efforts by reducing paper usage and aligns with the go-green initiative. Additionally, it enhances the employee experience by improving productivity and well-being. The tool eliminates misplaced documents, streamlines processes, reduces errors, and provides timely notifications, fostering a positive work environment at DHL

Title: DHL TV Netpresenter Power BI
Description: With the Netpresenter upgrade, we're revolutionizing communication. Integrating seamlessly with Power BI, it simplifies live performance data uploads, making content fresh and engaging. No more delays – upload TV content effortlessly in seconds. It's a game-changer, ensuring dynamic, professional-looking communication that captivates every employee, solving the problem of cumbersome and time-consuming processes.
Problem it Solves: The problem our idea solves is the outdated and restrictive nature of Netpresenter. Currently, Netpresenter is limited to adding and displaying static JPG slides or MP4 clips individually, resulting in a cumbersome and time-consuming process. This limitation makes it challenging to keep content up to date, especially for dynamic information such as daily performance results. Our solution aims to modernise this communication platform, offering a more flexible and efficient way to update content in real time, ensuring that organizations can easily keep their information current and relevant.
Benefits: Live KPI data on DHL TVs at SVCs offers insights for customer experience improvement. Employees enjoy efficient communication, instantly viewing their performance without PowerPoint hassles. NEOP Digi Hub's adaptable reports on TV screens enhance operational efficiency, facilitating proactive decision-making. The outcome: heightened customer satisfaction, increased employee engagement, and a more responsive work environment, ensuring prompt discussions and actions for every team member without delays
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, General Management, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Sales
Members: Daniel Taylor, Geetha Chelliah, Manpreet Singh, Mark Cowie

Title: Recycled invoice numbers
Description: By disabling the use of recycled invoices, the reactive checks/investigations will not have to place. This would streamline the auditing process and allow collectors to allocate more time towards taking action pressing topics/issues.
Problem it Solves: Freight payment agencies (FPA) / auditors encounter difficulties when auditing recycled invoice numbers. These would populate as a “duplicate” on the auditors’ side which many times become rejected or may be claimed as already “paid”.  To investigate / perform root cause analysis, collectors would have to crosscheck DHL data against data extracted from (FPAs). This is a time-consuming task to investigate and resolve (both for DHL and payers/auditors).  Example country: Italy - Italy invoices.
Benefits: By ensuring that we do not recycle invoice numbers, we can solve the following: 1.	Reduce the risk of payment delays that are caused by recycled invoices.  2.	Reduce number of disputes raised by customer / auditors.  3.	Prevent possible payment errors that may occur by AP teams.  4. Allow users, collectors to focus on more pressing tasks.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Express Ops-Trainer visibility Participant Booking
Description: A data base/system that handles bookings in a streamlined way. This would enable less  manual data manipulation, support multi user access without corrupting booking information/tracking and enable a 'one stop shop' approach for the full team to support the wider business where appropriate.
Problem it Solves: Since moving to Teams for our document visibility our 12 Trainers can no longer see the details of who to expect in their training sessions.  All work arounds/ solutions fail at some level to fit our requirements. The current training booking office programmes are archaic and labour intensive. They do not work for multiple users access. We handle approx. 4500 bookings a year. (Formstack and Excel spreadsheets). The current processes to record and track bookings are too fragile, unreliable and no longer fit for purpose as audience, volume and needs increase.
Benefits: Easier to maintain compliance- which is what our purpose as a team is heavily based on. Leaner approaches- e.g less manual input/creation.  Any time access to up to the minute/real time picture of participants with full GDPR compliant details visible immediately to the trainer. Flexibility to the Ops side. They can add participants at late notice to sessions. e.g as soon as vetting complete.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT
Tags: compliance, excel, gdpr, ppwkcheck, reduceemails, sap, secureddata, selfservice, simplification, SPEED, teams, timemanagement, timeoptimization, tool, training

Title: Helicopter view - Mybill
Description: Adding the option to retrieve a complete overview of credit/debit notes when searching on individual/multiple invoices will allow users to instantly retrieve the desired data.
Problem it Solves: When searching for an invoice number, Mybill allows you to search multiple / individual invoice number(s) at a time. Mybill also allows you to search per shipment number (AWB).  If for instance, you must retrieve credit notes for multiple invoices (among varying accounts / entities), you’d have to search AWB per AWB.  As you can imagine, this is time-consuming task.
Benefits: Shorten the amount of time required to map generated credit / debit notes. Shorten the amount of time required to investigate possible payment allocation errors caused by users/system. Shorten the amount of time required to revert back to internal / external stakeholders (e.g., sales, freight payment agencies, account holders).

Title: EDI integration – Mybill
Description: By adding the EDI interface, users would more easily be able to have a clear overview on how accounts are set up. This would shorten the amount of time required to perform core activities (e.g., root cause analysis and account maintenance).
Problem it Solves: Mybill does not visualize the EDI configuration of an account. Currently, Mybill only visualizes the SFTP directory on an account (once the account is opened).   To investigate the EDI settings set-up, tickets / other platforms would have to be logged / involved which lengthens the process to retrieve the desired data.
Benefits: Increased visibility of account configuration.  Reduce amount of time necessary to map accounts. Reduce the number of platforms / tickets required to retrieve desired data

Title: KAD Telephony System
Description: It will help us to ensure that the lines are correctly working more efficiently, it will also help get the customer to the correct tracing owner and round robin calls. The customers will always have the one telephone number to contact should they move to a different team.
Problem it Solves: Initiative improves on the customer and employee experience. This will help us to maintain a more effective approach at managing to telephone lines.
Benefits: More efficient to maintain and make any changes. A better experience for the customers as only the one number to call and a better distribution of calls among advisors.

Title: Competitor & Market Intelligence
Description: The target solution is the "Valona Intelligence" Platform which is already used by the Global Competitor & Intelligence Team.  The digital platform automates search queries and curates key competitor and market intelligence from multiple sources which can be accessed via an online platform. The information and insights can also be easily shared with key stakeholders including members of the Board or the UK Sales Team.
Problem it Solves: The UK Product Management Team often receive competitor and market intelligence requests from members of the Board or the UK Sales Team. Currently competitor and market intelligence is sourced manually which is time consuming. Automating the process through digitalization would enable the team to source the information faster and spend more time on generating insights which can support strategic or tactical decision making or simply keep the Sales Force informed of key competitor activity.
Benefits: The key benefit is speeding up the current process of searching for UK competitor insights and gain some insights into the strategic priorities of our competitors.

Title: GEMBA RIDE TR
Description: Operation supervisors and managers were using excel sheets for their Gemba Ride experience. One copy of the Gemba Ride Excel Record archived and one copy of it was shared with the courier. We have deployed a Gemba Ride App with Power Apps and this app allows users to fill the form through App, take a photo and save it to the SharePoint list. They also can share Gemba Ride scoring and comments with the courier by takin screen shot of the Summary Screen. SharePoint List is also linked a Power BI report which enable managers to follow Gemba Ride performances by Service Centers.
Problem it Solves: Operation supervisors and managers were using excel sheets for their Gemba Ride experience. One copy of the Gemba Ride Excel Record archived and one copy of it was shared with the courier. We have deployed a Gemba Ride App with Power Apps and this app allows users to fill the form through App, take a photo and save it to the SharePoint list. They also can share Gemba Ride scoring and comments with the courier by takin screen shot of the Summary Screen. SharePoint List is also linked a Power BI report which enable managers to follow Gemba Ride performances by Service Centers.
Benefits: Easy to use through App. No paper printout for Gemba Ride archive
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: EU Infrastructure Master Plan
Description: Creates a central repository of all EU infrastructure to review adequacy, future investment pipeline, capex requests and will link to critical drivers (IB and OB throughput, PuD capacity, H&S, lease timelines, Carbon Neutral Building requirements, infrastructure financials) for country facility adequacy
Problem it Solves: Provides a single source for all EU infrastructure adequacy and future investments. The tool will utilise Power Apps to simplify the country infrastructure master planning process and allow for a more detailed view of the critical drivers for investment.
Benefits: improved investment prioritisation within EU via  improved Capex planning and improved due-diligence.  - Identify where operational restraints / inefficiencies are in order to  maximise return on capital invested.  - Optimise investment process by avoiding time on BCA preparation for investments which would not GO ahead.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Automation of printing from SFTP server
Description: Instead of manually downloading files and printing them, this solution automatically downloads and prints new files that arrive at sftp
Problem it Solves: We have a solution that creates 3pa carrier and stores it into a sftp when we give that particular awb FD checkpoint. This solution speeds the process of getting 3pa carrier from sftp to a package
Benefits: This solution speeds the process of getting 3pa carrier from sftp to a package, leading to increase in productivity

Title: Tender Process Automation
Description: Our solution utilizes MS Forms, SharePoint, Power Apps and Power Automate to reduce inefficiencies in the EU tender process. It reduces manual work by semi-automating 47% of the emails sent out throughout each case and reduce document creation by 22%. The solution makes information efficiently accessible through one shared source of truth in SharePoint and it also reduces reworks by ensuring that the right information is entered the first time.
Problem it Solves: The current tender process for EU has multiple inefficiencies due to which it takes 29 days on average to submit a proposal to a customer. These inefficiencies include manual work that can be easily automated, inefficient information transfer between departments which leads to delays when searching for information, and constant reworks throughout the cases due to not receiving the right information the first time around.
Benefits: Customers will be able to receive offers from us much faster which will improve the customer experience we provide and positively impact our NPS and Ease of Use scores of the journey: "I receive an offer & open an account". The solution will also reduce the workload of the Tender team by 1 FTE and in this way positively impact the operational efficiency of the department.
Most impacted Functions: Finance, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales
Tags: customerExperience, operationalefficiency, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, pricing, sales, sharepoint, workflow

Title: DIGIBRIEF: Management Portal
Description: The DIGIBRIEF Management Portal addresses the crucial need for a systematic and efficient way to analyze and report on the data collected from Linehaul drivers during their briefings and debriefings through the DIGIBRIEF app. By centralizing the collation of this information, the portal significantly streamlines the process of generating actionable insights. This enables office staff to make informed managerial decisions, enhances operational efficiency, and improves driver productivity and satisfaction by accurately capturing and acting upon their answers and experiences.
Problem it Solves: The DIGIBRIEF Management Portal enhances EMA Linehaul operations by integrating with the DIGIBRIEF app for superior data analysis and reporting. It enables staff to seamlessly monitor trends, generate reports, and update the app's special instructions. Designed for ease of use, it streamlines workflows, supports data-driven decisions, and ensures content relevance. This essential tool boosts productivity and operational efficiency within the office environment, making it indispensable for managing the DIGIBRIEF process and the movements in and out of EMA.
Benefits: The DIGIBRIEF Management Portal streamlines DHL Express Linehaul operations by offering office staff a centralized data analysis and reporting tool. It enhances decision-making with real-time insights, reduces administrative work, and improves strategic planning. This boosts productivity and operational efficiency, allowing for better resource allocation and targeted improvements in Linehaul services.
Most impacted Functions: General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Network Operations, Others
Tags: application, businessintelligence, coordination, dailyreport, DataAnalytics, Datamanagement, datavisualization, dhlexpress, dhlexpressapp, digi, digital, digitalization, Linehaul, operations, ops, optimization, PowerPlatform
Members: Adrian Eden, Alex Brown, Ben Davies, Ben Hiles, Craig Murray, Gareth Knox, Geetha Chelliah, Mark O'Doherty

Title: Pick-up Performance
Description: A dashboard that calculates how well the couriers comply with the Pick-up time windows of customers, and tracks their pick-up exceptions. The dashboard serves as a tool to identify low performing couriers, customer accounts that receive sub-par service, as well as trends in Pick-up Exceptions.
Problem it Solves: Our Service Quality performance is calculated from Pick-up to Delivery, however the customers journey with DHL usually starts with a booking. Booking to Pick-up, is rather overlooked in OPMS and we have nothing other than a raw extract of "PuD" data in OPMS.  There are no OPS KPIs related to the timeliness and Pick-up Exceptions, like we for instance have on our deliveries. because of this, we have no easy way of making an overview of how well the couriers are compliant to the customers time window, or to see a trend in futile pick-ups for any given account.
Benefits: The dashboard provides an overview of our performance from booking to pick-up, and with this overview we are able to identify new areas of improvement to increase our service quality for the customers.  Our employees will also be more effective in finding these areas of improvements as they no longer have to navigate a raw data extract - leading to both employee and operational efficiency.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: CustBot - Customs ChatBot (webapp)
Description: Our ChatBot serves as a centralized databank housing all pertinent information for our agents, including system manuals, customs-related details, classification and cleansing information, and more. It meticulously curates only the most relevant and up-to-date data provided by our specialists, ensuring its accuracy and reliability. The information is presented in an accessible HTML format, offering the flexibility to format text according to our preferences, seamlessly integrate images and examples, and incorporate hyperlinks for enhanced navigation and reference. This comprehensive approach en
Problem it Solves: Previously, the Customs Department faced challenges with decentralized manuals and information scattered across iShare, SharePoint, Teams, server locations, Excel, Word, and PDFs. This fragmented system made it difficult for users to access vital information efficiently. To address this, efforts are underway to centralize and streamline information repositories, enhancing accessibility and ensuring accuracy in customs-related procedures. The aim is to create a more user-friendly platform for seamless retrieval of essential manuals and information within the Customs Department.
Benefits: Thanks to our ChatBot solution, we can provide declarants and other agents with pertinent and current information. The platform offers a broad spectrum of data, reducing the percentage of customer complaints by aiding in the selection of accurate tariff codes, adherence to customer instructions, and following correct processes. Simultaneously, our employees benefit from a user-friendly tool that is easily accessible and comprehensible, streamlining their workflow and facilitating the swift retrieval of accurate information. This ensures a more efficient and error-resistant operational environm
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: automation, chatbot, DataAnalytics, manuals, robotics, RPA

Title: HG MXP - Inventario Radio
Description: Helps keep track of business radio usage and life
Problem it Solves: The application to enter the data of the radios and who has them in charge. Repairs that are made when damaged can also be recorded in the app. There is also a historical section to keep track of all the events and a graphic section to see the progress of the radios in the app
Benefits: Digitalization
Members: Andrea ROSSINI, Fabrizio Gorini, Lukas Varini

Title: DEAL: Drop Everything And Learn
Description: Development of an application in which IT employees can self-register their various learning activities, and managers can track the team's progress against upskilling targets.
Problem it Solves: This initiative solves the problem of effectively tracking and managing learning activities for IT employees, enabling the measurement of time spent on learning per individual, identification of learning trends per domain, and centralized tracking of upskilling progress to improve employee development and meet upskilling targets.
Benefits: Employees are able to track the time spent on different types of learning and upskilling activities from various sources within and outside the organization. Managers are able to track the progress of the team against their upskilling targets. Centrally, to gain insight into the learning trends and interests per domain that can be used for future upskilling plans and initiatives.

Title: Contract Management system for Kazakhstan
Description: System for suppliers contracts monitoring (Contract numbering, ScOC, expiration status, reporting etc) Not this is manual with use of different systems in Procurement, Finance etc. Users need to check contracts manually.
Problem it Solves: System for suppliers contracts monitoring (Contract numbering, ScOC, expiration status, reporting etc)
Benefits: Structured contract process

Title: UK H&G Dataflow Refresh Automation
Description: PowerAutomate connected to SQL connectors and Dataflows automates the refresh process, cascading the refreshes one after the other once a data change is detected. This eliminates the waiting time between refreshes and ensures refreshes only occur when they are needed.
Problem it Solves: A series of complex data sources are combined and hosted in dataflows. The nature of the different sources makes the built in scheduled refresh slow to bring data to final reports, and intensive on server resources. NB this is the same solution as a previous campfire, resubmitted in order to move dev environments.
Benefits: The full PowerBI reporting suite, which includes volume and productivity information used across H&G UK, will be available several hours earlier, enabling more agility in operational response to volumes. Resource intensive refreshes will be reduced from hourly to daily.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR

Title: FSC Inventory Tool
Description: We built an Excel tool that automatically downloads the FSC data, and enables the operators to scan the item tags and their location tags, providing an immediate comparison between the data from FSC and what is in the cage. The inventories are then archived directly to sharepoint.
Problem it Solves: Currently, taking inventory of the Lost&Found cage requires to manually download the FSC data and then locate the items physically. There are a lot of manual steps, and becomes complicated for sites with a large amount of items to inventory, thus inventories are being only done partially if at all.
Benefits: The solution automates a lot of steps, enables mass scanning instead of individual identification, standardizes the process and files, and allows central operations to check on the inventories directly.
Members: Blair Proffit, Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Mayooran Soundararajah

Title: Safety observation response automation
Description: It will minimize manual work. At the moment all have to be done manually by one person. Using power automate to send responses from the forms to specific people automates manual processes for 1500-2000 emails per year.
Problem it Solves: Moving safety observations out from Questback tool and to MS Forms. Ms Form does not enable easily forwarding observations by email to multiple users based on selections in the form.  Using power automate to send responses from the forms to specific people automates manual processes for 1500-2000 emails per year. Also enables to save cost on Questback licences. iCare does not currently support the process for creating safety findings by people outside DHL organisation. When this is enabled in the future in iCare we can move to that.
Benefits: More time to do productive work, less time for manual reporting

Title: Digital checklist for 5S
Description: The solution is a PowerApp, allowing the checklists to be filled in on the warehouse floor. The data entered is available in Sharepoint for the operations manager and 5S Champion to review. A PowerBI dashboard based on the data is also available for further insight. The app is flexible, allowing different checklist items for different areas. When used on a smartphone it offers the option to capture supporting images.
Problem it Solves: When rolling out 5S in a workspace, team members need to do perform periodic checks to ensure the agreed standard is still being met. If the area in scope is large or complicated, there can be multiple checklists and many people can be involved in filling out checklists. In such cases, using a physical checklist is not viable, it would require constant effort to gain insight in the maturity of the 5S and to communicate potential improvements to the teams.
Benefits: The digital checklist makes it easier and faster for the supervisors to complete the checklist for their area, raising buy-in for the 5S project. Eliminating physical checklists reduces the need for paper and streamlines the process for delivering the checklist data to the manager and 5S Champion. Adding the data into PowerBI gives further insight into trends and potential issues, leading to a better final result of the 5S rollout.
Members: Jens Vermeir, Kristof PARMENTIER, Saad Eddine Orkhis, Wouter BUEKENHOUDT

Title: HG MXP-outbound control application
Description: we already use an application to control the inbound of the ULD during sort. in my Idea using the same rf a similar application can work with SABLE and GOALS updating the outbound "in real time" as explained below: 3 rf 1 for each of the main door for the exit of the ULDs the  agent will shoot the barcode of the uld and on SABLE the ULD will appear in  a different colour just like as it works with GOALS for the servicability check and the loading on the aircraft. this solution  might can garantee to check immediatly the loading of every ULD on the Dolly and so the entrance in Ramp area.
Problem it Solves: in MXP Hub site sometimes we have some problem in communication with ramp and wrh about the ULD that are ready to be picked up from wrh and be loaded on the aircraft like if one of them if already out or still in wrh expecially during cut-offs.
Benefits: much more control of the outbound of ULDs from WRH. much less paper waste because right now we print 3  white tags for ULD. with this solution I assume we can print just one of them

Title: CIS CZ APP
Description: unique link for all trainings without mistakes in Excel
Problem it Solves: Registration for CIS trainings, we would like to add link for our CIS Dashboard soon
Benefits: fast, clear, archive, digitalization

Title: Voice of Customer Feedback to Courier
Description: In our Digital PD boards, we have added a feature that allows couriers to select their route ID to view their feedback from the customers, including both motivational feedback and development feedback.
Problem it Solves: The Medallia platform has increased our customer insights and given us a lot of customer feedback data to navigate and analyze. Yet, through this initiative we have also found a need for a simple way for our couriers to individually receive their feedback from the customers.
Benefits: Our solution benefits the courier by giving individual motivational and developmental feedback from the customer, through an easy to use front-end on the Digital PD Board.  The channel of feedback will also benefit the customer by ensuring the feedback reaches the relevant courier for a better customer experience in the future.

Title: HMRC Reclaims GIA Data Enrichment
Description: Currently in place via the Blockchain Solution for duty drawback but it would also be good if this can be added for our Reclaims Schedules we submit to HMRC so that they can self-serve their audits and documentation requests.
Problem it Solves: Allowing HMRC hyperlink access to GIA for paperwork review will save a massive amount of emails back and forth asking for audit documents and should in theory speed up payments for our reclaims with HMRC.
Benefits: 1) Reduce low-value added activity with handling paperwork requests from HMRC which is a manual process. 2) Increase the speed with which HMRC can process reclaims, allowing a faster payment back to DHL. 3) Reduce workload for DHL agents as HMRC can self-serve.

Title: Improving Website and Online tool Accessibility
Description: Developing our own digital accessibility tools or partnering with suppliers like accesiBe could improve user experience, reduce legal risk; Ofcom Guidance 2023 focuses on supporting users with addtional needs for example and offer support to customers and staff.
Problem it Solves: To improve and offer a wider range accessibility of adaptions and tools that would provide equal and easy access to all our products and services. Embracing accessibility leads to a wide range of benefits, strengthens the brand presence, improves customer and employee experience.
Benefits: Tools like the AccesiBe widget integrate with existing websites to offer support for vision imparted, cognitive disabilities, seizure safe profiles, blind users, keyboard navigation among others.  This would offer access, improved user experience for our customers and employees

Title: Automatic notification email with Power Automate
Description: The Power Automate Workflow is linked to a SharePoint list in which incoming or outgoing physical mail is documented. When an entry is created in the SharePoint list, the employees select a department for which the post is intended. The selected department will now be automatically informed by email that a new entry has been created that affects the department. The email to the department also contains the attachment of the entry in the SharePoint list, a copy of the physical mail.
Problem it Solves: When an entry is created or modified in the SharePoint list, the relevant department will be notified via the department inbox of the incoming mail and be able to find it quickly to get the necessary information and the attachment.
Benefits: The workflow ensures better compliance because no mail is lost due to the notification. The flow also has a positive effect on speed, as the ID and attachment of the entry are automatically sent in the email, meaning employees can find the necessary information more quickly. The notification ensures more reliable work.
Tags: automatedemails, AutomatedFlow, Mailing, outlook, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, sharepoint

Title: AC MX Production Framework  Optimization
Description: We plan to use advanced data analytics and machine learning algorithms to identify flight schedule trends and incorporate them early into our maintenance strategy. This requires us not only to utilize core data like flight schedules (NetLine Sched) and maintenance activities (TRAX, eCentral8 & AIMS) but also to access specific aircraft maintenance information from each outstation stored in the Airport Information Directory (AID). This information is critical to consider factors such as hangar availability and other maintenance-related parameters.
Problem it Solves: We aim to align the published flight schedule with the required maintenance framework effectively, meeting the needs of both sides. The benefits of this optimization are manifold. We expect a balanced distribution of aircraft usage, optimized aircraft routes, and improved technical performance. It will also enable more efficient scheduled maintenance, resulting in higher quality aircraft maintenance. Ultimately, this will lead to increased aircraft reliability, reducing delays and cancellations, saving costs, and ensuring a reliable network for our customers.
Benefits: This optimization provides a balanced distribution of aircraft usage, optimized aircraft routes, and improved technical performance of the aircraft. It also enables more efficient scheduled maintenance, leading to a higher quality of aircraft maintenance. As a result, the reliability of our aircraft increases, leading to fewer delays and cancellations. This not only saves significant costs but also ensures a reliable network for our customers.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact
EGAP System: TRAX, AID, AIMS, NETLINE SCHED, NETLINE OPS, NMIV
Tags: air, aircraft, airlines, DataAnalytics, Dataiku, datascience, dhlexpress, DigitalTransformation, fleet, forecasting, ML, networkoperations, optimization, performance, profitablenetwork, safety, smartworking, TechnicalDispatchReliability

Title: CPH HUB Controlled Document Center
Description: The Controlled Document Center uses a Sharepoint document library with content approval. The document owner fills out some information about the document content, assigns reviewers and approvers. Power automate automatically uses the filled out information to create review and approval flows, while reminder flows for the document owner.
Problem it Solves: The controlled document center is used to manage documents that are used in the business such as policies, certificates or procedures. The controlled document center is created to ensure the documents are compliant with the rules from the performance team. Such as allowing the document owner to work on their documents, while only allowing the CPH HUB employees to see approved and published documents. To ensure yearly assessment and updates of the documents automatic reminders are also send to the document owner.
Benefits: The Controlled document center helps managing documents used by the business and keep them updated. The documents owners, approvers and CPH HUB employees all have access to the documents at the same place. The controlled document center is created with requirements to ensure that the documents uploaded are compliant and helps the document owner manage their own documents.

Title: HR - Approval process for opening position
Description: This solution is on SharePoint Online. The SharePoint will use a power automate flow. There is a validation flow for each opening position by services. The flow shows the status of each request for an opening position : who has validated it, who is the next approver, who has rejected, ...
Problem it Solves: The SharePoint allow severals approval process to validate an opening position. We use power automate flow for that.
Benefits: This solution allow to saving times, create few reports and have visiblity on the process of approval (who has approved, at which step the request is, who's the next approver, ...).

Title: Evidence of uniforms and PPE
Description: At least removing of papers. It will be a Power Apps application with a link to a Sharepoint list that will serve as a storage. The solution will also include a reminder workflow solution via Power Automate. The application will be used to maintain records of uniforms and PPE.
Problem it Solves: e-signature = paperless  - evidence - automatical adding and removing of items - automatical advising
Benefits: paperless  - user friendly enviroment - saving time - e-signature

Title: GSOP Hub: Tools and KPIs
Description: Create a PowerApps application with form-based sub-tools, links and reporting
Problem it Solves: Elimination of printed forms, creation of a single application for recording and reporting GSOP needs. Simplifying data access and data visualization for supervisors and managers.
Benefits: Paperless solution - environment footprint, money; KPIs graphs and other data shown via PowerBI in the App - less preparation time for leads, clickable, vizualization, fast response time; faster and easier processing of GSOP needs (for example digi GEMBA RIDE form); uploading photos and other attachments to better identify the problem or improvement (part of individual tools, if required or as an add-on). Easy access to all records (authorised persons)

Title: DCE integration with local customs application
Description: Dubee is designed as a scalable and secure platform capable of handling a large number of shipments and customs declarations. The local solution is customized as follows: Instead of manually entering the necessary data in the LCA to create an import customs declaration, DUBEE application automatically retrieves the data from DCE, process XML data and forwarding obtained data into LCA , Some of these data are: sender, recipient , btto, parcel, value, HS CODE.
Problem it Solves: Manual data entry from DCE to LCA
Benefits: This solution makes process of  making customs declarations easier, more efficient and accurate, leading to more declarations made then before, and also easier workflow for our customs department employees

Title: DCC integration with local customs application
Description: Dubee export is designed as a scalable and secure platform capable of handling a large number of shipments and customs declarations. The local solution is customized as follows: Instead of manually entering the necessary data in the LCA to create an import customs declaration, DUBEE application automatically retrieves the data from DCC, process XML data and forwarding obtained data into LCA,
Problem it Solves: Manual data entry from DCC to LCA
Benefits: This solution makes process of making customs declarations easier, more efficient and accurate, leading to more declarations made then before, and easier workflow for our customs department employees

Title: Digital Performance Dialogue Boards
Description: Using a large screen touchscreen computer as the Performance Dialogue board in place of a whiteboard, with a Skype client attached so the screen can be shared with those working at home.
Problem it Solves: Eliminates preparation time for running reports to get the information on the KPIs and writing it onto the board. Contents of the board can be shared over Skype so that it is viewable to those working from home.
Benefits: Performance KPIs graphs are shown directly through PowerBI - meaning less preparation time for the team lead, and clickable, drillable reports for better discussions. The Skype client and attached microphone and speaker means the board can be shared with those participating in the PD from home.

Title: Maintenance PowerApp
Description: This application would allow the inventories of all DHL maintenance departments to be unified, accelerating spare parts management, reducing capital investments in spare parts. It would also allow us to act more quickly in the event of a breakdown, being able to locate the location of the spare parts on site from a mobile phone, as well as manage delivery notes and documentation in a faster, more agile and comfortable way. Likewise, it would also allow on-site access to information, parts, maintenance manuals and other information to carry out repairs in a faster and more intuitive way.
Problem it Solves: This application would allow the inventories of all DHL maintenance departments to be unified, accelerating spare parts management, reducing capital investments in spare parts. It would also allow us to act more quickly in the event of a breakdown, being able to locate the location of the spare parts on site from a mobile phone, as well as manage delivery notes and documentation in a faster, more agile and comfortable way. Likewise, it would also allow on-site access to information, parts, maintenance manuals and other information to carry out repairs in a faster and more intuitive way.
Benefits: Fewer delays in the delivery of merchandise due to breakdowns. Faster, more comfortable, efficient and comforting work for maintenance workers. It can include a bar code scanner for registering the AWB of damaged packages due to jams, hits,  entrapments on conveyor belts or another similar issues and avoid losing this data due to blurry photos or bad transcriptions
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: EXP H&G ES AUTOSORT FSC DATA TO SHAREPOINT

This will me done via PowerAutomate using Non-Bussinness Standar Connector File System or SFTP and Bussiness Standar Conector Sharepoint for uploading the files

Title: Global Service Directory equivalent for customers
Description: Customers can freely obtain country specific restrictions, weight limit, cost restrictions and other country specific useful information without the need to call the sales rep, customer services or not use DHL due to not having the knowledge accessible.
Problem it Solves: Customers can freely obtain country specific information such as weight limits, cost restrictions, country regulations relevant to export/importing.
Benefits: We will be ahead of competitors and customers will have confidence and the knowledge to be able to send shipments on the DHL network without apprehension.

Title: FOC - Free of charge shipments approval process
Description: Facilitating compliance with a global standard so that DHL can ensure all FOC shipments are properly recorded and authorized in accordance with standard procedures.
Problem it Solves: Setting up the FOC approval process is important to shipment traceability, audit controls, and reporting to senior management.
Benefits: Speeding up the whole process (Sharepoint form entry and approval process via Power Automate), all types of FOC shipments in one place, under control, transparent and with approvals.

Title: Proces Verbal Predare-Primire
Description: The process will save the approval handover process to an excel file to be seen also by the financial deparment.
