Tags: approvals, approve, asset, AssetInformation, AssetTracking, RPA

Title: OPS Recaps
Description: Our Ops Recaps App streamlines end-of-shift reporting with a simple interface and standardized template, ensuring consistent and complete updates. When pressing Submit, the app distributes an email to all designated recipients. This app simplifies the overview for receivers, making it easier to read and understand the shift's events and numbers. Also, it serves as a foundation for analytics, enabling the optimization of sort times, identification of trends i.e. linehaul delays, and pinpointing other areas for improvement. All reports are centrally stored, facilitating easy access and analysis.
Problem it Solves: After each operation shift, the Team Lead is responsible for communicating the end-of-shift status “OPS Recap” to all relevant people across different departments. DK has six teams, and each team sends out its own version of “OPS Recap” to share this status. However, this process is time-consuming and inefficient. The "OPS Recap" emails lack a standardized format across all teams, leading to inconsistencies in the level of detail provided. In some cases, these emails are either too brief, missing critical information, or, at times, not sent out at all.
Benefits: This app streamlines the process of sending the end-of-shift report for each of our six teams, and also saves time of the six users having to write and distribute a report document via e-mail.  also, it increases the quality of data for further optimization of operational processes.
Tags: datacollection, PowerPlatform, Recap, reporting, standardization, streamline

Title: Customs Regulations- Booking Tool Notifications
Description: Introduce some form of automated notification or pop-up when a destination country is selected in all booking tools that notifies customers of the more 'obscure' customs regulations there, particularly around temporary import or return/repair regulations to improve customer knowledge.
Problem it Solves: Proactively notify GB shippers at the point of booking key customs regulations for the chosen destination, with the aim to reduce the volume of lengthy queries arising from customers being unaware of specific customs regulations at destination such as FR where temp export isn't allowed.
Benefits: Improve customer knowledge and deter shipping of goods where the desired customs service is unfeasible for the customer. Reduce query volumes and overall time to resolve of these kind of destination customs queries that often have a negative customer, and employee, experience when handling.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Operational efficiency, Employee experience

Title: Activating Feedback Functionality
Description: Replicate the feedback button functionality onto parcel.dhl.co.uk. The functionality already exists on DHL.com and therefore we could use the code to provide the same feedback experience that customers are accustomed to.  The insights would be captured to drive improvements in the user experience.
Problem it Solves: On page optimisation can take time and resources. Implementing the feedback functionality from DHL.com to parcel.dhl.co.uk enables us to capture customer feedback and make more informed decisions when investing in optimising the website. We can focus on activities that customers truly value.
Benefits: 1) Capture feedback from engaged users.  2) Develop a on page optimisation strategy based on customer insight 3) Improved UX  4) Improved SEO rankings.  5) Improved sales conversion.

Title: Daily Volume Report- Sales
Description: If this was available by a link to access it would support reducing the amount of memory in mail boxes. As the report appears when searching in outlook it can be timely to find an email relating to the customer due to the volume of reports.
Problem it Solves: Sales receive two reports daily on excel stating the previous days volume , by customer/shipment numbers.  Reduce time searching for emails as will mitigate number of emails in outlook with relevant search terms i.e customer name  Also emails have a carbon foot print of their own so will also support sustainability
Benefits: Timesaving Memory saving
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: H&S - iCARE & Origami interface
Description: Using RPA to extract data from drop down boxes in iCARE and auto fill data in destination fields into Origami to auto populate incident reports for insurance claims purposes
Problem it Solves: iCARE is the new global incident reporting tool to replace the Origami the UK version. Origami is used for insurance purposes for Employee and Motor liability claims. iCARE does not interface with Origami for insurance and legal claims purposes. To do this without a solution will require double keying on both systems. The solution would be to extract and transfer data from relevant fields using an IT autobot process RPA
Benefits: Supports Lost Time Incident Frequency Rate KPI data for both systems. Eliminates the need for double keying in both incident reporting tools. Accurate preparation of data in GBS Risk Management systems to prepare for insurance claims and court presentation

Title: CIS Trainers Capacity Overview
Description: This is a mobile solution to fill a Sharepoint List to keep track of CIS training sessions. Now, you can use your mobile phone on any location instead of being depended on a laptop.
Problem it Solves: Get track of training sessions details delivered per trainer, so capacity of CIS Trainers Team can be analyzed. This is done by filling in a list in Sharepoint but could not be done mobile ("on the fly"), you always needed a laptop to register this. This solution is a mobile interface to register sessiosn direclty into the Sharepoint List
Benefits: This solution saves time for the CIS Facilitator/trainer to register sessions.

Title: QR code SMS templates for couriers
Description: We resolved this issue by creating a QR code which contained coherent message telling that the DHL Express courier had tried to reach them concerning  their shipment. Every courier van has one laminated QR-code which courier can use if the customer doesn't pick up and if they can't leave card to them. QR-code is very easy to use, just open shipment information from GCA, press customer phone number, choose send SMS and read the QR-code.
Problem it Solves: When couriers tried to reach B2C customers by calling them from their Zebra scanners (TC57) sometimes the customers do not pick up because they see unknown number calling. We spoke to our teleoperator and they told us that there is no possible way to change the name of the number to be "DHL Express Courier". Also we have had some customer feedback that they would want to know why DHL had called to them. Last problem was that couriers have very little time on route to send SMS which would be coherent to our other messaging.
Benefits: It will improve communication between us and the customer, specially on cases where we can't reach the customers home door (for example buildings with access code).
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: EATLEJ Store - Automated Tasks Creation MS Planner
Description: Everyone in the team can see what needs to be done during their shift and act accordingly. It's neat and trackable and can even be used on a mobile device thanks to the Sharepoint page.
Problem it Solves: In our 24/7 working environment, different tasks have to be completed every day or several times a week. It is difficult to keep track of everything or to find out whether the previous shifts went according to plan. To ensure that these tasks are completed on time, the automation adds all currently required tasks in an MS Planner document. They are displayed to all members of our Store Teams Group via a Sharepoint page and can be easily checked off by whoever has completed the task.
Benefits: This automation ensures that everyone can see what needs to be done and can act accordingly. No analog solution with pen and paper, and it is comprehensible for other shifts.

Title: Currency rate update
Description: Is it possible to create automatic currency rate update to HEL customs application Prosped?
Problem it Solves: HEL Customs clearance team has to update new currency rates every month manually in Prosped.
Benefits: No more manual work needed to update currency rates.

Title: H&G UK IT APPS Change Request Tool
Description: Our solution offers access to a Power App form, enabling users to submit change requests and make modifications to existing requests that have not yet been reviewed. Additionally, it includes an interface to view the status of all your requests. All Change Requests are logged in a SharePoint library on the UK IT APPS SharePoint site, facilitating their review by our team and enabling status updates. Consequently, this ensures complete visibility of the request status for both requestors and our team members.
Problem it Solves: The H&G UK IT Apps team is responsible for managing and supporting a diverse range of applications, including the UK Customs clearance engine, BRU HUB, which is maintained by our local team of developers. Given the nature of our department, we are tasked with gathering business change requests from pertinent stakeholders. These requests need to be accurately logged, securely stored, and diligently tracked to monitor their progress. It's also our responsibility to provide regular updates on the progress of these requests back to the requestors.
Benefits: The solution elevates the employee experience by offering an intuitive tool for contributing to business process improvement. It sends a clear message to our employees that we value their ideas, and if justified, these ideas can lead to actionable changes. Moreover, it considerably boosts operational efficiency within our department. By reducing the influx of emails, it enables us to handle change requests in a more organized manner.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR
Members: Juliana Galkina, Pam NIZZER, suzanne needham

Title: MS forms for Marketing comps
Description: Automates the process of entering competitions, buying tickets, etc. Remove the practice of one person reading emails and manually entering it into emails, etc. You can export MS Forms to Excel. Use QR Code here also
Problem it Solves: Remove the practice of one person reading emails and manually entering competition entries
Benefits: Automates the process of entering competitions, buying tickets, etc. Remove the practice of one person reading emails and manually entering it into emails, etc. You can export MS Forms to Excel. Use QR Code here also

Title: Marketo (Digital Marketing Tool)
Description: As a result, we have implemented several automated campaigns that operate in the background, including onboarding and follow-up campaigns. This ensures that consistent and continuous contact is maintained for potential leads and customers. Additionally, it frees up time for our team to focus on more intricate campaigns that demand greater attention.
Problem it Solves: Through the utilization of this software, we streamline repetitive marketing tasks, nurture sales leads, personalize marketing messages and content. This not only saves valuable time and effort, but also enhances efficiency in the process.
Benefits: As a result, Marketing have implemented several automated campaigns that operate in the background, including onboarding and follow-up campagins.  This ensures that consistent and continous contact is maintained for potential leads and customers.  Additionally, it frees up time for our team to focus on more intricate campaigns that demand greater attention.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: SAP Historical Statement to Customer
Description: Created a How To Guide of generating historical statements in minutes directly from SAP -  It is possible that functionality in SAP had either not been explored/made available to the IE team.  Statements can be generated within minutes and either sent to customer in original SAP format, or exported to excel and then emailed to client "
Problem it Solves: ​At the moment an IE credit controller can only check how 1x payment was allocated at a time and then has to manually compile an Excel Workbook to show the customer their payment history.
Benefits: Trained Finance Digi Champion and provided him with a step by step guide on how to generate historical statements in SAP.  Finance Champion has communicated this new time saving method to all credit controllers, average time saved conducting this frequently requested task: 1 hour per controller

Title: DHL Express UK Tender Management Request Form for
Description: An Excel form was originally used for our whole sales force to request work from the UK Tender Team. This has a number of issues. Size of file (Portability), Version management (Sales using old versions and pushing out updates and changes). We developed an MS Forms request form and used Power Automate (Power Flow) to interrogate the form and direct the specific information to the correct group email for action. Using MS Forms allowed us to update the form instantaneously, with no action required from sales. Also we got the exact information required for the work orders.
Problem it Solves: Over 200 Sales people requesting work orders of the central Tender Team in DHL Express UK.
Benefits: Speeding up the request process. Right First Time for our sales please. Helping our Tender Team gather the right information to complete work orders and agility when it comes to changing our requirements.

Title: 1 to 1 Form Digitalization
Description: This whole procedure was consuming a lot of time for every shareholder, with this app we are creating a faster solution with a right at first time platform.
Problem it Solves: Our 1 to 1 forms were manual, which was causing extra paper usage. On the other hand it was very difficult to store data and no informative system was on spot. We had to folder each document manually allowing a higher error rate.
Benefits: Less paper usage, information security & İnformation storage.
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Others, Pricing, Sales

Title: Automating the process of excluding private person
Description: Implement FIRE (Finding Invalid Record Easily) in the process of excluding private persons from different source excel files. NPA Analyst is facing the problem of spending time, 1 – 1,5 hour every morning in order to clear the files and upload back to ICCC+. Solution can be used by countries that use solution to NOT survey private individuals. By starting FIRE, the working excel file is compared with our local background database of legal entities, so that based on the set criteria, private individuals are easily identified and then deleted from the working file.
Problem it Solves: We are not able to survey private persons due to local legislation. The manual process of cleaning files from different sources (excel files) takes about an 1-1,5 hour every day. There is also a possibility of error because the files are reviewed and deleted (private persons) manually, one by one. Automating the process of excluding private persons will help to speed up the day-to-day process of clearing source excel files from private individuals, thus eliminating errors due to human mistakes.
Benefits: Our goal was to upload cleared files to ICCC+ in less than an hour. After the testing phase, which lasted 2 days, we saved time and optimize the process.  Time required to complete the upload is improved. The entire process of deleting data and uploading files to Medallia SFTP is completed in 20 minutes on average. After successful testing, we updated our local ICCC+ Manual and regularly perform the task on day-to-day basis.
Members: Marijana MILETIC, Miroslav Trikić, Veljko PETROVIC

Title: Employee Contract Signing
Description: Current DHL tools (OneSpan and Docusign) do not have the the strong authentication standard from FI authorities Strong identification for e-services - Suomi.fi (https://www.suomi.fi/instructions-and-support/information-on-eidentification/strong-identification-for-eservices)
Problem it Solves: Signing work contracts and e.g. EPP (Employee Protection Program)  documents requires electronic signatures and Global tools do not cater for the de facto standard used in Finland
Benefits: Strong authentication for sensitive documents like work contracts, etc.

Title: Questionaire for Middle Management
Description: Questionaire (NPS scoring) for Middle Management on Monthly SMT Update to develop agenda and presentation quality. If scored 8 or below, developmental feedback required. If scored 9-10, developmental feedback is no mandatory.
Problem it Solves: Develops SMT Update for Middle Management
Benefits: Meeting the expectations of the Middle Management on SMT Update

Title: APW Tablet
Description: The Action Planning Worksheet (APW) is a powerful tool to establish and document the continuous improvement in Service Centres. The tool uses Power Apps and is connected to multiple Sharepoint tables, with access restricted at Country level.
Problem it Solves: The Mobile App will simplify the current Action Planning Worksheet, making the collection of information, findings and actions plans identification easier and faster.   Attachments and pictures can be loaded directly via the Mobile Phone or Tablet.
Benefits: The Mobile App ensures a more efficient and faster process for the users. It is user friendly and simple and increase data quality and data visibility.

Title: EXP FI LCA INCIDENT REPORT FORM
Description: DHL EXP FI users need to fill mandatory fields to create an incident to LCA application vendor
Problem it Solves: EXP FI LCA INCIDENT REPORT FORM harmonizes the creation of incident tickets to the LCA vendor for EXP FI application vendor. With the Forms & PowerAutomate we get always enough information about the incident for the external resolver group.
Benefits: Better quality incident reports Employees know what to inform to application vendor when an incident occurs  Employee does not have to answer multiple questions from the application vendor when the vendor starts troubleshooting Amount of incidents reported to application vendor is easy to report/followup

Title: Ultimate FTB Onboarding Experience
Description: A Microsoft 365 and Power Platform solution:  * A dedicated Teams site for the FTB Onboarding team  * A New FTB form (MS Forms) to register new FTB customers  * A FTB Onboarding Tasks tab (Tasks by Planner) with dedicated buckets for each function/step in the process  * A FTB Onboarding List (Sharepoint List) to keep records for reporting  *  Power BI for reporting  * Power Automate to orhestrate the process flow by automatically creating new tasks on form submits, and update and move tasks between functions/buckets as they progress.
Problem it Solves: We want to give our FTB (First Time Buyer) customers the ultimate onboarding experience so they feel well cared for and guided throuh each step until they are comfortable to stand on their own feet. We believe this will lower the bar for using our services going forwards, and thus bring more revenue.  The ultimate FTB onboarding process requires smooth and efficient cross functional collaboration between Sales, CFIT, Customer Service, Finance and Customs Clearance. For this we need a workflow platform that can orchestrate each onboarding task between the functions, from start to completion.
Benefits: This solution will support our cross functional customer facing teams to provide an even better onboarding experience to our FTB customers, leaving them with a true WOW-feeling!  The customer will be handheld through each step from purchase to pay, and will be comfortable using our services themselves (fewer calls to our customer service, CFIT and Finance Support teams).  Satisfied customers are also more likely to stick with us and continue shipping with us, thus generating more revenue.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, Sales
Tags: customeronboarding, Formsandpowerbi, ftb, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, sharepoint, teams
Members: Christian Andre Gundersen, Glenn Hansen, Mouhamoud Abdi Jama

Title: HR Reporting (Manager self service) PowerBi
Description: By importing all HR reports into Power BI, this allows all managers across the business to access all employee related information at the touch of a button. The reports are managed by role level security, which reduces the risk of a data breach. Ease of access  and user Friendly . All reports are now centrally maintained so it is easier to monitor changes over time or data irregularities.
Problem it Solves: Multiple reports being issued to the business inc. Finance, Operations and Managers regarding, Annual Leave, Overtime, Absence, Terminations & Training. Reports were extracted from different systems and manually manipulated to distribute to relevant managers. Also risks of GDPR sending personal data via excel files via email.
Benefits: Reduced time spend manipulating and send reports. Reduce error and reduce risk of GDPR breach

Title: Simple application for car data download

Benefits: A user from the Administration Department in a few minutes could get all data about each car: technical details, information about the insurance, police controls, owners, etc.

Title: EU As One Against Cancer Auction
Description: Since 2022, the EU Ground Ops team has been using an online solution created to manage the yearly fundraising activities for our #DHLAsOneAgainstCancer. This solution allows to present the EU Ground Ops team to present the items of the live and online auctions, information about the charities involved, and raffle tickets, while fostering community and providing a platform for European employees to contribute to a meaningful cause.
Problem it Solves: The Ground Ops team recognize the global impact of cancer and aims to address the lack of awareness in the topic and raise funding for charities through an online cancer awareness and fundraising campaign. Since traditional/local methods are limited in reaching a broader audience, an online solution becomes crucial for engaging employees across Europe.
Benefits: It will allow employees to contribute to a meaningful cause, foster community, and align with our #AsOneAgainstCancer campaigns.
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Customs, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Others, Sales

Title: Key Acc & BDM shared calendar
Description: One Dashboard view for all involved & Manager's to view / schedule all relevant employees. Idea is well received and now being rolled out to all Sales Channels
Problem it Solves: KAD& BDM Team is a nationwide team, not everyone is Dub hub based and with very busy schedules with internal & external meetings, different dates for each acc manager's annual leave, multiple deadlines and events with a team of 7 its hard to remember them all.  After initial discussions with Nicoll in I.T and then further conversations with David in H.R I felt setting up a calendar within our channel in teams would help as it would be a virtual calendar / dashboard for us all to view and at first glance see who is on annual leave, upcoming deadlines, events etc. I also felt this may help chann
Benefits: ​For the KA &BDM team we have our own teams channel and it was in this I added the calendar app. Each member of the team has access to it and at first glance they will see annual leave details, deadline details, upcoming event details etc in the one location. Easy to use and manage with information labelled with a different colour depending on the activity

Title: POWER BI Sales
Description: ​Power Business Intelligence is an interactive tool . Its a way of getting information quicker, safer & ease of use. The commercial team  can set security levels (ie - a Fieldsales person can only see Fieldsales information) the other "win" is that we spend time setting a report up, but then going forward, it takes minutes to update and cuts down on re-running (set up once and its done going forward)
Problem it Solves: ​Prior to Power BI, our Commercial team would be sending large files around (which is not ideal) which would have everyone's customers and information on it. Due to the size of the file and time spent uploading it, the file would be sent out in around the 2nd week of each month
Benefits: ​Monthly figures are issued a lot earlier every month now.  Allows account managers / channel managers to review territory performance  Commissions can be sent quicker which allows channel managers also to submit these in more time, allows them to meet deadlines

Title: Sales Lead Application
Description: Report sales leads via an App reducing manual workload to collate current info from COMET to Excel
Problem it Solves: App to auto-track Sales Leads. Eygpt app here also. ​Report sales leads via an App reducing manual workload to collate current info from COMET to Excel Lot of origin points for receiving Leads. Let David know.
Benefits: ​Reduce manual workload for collating data from COMET to Excel

Title: Air UK Pool Car Bookings
Description: All paper forms are replaced with digital forms using Microsoft Forms. Form answers are store in SharePoint lists and bookings are managed through an app. All emails for approving bookings and sending further forms are automated using the app and cloud flows. A record of bookings can be export to an excel workbook with the click of a button.
Problem it Solves: The pool car booking system currently involves multiple paper forms. This makes it more difficult for the admin team to keep track of bookings and causes the process of booking a car to take much more time than it needs to. The use of paper is also bad for the environment. Creating a record of bookings is more difficult with paper forms than it would be with a digital system and currently all booking response emails are written manually.
Benefits: It will be less time-consuming for employees to book pool cars. It will also take the admin less time to manage the bookings. All booking data will be stored digitally which is more secure than paper forms. The removal of the use of paper will be better for the environment.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: DHK Ground Staff Travel Request Approvals
Description: The process was recreated using Microsoft Automate to maintain a level of automation and ensure an electronic approval workflow. Failing the introduction of Power Automate, Travel Requests would have had to returned to being a manual process which is time consuming and prone to human error. Utilising Power Automate allows the request form to be dynamic and requested information can be changed instantly to ensure the process is as robust as possible.
Problem it Solves: DHK Travel Requests had to be migrated alongside eShare migrations. Failing the creation of a new electronic process would mean the reintroduction of physical travel request forms and a manual approval process. The reintroduction of a physical process would be a step backwards for our growing business unit.
Benefits: Introducing Power Automate in this instance has allowed further insight into the product and has provided the opportunity to introduce it into more departments and processes.

Title: HR order language course management
Description: The solution via the power platform offers quick access to all necessary and up-to-date information. The entire approval workflow is automated and thus accelerated.  The HR super user has all the data clearly displayed and can work with it, including in the form of various reports. The employee is notified when the status changes and can monitor their request in the application. Their managers are notified and HR super users are notified if any changes were registered.
Problem it Solves: Employees are entitled to a language course allowance. The procedure is quite demanding and confusing. The informations is not in one place. The approval time is unnecessarily long. The employee does not know the current offer of all available courses and vendors. He does not have information about whether he can apply for a contribution in the given period or whether the request is pending or has already been processed. He gets all this information only on the manual email basis of communication with HR.
Benefits: The solution via the power platform offers quick access to all necessary and up-to-date information. The entire approval workflow is automated and thus accelerated.  The HR super user has all the data clearly displayed and can work with it, including in the form of various reports. The employee is notified when the status changes and can monitor their request in the application. Their managers are notified and HR super users are notified if any changes were registered.

Title: Start DHL APP
Description: This will assist DHL in keeping compliant, As this APP would only be enabled on all DHL devices as we own the app, then the only initial login would be to verify their identity and and set up a password then they can  log on to a  DHL Device to complete the necessary training as in Security or Dangerous Goods Refresher, This would then stop any chance of our regulatory modules being hacked via someone's own phone or even the phone being stolen etc....
Problem it Solves: Smart Connect is a great platform for DHL News new business adverts etc... keeping us all up to date and it fantastic, but completing regulatory training on My Talent World through the Smart Connect App especially our own DHL Security modules or Dangerous Goods for refreshers should be a no go due to the fact that we are training staff in those modules via our own DHL devices the now, but now we are looking at completing this training on our staffs own phone surely this is a security risk,  As we own the APP can we not build this in to our software and devices.
Benefits: Some of our staff barely know how to use a phone that is not being rude it is fact new generation yes so further down the line  then I would retract that sentence, but now we are asking them to complete training on MTW via this app on their phone, Surely this would be a security risk to the business, Also if we could enable this app to be on DHL Devices then log on will be simpler than the MTW logins expiring etc.. As this would be their own login and password ,enabling the staff to complete the work more efficiently hence this builds their operational compliance and performing KPIs,
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Training on MTW
Description: To Digitalize all CIS Passports keeping all data in the one place. To add in all local training that is not logged on MTW and to keep all training easy assessible for our people in the one place. Currently we have some on MTW and some not logged.
Problem it Solves: Keeping an accurate and up to date log of all training completed supporting with development. Removes the requirement for hard copy CIS passports and all completion and badges available on MTW badge section.
Benefits: Improves employee experience due to al training completed/required is in the one area. Managers can keep clear information on what is required to develop our people further. Will improve CX as we are training our people to be the best they can.

Title: HR Employee File Extraction & Auto Classification
Description: HR / IT have successfully trialed HP Scan AI -  a solution which is taught to recognise, extract and categorise documents, digitising them to make them searchable. AI can perform this task faster and with greater accuracy than humans. Step 1, Existing Employee HR Files: Extract and separate batch of ~4800 previously merged HR files (from SAP) into individual documents Step 2, Future Documents: Ability to ingest via HP multi-functional devices (MFD scanners) or desktops to automatically classify and route, saving effort.
Problem it Solves: In 2016, employee HR paper files were scanned into electronic PDF documents for storage in SAP. Each of these 4,800 images contain a mixture of multiple documents within each single scan (contracts, letters etc). To find a specific document the whole pdf image needs to be eye-balled which is time-consuming and inefficient and it is difficult to extract elements. The mixture of document types also presents a security and document retention issue, being unable to implement retention policies for different categories. It is important to extract and clean these files before decommissioning SAP.
Benefits: - Avoidance of cost to manually rescan and separate employee files (estimated £62K), with reduced errors and risk of exposure of sensitive information. - Future effort saved by scanning directly into MFD app which automatically classifies and stores (rather than scan - email - save – upload – delete). Improved GDPR  from reduced emailing  of confidential documents and saving locally. - Reduced administration effort for People Services team when locating specific documents - allowing them to focus on more value added and rewarding tasks, such as proactive employee relations management.

Title: One-to-one form
Description: The integration of SharePoint with PowerApps provides a streamlined solution for creating digital forms. This integration solves the problem by offering managers and supervisors a more efficient and user-friendly application. Instead of dealing with multiple tools or interfaces, they can now conveniently access and complete one-to-one meetings within a singe application. This not only simplifies the process but also enhances efficiency and user experience.
Problem it Solves: Integrating SharePoint with PowerApps will streamline the creation of intuitive digital forms and will empower managers and supervisors with a comprehensive solution. This integration enables quicker access to relevant data and provides a unified platform for completing one-to-one meetings efficiently. The combination ensures a consistent and user-friendly experience which allows for a more productive and collaborative approach to personnel management within a single application.
Benefits: The one-to-one form will be faster to complete and more user-friendly.  It will clearly show which one-to-ones have been completed which increases efficiency and productivity.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR
Members: Ashley WEBB, Gary Emery, Juliana Galkina, Pam NIZZER, suzanne needham

Title: LHR Recovery Log
Description: The implementation of a PowerApps form will allow truck drivers to efficiently input arrival details directly into a computer upon reaching their destination. This process, not only enhances accuracy but also expedites the information flow. The entered details are seamlessly updated in a designated SharePoint list, enabling the office team to promptly review and act upon the real-time data. This not only improves communication between drivers and the office but also ensures that critical information is instantly accessible for quick decision-making and operational coordination.
Problem it Solves: This will eliminate the need for truck drivers to call the office for manual check-in processes, significantly reducing dependency on phone communication. By seamlessly capturing and transmitting details about checked-in trucks through a PowerApps form, valuable time that would have been spent on unnecessary communication, is now saved. This not only enhances operational efficiency but also minimizes the time it takes the drivers to provide the information required.
Benefits: This will not only simplify the check-in process but also bring about operational enhancements, data accuracy improvements and increased overall efficiency.
Members: Ashley WEBB, Pam NIZZER, suzanne needham

Title: eCAPEX Tool

Benefits: Streamlined process, No time limitation for the approvals, Better employee experience

Title: GPI APP

Sales representatives are unsure if they should take action.

Title: collection of sustainability projects

Problem it Solves: We would need a program that allows us to report the information deriving from sustainability projects promoted both by the company but also by DHL Express employees. Title: GRACE AI Voice Bot by GridSpace
Description: Customers talks to someone who doesn't sound like a robot. Incredibly realistic. Grace integrates with your voice tech. Grace can answers millions of phone calls simultaneously.
