Title: HR PowerApp - Employee onboarding tracker
Description: Power App based on HR maintained sharepoint list which includes tasks, their intended execution timeline and related work instructions.
Problem it Solves: Inability of HR staff to track the status of all tasks related to a successful employee onboarding by the direct manger.  Direct manager can overlook to perform certain tasks Direct manager doesn't always know the work instruction or where to find information on how to initiate a certain task
Benefits: - Ability for HR to track and steer onboarding tasks - Clear overview for managers/supervisors - Referrals to work instructions per task, maintained by HR dpt in Sharepoint list - Timeline grouping for tasks (pre/during/after employee start day) -

Title: BE OPS PA
Description: Automation leads to less need of time and rise of efficiency.
Problem it Solves: Bundles a few Ground Operations related Power Automate flows, without front end or need for premium connectors.
Benefits: Automation Save time Improve efficiency

Title: Direct Infeed Stowage registration tool
Description: Each operator is asked to use the same registration form in which they fill out standardized information on the movement number, the customer, the arrival and departure times and the volume they've picked up (in pallet spaces). This data is send to a SharePoint List that functions as a database on top of which a Power BI report is created that provides valuable insights on the transported volumes.
Problem it Solves: Each day about 100 trucks move directly from the customer's site to BRU HUB. The different movements are operated by different carriers, each using a different method of sending loading data to the Transport team. The different methods of sending loading data lead to difficulties in registration and time loss for the transport team. By unifying the way we register load data of Direct Infeed movements, we save time and allow reporting to be set up based upon which mitigating actions can be taken. This, in turn, leads to a higher load factor and lower costs.
Benefits: The solution has the following benefits: - Save time for Transport team in terms of registration - Unified way of worker across carriers - Actionable report in Power BI allows to distill mitigating actions
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Hands-free COY Reload Scanning UK H&G
Description: The main advantage of using barcode read cameras is that they offer a fast and efficient way to retrieve information about products and items, while keeping operators hands-free without the need for a ring or handheld scanner. Visual indication of scanning status is enhanced with LED light bars illuminating the working environment for the sort operators. Installation of 79 chutes has been approved under BCA 23-1283 with planned implementation and go live in 2024.
Problem it Solves: Continuous improvement towards internal KPIs. The project will address scanning compliance for the DF vs Any KPI and improve productivity (PPH) for reload scanning.
Benefits: The Project aims to improve scanning productivity by up to 20% and the overall reload activity by 8.2%. Which leads to a saving of 5.9 FTE.  DF performance increase from 99.59% to 99.73% subject to performance review once installation is complete.  Ergonomic benefit of user reloading ULD / CMP as highlighted in BCA.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR
Tags: automation, compliance, continuousimprovement, greatservicequality, handsfree, performance, productivity
Members: Alan PURVEY, Ashley WEBB, Claire Morris, John Ball, Karl Hantschmann, Matthew Hoyland, Thomas Gayner

Title: PT Finance Approval Workflow
Description: Despite workflow is working, it's not working on a compliant way.
Problem it Solves: This solution is being used to automate approvals of costs in PT. It was made on the beginning of SP migration and must be redefined to use a proper automation account. Current solution https://dpdhl.sharepoint.com/sites/expptfin/Lists/Pedidos_investimento/AllItems.aspx Current user workflow.approval@dhl.com
Benefits: Process was previously made with a paper sheet passing hand by hand during the approval flow.

Title: Hands-free COY Reloading Scanning
Description: Bar-code read cameras pointing onto the walkway in front of the reload chute allows the operator to walk with the parcels (bar code label pointing upwards) into the ULD without the need to perform the scanning action with a hand- or ring scanner. Also there's no need to check for a positive scanning on the reload work station display anymore. The elimination of both actions reduces the reloading cycle per shipment with approx 2 seconds
Problem it Solves: All shipments that are reloaded in a hub or gateway have to receive a reload scan The reload scan is performed by a handheld scanner or ring scanner. Beside the additional time required to perform the scanning, the operator has to ensure the correct piece ID barcode is scanned
Benefits: Time & Resource  Savings (Efficiency)  Technical Feasibility (Innovation) Scanning Performance (Quality)

Title: digitalize Wertschätzungsmeldung
Description: Implementing a digital solution for reporting appreciation expenses streamlines the procedure, reducing administrative overhead. It enhances accuracy by automatically calculating expenses, mitigating human error. This solution promotes transparency with real-time tracking and fosters a culture of appreciation, boosting morale and productivity. Overall, it contributes to a more efficient, fair, and positive work environment.
Problem it Solves: The current process of reporting appreciation expenses presents challenges. It's time-consuming and administratively heavy, often requiring physical forms or meetings. The manual calculation of expenses can lead to human error and inaccuracies. Lack of real-time tracking reduces transparency, and the cumbersome process may discourage employees from acknowledging colleagues' efforts, impacting morale and productivity.
Benefits: With a digital solution for reporting appreciation expenses, employee experience is enhanced as it simplifies the process, making it easier to acknowledge colleagues' efforts, thus boosting morale. Operational efficiency is improved by reducing administrative tasks, mitigating human error, and providing real-time tracking for transparency, leading to more accurate and streamlined expense reporting.
Tags: powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, RPA, sharepoint, Sharepointforms

Title: CS Quiz System
Description: The CS Trainers need to check how good the training is and the weekly quiz is an aid to this.  The Trainers can define a number of questions/answers.  The quiz is then completed by each CS employee/team.  The results can be exported in an Excel for further analysis.  This was originally built on an internal website (to be shutdown), and is now replaced using a Sharepoint and Power Platform App.
Problem it Solves: Replaced old system.  Allows CS Trainers to define a quiz and monitor/analyse results of the quizzes answered by the CS Teams.  Used on a weekly basis.
Benefits: Improvement in training  and employee knowledge - increasing efficiency when dealing with Customer queries etc.
Tags: CustomerExprience, dhlexpress, efficiency, elearning, PowerPlatform, training

Title: CS Complaints
Description: The older complaints system is to be shutdown, but there is still a requirement in the Complaints Dept. for such a system. This is a Sharepoint list with a Power Platform application as front end.
Problem it Solves: Replacement of older Customer Details application for the CS Complaints Department.  Keeps track of agreements between customer and complaints.
Benefits: Maintaining an easy to access overview of the Complaints interaction with customers and subsequent actions/agreements.

Title: Hire My Friend
Description: Power Apps form has been created. Since this form is integrated with SharePoint, the filled form automatically becomes a list in Sharepoint. Thus, manual e-mail tracking and Excel creation processes were eliminated. Thanks to the mandatory fields in the form, incomplete data entry cannot be made. This reduced the extra workload that increased with e-mail returns.
Problem it Solves: When employees wanted to recommend a candidate for newly opened positions, this process was done via e-mail. It was error-prone due to the fact that e-mail tracking was done manually, and there was an extra workload due to the creation of Excel. When the employee sent incomplete information about the candidate, e-mail congestion occurred. Data was not being transmitted quickly and accurately at the same time.
Benefits: Employees who recommend candidates can follow the process of the candidate they recommend from a single system. For those who do not know how to propose a candidate, all the necessary information that they need to provide in the I have a candidate form is included in the form. Thus, it has become easier for the employee to recommend a candidate and the quality of the service we offer has increased. Thanks to the form's integration with Sharepoint, all data can now be extracted and analyzed in Excel at the end of the year.
Tags: Hiring, hr, HumanResources, powerapps, PowerPlatform, sharepoint, Sharepointforms
Members: Berna Simsek, Duygunur KALAYCIOGLU, Helin Oyku DEMIRCIOGLU

Title: Invoice Data on LCA
Description: We will adapt the format of the invoice sent from the customer to the Revenue Administration as data to the local customs application and receive it from the customer again in a new format through an API we wrote on behalf of the customer. (In accordance with LCA format)
Problem it Solves: Customers who send shipments for micro export outlets in Turkey must also issue invoices in Turkish and submit this as data to the state revenue administration. They forward this data to the Revenue Administration as their own data, but they only give it to the carrier of the shipment as an image, not as data. This causes manual data entry.
Benefits: In this way, since the data we receive from the customer will be automatically written to the local customs application, the workload of the personnel who perform this process manually will be reduced. In addition, an additional invoice document will not have to be forwarded to the carrier, which will be an activity to prevent paper waste.

Title: LT-CCCG/BOND-Communication tool
Description: The CCCG department makes a request to the colleagues in the BOND department for additional data on shipments. For example: reweighing of the shipment, photos of goods or documents attached to the shipment are required.
Problem it Solves: CCCG and BOND departments communication problem
Benefits: CCCG: easy to register new request, faster response from BOND, notification about response. BOND: getting notifications about new request, easy to response by using mobile phone, easy to add photos. Wider information (process before/after digitalization, feedbacks from colleagues, etc.) in att.
Tags: BOND, CCCG, CCPU, List, operations, OPS, Sharepoint
Members: Auris Petkevicius, Egle Paukstyte, Rimantas Kildisius

Title: LT-ADM-Confirmation of gifts
Description: A Microsoft Form is created, which asks the employee a series of questions to determine whether a gift can be accepted. The employee can fill in the form on a computer or phone, add photos. Based on their answers, a confirmation request is sent to the manager or MD. If the photo does not exceed 5MB it is attached to the request. If the employee's answers do not allow the gift to be accepted/delivered, he/she is informed by email and the responsible colleague is attached to the letter (cc). All queries with the managers' answers are stored in the Sharepoint List archive.
Problem it Solves: In the past, an employee would send an email request to his/her manager for confirmation that a gift could be accepted or given. This was time consuming and the employee had to keep the confirmations. The policy for accepting/delivering gifts does not always allow for acceptance/delivery, the manager's approval is not always sufficient.
Benefits: Employee satisfaction, an easy and convenient platform for registering gifts.

Title: LT-OPS-Truck loaded in disorder
Description: An OPS worker uses the phone to create a new List entry. He/she specifies the destination, selects Origin from the list, records a comment and takes a photo of the evidence. Once the record is saved, an email is automatically sent to colleagues in the region with the information and photographs.
Problem it Solves: To report a lorry arriving from another country that had been loaded in a disorderly manner, OPS colleagues had to take photographs of the evidence, upload the photos to a computer, and write a letter to a specified email address with their complaints.
Benefits: A much faster and more convenient way to transmit information.

Title: LT-GTW-Daily checklists
Description: A GTW staff member fills in a daily form with answers and comments to the GTW manager's pre-defined questions. The answers are stored in the Sharepoint List and the GTW manager is informed by email after the record is created.
Problem it Solves: In the past, it was difficult for the GTW manager to keep track of when things were or were not done.
Benefits: Helps the GTW manager to get information about the current situation more quickly and to plan necessary changes.

Title: LT-FIN-Confirmation of refund
Description: New requests from finance staff are recorded in the Sharepoint List. After the creation of a new record, requests are sent in sequence to the responsible staff for approval. All responses are stored in the same Sharepoint List. When the request is approved by all respondents, the creator of the request is informed. The next day the record (with attachments) is moved to the archive. In this way it is easy to keep track of existing requests, old records are not disturbed and are easy to find.
Problem it Solves: When a customer submits a refund request, the information must be verified by the Finance Department and several levels of approval must be obtained. In the past, the collection and storage of confirmations was done by email. The process was long, the requests got lost, it was inconvenient.
Benefits: A faster and more convenient way to submit, track and receive your refund confirmation.

Title: LT-SLS-Contract archiving tool
Description: Sales colleagues receive the documents they need to save by email. They need to forward the email to a dedicated email address with the company name in the subject line. After receiving the email, PowerAutomate flow checks the first letter or number of the subject and moves the files from the email to an existing or new folder. The sales colleague is informed about the success or failure of the data transfer by e-mail.
Problem it Solves: Sales colleagues keep the contracts signed by customers in the Teams Group. They are stored in a special folder, sorted by the first letter or number of the company name. When a contract is renewed or a new one is signed, a member of the sales team has to locate the relevant folder and check if the company is not already registered. If it is not registered, a new folder must be created and the documents uploaded; if it is already registered, the documents are uploaded into the old folder.
Benefits: Saving time, eliminating manual work

Title: LT-SLS-Custom discount approval
Description: The sales manager must fill in a special form with all the necessary information to confirm the request. Approval request is first sent to the Sales Director, after approval it is sent to other SMT members. The Sales Manager can tick whether OPS approval is required and provide them with the necessary information. After approvals, rejections or request for additional information, the Sales Manager is informed by email. Records and responses are stored in a Sharepoint list.
Problem it Solves: When a sales manager wants to give a special discount to a customer, it is necessary to obtain the approval of SMT members. In the past, such requests were sent by email, unstructured and stored in Outlook.
Benefits: A simpler and much easier way to request confirmation of a special discount, with structured and clear information for everyone. Archive quickly accessible.

Title: OPS Customs Inspection Tool - OPS Beschautool
Description: The solution consists of two parts: a SharePoint site where customs inspection cases are initiated and closed by customs colleagues, and the 'Beschautool' for OPS colleagues. Depending on which GTW (Gateway) a case has been opened for, that case is visible in the 'Beschutool' only to the respective users. OPS colleagues now have the option to assign themselves a case and forward the necessary information by completing the case to the customs department. A completed case is no longer visible to OPS but only to the customs department. If everything is ok, the case will be archived by customs.
Problem it Solves: Our customs department requires specific information, such as a description of contents, images, etc., as part of a customs inspection. Instead of physically going to the Warehouse to collect this information, our customs colleagues receive support from the OPS department. The 'Beschautool' serves as an information and communication platform in this regard.
Benefits: Efficiency enhancement - simplifying and optimizing the Customs inspection procedures - archiving of cases - Tracking and transparency throughout the entire process - communication between Customs department and OPS
Tags: Beschau, CCPU, customs, customsclearance, CustomsClerance, customsinspestion, PowerPlatform, Zollbeschau

Title: Sorting by Account - DHL TN
Description: Get to sort the shipment by Account, then by weight, and finally manually
Problem it Solves: We need to sort shipments and multipiece shipments using the accounts. This will help DHL TN to get all TN Billed shipment towards TUN-SND and all the rest towards TUN-TUN. TUN-TUN will then be sorted by weight (TUN-SND>30kg, TUN-TUN<30kg). Also, we should be able to get sorting exception manually.
Benefits: The solution should bring more satisfaction to customers and also get then to spend more. As for operation this will help eliminate a manual effort that is not 100% accurate
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Region: Europe, Middle East and North Africa
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, Hubs & Gateways, IT, Network Operations, Others, Sales

Title: Linehaul Annual Leave Application
Description: A PowerApps application will streamline leave booking for EMA Linehaul drivers. Employees will use an app to request leave, and supervisors will manage requests through a model-driven system. Automated workflows will send approval notifications, and the system will display and manage unavailable leave dates. This solution transforms a simplified digital process into a state-of-the-art efficient one.
Problem it Solves: Currently, booking various types of leave (annual, sick, military, bereavement, jury duty, etc.) is not possible with the current system used within EMA Linehaul (Microsoft Forms) and it can be time-consuming, prone to errors, and lack transparency for both employees and supervisors. The Campfire aims to digitise and streamline this process, reducing inefficiencies, potential errors, and delays while improving the overall transparency and user experience for all involved parties.
Benefits: Boost efficiency: By digitising leave booking, management time is reduced.  Improve accuracy: Automation minimises errors in leave management.  Enhance transparency: Employees and supervisors will receive real-time updates.  Increase satisfaction: The user-friendly interface improves the employee experience.  Support sustainability: Digitisation reduces paperwork, supporting DHL's sustainability goals.  Provide flexibility: Admins can adjust unavailable leave dates as required.  Overall, the app enhances efficiency, accuracy, transparency, satisfaction, sustainability, and flexibility.
Tags: approvals, AutomatedFlow, backoffice, bookingspace, digital, digitalization, DigitalTransformation, employeeexperience, employeemanagement, Linehaul, PowerPlatform

Title: Ops Apps Library
Description: This power app solution serves as a library mainly for Ops users, along with CS & Sales and consolidates the url's to all Ops applications, information about correct Global SOP checkpoint  remarks in local language and information about frequently asked questions about DG transportation so that users benefit from mobile phones and desktops in a digital way of working.
Problem it Solves: There is no user-friendly mobile solution to find information on the links to Ops applications, Global SOP  guidance in local language and guidance to freqently asked questions on DG transportation. The data is sourced from a local sharepoint site and updated regularly by country admins upon new or updated information.
Benefits: This app will enable mainly Ops users, also CS& Sales to access Ops information in a mobile & user-friendly way.

Title: Simple letter automation with Power Automate
Description: Our Campfire will solve the problem through a Microsoft Power Automate flow that uses premium connectors to populate a Microsoft Word template.
Problem it Solves: Our Campfire will help us in automating the creation of letters that we receive on a weekly basis. Said letters are categorized as simple as they do not require much in terms of data elaboration. This automation process is relevant because it will allow us to invest the saved time into more value adding tasks.
Benefits: The ability that our Campfire will provide, of automating through a Power Automate flow with premium connectors the compilation of simple letters, will greatly improve 1) time saved, 2) efficiency, and 3) reduce human errors in the input of data.
Tags: AutomatedFlow, automation, HumanResources, optimization, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, PremiumConnectors

Title: My Leave
Description: An app where you can book and see your own leave
Problem it Solves: Digitalise leave
Benefits: Efficiency and visibility

Title: SVP customer opinion survey on tablets
Description: The 'Customer opinion survey' was created in MS Forms/Power Automate and is available on dedicated tablets in SVP. Customers visiting our service points can give us their feedback. Power BI is used to analyze answers
Problem it Solves: In our customer service offices, we have not collected feedbacks from customers who visited us. The simplest way was to create a short "Customer opinion survey"
Benefits: Finding out what customers think about the services provided at customer service points. Posibility to improve the quality of service by taking into account customers' feedbacks

Title: GSE Report
Description: Users can now fill out a form using MS Forms on a tablet/PC/smartphone. The defect is sent directly to the GSE team. The team receives an email and can now view the defects in a SharePoint list and also assign them directly.  If the defect is fixed, the user is informed again that a repair has been carried out and the tool is available again.
Problem it Solves: Defects in GSE tools (cars/lifts/cards) are currently entered in a book. The co-worker picks up the book, writes down the problem and then hands it over to another colleague who repairs the defect.  The GSE Report is now to transmit these fully digitally
Benefits: Defects are detected more quickly and therefore also processed more quickly. Furthermore, users no longer have to go to a specific location because they can report the fault/defect directly on site via EMB or PC.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: aircraft, applications, EAT, forms, Microsoft, powerapps, Powerautomate, PowerPlatform, Reports, sharepoint

Title: Facility Shipment Journey Process Mining
Description: This initiative aims to use process mining methods on dataiku to more deeply understand how shipments move and behave within a selected facility.
Problem it Solves: The focus of this project idea is to examine the path shipments take within a selected facility, tracking them through the various checkpoints. Until now, there has been a lack of comprehensive analysis of the movement patterns of a large sample of shipments  (in other words, process mining) to gain a clearer understanding of the ideal / “happy-flow” journey, and how often unexpected deviations occur (discounting factors like service incidents, on hold, etc.).
Benefits: Better understanding of the shipment journey and identification of potential areas of improvements that can lead to increased efficiency, quicker handling etc.

Title: Real Estate Energy Efficiency with HDD
Description: This project aims to provide a solution for ISO50001-certified organizations by designing a dashboard that shows facility-level energy consumption data from Express TM1 normalized with heating degree days obtained from open Web resources. In this way, country organizations do not need to do this manually on Excel every month.
Problem it Solves: The unavailability of heating degree day (HDD) normalization for real estate energy efficiency KPI in energy efficiency reports and regional scorecards causes issues in terms of data monitoring, planning, and operational control for countries that have ISO50001-certified facilities.
Benefits: Reduction of report preparation time by each certified facility, Easy monitoring of (now) standardized and automated KPI, Transparency in facilities' energy requirements, which can lead to the identification of energy savings via benchmarking, Supports sustainability efforts, Fulfills an auditing recommendation, Digitalization
Most impacted Functions: Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Network Operations

Title: PDF document maker from many kinds of files
Description: An application has been developed that allows users to indicate the folder with the source files and the desired order of the files in the target pdf file. Based on this data, the application generates the output pdf file. The tool is used in Poland by Customs agents for merging documents processed during clearance process but it can be used for any other purposes. Therefore it is indicated in Campfire that it can be used by any function having contact and exchaning documents with customers or employees.
Problem it Solves: Customers of customs agencies expect to be supplied with a pdf file containing a set of documents processed as part of clearance. The source files are of various types (tif, jpg, pdf, png). Manual work - scanning, converting, merging files - was required to meet customer expectations.
Benefits: Meeting customer expectations, increasing process efficiency by significant time savings, paper savings (go-green).
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Human Resources, Sales

Title: LRT hours and PuD routes into PD Board Power BI
Description: LRT automatically sends me an email with the data for all DK stations in a zip format. I get two emails. One with Yesterday's data and one with data from the day before Yesterday. The csv files are unzipped and saved to two separate sharepoint folders via a Power Automate Flow. Via Power BI online one dataflow holds data for the last two weeks. The dataflow is then used as data source in all our PD Boards. I use another Power Automate Flow to run several refreshes of the dataflow, since LRT is inconsistent timewise. The data needs to be available before 7:30.
Problem it Solves: Instead of each PuD and TH AM/PM team each manually download extracts from LRT to update their Power BI performance report for their PD Board, we use a solution that automatically has the information available when their PD meeting is held.
Benefits: Instead of each of our 9 PuD/AM/PM teams each log into LRT and download data each day, this is done automatically for them saving them 5-10 minutes every day.
Benefit Category: Sustainability Impact, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: 0365, automation, DataAnalytics, lrt, performancedialogue, Powerautomate, powerbi, PowerPlatform, RPA, RPAAssistance, sharepoint

Title: CPH HUB HR Change Requests Tool
Description: Using Sharepoint customized forms as the request for for changes and Power Automate flows for communications between stakeholders and approvals.
Problem it Solves: Today in our hub any request for changes to an employee’s employment is handled via Excel forms that are filled out, printed, and manually signed by the various stakeholders. Issues encountered: 1. the papers printed are misplaced and the process needs to restart 2. Lack of of overview for both requesters and approvers which causes delays 3. Lack of clear overview for HR team who only are notified of change after approvals without being able to anticipate the workload expected (an issue especially during peak periods).
Benefits: Reduced delays in processing HR changes,  Reduced paper printing  Streamlined approval process  Efficient resource allocation based on expected workload Clear overview of the type of changes (financial/non-financial) Less human errors and time spent requesting approvals.

Title: Quality Management Tool
Description: By moving to Sharepoint this will allow us to log more detailed errors whilst also providing us more in depth reports which help summarise error trends. Sharepoint would also be cross functional to allow other departments such as finance access customs errors for review.
Problem it Solves: Our campfire will help us move away from our old error reporting system to a new and improved platform.
Benefits: more route cause analysis will be generated from the new tool.  - more Customer errors will be logged to allow better quality - the tool will be more user friendly to help improve productivity
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Alison Walton, Joshua Cotterill, Mollie Garratt, Samuel Adamson, suzanne needham, Zoe Evans

Title: Quiz- Christmas Calender
Description: Participation in the quiz is intended to be made even more motivating for employees through grand prizes, such as refurbished laptops or smartphones.
Problem it Solves: Employees can enhance their IT knowledge through targeted IT questions or tasks. For instance, they can improve data quality in specific systems, for example maintaining their personal information in ServiceNow (corresponding quiz tasks).
Benefits: Gain a better understanding of IT terms. Enhance comprehension of IT processes. Improvement of data quality (fulfillment of tasks in the quiz).
Tags: Adventkalender, Adventquiz, Calendar, Christmas, PowerPlatform, Quiz

Title: automation of HR processes
Description: Designing the flow of applications using forms and powerautomate. Thanks to this solution, an employee can submit, ex. a request for registering a family member for insurance by completing an online electronic application. The application then, if it requires consent, goes through the acceptance path, or if it doesn't require consent, it will go straight to the addressee. The person submitting the application sees the application status and receives confirmation that the application has reached the recipient. Thanks to this, the employee can be sure that the application has been delivered.
Problem it Solves: It speeds up the approval process, eliminates paper consumption (GoGreen), no need to provide documentation between locations and vendor, reducing costs, allows to easily prepare reports regarding a given process, and the process can be performed at any time for the employee.
Benefits: Employees can easily and quickly submit a request to the employer, can track the progress of the request, and receive a response/effect to the request at a much faster rate. Employees do not have to send completed paper applications from their location to the headquarters. HR employees immediately see the employee's application and do not waste time processing the document if the document should be sent to the supplier. The employee spends less time completing the application.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact

Title: Security Initiative -  Security Check
Description: Currently I have a working APP, being operated at 4 facilities in the UK, the data captured on the APP is interfaced with a SharePoint and a Power BI dashboard is produced on the data collected. The security checks captured on the APP include all security checks for TAPA compliance. this is a global security standard which DHL heavily invest in  and have over 400+ facilities. currently the app is on a personal account and therefore i require it to be made into a robotic account so it can be extended to all UK facilities and reduce our carbon footprint, improve digitilsation improve for users.
Problem it Solves: This power APP, "Security Check" is an app which allows the user to record facility security checks that traditionally have been captured manually by pen and paper, uploading to a SharePoint site. The App allows the user to capture checks in real-time and for the checks to be visible immediately on a dashboard where the data is leveraged onto a Power BI dashboard, the solution is very powerful, user friendly and cuts down load on workload time for users as well as the carbon footprint. , currently we use it at  small number of facilities for TAPA security compliance.
Benefits: User Experience - User tell me that the APP is  smarter, reduces user time, easier for the user to record security checks, improvement. Carbon footprint - takes the user less time to achieve the task, Zero paper Compliance -  Security compliance is key to securing our facilities, people, customers shipments and network Visibility - The checks recorded on the power APP are visible immediately and are not on paper at a facility in a cupboard, compliance auditing is easily checked from afar, remotely, reducing travel etc, benefits are endless.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Sustainability Impact, Customer experience
Countries: United Kingdom, United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR
Tags: accountability, analytics, audit, bigdata, compliance, continuousimprovement, Digitilization, environment, guards, healthandsafety, PowerPlatform, security, TAPASecuritycompliance

Title: Security Department Flows
Description: 1.	Gathers information from sharepoint list item when there is a new or modified list item. 2.	Sends the information as an email to requestor and the security team. 3.	Sends approval requests to authorized personnel and updates the sharepoint list.
Problem it Solves: There are 9 power automate flows that meets the below needs for DHL personnel. 1.	Keeping records of the security requests. 2.	Organizing them in a SharePoint list. 3.	Sending requests and their updates automatically via email. 4.     Having approval
Benefits: 1.	Authorised personnel can follow the requests in email environment. 2.	Users get emails if there is any update in their requests 3.	Instead of sending repitative approval emails it is done via workflow. 4.	Approvals results are updated in the sharepoint item too. So, end results are always saved. 5.	If there are requests that take times, workflow sends a reminder email. Which helps tracking the requests.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources

Title: EXP NL SQ - Dashboard Automation
Description: The goal is to automate the refreshing process of various dashboards partly or fully, which will decrease the workload of refreshing them.
Problem it Solves: Service Quality is manually refreshing a lot of dashboards on a daily basis, which takes up a lot of time.
Benefits: Less workload with regards to refreshing dashboards.

Title: Kahoot Quiz
Description: Quizzes for Employee engagement can now be accessed through the Kahoot app for HR Sameday & Marketing, Sales & IT functions. Simple solution for all users to download the app to their smartphones & access the quiz that's been created by the host through inputting the Quiz code
Problem it Solves: Employee engagement is difficult. Quizses etc are difficult for everyone to access
Benefits: Employee engagement

Title: Report damage/loss flow
Description: The workflow is linked to a sharepoint form that is used to report damages/losses. The workflow consists of one step, once a report is entered an email goes to the person assigned to deal with the damage or loss.
Problem it Solves: email correspondence
Benefits: modern environment, user-friendly environment, speed of processing.

Title: Customer tour terminal reservation flow
Description: The workflow is connected to a sharepoint form that is used to book appointments for the terminal. The workflow consists of two steps, an email confirmation to the booker to save the booking, an email notification to the verified persons in charge of the booking.
Problem it Solves: email correspondence, outdated environment (intranet), frequent administrator interventions required
Benefits: modern environment, user-friendly environment, speed of processing, rule for checking duplicate reservation data, minimal need for administrator intervention.

Title: NOEP Tally Counter App
Description: NOEP Tally Counter is a user-friendly App to be used during GEMBA Walks in warehouse for PPH observation in processes, work rate comparison with standard rates and belt speed capture.
Problem it Solves: Support NOEP Specialists and Process Engineers by simplifying the consultation of the standard Work Rate Library and document the real-time activities observations.
Benefits: Customized view per User Filters per Country/Facility/Process Sorting options by GEMBA Walk date Pieces Counter & automatic calculation of Total Flow (Heads*PPH) Link to consult and select the Standard Work Rate  Option to add Pictures and Download Observation overview Idle Time calculation

Title: eBook / eProposal
Description: Implement Visme - a SaaS solution that will support the bid team in the creation, distribution and analysis of customer bid presentations employing engaging branded templates, charts and Infographics, videos and animations, to get the message across faster and with more clarity.
Problem it Solves: Customer bid presentations are completed on paper or pdf and are not engaging as they do not allow for the inclusion of multimedia (video, audio, HQ graphics, templates). It also does not provide analytics on readership (tracking number of views, number of unique visitors, page completion etc).
Benefits: More engaging customer bid presentations with better analytics to improve conversion. Increase collaborative working and increase speed of creation through template, library management and easy distribution.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Operational efficiency, Employee experience

Title: Inspect Monitoring
Description: Our tool highlights all packages that may require a SI and don't have it immediately at the debrief step. The agent can then create the SI or feed ECIS to block during containerization if necessary.
Problem it Solves: Some packages may depart without having gone through a mandatory SI, but there is no visibility of compliance at export time. Not inspecting a shipment can have a wide range of consequences.
Benefits: This solution enhances visibility and control over the shipping process, improving operational efficiency and customer service.
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Hubs & Gateways, Network Operations, Others
Tags: automation, debrief, ecis, excel, quickloc, RPA, sherloc, shipmentinspection
Members: Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Julien EDERY

Title: SMART Hub&GTW
Description: Before the start of the export activity, our tool provides information on the volumes to be handled via a PowerBI dashboard. Direct injection shipments are identified early to avoid unexpected volumes.
Problem it Solves: Hubs & GTWs lack visibility on the volumes they will handle during the export process. Because of this, it is hard to plan ressources accordingly.
Benefits: This solution enhances resource planning and operational efficiency, reducing unexpected issues and improving productivity. Staffing and resource planning can be planned ahead of time, leading to smoother operations.
Tags: debrief, directinjection, export, gateways, Hubs, Linehaul, networkoperations, operationalefficiency, opms, PowerPlatform, RPA, sherloc
Members: Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Julien EDERY

Title: Tracing Debrief
Description: Our solution provides a summary at the end of each debrief to ensure no details have been overlooked, and provides an overview of the indicators that impact performance or risk processes. This takes the form of an Excel dashboard which provides an overview of the focal points from DEBRIEF.
Problem it Solves: The debrief process often involves a vast amount of information, causing the debriefer to possibly overlook crucial points. There is also no recap on the Debrief activity that would help to identify continuous improvement intiatives.
Benefits: This solution will improve accuracy and efficiency in debriefing, leading to better performance and ensuring a more consistent process. Examples of focus points: Missing AD, ND vs ODD, Futile PU, Missing NC...
Tags: courier, debrief, missingnc, odd, origindelay, RPA, sherloc
Members: Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Julien EDERY

Title: Tri Import
Description: Before the start of import activity, our tool provides information on the volumes to be handled. This includes typology, containerization, multi-piece shipments, special customers, and sorting to other agencies.
Problem it Solves: There is no visibility at the facility level as to incoming import shipments. Operations have no choice but to adapt quickly to incoming volumes resulting in inefficient resource planning (stations and routes).
Benefits: This solution increases operational efficiency by optimizing resource allocation, improving overall productivity. Staffing at sorting stations can be anticipated as well as route flexing.
Tags: imports, manifestservice, quickloc, reporting, resourceplanning, RPA, sort
Members: Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Julien EDERY

Title: Tracing TDX
Description: As the delivery deadline for time-critical shipments (TDX, CMX...) approaches, our tool identifies these shipments and their last checkpoint in near-real time. This allows targeted communication with drivers to ensure timely delivery. This tool has no limitations to its use, therefore can be deployed to multiple agents at all facilities.
Problem it Solves: It is curcial to track packages with specific delivery time requirements (e.g. pre-9, pre-12....) as the deadline apporaches in order to verify that they will be delivered  before it. AQCC enables this, however its access is very limited which is not sufficient for this purpose.
Benefits: When a pre-9, pre-12 delivery is identified as being at risk of being late, the Fix Exception agent will contact the driver to get a status update, and in case of an issue will work to find a solution. This greatly reduces the amount of late deliveries, improving customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.
Tags: AQCC, courierdelivery, courierexperience, DeliveryExceptions, manifestservice, quickloc, RPA
Members: Christophe LANCIRICA, GEOFFREY JUNIOR DIMELO, Julien EDERY

Title: Quickloc
Description: Ability to simultaneously track up to 50 AWBs streamlines the monitoring process for users dealing with numerous shipments. The incorporation of color coding adds a visual layer, allowing users to quickly identify and comprehend the checkpoint status of each AWB The filter capability in Quickloc further contributes to problem resolution by enabling users to focus on specific subsets of AWBs
Problem it Solves: Quickloc tackles the challenge of streamlined shipment management by offering a user-friendly solution for tracking up to 50 Air Waybills (AWBs). Its innovative approach includes color coding, enabling at-a-glance assessment of each AWB's status or location. This visual cueing enhances efficiency and quick decision-making
Benefits: Efficient Multi-Tracking Visual Insight with Color Coding Customized Viewing with Filters Enhanced User Experience Reliability through Sherloc Integration

Title: Inbound NCY Scan  FLT Drive Through  EMA
Description: By installing a forklift drive through portal, we will be able to identify the capability of the technology to read barcodes on moving NCY freight.
Problem it Solves: To allow the business for higher NCY visibility, we need to understand the capability of the current ‘High-Speed-Steerable Mirror’ solution technology available and its capability and read rates.
Benefits: If the trial is successful, it will benefit DHL by providing higher visibility on the NCY process enabling us to improve efficiency and productivity.
Tags: efficiency, FLT, inovation, NCY, productivity, Scanning, tracking
Members: Alan PURVEY, James Atherton, Thomas Gayner

Title: Digitalization of security flight plan
Description: Implementation of Ramp Management System Application (RMS) at the security department for automated work order generation and efficient resource deployment. Flight plan schedule changes will be automatically reflected in real-time. Employee distribution and work order assignment are fully digitalized. The utilization of tablets facilitates the digitization of paperwork and reports.
Problem it Solves: Security tasks, such as aircraft searches, have to be conducted for all inbound flights from non-EU countries and direct flights to the USA. To manage these tasks, a security flight plan is created manually.  Flight plan adaptations are considered from three different databases and manually transmitted to the security flight plan. On average, 641 flight plan changes are thus managed per month.  These activities are labor-intensive and prone to human error. Manual security processes for flight plan activities are not suitable for the anticipated growth in future aircraft movements.
Benefits: 1. Ensuring compliance with European aviation security regulation DVO EU 2015/1998 2. Eliminating human factors as a source of error through digitization and automation 3. Complete digitization of all security processes on the apron. 4. Improving productivity in the Security department 5. All operational departments at LEJ Hub work with same software (Ramp Management Software) and database
Benefit Category: Sustainability Impact, Operational efficiency, Employee experience
Most impacted Functions: Aviation, Hubs & Gateways, IT, Network Operations

Kat3 CCCG Documents: Focuses on overseeing Kat3 clearance types in Turkey for individuals.
Problem it Solves: CCPU Export Files: Efficient Handling of Micro Export Shipments Return and Re-Entry Files: Handling and Declaration of Returned Shipments Kat2 CCCG Documents: Streamlining Kat2 Clearance Type for Individuals Kat3 CCCG Documents: Streamlining Kat2 Clearance Type for Individuals
Benefits: We do not print any paperwork anymore Trace Closure performance has been improved Accelerated Export Processes Streamlined Kat2 Clearance for Individuals Timely Handling of Returned Shipments

Title: EU Travel Request Form
Description: The PowerApps-based travel request application tackles the challenges associated with manual travel request management by introducing an automated and centralized solution. The app streamlines the request submission process, eliminating the inefficiencies of manual procedures and reducing the likelihood of errors. It establishes a centralized repository where all travel requests are logged, providing a unified platform for both employees and administrators to access and manage information.
Problem it Solves: The PowerApps-based travel request solution aims to address the inherent challenges in manual travel request management within organizations. Traditionally, the process is time-consuming and error-prone, lacking a centralized system for efficient tracking and approval. The solution streamlines this workflow, automating request submissions and establishing a centralized repository for easy access and management. By incorporating an automated approval workflow, it ensures requests follow a predefined path, reducing delays and enhancing overall efficiency.
Benefits: The PowerApps-based travel request system offers a multitude of benefits for organizations seeking to optimize their travel management processes. Firstly, the automation of the request submission and approval workflow significantly reduces the time and effort traditionally associated with manual processes, leading to increased efficiency. The establishment of a centralized repository ensures easy access to and management of travel requests, fostering a more organized and transparent system

Title: Virtual Reality (VR) Procedure Training A300-600
Description: Traditional mockup training is lacking action feedback and accuracy of the cockpit dimensions. When training in a virtual training environment, using state-of-the-art virtual reality headsets, the training of muscle-memory is possible to a much higher level. The provided system behavior and sound effects facilitate a perfect learning environment.
Problem it Solves: Before starting their type rating in our full flight simulator in Leipzig, our new joining pilots are being trained on the operating procedures. Currently this is done with the help of a mockup with paper posters. To enhance this training, virtual reality is implemented as a training tool. The trainees can now study using a customized 3D cockpit model of our beautiful A300-600 aircraft, with all normal and some emergency procedures implemented.
Benefits: Since the trainees are fully immersed in the training environment they have a way more realistic and thorough training experience. Action feedback in form of system behaviour and warning sounds etc. eliminate a lot of previously asked questions. All in all less time is needed to cover these procedures in the fullflight simulator and so the simulator time can be used more effectively – e.g. to train more manual flying and thus enhance flight safety.
Benefit Category: Sustainability Impact, Operational efficiency, Employee experience

Problem it Solves: Allows the Sales force to book a visit for their customers on the available Hubs, facilities. Possibility for the Facility admin to set the available slots, ask and collect the the proper documentation to the customers, easy to get in touch with automatic notifications
Benefits: Easy to get in contact with Sales, solid mechanism of customer involvement in Hub and facilities tour organization
Members: Marco FERIOLI, Roberto INNOCENTI, Valentina Gradoli

Title: GSE Tracking LEJHUB
Description: Equipping of 2000+ GSE devices with GPS sensors and all dollies in addtion with LOAD sensors. Collecting the data via DPDHL IoT platform as standard interface to the LEJHUB Ramp Manangement System. Visualizing and combining the GSE Tracking data within the RMS to fullfil different OPS Use Case
Problem it Solves: Currently there are only rough overview and transparency about the GSE on the LEJHUB RAMP, how much GSE is in use or still can be used. Manuel inventories take place during operations. Availability of empty dollies are not visible. This leads to unplanned search and corrective measures
Benefits: Saving manual inventories, Reduction of RAMP process delays (e.g. driving delays, lack of equipment), CO2 savings due to optimized driving activities of GSE
Members: Alexander Schwarz, Axel Wiebracht, Diethard Reimann, Frank STEINERT, Hendrik Meiner, Jyotirmoy Banerjee, Steffen Schlegel, Sunie Hassan

Title: Electronic signature pad
Description: Electronic signing pad software approval for download.
Problem it Solves: Helps environment by going paperless and for visitors and contractors visiting site and signing other documents.
Benefits: Less use of paper, and easier to mange control data.
Most impacted Functions: Electronic Shipping Solutions, General Management, Human Resources, Network Operations, Sales

Title: GSOP Audit Tool
Description: Development of a web solution for French GSOP team of 7 conducting audits across 49 facilities, replacing current antiquated methods. Possible replication of solution to other countries in a later iteration.
Problem it Solves: The objective is to replace many of the manual, tedious and repetitive tasks taking much of their time before, during and after audits that are currently not doable within GRID.
Benefits: This will save a lot of time, standardize the methodology and outputs, while providing a better centralized environment for GSOP and facilities to efficiently make
Members: Ayoub ATFANE, Evelyne ACHI, Julien EDERY

Title: Damage report dematerialization
Description: When in a facility an agent or supervisor notices a damaged shipment, they have to scan in ECIS the appropriate checkpoints then fill a form and take the pictures of the damage on a scanner or phone that will be sent to them via email. In the end, this report will automatically be entered in GIA.
Problem it Solves: Storage and sharing the information with the network Time consuming process (filling a paper form and taking pictures) No link to GEMA Non compliance, customer complaints to CS because no damage report filled Impossible to know the cause of damage
Benefits: GSOP and ISO compliance Storing and analyzing consolidated data Time saved with automated process Easily identify cause of damage In the future, accessibility through GEMA or Sherloc automated Increase customer satisfaction with quicker and more accurate response from CS
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, Hubs & Gateways, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: Vehicule Inspection dematerialization
Description: Courriers have to do a daily and weekly vehicule inspection and in FR at the same time they have to check the supplies as well. They can use their phone to answer a questionnaire and in the future take pictures that will be received via email and stored in Sharepoint available for the Fleet team.
Problem it Solves: Require at least all DHL courriers to complete the inspection Taking pictures of the damage Extract data, consolidate information and producing analysis Non compliant (GSOP, CRISP and ISO) because checklist was not done daily
Benefits: Reducing the amout of paper used in all the facilities Reduce the amount of time needed to solve an issue Reduce the risk of losing the inspection sheet Previously 4 manual activities and now 1 manual and 2 automated activities

Title: Non Stackable Palette IA recognition
Description: In order to prevent the charging of false NSP or non NSP to the customers and the costs associated, an AI process allows to analyze the daily images taken from a phone through a form filled by DHL agences via Microsoft Forms and stored in a Sharepoint folder.
Problem it Solves: As a surcharge is applied automatically to the customer, it costs from 2 to 3 times the surcharge to reimbuse a client in case of false or non NSP. Time consuming process
Benefits: Cost of reimbursment saved because we do not bill false NSP up hand. Time saved analyzing the photos daily (average of 350 photos) Less people dedicated to the claims and surcharges Customer satisfaction
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: Digitalized SALT test
Description: New way of SALT quizzes  Replaces one of GSOP recommended practices - „Paperwork tests“ Enables to deliver SALT every month to all  Like an app, includes pictures and automatic feedback Provides SPVRs with regular summarized results Easy to maintain – 5 minutes job
Problem it Solves: Frequent pickups of hidden or incompliant DG shipments  Workload of SPVRs while delivering compulsory SALTs tests Variable quality of SALT tests Delays of shipments with minor DG incompliances
Benefits: More safety, cost reduction, reduction of shipment delays

Title: H&G-DE-LEJ-Ticketsystem for Customs/Customer Suppo
Description: Salespersons have a centralized point where they can create the tickets to get help from the customer support team.  Afterwards an QM should be implemented to check how well the problem was solved as well as a dashboard to identify often upcoming issues and increase the work.
Problem it Solves: Currently there is a SharePoint-list with automated flows which is used for getting and solving tickets regarding customs/customer support. To officialize and implement an QM into that work we would like to develop a PowerApp based on that list.
Benefits: Better handling of tickets and improve the work based on the QM of the persons who solved the tickets.

Title: Legal Award app
Description: Power Platform based solution to provide our legal colleagues an app where they can insert an initiative, vote it, extract a list, etc.
Problem it Solves: Our legal colleagues need a platform where they can insert an initiative, vote it, extract a list, etc
Benefits: Faster procedure, zero costs, possibility of tracking and reporting

Title: Service Point Prospect Data
Description: The idea is to create an automated process where Service Point prospect information can be automatically populated into Comet.
Problem it Solves: This initiative solves the issue of manually entering Service Point prospect data into Comet. This will improve productivity as 10 applications forms can currently take 1.5 hours to transfer the data manually into Comet. By automating this process the team can work on more value adding activities.
Benefits: (1)To reduce the time it takes to manually input SVP prospect data into Comet. (2) To get faster visibility of SVP prospects to the relevant Field Executive to follow up.  (3) To improve data accuracy and eliminate errors associated with manual data transfer.

Title: Push Teams Notification using a Process Assistant
Description: To solve that problem we'd like to use an RPA that triggers a PowerAutomate flow. Need space allocation/configuration for the RPA in Production environment.
Problem it Solves: Send notifications in Team's channel as a generic sender instead of any individual users. We do not want to tie the message to any specific user and just want to use a generic sender instead.
Benefits: Procedure OPS employees will not get confused when notified via their channels Teams with a generic name in place of specific one.

Title: Bagging app.
Description: Bagging process requires employees with good knowledge of the global bagging and EPO rules. It means that the employee does not have to check the correct routing of the shipment on based of the file and the information is directly shown to him on the scanner.
Problem it Solves: We have developed an application that can display AWB or PID based bag name according to Global Bagging and EPO file or according to local GTW settings.
Benefits: We have achieved faster bagging process and reduced errors.

Title: Prontoform implementation within HR Department
Description: As well as the 'Return to Work' prontoform, there has also been the roll out of the application for 'Flexible Working' via prontoform. Other documents that will be digitalised in this way will include the 'Sickness Review' and 'Pass Renewal' forms.
Problem it Solves: The prontoform enables a user friendly experience when an employee returns to work. It has enabled digitalisation as part of the roll out, and being able to collate information in a timely manner.
Benefits: The digitalisation of these forms will enable a user friendly experience in ensuring all relevant documents are completed in a timely manner and moving towards a more GOGREEN and sustainable department. Efficiencies as a department will be improved in ensuring that these are completed.
Countries: United Kingdom EMA, United Kingdom LHR

Title: Non Stackable evidence
Description: This app will help OPS team to collect non-stockable shipments evidence. They will only need to scan shipment label and take a picture to store this evidence in a SharePoint list. This information could be queried by OPS, CS, Sales and Finance teams.
Problem it Solves: This app will collect evidence of non-stackable shipments to justify additional extra charges to customers and thus avoid having to pay credits
Benefits: DHL will be able to share non-stackable extra charge evidence to customers and avoid paying credits to them for that extra charges.
Members: Miguel PUERTA, Sandra Jeniffer Garcia Cruz, Victor Vazquez Lopez

Title: Online chat for Service Point Partners
Description: To provide an online chat solution which can be modified by the types of Service Point partners we work with.
Problem it Solves: To provide a tailored online chat for all Service Points. Currently Rymans and Dyas stores have a shared chat but this wouldn't be suitable for all retailers. Providing a specific online chat for our partners means we can provide a tailored service and resolve queries faster.
Benefits: 1) Faster responses to any queries raised.  2) Call reductions coming into partner support.  3) An enhanced customer experience.

Title: Facilitator Recognition Hybrid Event
Description: **1. Celebrating Our CIS Facilitators:**  **2. Bridging Distances:**  **3. Networking Opportunities:**  **4. Promoting Collaboration:**  **5. Acknowledging Excellence:**  **6. Fostering Engagement:**
Problem it Solves: This event stands as a testament to our commitment to excellence and collaboration within our CIS organization. The initiative brings together a diverse range of talents, ideas, and experiences to foster growth and innovation.
Benefits: The event serves as a platform to honor the individuals who consistently deliver high quality and volume of modules. By recognizing their dedication, we create an environment that values hard work and inspires others to strive for excellence.
Members: Camila Ortiz, Lorela HOXHA, Marco Chavez, SAIKIRTTI KUNASEKARAN

Title: Smart glasses for manual inbound sort
Description: The use of smart glasses within Operations to facilitate inbound sort, by reading the parcel's barcode and displaying the route code on which the parcel has to be sorted.
Problem it Solves: Makes the need for route knowledge of an operator obsolete. Improves sort speed and accuracy. Leaves both hands free for the operators to handle the shipments while still being mobile, resulting in a higher throughput compared to existing sort scan solutions.
Benefits: Sort staff flexibility as no route knowledge is required. Caters for flexible route planning & sorting. Suited for flyer and small toteable pieces sort. Works with a BPI integration retrieving the route code generated by either GDA or DISCO from the WLPRT event in GNS.
Tags: belgium, flyersort, handsfree, inboundsort, operations, smartglasses
Members: Diego Canavessio, Michael Stoehr, Pieter Janssen

Title: CashLine App
Description: App made on Powerapps and consist of one form of entering details and one admin panel.
Problem it Solves: Fast and convenient method of entering, storing and access of cashline (discount) information of Customer Service dept.
Benefits: Fast and convenient method of entering, storing and access of cashline (discount) information of Customer Service dept.

Title: Trade Compliance customer ID transfer
Description: Currently GB UK DP team request customer ID when asked by the regional screening team to clear their shipment. The only option to provide a copy of their ID is via email. We have numerous and continuing concerns from the customer of the safety and security using the email option with their provider.
Problem it Solves: A secure method for customers to provide DHL with their personal ID for the clearance of the Denied Parties process An alternative way to provide customer ID rather than sending via their email provider
Benefits: US DP team currently have this in place via their website https://mydhl.express.dhl/us/en/help-and-support/shipping-advice/what-documents-do-i-need/denied-parties.html and we would like to adopt a similar process for GB.
Members: David Blackman, Matthew Richardson, Nicola Blatherwick

Title: Cashbook Application
Description: Collecting cash information from service points and agent office (includes courier cash register devices) on a daily basis in one place - SharePoint list. Offices can do reports. Finance uses this information further on in their debases. This app calculates current balance of every office.
Problem it Solves: Clear and fast method of entering daily cash of all country service points. Providing information of all cash to Finance department on a daily basis - information in one place. This cash information includes cash register devices of couriers and cash collected in the service points.
Benefits: Clear and fast method of entering daily cash of all country service points. Providing information of all cash to Finance department on a daily basis - information in one place. This cash information includes cash register devices of couriers and cash collected in the service points.

Title: A1 Coaching
Description: Team leads listen to x10 calls per advisor per month.  AI coaching will listen and mark all calls (process side not sentiment) giving us more data and better results. This will in turn help the managers to coach our people and improve on CX.
Problem it Solves: To listen and mark all/most advisor calls for the month. This will save the team manager time on listening to x10 calls per advisor, will give a better overall score due to more calls monitored. We would have clearer results on advisors following process.
Benefits: More data for better and meaningful results time saved for team managers, more focus on 121s and coaching and developing. Improve on customer experience.

Title: User on boarding form
Description: Department manager fills out form regarding user info, department, cost center, different application access, agent phone requirements and other things that new employee needs for work.
Problem it Solves: It simplifies the proces of gathering information regarding new user account, applications and email distribution groups of new employees.
Benefits: All info on one place for faster user creation and application access rights.

Title: Online Newsletter
Description: Online format of newsletter will improve internal communication and reduce production costs.

Title: IT Access form workflow

Title: Digital HR forms for business approval
Description: Create a system to handle approvals for new employees and employment changes like position/salery/hours. Especially for blue color works, since they change contracts often, which can create a lot of manual changes. Take the outcome of the FIRST CHOICE project on this subject and create a system​.
Problem it Solves: To avoid  the extremely manual and slow process of printing, filling it out in hand, pass it around to all involved leaders, and finally typed in manually by a member of HR​

Description: Benefit in operations is a complete, correct and up to date picture of which ULDs are in the building. This is to avoid errors in ULD management.
Problem it Solves: Create and implement a system keeping track of ULD locations physically to give a better overview of where ULDs are located
Benefits: Create and implement a system keeping track of ULD locations physically to give a better overview of where ULDs are located

Title: EAD ENTRY AT ORIGIN
Description: Origin gets responsible for their own data and will also do all the data entry work.

Benefits: There is already an IT solution to have EAD MRN numbers entered in DCVS in origin become available in the regional NCTS solution. This solution needs to be implements to local clearance applications at EU exit points and a regional agreement to be made that origin is to enter this data​

Title: NCTS UPLOAD TO GIA​
Description: Using the same idea as for import declarations to make NCTS declarations available to other stakeholders in Global Imaging in order to avoid requests by email or phone to provide this type of documents​.
Problem it Solves: All European CCPU departments to upload released NCTS declarations to Global Imaging​
Benefits: Suggestion is to create a Campfire initiative with EU scope to implement this way of working on a regional level​.

Title: INTERNAL DIGITAL HR FORMS
Description: There should be a system which can collect form entries from employees signing up to all kind of things​.
Problem it Solves: This would save paper as well as time for the employee and HR as paper based forms are no longer needed.
Benefits: Investigate DHL standard form generating systems to see which fits the process best.

Title: DIGITAL KEY LOGGING​
Description: Perhaps is 5 as benefit overrated as a digital solution would not increase productivity, nor save cost and only slightly increase quality due to getting rid of hand written forms. Still it’s a clean and simple digitalization initiative of a kind we encourage hence it is included. ​
Problem it Solves: Create an IT system for logging of borrowed keys​
Benefits: Develop a simple key logging system for internal use in Security department​

Title: GID QR CODES ON ID CARDS​
Description: The Global ID QR code in the CIS passport should be printed on the DHL ID card (which we always bring). It’s to be used as the QR code in the CIS passport reporting training completed for the employee using the Facilitator App.​ Print Global ID QR code on ID cards​
Problem it Solves: This would ease the admin work for trainers as there would be no need to report training completed in MyTW manually.​
Benefits: More effective way of registered who have participated in which course. Furthermore, it will reduce manual work of reporting in different systems.

Title: DeepL API for translating line item description
Description: DeepL API can trustfully translate each line item description and provide best translation quality (compared to all other API translations on market like Google or Microsoft translate)
Problem it Solves: Translating of line item description for customs declarations.
Benefits: Saving time and processing H7 shipments automatically on customs department. Provide more space for our emloyees to focus on harder cases and wellbeing. Customer has best servoce quality with current automation settings.

Title: IT ROLE PROFILES​
Description: Create a matrix with position/role profile and IT application access level and IT equipment for the position.​  The matrix and the local process for employee maintenance is the base for an user management solution developed to centralize information and tasks between HR,IT, Security and finance.
Problem it Solves: It’s clear what preparations are needed for a new employee in terms of IT access and IT equipment which should better ensure it being in place from day 1 of the employment. ​
Benefits: It’s clear what preparations are needed for a new employee in terms of IT access and IT equipment which should better ensure it being in place from day 1 of the employment. ​

Title: Re-enabling Trust Pilot for the UK
Description: To re-activate Trust Pilot on our non-account website to capture authentic customer reviews regarding the DHL service.  This will give customers the ability to evaluate our service more effectively vs. the competition and increase sales conversion.
Problem it Solves: Customers will often select a supplier based on Trust Pilot reviews. Peer to peer recommendations can help drive more conversions as well as providing a rich source of customer insights that can help improve and optimise the entire digital customer journey in the long term.
Benefits: 1) Access to authentic customer reviews  2) Improved sales conversion  3) Enhanced digital customer experience vs. the competition  4) Improved SEO rankings

Title: Auto Document achive
Description: Each year the training certificates need to be archived into a yearly folders. The certificate database is on sharepoint and every function/facility and individual is represented. As its a manual process it is extremely time consuming and prone to human errors
Problem it Solves: An annual archiving of all facilities online certificate database which is excess of 5000 individual files on the sharepoint.
Benefits: By digitialising this process we can ensure the certificates are stored correctly and in a much more timely manner. this will also enable to location of certificates easier in the event of audits, both internal and external.
Most impacted Functions: Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: Franjo Krenker
Description: Shipments handed over to Post office need new, Post office certified, shipping label with consignee name and address to enable Post office to deliver shipment correctly. DHL label cannot be used.
Problem it Solves: Shipping labels creation for local Post office
Benefits: The purpose is to avoid manual work and to speed up the hand-over process. Excluding human errors is also of great importance.

Title: Images and documents management tool
Description: Documents come in different formats from our clients: Word, Excel, pdf, jpg other graphical format.  The application graphically browses the pages of the documents and images as thumbnails. It converts everything to .pdf, format A4, eBook quality. It can save or print the selection.
Problem it Solves: Select relevant support documents and make single pdf file to attach to the Customs declaration. Print selection is available.
