Title: RTO list in terminal
Description: Aiming to optimise process and look cross functionally this setup as part of whole process with customs team. (Identified needed fields, reviewed also current RTO list. Possiility to combine these and eliminate waste. Work in progress to create updated RTO list)
Problem it Solves: Terminal uses excel based RTO list independently from customs process. Causing manual copy-paste work and manual work
Benefits: Possibility to optimize process and reduce waste

Title: CS GoS Desktop Widget
Description: Take the existing GoS webpage (GOS Wallboard (dhl.com) and turn it into a Desktop widget. At the moment we find that the webpage gets lost behind all the other documents / apps open on the agent desktop. The idea is to convert it to a GoS R-A-G widget that could be permanently visible at the edge
Problem it Solves: Giving an Agent visibility of their team’s GoS is particularly important when working from home so they know when to drop other activities (Wrap up, emails, outbound etc) to focus on inbound calls to improve queue times and customer experience. With SMART working the UK is operating a 50 office /50
Benefits: Reduce call waiting time during busy periods.

Title: B2B Lead Sourcing
Description: We have tried to source B2B leads using online sources. The leads have been cold and have been passed onto our LQ Team for qualification resulting in lower conversion rates vs. other lead sources.
Problem it Solves: Implement or partner with a vendor that can provide a software solution to provide warmer B2B lead sources to drive the market penetration of key B2B industry verticals. This would save time for searching for the lead sources and ultimately improve the conversion rate.
Benefits: By partnering with a company similar to Sales Optimise the business could see the following benefits.  1) Employee efficiency-Saves times hunting for leads.  2) Increased conversion rate  3) Supports the B2B growth strategy.

Title: Infeed truck utilisation
Description: Using a PowerApps application, the user can select a movement from the schedule. Type of shipments and load percentage are selected and sample shipments can be scanned. Photos can be added as supporting proof. Collected data can be analysed to identify improvements.
Problem it Solves: BRUHUB receives a large amount of customer-loaded direct infeed trucks. There is limited visibility on utilisation: actual volumes are not reported or measured, leading to non-optimised movements.
Benefits: Data can now be collected on previously unknown load percentages, underutilised movements can be downgraded, combined or cancelled. An added benefit is that loading issues are also recorded for escalation, improving safety and quality.

Title: ImpAct problem solving application
Description: A PowerApps program that guides users through the First Choice ImpAct method. Actions can be assigned to users across the platform. Power Automate can be integrated to provide reminders and PowerBI can be used to monitor usage and analyse the results.
Problem it Solves: Solving problems and escalating issues is a very inefficient process. A great deal of communication is still done via e-mail, the sender needs to keep track of responses and send reminders if needed. This leads to a lot of waste: problems are noticed but not resolved.
Benefits: Employees can resolve issues quicker and easier than via standard communications methods, there is less frustration due to lack of feedback as reminders are automated. Structured problem solving with impactful actions is an important pillar to improving processes in all departments.

Title: Electric charging point contact
Description: Create/ order a sticker or sign directly out of SmartConnect that can be put behind the windshield of an electric car when charging on company premises. - sticker/ sign includes a description and a QR code which is directing to the profile page of the driver in Smart Connect or starts a chat.
Problem it Solves: On our DHL premises we have limited number of charging points. Often charging points are blocked by cars that have not been removed after fully charged. This easy solution provides one in need of a charging point to contact the driver of a car through Smart Connect.
Benefits: easy way for colleagues in need of a charging point for electric vehicles to contact drivers Who charged their car but did not repark yet. Reduces blocking charging points when they are needed. -no personal information of driver revealed. -can be used everywhere, simple, company and private cars.

Title: Quality Evaluation to Coaching Summary
Description: Build/integrate a new application for WFO QM coaching evaluations and coaching summary (excel). Currently 2 forms completed with duplicated information being manually transferred.  WFO to offer jump to coaching summary form save on manual intervention.
Problem it Solves: Time wasted with manual intervention copy and pasting from one application to another.  improve on efficiency and drive digitalization here along with continuous improvements.
Benefits: saves time no each quality evaluation Less system issues less space of S drive (currently excel form) increase productivity
Tags: 21stcenturyreporting, coaching, customerservice, DataAnalytics, efficiency, greatplacetowork, productivity, qualitymonitoring

Title: "The GEMBA league"
Description: "The GEMBA league" is a simple league table where employees compete for prizes by submitting GEMBA walks. For each new GEMBA walk they submit they score 1 point and you get additional 2 points when a GEMBA walk is marked as completed.
Problem it Solves: Helps engage employees to make use of GEMBA tool to register improvement actions taken. League table is maintained and updated manually using a website called keepthescore.com. The website allows to keep track and present score in a very simple manner.
Benefits: This method encourages employees to register their improvement actions and keep continuous improvement at the top of their minds. That will in return improve processes, efficiency and enhance our customers experience.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: BA emails

After process upgrade we have a new program, where we just paste waybill number and the email is automatically sent.

Title: What3Words Integration into DHL Delivery options
Description: What3words is a quick, simple way to find, share and save exact locations. The system converts coordinates into 3 word addresses. Problem it Solves: It gives accurate location data for delvieries, improves quality of delivery services, reduces chances of shipments beng delviered incorrectly, could improve customer confidence in delvieries if we could add it to POD and POP.
Benefits: Can be used to aid delivery; reduce number of shipments that have been delivered incorrectly, could be added to POD and POP to give a far more accurate delivery location. Title: Handover Protocols

Benefits: Less Paper consumption and faster file to pdf conversion.
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, IT, Network Operations, Others

Title: ChatBot for Local IT Support
Description: Our users most of the time try to find our who is doing what in IT so that they can direct their questions or requests to the relevant team. We are building a chatbot which will help them to find most relevant IT team for their needs.
Problem it Solves: It will help our users to find information much more quickly.
Benefits: Fasten the process. Eliminate time, resource waste. Instant information availability.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Finance, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: OCR - Customs Invoice Data Capture
Description: This project aims to develop innovative, cost-effective solution to eliminate manual invoice data entry process, speed up export process and minimize user intervention for Customs department using OCR technology. OCR will capture invoice data from scanned images and insert them into LCA by RPA.
Problem it Solves: Currently Express Turkey Customs team enter customs invoice data manually into the LCA. This is a time consuming process and takes a lot of time. This solution removes manual data entry process and capture invoice data automatically from invoice and insert them into LCA by RPA.
Benefits: Micro Export numbers increased %78 compare to 2019. More export shipments means more people working on data entry. There are a lot of time wasting, productivity loss during manual data entry. Customers also will be satisfied if we clear their shipments faster.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Mobile Payments - QR Code Based + NFC Payments
Description: And so we thought, why not to use hand terminal as a payment device and couriers keep one device: First we implemented a QR code payment solution which requires completion of payment on customer side and recently we are working on a NFC based payment solution through hand held terminal. And so we
Problem it Solves: The problem was couriers either missing POS device or sometimes do not prefer to carry POS device as a secondary device and some payments held through unsecure mail order mechanism.
Benefits: More secure and convenient payment solutions both for customer and for DHL through reusing existing hand terminals.

Title: Collection Customs Data From Customers via SMS
Description: With this solution, our customs team send sms to all our customers regarding their missing data. Customer reply to the SMS and it automatically flows into our LCA.
Problem it Solves: Customs teams are calling our customers to collect their missing data to complete customs process. This is a time consuming process and a manual workload.
Benefits: Manual workload removed by using this automated solution.

Title: One Form for All
Description: Currently when users would like to request access/cancel for an application they need to submit a ticket to Helpdesk and helpdesk creates additional seperates ticket for each time. One form for All allows users to submit their application access/cancel requests from a single interface.
Problem it Solves: Current process does not allow users to submit their request by themselves. They need to raise ticket to Helpdesk. And request information most of the time is not enough to create access. So we have to go back and ask user additional info.
Benefits: Eliminates waste, save time. Automate the process. Full visibility on GSN. Right at the first time.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Finance, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: LCA - SDCM Integration for Outbound Shipments
Description: Currently Express Turkey do not have any application or interface to manage OB shipments. Our OPS team manages it via an iShare list. Once shipments arrive at stations they enter information on this iShare list and classify them. It have a lot of manual interaction.
Problem it Solves: With this integration, once a shipment is created by our customer then it become available in Evrim instantly. So our customs and ops teams do no need to wait until courier to arrive the station and enter the information in iShare list manually. All data flow happens at the backend seamlessly.
Benefits: Eliminates time, resource waste. Instant shipment visibility/availability in our local customs app. Fasten the process.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Trace update to sales executive
Description: Would be really helpful if the customer advisor could tap a mark to Gema, when opening a trace inquiry. A pop up could appear for example to GSPT+ so that the sales executive would know that a trace is open. Next time calling the customer, the executive would be aware of the situation.
Problem it Solves: Keeps the sales executive updated if their customer is contacting customer service and requesting for a trace inquiry.
Benefits: This would help the internal information of customers actions and the customer would get even better service as the sales executive would be aware of their customers challenges. As a sales person I really need to know what is going on with my customers in order to give them better service experience
Tags: customerexperience, customerservice, DataAnalytics, gema, motivation, sales, slnb

Title: Customer Data to hold info on billing method
Description: Currently information is scattered around different system (MyBill, AET, GCBD and regional ebilling gateway) without the possibility to check in one single location what is the valid billing method for the account. FI Speciality is the national ebilling platform (Verkkolasku)
Problem it Solves: AET and / or GCBD to hold and show information on Finnish national ebilling method (Verkkolasku). Currently that is not visible anywhere and takes extra steps to check in Finance
Benefits: Saved time and faster problem resolution

Title: Yhdistetty puhelinluettelo
Description: Yrityksen liittymän ja/tai  puhelimen käyttöönotossa, ei SIM:llä ole valmiina yrityksen sisäisiä puhelinnumeroita.  Tätä varten olisi huippu sellainen " EXP - Ring"- järjestelmä / APP, josta saisi ladattua työpuhelimeen kaikki Ringiin syötettyjen puhelinetu - henkilöiden puhelinnumerot kerralla.
Problem it Solves: Puhelinnumero - rinki, jossa mukana yrityksen kaikki henkilöt työpuhelinnumeroineen, jotta viestintä saataisiin nopeutumaan sekä työsuhdepuhelimien käyttö viestinnän osalta monipuolistumaan
Benefits: Verkostoitumisen laajeneminen Viestinnän nopeutuminen Mahdollisesti lisääntyvä keskinäinen kontaktointi Sparrausmahdollisuudet kollegoiden kesken yli osastorajojen Nopea konsultointi akuuteissa tilanteissa Lyhytnumero - mahdollisuuksilla taloudelliset hyödyt "Ring - hinnoin"

Title: DISCO for couriers
Description: The digitalization initiative of having screens between the gates in PUD will help the couriers and direct loaders know exactly what to expect and when.  The sorters will have to look through less shipments each, improving efficiency, while couriers may leave when they are full, not waiting for all.
Problem it Solves: Visibility for sorters Shipment visibility for couriers pre-departure
Benefits: Sorters will have the information of what is coming, which will allow them to sort vehicle instead of waiting for shipment. Couriers may leave when they have all shipments on their screen, and may get more ORH. Will also give an overview in case of non-scanned shipments on the vehicle.
Members: Alexandre Luc Philippe, Christian Glotta, Mikael Ryberg

Title: Paperless car expense form
Description: Each time you are delivering the car expense report you need to print it , sign it, get your manager to sign it , and hand it over to  Account Payable. With any application like DocuSign you save time and paper for each report you
Problem it Solves: Printing and getting the car expense form signed and delivered
Benefits: Easier to submit and approve the car expense report

Title: Digital Holiday Form
Description: The digital form is created in Microsoft forms and is built on short, relevant questions required to fill a holiday request. Name helps break down the request by shift, email address is required so a response can be sent back to the requestee.
Problem it Solves: Removes the need for paper holiday request forms and lessens the chance of human error or loss when filling and storing said forms.
Benefits: The form is accessible to all staff members. The form removes all paper from the process keeping it digital start to finish. A notification is sent to all relevant management staff for approval. Once Approved or Rejected an email is sent back to the employee automatically.
Tags: approvals, DataAnalytics, digital, holiday, qrcode, rejections, RPA

Title: DCVS Customs - välilehden kehitys
Description: DCVS Customs - välilehden tullinimikkeiden valintalistaukseen "select all" - toiminto, jotta poistettavat valintaruudut saisi valittua kerralla ja näin poistettua isomman tullinimike - määrän yhdellä klikkauksella
Problem it Solves: Poistossa olevien tullinimikkeiden poistaminen tapahtuu tällä hetkellä yksi kerrallaan. Kehityksellä saataisiin poistettua useampia valintoja kerralla. NOTE: CLOSED IN CAMPFIRE, TAKEN IN AS DCVS IMPROVEMENT REQUEST VIA OPS PROGRAMS
Benefits: Toiminnolla voitetaan työaikaa, lisätään tehokkuutta sekä tuodaan taloudellisia hyötyjä henkilöstökustannusten kautta. Lisäksi henkilökunnan työssäviihtyvyys paranee.

Title: DISCO Sort-2-Light for Flyers
Description: DISCO based FLY sort-2-light solution, low cost but high speed (>950pph). Tote rack with overhead Cognex presentation scanner and LED strips on each shelf. When a shipment is scanned the leds under the corresponding route's tote bin is lit up. Sort info displayed on a monitor attached to the rack.
Problem it Solves: Current flyer sort process is manual, inefficient and prone to errors/missorts. Service centers depend on utilizing experienced workers in this process, to read the label and identify which bin to sort each shipment to based on zip codes. Now they easily scan and immediatley see where to put it.
Benefits: Fast, efficient sort-to-light solution for flyers (>950pph). Easy & intuitive, anyone can sort flyers with 100% accuracy.  Scalable, supports large facilities with a 2 step process (rough sort + fine sort).  Ergonomic, the high speed presentation scanner allows worker to use both hands for sorting.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Customer experience, Operational efficiency

Title: DISCO PUD Belt Load Assist Tool
Description: Visual guide/supporting tool for the PUD Direct Loaders. Touchscreens in the PUD showing the parcels virtually moving along the belt synchronised with belt speed. Countdowns for each gate showing the time to the next parcel.
Problem it Solves: Until now the direct loaders/couriers  have to check every parcel passing them on the PUD belt to see if the parcel is for their route(s). Now they take a quick look at the screen next to the gate and immediately know how long until their next parcel + easily identify it on the belt when it arrives.
Benefits: Reduced stress on loaders/couriers, improved wellbeing, increased productivity, and increased sort quality. See ppt for additional details.

Title: Digital Daily Vehicle Check
Description: A web based app on the courier scanner allowing the courier to easily perform the daily vehicle check. Significant savings in time, paper and printing cost. The platform is scalable and can also be used for many other use cases.
Problem it Solves: Every day each courier must do a pre-departure vehicle check, filling out a printed form which is given to the supervisor before departure. This web app on the GCA scanner allows the courier to do it digitally, with significant savings in time, paper and printing cost. Follow up is also made easy.
Benefits: Saving time Saving paper Saving printer toner Saving cost EOS boost (digitalization of a very non-digital process)

Title: NCMT Report
Description: A browser-based, proactive data input tool/interface, in which employees can submit issues relevant to PUD and stemming from courier routes / service partners / overall pickup and delivery. Data would be stored in a server and used for analytical / performance dialog purposes.
Problem it Solves: Lack of integration and agglomeration of issue data in PUD, coming from several departments and shifts.
Benefits: A centralized overview of issues and obstacles is useful for: - PDs with couriers/teams/service partners - Service Partner Tenders - Analysis of trends, weaknesses and strengths  - A good basis for positive competition
Tags: analytics, courier, customerservice, dashboard, data, DataAnalytics, performance, performancedialog, powerbi, pudefficiency, servicequality
Members: christos mertiris, Ole Werner Sveen, Per Nilsen

Title: Flyer Sort (CZ)
Description: We have developed an application that can display AWB or PID based route code according to our local database.
Problem it Solves: Sorting flyer shipments requires employees with a strong knowledge of the GTW service area and the division of this area by individual courier routes. If the employee does not know the route of the shipment, he must take the shipment to the PC and find the appropriate route according to the address.
Benefits: We have achieved faster sorting of shipments and reduced errors.

Title: CONTACT
Description: CONTACT (Customer Onboarding – Nursering Tool And Contact Tracker) - tool for onboarding new clients, track contacts with clients, share information about clients with SVC employees, Customs, Ecom and couriers
Problem it Solves: Tool helps to keep information about clients from the first touch, through SVC, Customs, Ecom and provide details, so Sales could track how clients reacts for "special care" during first days of cooperation.
Benefits: Clients are more likely to use DHL Express again as they have superb feelings during whole process of sending from onboarding to sending the first shipment. Users has all information about new clients in one place, anyone can check if clients has been contacted in specific period of time.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: CUSTOMER's ONBOARDING TOOL
Description: Tool build on Microsoft Forms. Recomendations from SLS are implemented to the tool and it sends automatically: welcome mail to the Customer and email to other functions involved in onboarding process (OPS, Customs, MyDHL+ administrators). Every week we are raporting the flow of the process.
Problem it Solves: The tool limits manual work within the process. Before implementation it tooks 7,3 days per month to do the process now it tooks 2,03 days per month.
Benefits: Customer is better prepared to send first shipment and knows were to find help (in DHL) if he will have questions. Internally the information flow is faster and easier.
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, IT, Network Operations, Sales

Title: Special price calculator
Description: Advance invoice writing system will be updated with new tab for special price counting and all other steps involved. Agent counts special price part manually and part by system. after evaluating the process, it was decided to create a separate application for this purpose.
Problem it Solves: Quick special price counting, advance invoice writing and courier order updating.
Benefits: New tab will give opportunity work just on system and eliminates manual work for agents, so it will save time. Also these tool will help to offer better prices for cash customers.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: RPA of ManTra and e-mail notifications
Description: The ManTra tool transforms the long and inconvenient txt manifests that OCNT users can get from OCNT into neat and concise Excel spreadsheets.  These are then manually forwarded to appropriate OCNT users / Warehouse agents via e-mail. Therefore, we see the potential for the automation here.
Problem it Solves: OCNT reports are manually converted into a more structured form using the ManTra tool. Our aim is to automate several interconnected processes which currently have to be done manually. This would greatly increase time efficiency and reduce employees workload.
Benefits: Combining several processes into one that is automated would bring many benefits for our employees e.g. reduction of manual workload, increased time efficiency, etc. We will be happy to provide more details regarding this initiative.
Tags: automation, initiative, nmiv, ocnt, reporting, RPA

Title: LINO DDI
Description: LINO DDI – Decision support for tactical linehaul network optimization
Problem it Solves: Optimization of the DDI EU Network
Benefits: Cost savings on the DDI Linehaul

Title: Forecast -  IB/OB Courier Stops
Description: Predict the # of stops(inbound/outbound) the courier will need to make.
Problem it Solves: Allows service centres to plan their transport cycles effectively
Benefits: Service Quality & Better Staff and Resource Planning

Title: Profit Share Scheme
Description: This is the output of data set according to the supplied parameters.
Problem it Solves: Programming the data output for PSS calculation will make our work easier and save time.
Benefits: Ease of work, calculation, saving time.

Title: Lead Agent Chat
Description: To have chat available for lead agents to answer advisors questions. They would use the Digi platform available, if they need more support can go through to a lead agent on MCT to help support. Lead agents can handle more than 1 query at a time. Improving AHT and Customers experience.
Problem it Solves: Initiative will help advisors should they require support from lead agents to answer customers queries/questions. The advisor calls the lead agents but lead agents can only answer the 1call at a time. Chat would mean the lead agents can answer more queries at any given time reducing advisors AHT.
Benefits: Lower AHT improving on operational efficiency. Lead agents can handle more queries any any given time. Improved customer experience as quicker resolution less hold time. Less frustrations of advisors trying to get answers improving their experience.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Customer experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Optimization of document circulation
Description: Applications are registered and automatically submitted for implementation (external partner), an automatic notification to the employee is generated. Fast reporting. Limited number of hypothetical mistakes. No delays, including those related to absences
Problem it Solves: Optimization of document circulation; reduction of paper consumption; relieving the staff team Use of Microsoft tools: forms, power automate, sharepoint & email easy & user friendly solution
Benefits: improvement of service speed
Tags: employeeexperience, gogreen, hr, lesspapier, operationalefficiency, powerautomate

Title: HR - Incentive approvals automation
Description: Current approval process is sending emails back and forth. Aiming to integrate this to standard workflow, potentially in HR system or e.g. with O365 tools
Problem it Solves: Manual process for approving quarterly staff incentives. Consumes HR and Managers/Supervisors time.
Benefits: Saving time in automating process

Title: SMS4Delays
Description: We have developed an application that can display AWB based phone numbers, classify mobile nr. or land lines and send SMS messages in predefined templates.
Problem it Solves: Quick SMS notification of customers in case of unplanned delays in shipment delivery
Benefits: Improving service and reducing the number of calls​ in Call center (CS)

Title: CCG (CUSTOMS COORDINATING GROUP)
Description: THERE IS A GAP IN OUR BUSINESS WHEN WE HAVE ISSUES WITH CUSTOMS (PREDOMINATELY EUROPE) WHEREBY IT ISNT NECESSARILY TO DO WITH A SPECIFIC WAYBILL, UK FIELD SUPPORT ALWAYS ADVISE TO REACH OUT TO THE COUNTRY DIRECTLY. WE NEED A SMALL TEAM (LIKE COG) WHOM CAN FACILITATE SUCH REQS AND REACH OUT FOR US
Problem it Solves: THE GAP BETWEEN CUSTOMER SERVICE AND UK FIELD SUPPORT WHEREBY SALES HAVE TO GO TO EACH COUNTRY IN EU FOR ANSWERS FOR CUSTOMS QUERIES RATHER THAN A DEDICATED TEAM TO FACILITATE THIS FOR US
Benefits: LESS TIME WILL BE SPENT WITH DIVERSIONARY ACTIVITIES MORE TIME WITH SELLING, ALSO WILL INCREASE RESOLUTION TIME THUS INCREASING CUSTOMER CENTRICITY

Title: Expenses approval flow
Description: Having completed the migration of the Microsoft O365 solution within the company, we want to automate workflows in the finance department with the approval flows in MO365 with Power Automate. The application will be installed in the DHL O365 tenant with PowerShell scripts for installation.
Problem it Solves: The solution currently used is manual data entry. With this automated workflow we will save on average 4-5 working days per month.
Benefits: This solution will save hours of manual work and it will be easy to use for expenses we encounter every day

Title: HR medical leave automation
Description: The solution was to automate this process with Power Automate tool. The trigger is the subject of the mail that contains medical leave. After that the attachment will be save automatically in HR SharePoint in a specific folder with exact date and time when the email arrived.
Problem it Solves: Each month, a colleague had to check all incoming emails on a shared mailbox to download attachments from certain emails containing the subject of medical leave. This process took 3-4 hours and was very slow.
Benefits: Remove the time consuming in HR department for medical leave requests

Title: CFO deviation PT approval
Description: Having completed the migration of the Microsoft O365 solution in-house, we are automating the workflow for the finance department, which will streamline the CFO deadline approval process with Power Automate. The application is installed on Corina Vasilescu's O365 tenant and is live as of 16.02.2023
Problem it Solves: The solution before this automated flow was manual data entry and the most important problems that we eliminate are the time and paper consuming.
Benefits: This solution will save hours of manual work and it will be easy to use for request approvals that we encounter every day.

Title: AED register
Description: The system collects and stores expiration dates. Sends automatic notifications. Records a new expiration date upon receipt. freeing the process from the human factor
Problem it Solves: The AED battery expiration date needs to be checked and periodically reviewed (usually every 4 years). Such a long period may give rise to the risk of missing the check
Benefits: Reflecting employees in the process of creating and updating the registry. Automation of the process of reminders about the task to perform. Automation of mailing to the employee, supervisor and health and safety.
Tags: AED, effectivness, forms, healthsafety, hr, powerautomate

Title: Employees requests processing gest automated
Description: Employee is requested to feel specific form (forms) - this happens any  employee statement or request Information in gathered on sharepoint, attachements are being stored there as well E-mails are prepared based on the content of the forms and immediately to specific responders
Problem it Solves: Eliminates manual job - delivered by employes data are automatically: - being gathered,  - storaged in planned order, - in specific parts information is delivered via e-mail to specific people in order to make things happen
Benefits: Easy to fill in form,  confirmation of submitting the application, minimizing the risk of errors and mistakes reduction of manual work in a given process reducing delays caused by absences of envolved in particular process employyes
Tags: automatedemails, digitalhr, efficiency, forms, hr, powerautomate, quality, timeoptimization

Title: EOY Nominations+ Notifications
Description: Nominated employee gets automated notification about nomination with details as: - who has nominated the employee - what is the justification The link to the nomination form is also delivered, ds nominated employee can fill it in as well
Problem it Solves: Immediate information about nomination delivered to nominated employee  Ensuring that every employee knows about nomination and its reason Information is also delivered to nominated employee'e manager and it all goes without additional effort - power automates makes it happen
Benefits: We take care about employees engagement & satisfaction due to fast feedback information.  We deliver positive stimuli. Time saver -no manual work is needed. Reporting avaliable with "one click"
Tags: digitalhr, efficiency, engagement, EOY, hr, motivation, powerautomate

Title: Import Manifest
Description: This new initiative will give us extra quality and time for our employees. This will be integrated into LCA, we have DCC data down streaming to LCA + MS3 manifest file, and LCA will combine these data elements together and make import manifest based on CA needs.
Problem it Solves: Automated import manifest submission to customs authorities system (sys to sys).
Benefits: More efficient and better data quality.

Title: B2B Customer Contact
Description: Automated process picking up shipts from DCC based on status code & send a pre-arrival notif mail to Customer with the the additional info requires. If required the process will also gather additional documents from GIA and attach these to the email. Pls check Additional Information for more info.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort required to manually query DCC, send instruction mail to Customers and if required download ppwk in GIA.
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: MT Import Declaration
Description: Automate the drafting of Import Declaration in the Malta Customs Portal by receiving the information of the shipment via mail (TDID List) and querying some additional data in DCC. The DHL Agent will review the draft created by Bot, add some element not available in DCC and submit the Declaration.
Problem it Solves: In MT there is no EDI connection between the DHL applications and the website of Customs Authorities (CA) to which Import declarations must be submitted. RPA support the declaration process by the time a long term technical solution is implemented.
Benefits: Automating, FTE assigned to more added value tasks
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: FR Inbound Customs Release
Description: Automate, for France,  the release of shipments blocked in the warehouse inventory system CDS AS400 based on records extracted from DCE SRDS.  Please note this initiative is ad interim waiting for an interface [DCE to CDS] to be deployed in early 2023.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort required to release the shpt in CDS
Benefits: Automating, FTE assigned to more added value tasks
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Customer experience

Title: Update of Customs document type code in DCVS
Description: Automate the update of DCVS shpt having GB as destination. Users feed the Robot with template containing AWB & MRN. Robot will, via MQ queue, send a msg to update the shpt based on required action.   Pls Note this script will be update in 2023 for the Robot to update the shipment directly in DCVS.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort by an RPA solution to update the required info in DCVS.
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks

Title: Support VAT 22 - FR - End of Scan
Description: Automate the submission of a confirmation that the scanning process has finished to Customs authority. This submission is made from DSA [Unique ID of each movement] level and is submitted in DCE. The automation focus on specific shipment status and DCE queue.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort by an RPA solution to submit end of scan msg to Customs authority.
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks

Title: MT Import Manifest Registration
Description: Automate the Import Manifest Registration based on mails containing the Inbound shipment information part of DHL Flights landing in Malta, upload them in the Local Customs website, including a confirmation of the successful registration. Please check Additional Information for more information.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort by an RPA solution to trigger and bridge an existing automation created before (covering end 2 end process).
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks

Title: Billing CNDN Duty Maintenance
Description: Automate the extraction of shipment invoice information from GWEB 1.5 and use them to validate and maintain the shipment in either Oracle R12 or in IAS accordingly based on the logics that are supplied by the business.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort required to extract data from GWEB and upload them in R12 or IAS.
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks

Title: Billing Paperwork Upload to Alcatel
Description: Automation of the weekly process to upload invoices into the Alcatel portal.
Problem it Solves: Replace manual effort by an RPA solution  automating the load of invoices into the Alcatel portal.
Benefits: Automating, standard process, FTE assigned to more added value tasks

Title: ACA status change via LCA (GWAT)
Description: LCA (GWAT) will have integration with ACA status. With this, we will be able to work from one system for all processes.
Problem it Solves: Agents and supports will not need to submit statuses thru ACA system.
Benefits: More efficient work for agents and supports.

Title: H7 declaration data validation
Description: H7 declaration data validation before submitting final declaration will help to reduce declaration mistakes.
Problem it Solves: Compliance issue
Benefits: Compliance issue as we are AEO owners

Title: DCC export data integration in LCA (GWAT)
Description: With this initiative, we will be more efficient in export part, we will have one tool, where CMF will have, where export agent will be able to look for archive in digital way, where agent will be able to control shipment workflow for export brokers.
Problem it Solves: With this initiative, we will have more efficient in export process.
Benefits: Export process will be efficient, that will help us to provide better service for customers as with this initiative help, there will be much less export shipments left over to next day.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions

Title: LRN & MRN H7 declaration search in LCA
Description: Brokers submit H7 declarations with LCA option to Customs Authorities systems (sys to sys), when declaration is approved by CA, the declaration is saved in digital archive. in some cases customer or FIN asks for PDF copy of old declaration, so with this initiative help, it will be much easy to find.
Problem it Solves: With this initiative brokers will search for H7 declarations in LCA much easier.
Benefits: Efficiency for brokers.

Title: Digitalizing Customs Clearence Documents Flow
Description: A digital process flow have been established with existing EGAP tools or platforms like iShare with minimum coding approach -where coding have been used for document conversion/combination/ftp to Global Imaging Archive and automatic request creation on iShare
Problem it Solves: Recently util December 2020 individual shipments customs clearence teams was (TR CCCG team) working with printed documents which have been requried from customers through email, for their customs clearence whether it is a signed warrant from individual to DHL for clearence and proof of a shopping.
Benefits: The development done especially during  2020 Covid period , related teams were coming to office just only for this printing and handout these customs clearence documents.  Digitalisation help both employee experience and operational efficiency.

Title: IVR for Riga
Description: Currently there are multiple phone numbers for our customers and we would likr to consolidate multiple phone numbers and provide one number for our customers.
Problem it Solves: Single point of contact via phone for our customers
Benefits: Currently there are multiple phone numbers for our customers and we would likr to consolidate multiple phone numbers and provide one number for our customers.

Title: Digitization of ESU/ESI freight data processing
Description: A long time is spent loading data into the NMIV system after the end of the process.  To solve it we will make a browser plug-in that would be programmed with all the exceptions, and this plugin would also automatically enter the data in the appropriate fields via the NMIV DOM.
Problem it Solves: Speeding up the of ESU/ESI freight data processing. Removes steps for human error.
Benefits: This would save time on training new staff and make data entry fully automatic, so that a colleague who has quickly mastered manual data entry can return to the terminal to coordinate whether the load is being put on the right truck.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Customer experience

Title: Single Point of contact for customers
Description: Customers currently have 3 phone numbers how to reach DHL - customer service, customs and e-com specialist. Customers often use the wrong number. With the implementation of this solution, the customer has only one telephone number to call for all questions - Customer service.
Problem it Solves: Single point of contact is new idea, that helps our customers to reach DHL easier and faster, as well as reducing customer confusion, as there are currently 3 public telephone numbers available for contacting DHL.
Benefits: From customer perspective, DHL is easier and faster reachable, also one telephone number makes communication more understandable.

Title: Digital Vehicle Inspection Checks
Description: A fully digital app-based vehicle inspection process, that eliminates the manual paper checklists. The app is designed to connect each inspection with the proper follow-up person right away, ensuring that any issues or concerns are addressed in a timely manner.
Problem it Solves: The solution eliminates the need for manual, paper-based vehicle inspections by digitizing them, streamlining the workflow and saving time and archiving costs
Benefits: This digitized process can help to improve accuracy and reduce errors during the vehicle inspection checks while also saving time and resources. Additionally, the app can provide real-time updates and tracking, allowing stakeholders to stay informed throughout the inspection process.
Tags: AuditEfficiency, automation, digitalization, fleet, fleetmanagement, healthandsafety, mobileapp, operations, ops, opsprocesses, opsreporting, predeparturecheck, productivity, safety, safetyfirst, vehicleinspection, vehiclemanagement, vehicles

Title: EXP RO e-Factura legal requirement generation

Benefits: The solution saves on manual processing of required data in the Finance department.

Title: Importing data from CSV to third party web app
Description: Using Power Automate Desktop flow to scrape data from CSV and put those data into third party web application, minimizing time spent and eliminating unnecessary copy paste actions.
Problem it Solves: Some shipments are being handled by our third party associate. Customer care agents needs to transfer those shipments from DHL system into their system. With this initiative we are lowering manual data migration from CSV into third party app.

Title: Customs correction doc archiving

Title: Pre-Departure and Vehicle Checklist

Problem it Solves: Eliminates manual work and reduces company environmental impact . E.g. in HEL terminal alone 12800 sheets of paper and time consumed in pre departure checklists. Improved vehicle damage reporting to be invluded as well
Benefits: Eliminates manual work and reduces company environmental impact . Makes followup visible and easier to action when paperbased lists are removed.

Title: QEE - Report Data Automation

Gather data to single data mart and produce reporting using PowerBI. Also enable finance teams to automate data sources to CREST loading
Problem it Solves: Currently QEE reporintg is largely manual all the way from various vendor portals, including leasing companies, fuel companies, realestate heating and electricity poertals.
Benefits: Time and effort saved in automating manual and repetitive tasks. Reduction of errors and added visibility and timeliness of data.

Title: GOALS

Title: MyBill Customer Query Enhancements
Description: 1) Create split query code list e.g. to stop freight queries being logged with customs query codes. 2) Create drop down field for each invoice to allow selection of specific AWBs to query. 3) Create self-service portal to allow customers to update direct debit details/address/contact details etc.
Problem it Solves: Improve customer's opportunity to self-serve and provide DHL with more detailed information to reduce the amount of follow-up required when logging MyBill Queries. Presents the opportunity to automate certain processes, reduce customer contacts and improve customer experience and productivity.
Benefits: 1) Reduce daily manual validation effort that is completed on MyBill query uploads. 2) Removes free-type error and will direct agents to exact AWB's of concern, reduce need for further contact to confirm queried AWBs. 3) Reduce customer contacts for simple changes that could be automated.

Title: AR Statement Tool
Description: At present, the excel statement macro that is in use was created in-house some time ago. It will frequently crash, particularly for large accounts, or pull the data very slowly, meanwhile locking agents out of other excel files whilst it runs. A new, improved tool would help to resolve this.
Problem it Solves: Improve the efficiency and stability of the statement macro currently in use by the UK AR teams. Currently this is (relatively) slow and prone to crashing. A new, improved too would boost productivity and efficiency of the repetitive task.
Benefits: 1) Improve efficiency of the statement-running process. 2) Improve productivity by reducing the frequency of application crashes and locking out of excel while the macro runs. 3) The new tool would keep the same format so as to minimise the training impact, and impact on customers statement format.

Title: DCE to LCA
Description: XML files from DCE need to be converted/mapped according to local requirements to be  accepted by Local Customs Application.
Problem it Solves: Current XML files from DCE do not have correct tags or tag mapping to be accepted  by LCA. Declarants need to fill in every field for declarations in LCA.
Benefits: Customs declarants save time and do not need to create export declaration from scratch  in Local Customs Application.

Title: ECS/ICS report
Description: Automate report creation.
Problem it Solves: Saves time for creating report for local Customs application.
Benefits: Improves operational efficiency.

Title: REMOTE Automailer
Description: The automailer checks a combination of criteria, based on which it takes a series of actions. When certain criteria are met, it triggers an e-mail to the address we have on file in our customer database, attaches the relevant images from CIA and sets a series of codes we need for later steps.
Problem it Solves: Reaching out and notifying B2B customers and their brokers about the status of the clearance of their shipments or about missing documentation has been a manual and laborious task for many years.  Cases had to be handled one by one by our team members and required several steps.
Benefits: Customer: Speed - The automated solution works 24/7 and thus notifies customers in real-time. Employee: Less repetitive manual work. Reduced risk for errors Operational: Shipments cleared faster. Shorter transit time and less time in bonded warehouse
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Tags: cs, customerexperience, customerservice, customs, lej, RPA

Title: MyDHLUnity
Description: It provides an automated import and print of shipment data without manual interaction, by using MyDHL+ (and now also MyDHLAPI) as backend.  Furthermore it is capable to do an auto correction and validation of cust. data as well as checking and creating individual or standard mappings in MyDHL+.
Problem it Solves: Have you ever tried to use MyDHL+ in an automated workflow on customer side? This is nearly impossible, as there is no way to import and instantly print labels via MyDHL+. Certainly, MyDHL API can be used instead, but this requires developing/implementation effort on customer side.
Benefits: Automated Address Correction via MyDHL+ PLT & Customer Invoices (incl. CIN) IOR (account check) EDI compatible file mapping Phone number validation Mandatory shipment field check Instant label printing !!!Real-time Search (suggestions for each entered letter!)!!!

Title: LPR System at Security Entrance
Description: DHL employees with registered private and company cars, vans and trucks can enter secured area automatically, without security service SBS assistance or usage of ID cards. SBS guards can concentrate their focus fully on visitors. We can achieve more secure place to work and eliminate human mistakes.
Problem it Solves: DHL EXP SK is based next to the international airport BTS (Bratislava). Due this area is under enhanced security oversight. Each car entering this zone must be identified by the security service. Entry of registered DHL car/trucks will be accepted automatically with License Plate Recognition (LPR).
Benefits: Smooth entry of every registered company and private car to DHL secured zone and parking place as well. No queues front of the entry ramp, security guards focusing on legitimation of strangers and visitors only. Less stop/start/accelerating car operations also means a smaller carbon footprint.
Benefit Category: Operational efficiency, Employee experience, Customer experience
Tags: cctv, checkpoints, gogreen, greatplacetowork, safeplacetowork, security

Title: UK Duty Reclaims

Title: MyBill Ease of Part Payments

Problem it Solves: Improve the ease of making payments in MyBill for customers by enhancing the technical abilities of the tool to accommodate making payments when credits have been issued.
Benefits: 1) Allow customers to use credit notes/ payments, and make payment for part paid invoices through a singular digital tool, consolidating and simplifying the process. 2) Making it easier for customers to make non-standard payments, an issue frequently flagged in NPA.

Title: Utilising Push To Talk (PTT) technology.

Title: DG Acceptance training to external people

Benefits: 500-700€ per head for such a training + productivity to the local DG trainers

Title: NPA Tool Mobile App
Description: I have had some feedback from the sales team that something we can do to make their lives easier would be to get a mobile app for the NPA tool. This app would allow not only the sales team but staff in all functions to make and update NPA 2nd calls without the need to be sat at a laptop or PC.
Problem it Solves: Feedback from sales: Complications updating NPA 2nd calls whilst not near a PC. Some of our staff e.g. Account managers spend a lot of time on the road unable to access a PC, this can result in difficulties or delays updating 2nd calls which is resulting in a slightly lower 3 day attempt rate % KPI
Benefits: If we can make it easier to make and update 2nd calls, we improve the customer experience as they will likely receive calls sooner increasing the 3 day KPI and we make things easier for our staff as they don't have to worry about when they can update the tool even if they have made the 2nd call.

Title: Spot Rate Quote Consolidation
Description: Single, comparable spot Rate quote based on GRE and GSRT rates, with Dims entered only once.
Problem it Solves: Reduce Sales double entry into GRE (customer rates) and GSRT (heavier weight shipments) to generate a single comparable Spot Rate Quote including all surcharges side-by-side.  Also, GSRT does not include surcharges so these have to be calculated manually.
Benefits: This will reduce double entry (account, IATA codes, Product costs, weight & dims per piece) for anyone in the sales department creating and comparing spot rates, from Account Managers, TSE’s, SAS and Sales Support. For a quote with 50 pieces  it takes ~ an hour longer to enter into both tools.
Members: James Delaney, Jo Mears, Suneal Gill, Toni BERRY

Benefits: Minimize human error Save time in raising individual tickets Streamline onboarding process Boost productivity of new starters by ensuring all relevant applications are available to them from the off Reduced individual IT ticket volumes

Title: Keys Locked in vehicle
Description: Yesterday this would have saved two hours for someone to drive with the keys to vehicle. Saved on fuel it would also benefit the customer as the courier would get going again quicker. The technology does exist as you can lock unlock a BMW from an app remotely.
Problem it Solves: Had a courier lock his keys in his van yesterday (it happens a lot) someone from the SVC has to run the keys to unlock the vehicle so the courier can carry on. Would it not be easier for a manager/Ops manager to unlock the cab remotely?
Benefits: Driver back on the road quicker which is better for customer  saves money and increases productivity

Title: App Predepart
Description: New Android application called PreDepart to detect, through PID / AWB reading, that the PID has been loaded by the Courier using checkpoint LV and WC (Control performed towards Genesys subsctiption database).  It provides than a full report of the scanned pieces to manage Security ISO respect
Problem it Solves: The goal is to eliminate the manual control activities from the loading list (delivery) and physical control of what is loaded by the Courier , allowing a check in real time without using lists between the pid that occurs and the one that appears to be loaded.
Benefits: Online check of the parcel load by Courier. Reduction to zero of missort/robbery of shipments. Full compliance with security ISO requirements

Title: Safe, CLean and Green

Title: Body Worn Surveillance
Description: The only cons I can think of is the privacy and cost implications. However, it would decrease claims/disputes made against the company as we could look back to point of delivery but also increase safety of courier and freight. Could also use for training new staff, good/bad examples of service.
Problem it Solves: In modern day we see these being worn in retail/security more and more. Improved customer service - helps with claims/disputes. Helps prevents violence/verbal abuse towards courier - can be used as evidence if an assault does occur. Can also be used as training material for CIS induction.
Benefits: See above.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: DHK Electronic TechLog
Description: A tech log page (TLP) must be completed for every flight as a legal record of an aircraft's technical status and journey. Traditional TLPs generate a lot of paper, which had to be physically sent to head office or a station and information from them manually entered into the airline's CAMO systems.
Problem it Solves: The electronic Tech Log reduces the amount of paper on the flight deck; it removes the physical processes of sending and storing log pages and provides a interface between aircraft and TRAX ensuring reliable and real-time data.
Benefits: Automated data transfer into TRAX. Leverage of existing infrastructure and deployment at sister airline, DHX, to minimise implementation costs. Digitalization of the flight deck. Reduction in paper in the flight deck. Cost of implementation absorbed within other TRAX upgrade projects.
Benefit Category: Operational efficiency, Employee experience, Customer experience
Members: Ben Gill, Dale Verrall, Jasbir Singh, Richard Brew, Tommy Britton

Title: BPAY Process

Problem it Solves: Manually creating report for the purpose of  booking - payment to supplier from previous day.

Title: Using Speech Synthesis for IVR prompts

Benefits: Additions and changes to the IVR can be made quickly. This allows us to change the IVR in response to customer feedback and it allows us to incorporate new features quickly.

Title: Indoor Localization

Title: Predictive Analytics Lead Generation
Description: In DE we are using DnB and DUNS numbers, so we have combined SIC, DUNS and Acc no to create a DHLE DE customer with that data. Now we've created an algorithm on DnB side which shows us unknown customer with a look-a-like of 70/80/90%+ to our existing customers. Beta-Testing mode currently.
Problem it Solves: Generating Sales leads is always challenging and with a lot of effort. Would be much easier to have databases of all customers in a economy and then only pick those customers which are most likely Express Customers.
Benefits: Call only customer which should be in scope and Sales employees can convert more leads into customers.

Title: CO2 Condition Monitoring
Description: Together with IoT Team from Corporate Development we have installed 23 CO2 tracker in the office to ensure that the CO2 condition is monitored. People can scan the QR Code and look real-time the CO2 condition in the office so that they have the visibility of the potential risk.
Problem it Solves: After Corona and with regards to New Work we need to safeguard working in Offices when the employees are coming back to the office.
Benefits: Safe workplaces, employee's trust, dashboard central monitoring and alert functionality, cheap installation

Title: Cage Tracking  -DHL Express Italy
Description: Assemblee asset tracker to all cages and use the DP DHL IoT Frontend to locate number, posistion and status of cages. Pilot phase completed in February 2022. As at today (September 2022) roll out is almost completed; more than 1000 cages already equipped with IoT device.
Problem it Solves: Roller Cages are used Daily at DHL Express Italy to move shipments between service centers and thus have no fixed position. This solution will enable cages tracing and control, avoiding loss and allowing a better control on the necessities to be covered and the amount of cages to be eventually buy
Benefits: Cages can be located and reported on daily bases - Rebalancing can be planned "real time" and therefore costs for Adhoc - trucks can be reduced - life span of cages is visible and purchasing a new cages can be planned in time
Members: Giovanni GORNI, Marco FERIOLI, Suraj Guha, Tina Ziemek

Title: GEMBA Walk in TEAMS
Description: Using SharePoint Lists and some Flows we created a solution that can be easily viewed and worked with in MS TEAMS - also on mobile phones and tablets. Incl. functions: Plan GEMBA Walk in a calendar, automatic Outlook appointment creation, enter observations and assign via email and Excel reporting.
Problem it Solves: GEMBA Walks need to be planed and employees should be informed about and be able to join them.  Improvement actions that results from GEMBA Walks need to be documented and followed up for easy implementation and for everybody to see and learn from them. Title: GCCR - JSON file generator
Description: JSON format is something new, historically we've sent pipelined text files or XML. The solution is based on MSSQL TSQL "FOR JSON PATH" code that can be fully reusable to the ad-hoc country mappings against the LCAs for clearance, based on variables and/or temporary extractions, and POSH calls.
Problem it Solves: GCCR stands for Global Customer Clearance Reporting including all types of declarations, not just formals. It is expected for the non-EGAP countries to come up with a standard message format to be sent to the global platform via jMQi mechanism. The challenge is the message new format based on JSON.
Benefits: get rid of JSON generation complexity and just be focused on the country mapping. TSQL code and techniques are fully reusable by anyone he/she is interested to

Title: Techlog Classification and ATA Chapter Re-Coding
Description: Step 1: Identify the original defects among all techlog entries Step 2: ATA codes need to be reviewed because roughly 40-50% of defects are reported with incorrect ATA codes.

Benefits: The solution is supposed to automate the current manual classification and recoding practice performed by Engineering Reliability staff. An increase in accuracy is not expected, instead we strive for a noticeable decrease in time spend for recoding (from 8-10 hour to 2-4 hours per week).

Title: Predictive Maintenance LACS with AWS Ranger
Description: The AWS Ranger is a sensor package with video and thermal camera. It generates data and a video stream during traveling in our LACS ((Large Automated Conveying System)  system. Afterwards the data will be processed in the cloud  and identifies issues for maintenance/repair work.
Problem it Solves: Our LACS system is very long and we need to operate regular maintenance checks of the conveying components. The AWS ranger will minimize these walks and enables a continuously monitoring for the classic maintenance "see and feel" checks. Furthermore it gives an early indication for repair work.
Benefits: Early warning of possible technical issues to avoid breakdowns during Operations, Saving of planned maintenance hours of the LACS system

Title: Customer Account Update

Problem it Solves: Automation of manual work
Benefits: Automating mundane/repetitive tasks from our people to free up time for more demanding tasks

Benefits: On-line, quicker and easier to liaise with managers on their appraisals.

Title: Digitalisation GPI Mailing
Description: Customers are informed via email with their new ratecards and more information attached.  This saves costs (no external supplier, no courier stops, no packaging material, no paper and printing costs) and time (30h to prepare the shipments). It also improves the customer experience and transparency.
Problem it Solves: Until this year our customers receive their new ratecards in printed form, packed in an DHL envelope, delivered with our courier during peak season. In this process we were supported by an external supplier. The whole process is manual, time and cost consuming and not state of the art.
Benefits: Big boost in effiency for Pricing and reduced costs and workload in Operations.

Title: Customer customs declaration portal
Description: We need to look in to the possibilities to develop a portal where customers can access all of their customs declaration and customs paperwork digitally without having to contact DHL Express for copies. We need to have awb, vat number, invoice number and "ekspedisjons- og løpnenr" as search options.
Problem it Solves: DHL Express NO stopped sending copies of customs declaration per post in Q4 2021, which led to an increased number of requests for copies per email. We have tried to register as many customers as possible to receive copies per email, but we still receive an average of +1000 request every month.
Benefits: Customers will be able to provide their customs declarations whenever needed for accounting purposes etc. DHL Express will have a decrease in number of request from customers needing copies of customs declarations and customs documents.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Operational efficiency, Employee experience

Title: MyDHL+ Mailing Tool
Description: The MyDHL+ Mailing Web engine offers automated checks based on GEMS, Phone, Countries, Currency, Incoterms, Export Reasons, Document Type and many other predefined rules. Once the data is autocorrected, a ready to upload MyDHL+ file is generated!
Problem it Solves: MyDHL+ Mailing Web engine checks, corrects and enhance customers’ bulk mailing requests prior loading them into MyDHL+. This data quality step leads to faster and smoother uploads.
Benefits: Customer mailing tend to be a higher revenue service we can offer. So the more we can do and do with highest quality, the better for our us and our Customers. Instead of taking 5 days to complete a large customer mailing, we can finish in normally within 1 day.

Title: OCR domestic stamps address capture
Description: Create a solution whereby we can take a picture of the consignee address on the domestic parcel, convert the hand-written or typed address image into text characters and load this data into Genesis.  This will enable Switzerland to deploy the latest geo-coding solutions including GCA, ADM2, DISCO.
Problem it Solves: Currently we receive between 10K-15K domestic shipments per day where the consignee address is not captured in a system. In order to enable future EGAP tools, we need to capture the consignee address.
Benefits: The Swiss domestic product is well appreciated by Customers (particularly those also with International shipments) and generates very good revenue. In order to enable EGAP deployments, domestic consignee addresses need to be captured systemically.

Title: Promote Digitalization in Country

Benefits: Great ideas come from the Employees and we want to encourage Employees to bring these forward.  We have a very good Country EOS score on Digitalization (92) and its important to maintain this by providing fresh practical information and examples to our Employees.

Title: System Reliability Engineering for LCAs

Problem it Solves: Secure a maximum up-time for our local import and export Customs applications including how we proactively detect issues and solve them as fast as possible.
Benefits: IT monitoring:  sFTP, process up time, performances, processes’ health. Data transfer bottleneck between applications, Customs response time, In/out-bound message volumes, any metrics not covered by OVO / OBM.  Business monitoring: Customs declarations status/volume, Customs systems response time..

Includes removing GCA application and legacy SOTI installation, replacing with SOTI Mobi Control cloud software and DHL24 App.
Problem it Solves: Avoid cost of 400 new Samsung mobile phones at DHL Express Service Point Partners, provide more efficient technical support from our eCom Help Desk as well as enable secure and regular deployment of the DHL24 App and Android operating system upgrades.
Benefits: Avoid cost of 400 new mobile devices at our Service Point Partners by reusing older courier scanners.

Benefits: Improve visibility of couriers to the customers, possibility for the couriers to contact the customer, improve delivery rate on route

Description: Dedicated agent performs following manual actions on daily basis: 1) Download inbound shipments from Advance web service. 2) From the list of all IB shipments they filter only B2C shipments. 3) Prepares csv file for manual upload to ODD. 4) Makes manual bulk upload through ODD UI.
Problem it Solves: Currently there are 3 countries (CZ, PL, HR) performing manual daily ODD bulk upload process. The purpose of this process is to absorb into ODD the B2C shipments (shipments to be delivered to private individuals) which wouldn't be absorbed through any other standard channel.

Problem it Solves: With this RPA we avoid the high cost in FTEs that the current process (manual) has and we generate the capacity to dispatch all shipments on the same day, facilitating the viability of this business model.
