Title: EE Tax and Customs & SUN automatic reconciliation
Description: EE Finance department has to download multiple Excel files and import data to single Excel sheet and then compare the data.
Problem it Solves: Estonian Tax and Customs Board department (ETCB) is operating with fully electronical  invoices and declaration.  This initiative will help us to reduce manual work that is currently needed to get data from ETCB site and SUN and format so that we could check reconsolidate both.
Benefits: reduce manual work at least 80 man hours per month and reduces mistakes.

Title: Agreements Archive
Description: Stores in GIA digital documents belonging to suppliers, which need to be stored according to different levels of confidentiality. Browser based.
Problem it Solves: Safe archive of agreements from suppliers in GIA
Benefits: Safe storage of documents and retrieval of data sent in the naming of the files (eg. start/end of agreements, name of supplier, vat#, etc).

Title: post clearance charges automation
Description: Post clearance charges cannot be processed the same way as standard clearance charges in ODB. It requires manual preparation, sending to the billing, filling gweb for further process
Problem it Solves: Manual process of post clearance charges in ODB
Benefits: avoiding manual work

Title: WCC: Optimalisation Keywords SEA/SEO
Description: Through an automatic monthly report on both the CLICK and the WALK accounts from C360 reporting, we can more easily cross-reference the combination of items sent to certain destinations and therefore bring up less obvious keyword combinations.
Problem it Solves: Expensive generic keywords in Google SEA (Search Engine Advertising)
Benefits: This allows us to purchase less expensive keywords - because they are very specific - and to use the same SEA budget for more keywords. By targeting keywords based on the needs of customers, the ROI of the SEA budget is also higher.

Title: Debt Collection customs automation
Description: Finance OTC team sends regular upon occurrence (depending if any cases) list of stop trade or bankrupt customers to Customs CMF administrator, who enters the block status in customs system – DCC.
Problem it Solves: digitalization of manual work
Benefits: better productivity, avoiding manual work
Members: Martin Janiczek, Pavel Bittner, Tomas Burian

Title: Automating Trustpilot invitations
Description: The solution is a simple excel-based application that loads NPA data, applies rules and filtering to decide which customers should receive an invitation and then calls the Trustpilot API to send the invitations to the customers.
Problem it Solves: Trustpilot is a well-known review site in Denmark, and we use it as a source of Voice-of-customer. Previously, inviting customers to leave a review was a very manual process.
Benefits: The largest benefit is time-saving - roughly 30 minutes per time that invitations should be sent.

Title: NPA analysis for ChatBot
Description: We do not have a specific NPA apporach for the ChatBot and we want to develop this approach for uour chatbot: voice of customer and csutomers callback to evaluation satisaction & experience
Problem it Solves: NPA missing for Chabot
Benefits: customer experience & satisfaction, quality & NPA approach, voice of customer feedback
Members: Christelle MECKLER, Patrick Goeuriot, Thierry KAUFFMANN

Title: HR Head Count accounting automation.
Description: HR have to keep/report Head Counts and FTEs monthly dynamics trends in Sun Accounts. Having no centralized global tools for PAYROLL to update this statistics in corporate ledger for UA, they have to do complex manual calculations in Excel to meet DPDHL standards for HC/FTE accounting.
Problem it Solves: Automate laborious monthly manual data processing/reporting in corporate ledger Sun Accounts
Benefits: Reduction of manual data handling HR/FIN Data quality

Title: SATS Automated User Access Management (SATS AUAM)
Description: To implement an automated solution for the current manual User Account Management (UAM) process for handling SATS application access requests  (Add/Modify/Delete) across EU - improving efficiency of one of the  EU RACC team's common daily routine tasks & to promote digitalization within dept.
Problem it Solves: The SATS AUAM tool will provide more time efficient to free up staff and have them focus on more 'value-add' or critical activities for the business.  Currently, the EU RACC handles on avg. ~150 requests per month @ 15 mins. per transaction. This man effort time is automated now via this initiative.
Benefits: The business user will have more immediate or faster solution to their request regarding SATS T1 application access management (create/delete/modify).
Benefit Category: Operational efficiency, Employee experience, Customer experience

Title: Digitalization of HR form
Description: Návrh : neměl být problém sdílet stejná data  mezi nabídkou a nástupem, dále provést celou řadu automatizací pro komfortní vyplnění
Problem it Solves: Digitalizace HR formulářů - doplnění údaju jako cost center, pracovní úvazek.
Benefits: Digitalizace - omezení chyb lidského faktoru

Title: Digitalize Leavers Check list
Description: We (HR) would like to request an online surface where HR or leaders can add the leaver, and relevant function could confirm in the system if the leaver has any debt or not.
Problem it Solves: In case of leaver, some functions need to confirm if the leaver has any debt towards to DHL or not (finance, IT, HR, security etc.) Now it is handled either via email or paper format (since COVID) or the combination of the two, which is not really user friendly and efficient.
Benefits: With this all of the information would be stored in one place.
Members: Greta Dira, Szilard Stahl, Szilvia Luby

Title: Extra mile digitalization
Description: Implement an online surface for Extra Miles nominations, which could be available to all employees and set up an approval workflow (similar as the recruitment request portal for CEU)
Problem it Solves: We would like to simplify the Extra Mile nomination's process. Currently the nominations are sent via email to HR, and we need to collect all of the approval for the nominations.
Benefits: With this online tool the whole process would more efficient.
Members: Greta Dira, Szilard Stahl, Szilvia Luby

Title: The Knowledge
Description: Implement a digital knowledge tool that is available cross platform enabling UK Sales to search, access and share information with their customers at a click of a button 24/7. The application would enable Sales to respond to customer queries faster by enabling them self serve with confidence.
Problem it Solves: UK Sales often contact the Product Management Team for the latest information on DHL Services, Optional Services, Surcharges, Customs Services and the Competition. UK Sales do not have the time to search for this information as it can be held on several sources which is time consuming for them.
Benefits: The Knowledge is a single platform which would contain the latest information that the UK Sales Team can access 24/7.  Responding to customer queries with speed and accuracy enables DHL to have a competitive advantage vs. UPS and FedEx as a Certified International Specialist.

Title: DesktopTool
Description: the desktop tool was created to have all the internal files updated and to be found faster divided per department.
Problem it Solves: internal, personal file to be found fast and updated.
Benefits: Employee experience: needed files, tools or other information always available

Title: Key Account  LIVE CHAT - MCT
Description: Adding the live chat for Key Account Desk. each customer receive a link where can be connected to the responsible Key Account Agent and do a live chat instead of call.
Problem it Solves: contact service availability, greater service
Benefits: Customer experience: faster communication possibility

Title: LIVE CHAT - MCT
Description: LIVE CHAT (connected to MCT) is linked to our DHL.COM page. if the customer asks to contact the customer service it will be redirected to the live chat. the customer can chat with a CS agent, for example during lunchtime, saving phone costs. Live Chat is a service improvement in a technology world.
Problem it Solves: Reducing call for fast information, Improve service for customer.
Benefits: Customer experience: different services, contact possibility during lunchtime or other activities Employee experience:

Title: 24/7 Proactive Customer Contact - CCCG (customs)
Description: with the implementation of the 24/7 IVR Tracking system in the CCCG GTW department, the customers can call outside business hours and holidays. the next working day, the agent will extract the report, check with the WB the request, and contact actively the customer.
Problem it Solves: reducing calls during business hours, customer should not recall saving money, time
Benefits: Customer experience: Great active Service, don't need to recall Employee experience: No nervous customer Operantional efficiency: reduced incoming call during woking hours
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: RPA MCT to GEMA
Description: This RPA, MCT to GEMA, will compare the Subject of the Email in MCT, containing the WayBill and check in GEMA and create a new activity in GEMA adding the email.
Problem it Solves: Adding received/sent emails from/to customer manually into GEMA.
Benefits: Employee experience: saving time no manual copy/paste Operational efficiency: the agent can focus to work more email and traces.

Title: 24/7 IVR
Description: Opening the IVR for ODD and Tracking, the customers can call us during Out Of Hours or Holidays. they can organize new redelivery in ODD by phone. The customer can also track a shipment and if the shipment was delivered, can check who signed or where it was left the shipment.
Problem it Solves: Reducing calls during business hours concerning redelivery and tracking calls.
Benefits: With this initiative you can improve:  Customer experience, Employee experience, and Operational efficiency - reducing calls during business hours and nervous customer - customer can call in every time from everywhere - agents can focus on customers with a specific request
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Total Reward Statement automation and alignment
Description: All employees will receive an overview of their annual total compensation on annual bases. This will support DHL Express CEU in employee engagment and  increase transparency and awareness  in Compensation topic.
Problem it Solves: Currently Total Reward Statement is not provided only in few CEU countries.  It is being done manualy and with no alignment. Automated aligned solution will increase HR efficiency and possibility to implement it accross CEU.
Benefits: HR efficiency * decrease of manual repetitive work * prevention of mistakes * save of time Employee experience: * better visibility of reward for work * better accesibility for all involved * better perception of DHL Express as employer  - GPTW for all support
Countries: Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Iceland, Latvia, Lithuania, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Finance, General Management, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: Speech Text Recognition
Description: By using a new functionality available in 0365, once the backline agent has finished the conversation with the customer, the conversation can be translated into words and then pasted to GEMA.
Problem it Solves: It allows to reduce the transcription time of a telephone call, avoiding manual introduction of the information into GEMA.
Benefits: Reduces the writing time needed to update a Gema request after a call with the customer. Improves the employee experience  and operational  by increasing the productivity of the backline agent.
Members: Sandra Jeniffer Garcia Cruz, Yolanda Tomas

Title: Leads Integration in Comet
Description: A task has been programmed and automated to upload the files created externally several times a day  to Comet system.
Problem it Solves: The Upload of the leads files created externally from a provider with their own system had to be uploaded to Comet system manually several times a day.
Benefits: The new system saves valuable time to the sales assistant that uploaded the info previously. This time can be used in making much more productive tasks. The leads also be uploaded  24/7 at anytime.
Members: Jacinto TOSTADO, Juan MATIAS, Lorena APARICIO CUBERO

Title: Automation processing of bank receipts
Description: Feature automates receiving daily bank documents with client payments in CSV format, parsing them, creating data structures to allocate transaction details and upload it into SUN 5.0 using Sun System Connect API
Problem it Solves: Fully automate processing of bank receipts and loading into SUN ledger
Benefits: Saves around 4 FTE who otherwise would process them manually

Title: Act of IB re-weight automation for B2C
Description: To avoid manual work and typos a semi-automatic process app was introduced since Dec 2021. An additional functionality has been added to the existing KZ RW app to speed-up the process of the Customs Clearance for B2C Customers.
Problem it Solves: Import department has to fill a legal document of shipment weight confirmation (based on IB RW) for the Customs authorities.  The initiative solves the problem of manual work and low speed of manual paperwork preparation.
Benefits: 1)  speed-up the process of the Customs Clearance (B2C) overall and particularly the process of paperwork preparation. 2) Customs Agents can quickly print the legal Act of RW to a printer or PDF by entering AWB number.  3) Legal compliance
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Customer experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Apple X12 EDI integration
Description: Integrating local clearance application with Apple to automatically process XML 810 commercial invoice data and reply with EDI X12 214CB in native format.
Problem it Solves: Manual message handling/exchange when clearing Apple import shipment
Benefits: Data processing efficiency
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Andrii Snikhovskyi, Olexandr Andryuschenko, Pavel Becko, Yuri Poltavsky

Title: Delivery Invoice for Cash Shipments
Description: Generation of an invoice for Inbound Cash Customers when payment is not done through ADC and VAT and Customs fee needs to be collected
Problem it Solves: Avoids a very manual and costly process for low unit cost
Benefits: Operational efficiency through digitalization of the process

Title: claims process improvment to DIGITAL
Description: claims process auto. & improv. to DIGITALIZATION selfservices for Cust Initiative has been submitted by France in April 2021 into Jazz team Express Business Change Request We need support from Global - FR Initiative with GLOBAL BENEFITS Keeping also current FR process with autoGEMA recogClaims & MCT
Problem it Solves: 1.no claims tracking dashboard available online for our Custs asking a lot,  our Key Account Custs (€, statut, decision..) 2. no attachments can be submitted online in Claims Form impacting Customer experience and CS KPI 4. Bulks submit 3.  auto CPB should be 3.5h-2h 4.Competition online dashboard
Benefits: CS & Sales benefits and customer experience improvment BtoB& BtoC satisfaction (eg. Key account Custs expectation : Back Market...) Time saving & efficiency FR Initiative with GLOBAL BENEFITS for all of Sales & CS departments for all of countries Customer selfservice from MyDHL+ and Customer Satisf
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Catherine Despinoy, David Richards, Patrick Goeuriot, Thierry KAUFFMANN

Title: KART3 deployment to all of the Customers
Description: We deployed KART3 as we were pilot so promoting this very great tool for our Key accounts Customers, We would like to open it to all of our Customers (perf report, incidences comments, chat with advisor...)
Problem it Solves: Get visibility to all of the Customers on perf reports, explanations comments...
Benefits: Customer satisfaction, experience improvment, CS improvments and decreasing of calls

Title: AutomateDataEntry in LRT (ADLRT)
Description: Capture hours in the specific work areas more accurately each day and be able to compare it to standard rates. The captured hours can be automatically uploaded into LRT to eliminate the manual data entry process and reduce inefficiences.
Problem it Solves: Inaccurate Data entry
Benefits: More accurate hours in LRT Plan staffing requirements based on the accurate hours captured OCPM reduction (possibly)
Members: David Ellingson, Maarten GOVAERTS, Mikael Ryberg

Title: KPI Dashboard Same Day
Description: Same Day needs a dashboard based on real-time data and connectivity to current systems (Supply Stack, Globuss). The dashboard should show developments at an early stage (leading and lagging indicator). It serves as a tool for controlling and evaluating the strategic and operational measures.
Problem it Solves: Lack of transparency and forecasting possibilities in the Same Day department require the conception of a new dashboard that enables both product-related key figures and customer developments. Data on revenue, margin, gross profit are available with a delay only after the end of the month.
Benefits: With the introduction of the dashboard, we have daily updated data that shows us developments at an early stage. At the same time, the dashboard enables us to perform deeper customer analysis to uncover trends and insights and provide sales with relevant same-day data.

Title: Knowledge Management in Customer Services
Description: The solution is a repository for everything a CS would need to know. Editors add information on a regular basis. The system can remind agents if there is some information that they have not reviewed recently, and the systems reminds the editors to update pages that haven't been updated in a while.
Problem it Solves: There is a lot of knowledge a Customer Service agent needs access to, in order  to advise our customers on the many different questions that come in. Without an effective knowledge management system, our CS agents will struggle to be Knowledgeable, Polite and Helpful!
Benefits: Our CS agents have an easy and effective way to access the information they need and to keep themselves up to date. That is beneficial for our agents, and for our customers who can get the help they need.

Title: Formal Clearance Detection Robot
Description: We developed an in-house solution to detect any outbound shipment which have declared value greater than 15kEUR or weight greater than 300kg. Our robot then generates SU01 to hold these shipments.
Problem it Solves: Customs Authorities of Turkey requires to hold any OB shipment that have declared value greater than 15kEUR or weight greater than 300kg. Users sometimes might miss out to hold these kind of shipments which results monetary fines for DHL. Our robots detects these shipments and hold them instantly.
Benefits: Primarily Improves operational efficiency.  - no more monetary fines. - Compliance with local Customs authorities.

Title: Meeting room booking screens
Description: Mount booking screens outside meeting rooms, showing availability, and where you need to confirm that the meeting has started as you enter the room. If not confirmed within first 15 minutes, meeting room booking is cancelled.
Problem it Solves: There are a limited amount of meeting rooms. Often meeting rooms are booked in the system, but are not actually in use because the meeting has been made digital instead - without changing meeting room booking.
Benefits: Maximize utilization of meeting rooms
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, General Management, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing, Sales

Title: Daily Country Dashboard
Description: Daily Country Dashboard puts together main KPIs chosen for illustrating daily performances in OPS, CS, Customs and MXP-HUB. Developed in PowerBI it is also accessible via mobile devices.
Problem it Solves: the key indicators from four organisational departments in a single Dashboard - no more need for consulting multiple emails and offline flows in order to get a general Country overview - userfriendly interface  - possibility to consult from mobile devices - easy and fast way for reporting issues
Benefits: rapid access to main KPIs - substitutes mails and offline flows - easy to use and share
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Hubs & Gateways, Network Operations
Tags: crossfunctional, customerservice, customs, daily, dashboard, kpi, mybi, operations

Title: Electronic Document Management System
Description: This cloud-based EDMS solution provides lawful means for remote legal paper signing by DHL employees such as internal policies, procedures, etc. And gives additional control over the papers' signing processes.
Problem it Solves: to replace the manual process of signing documents internal policies, procedures or other legal changes by every employee and control the signing, notifying process.
Benefits: Time and financial savings due to decreased paper handling. It makes communication between the employer and employees easier. Documents are signed electronically with a certified e-signature and stored in e-Archive.
Tags: documentarchiving, documenthandling, employeecompliance, employeeengagement, employeeexperience, hr

Title: Parcel Lockers
Description: Find a supplier who will provide DHL with fully scalable modular parcel lockers, software to control these lockers and API for the integration between DHL and Lockers.
Problem it Solves: DHL customers do not want to wait for a courier or to go to SP, because courier intervals are not very customer-centric and the number of SP is too small to meet customers needs.
Benefits: Increase DHL network, meeting customer expectations.

Title: Packman pick and pack solution
Description: Packman is a modern web-based solution leveraged by Microsoft application and database servers and is used in pair with EGAP solutions ( XMLPI, DCG, ELP). Packman support manual file upload, integration with client's systems, per-box label printing with optional Client’s barcode support.
Problem it Solves: It takes a lot of time to manually create a huge number of shipments >1000 and bookings for the next day if the customer(s) refuses to do it themselves using standard ESS tools for one or another reason. Especially if it includes complex sorting techniques and printing additional ppwk.
Benefits: Automatic shipment, booking preparation allows us to win customers, reduce the number of FTE for the shipment preparation projects and save time for the different departments that take part in this process.
Tags: customerexperience, efficency, operations, ops, performance, pickupbooking, sales, shipmentprocess

Title: Smartflow-system  automating approval processes
Description: This web-based tool is used in pair with EGAP as a pre-step enhancing existing solutions. Adjustable settings allow to use org structure, purchase amount, cost center, business function owner and 20+ other parameters as a criteria that defines approval algorithm.
Problem it Solves: Replaces overkilling manual process when something (e.g. a purchase or an employee replacement) is approved by lots of stakeholders over e-mails with sophisticated software.
Benefits: Huge cost and time saver. Makes an approval process more transparent and controllable.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, General Management, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Others, Pricing, Sales
Tags: approval, approve, coordination, efficiency, purchase, workflow

Title: Fiscal invoice for CASH at pick up or delivery
Description: As per new law DHL must give a fiscal invoice to the customer at the moment of PU or delivery. Invoice issued from DHL is automatically validated from Tax System through a tool in between DHL and Tax system that is provided from an authorized local provider.
Problem it Solves: Ensures compliance to new Tax regulation.
Benefits: Alignment with legislation

Title: DHL4U
Description: Private Consignees are selected in the data cleansing / classification process where all permissions or documents are not held by DHL. A link is sent prior to arrival where data can be entered, agreement "ticked" , or support documents uploaded, that are then assigned to clearance teams.
Problem it Solves: Collects data (and documents) from private individuals needed to perform import Customs Clearance. it allows CNEEs to register submit their EORI # and provide DHL clearance Authorization (POA) prior to shipment arrival.
Benefits: Customers are pro actively contacted avoiding lengthy customs delays. Customs teams avoid contacting private individuals by telephone or email to collect needed information

Title: RPA Query Handling File Creation
Description: With the new iShare platform the data from the local customs application is automatically inserted. Automated reporting and live dashboard also helps to increase effiency. Cases can be handled with priority through better visibility.
Problem it Solves: Our CCCG department manually logs customers’ complaints in a MS access database. They grab data from the local customs systems to create one case in the database. That takes up to 3 mins because the system is very slow and due to the manual work it is an errorprone process.
Benefits: Reduced time to log a case from 3 to 1 min->Ø 50 cases/day = 100 min time savings/day  - PD Reporting integrated & automated -> 30-40 min time savings/day  - Time savings of 25 min/m for the monthly reporting
Members: Beatrix PETERMANN, Joao Goncalves, Nenad MARKOVIC

Title: Optimization  T1 process
Description: The list is now automatically populated on an iShare, where the SVCs automatically receive an email as soon as there is a shipment for their area. They enter the status, every time they get new information about a T1 shipment and log it on the iShare, where it is already consolidated and therefore s
Problem it Solves: To check and log the right delivery of shipments accompanied by an T1 document (AT  customs document), a file has been sent out to our Service Centers to manually log the status of the delivery and send the file then back to the customs department. It is then consolidated and archived.
Benefits: Time to conduct the process per month

Title: Digitalisation of Service Points
Description: With printing into PDF and a digital signing pad in place, we are very confident to fulfill all needs without printing and scanning any invoice anymore.​
Problem it Solves: For legal reasons, the customer needs to sign the invoice first before loading it to myDHL+ at a service point. So invoice needs to be printed, signed and scanned.
Benefits: reduce paper, ink to print invoices

Title: Improve Shipment & Invoice Data Quality
Description: One aim of this project is to set up and implement a cross functional (OPS, SLS & ESS) process to work As One on those customers. Therefore we developed an eShare platform where we have a transparent view about all actions taken for every customer logged.
Problem it Solves: Customers provide inaccurate content description on their airway bill. This leads to a manual correction done in our Data Entry department.
Benefits: Data Quality
Most impacted Functions: Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Network Operations
Members: Daniela Wendl, Martin SANDNER, Michael Viehboeck

Title: Optimization Service Partner Stop Control
Description: The database that provides the stops has been upgraded and now includes the control steps that have to be conducted before the initiave. So the SVCs save time because the manual control steps are now done automatically and there are only a few left.
Problem it Solves: Service Partners are paid on a monthly basis with the help of a database that breaks down the stops and therefore enables a granular control of them. Unfortunately the SVCs have to conduct several control processes before they can be sure, that the stops that are basis for the payouts are correct.
Benefits: Time to conduct the process per month

Title: Predictive Maintenance: Vibration
Description: Our partner will bring sensors and cables to our conveyors and they measure the vibration. Baselining vibration means all ok, more vibration is energy, energy is heat and so on. 3 month test with full online dashboard started.
Problem it Solves: Conveyor are getting stopped or broken and nobody knows where the issue is. This is often the reality. Cold start of the conveyor and everything works again. After a certain time it happens again. RW performance going down, losing revenue, people need to work harder... nobody likes conveyor crashes
Benefits: Less breakdowns Better RW performance identify weaknesses on conveyor belts predictive maintenance to reduce breakdowns
Tags: checkpoints, compliance, conveyor, dashboard, efficiency, predictivemaintenance, thirdparty, tracking

Title: eHR hiring automations
Description: every time a new employee joins the company (indipendently of leasing or standard empl.) the data from WebApp is automatically loaded into eHR. Prototype is completed for testing
Problem it Solves: saving time from reentering the data and reduce mistakes by double entry to eHR
Benefits: less workload and data consistency

Title: Digitalisation collective agreement
Description: the process is done in digital form in existing payroll application
Problem it Solves: current manual process is time consuming, transparency is missing, reporting is only manually and data security is low, risk by legal compliance
Benefits: legal compliance, quality, data security  improvements, less workload

Title: eHR person management
Description: Changes on existing employees are saved in WebApp. An automation helps to load it to eHR. Prototype is completed for testing
Problem it Solves: saving time from reentering the data
Benefits: less workload and data consistency

Title: GEMA request - OPS
Description: GEMA request automation for bad address
Problem it Solves: automation of a manual process
Benefits: less workload, quicker interaction

Title: 3rd Party customs broker
Description: Based on LCA data a URL with landing page is sent to the broker. Broker answers whether he take care of customer release and distribution to the end customer. The broker reply feed by RPA to our LCA
Problem it Solves: Handling customs brokers
Benefits: Paperless & Fast process

Title: Customers' sel-service
Description: Ofer customer who dial in a self-Service via a landing page which send to their smartphone.
Problem it Solves: Lower incoming call to FL
Benefits: Lower incoming call to FL

Title: Classification via Commercial invoice part number
Description: Classification for VIP customers. Robot search historical Classification and retrieves the latest one per commercial  invoice p/n
Problem it Solves: Inconsistent classification for VIP customers
Benefits: Increase Classification quality

Title: Mark VIP Customers
Description: Set a list with VIP customers in LCA to prioritized them on top
Problem it Solves: Prioritized VIP customers
Benefits: Prioritized VIP customers

Title: PLT based on email from customers
Description: Customer send paperwork to DHL IL email address. Robot upload the attached paperwork and upload to GI. Checkpoint is set accordingly
Problem it Solves: For customer who reject to be set as PLT
Benefits: Speed up the export process

Title: Contract Generator upgrade
Description: We can easy have correct version of contract. Faster we will fill the client data. And faster send to the client. And add some more important column for General Cooperation Contract
Problem it Solves: Currently we are using (CZ Sales Supports) this link for generation new customer contract https://ddd.cz.dhl.com/ContractGenerator/login.jsp - this tool is only for General Cooperation Contract. And we want add all other agreements, addition contract to this tool.
Benefits: Customer will get draft of future contract faster. All actual version will be in same tool.  It will save our time (fill in information about client).

Title: Tri5G
Description: Implementation of a 5G mobile network infrastructure at Hub LEJ  for 36 month within Apron and Hangar to expand the current digital infrastructure. Testing of several use cases for 5G together with EAT to evaluate new technologies for logistic processes.
Problem it Solves: Improving current functionality of wireless infrastructure at DHL Hub LEJ.
Benefits: Increase operational efficiency by testing new technologies.
Members: Heiko Otto, Karen Ziegelmeyer, Matthias Weiss, Susann Erfurth

Title: Internal Cage Tracking - DHL Hub LEJ
Description: Internal LEJ Hub roller cages have special marks or color to identify and equipment have to be used for dedicated internal transport and storage processes. If cages has left DHL Hub LEJ area the position will be shown by IoT platform and facilities outside LEJ will be informed to send them back.
Problem it Solves: Assemble asset tracker (Sickfox/ALPS) to all internal LEJ Hub cages and use the DP DHL IoT-Frontend to locate number, position and status of cages at DHL Hub LEJ and identify if asset lost out of LEJ Hub area. Roller cages could be loaded with pieces and used also as Unit loading device.
Benefits: Tracing of internal assets Possible allocation of assets within several buildings Possible finding of pieces loaded into roller cages

Title: Cage Tracking - DHL Express Germany
Description: Assemble asset tracker (Sickfox/ALPS) to all cages and use the DP DHL IoT-Frontend to locate number,  position and status of cages.
Problem it Solves: Roller cages are used daily at DHL Express Germany to move shipments between service centers and thus have no fixed position. In 2019 we had 6 regular truck tours and many additional adhoc tours per week to rebalance the empty cages between the service centers.
Benefits: - Cages can be located and reported on a daily basis. - Rebalancing can be planned "real time" by our central network team and therefore costs for Adhoc-Trucks can be reduced - life span of cages is visible and purchasing of new cages can be planned in time
Members: Matthias Tellmann, Sascha Hoehle, Suraj Guha, Tina Ziemek

Title: HR case & process tool
Description: Together with an .xls expert we developed a workflow support tool for our HR Services team. It offers an overview for the team which process is in which step, gives an overview of the workload, offers information about process duration (dashboard) and is an easy to use tool for holiday handovers.
Problem it Solves: HR Services team had no workflow tool to offer the following benefits: - know which and how many processes (changes, new hires, contracts to be written, exception handling..) were ongoing; -know who works on which cases, - know how long processes take and whether it was done with high quality.
Benefits: HR services team is fully transparent and informed which case is in which step and can inform all employees accordingly. We also know how long our process takes and can therewith also manage expectations and be transparent towards our colleagues

Title: Missing paperwork Gema
Description: For shipments assigned a missing paperwork/nil image status: Automation of the contact with origin Country via GEMA and retrieval of daily individual country file detailing shipments from an SFTP site and access to GEMA to complete template and assign to origin country.
Problem it Solves: Automation of manual work
Benefits: Automating mundane/repetitive tasks from our people to free up time for more demanding tasks

Title: Online Family Day
Description: We celebrate with an online barbecue event, streamed from the MD's garden. SMT has chosen different dishes and each of them will prepare the food in front of the camera. We'll have several quizzes (e.g. favourite songs of our SMT, find a word...), a DJ and will talk to the people in their garden.
Problem it Solves: Our DHL Express Family Days are a unique opportunity to come together, to have fun together, to bond and to strengthen our AsOne feeling. Due to obvious reasons we can't conduct them during the pandemic the way we used to. But we won't miss them and need an online solution.
Benefits: People will experience an engaging, funny Family Day during worrying times and we'll show them that we care.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Finance, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Sales
Members: Melanie Schlakat, Simon Schlee, Vanessa Simon

Title: automated online callback to the customers
Description: Create automated callback when the customer is checking info on the dhl website
Problem it Solves: we do not have automated callback on the website, only incoming calls and costs for the customers update 09/22/2021: Has been solved by live chat agent on specific bookings webpages
Benefits: customer experience & satisfaction, calls management

Title: My DHL+ Digital contacts promotion
Description: the new website contacts way for Customer is still at the phone scope and form scope, we want to promote digital contacts way such as chat, social netw...
Problem it Solves: the new website contacts way for Customer is still at the phone scope and form scope, we want to promote digital contacts way such as chat, social netw...
Benefits: customer satisfaction & experience, impacts on CS calls decreasing, call diversification strat
Members: Catherine Despinoy, Cecile LANILIS, Patrick Goeuriot, Philippe Bergonhe

Title: GLOBUSS Sales Dashboard
Description: By switching to a dashboard, we are making the data fully automated available in a modern web-based frontend. The dashboard enables a graphical representation and the figures can be captured more quickly. The preparation time via GLOBUSS takes only 1-2 hours/month.
Problem it Solves: The preparation of the business performance data (~ 100 Excel files) takes aprox. 3-5 days/month. By providing the performance data directly from GLOBUSS via the GLOBUSS Sales Dashboard, we save several days of work and DO IT RIGHT FIRST TIME.
Benefits: Benefit for Sales: Average preparation time for APS/TPS sessions reduced. All figures and KPI´s are available as before. Graphical presentations are available. Benefit for Sales Development: Less admin time and always right first time. Preparation time reduced from 3-5 days/month to 1-2 hours/month.

Title: DE Pilot Security Roboter
Description: Functions of the robot:  Detection of incidents, reporting to Security Control Center or to other interfaces (e.g. police) Live view of robot cameras from Security Control Center individual Announcements via loudspeakers
Problem it Solves: When it comes to guarding our property (buildings, vehicles), today we mostly rely on manned guarding.  The quality of the security service depends largely on the people involved.  The use of robots in guarding can potentially increase the quality of guarding and reduce costs.
Benefits: Better guarding quality  Lower guarding costs compared to manned guarding

Title: CS Contacts using Whatsapp
Description: FR has been pilot of Whatsapp chatbot involved as part of CS contacts - we need support to continue to develop this CS flow (MCT integration)
Problem it Solves: customer cs requests moving to digitalization we need to align our tools to customer expectation
Benefits: CS Decreasing of calls and customer experience improvment

Title: ASRS – Automated Storage Retrieval System
Description: With DHL Express Turkey’s move to new headquarters and operations gateway at IGA – NEW ISTANBUL AIRPORT , while one of the aims was to build a state of art headquarters and operations gateway with benefits also from automated systems both on sorting and shelving through automated sort and warehouse.
Problem it Solves: To convert a time-consuming warehouse processes which is prone to human errors to a more automated and customer added value process with integration of automation, EGAP and messaging systems.
Benefits: Better operational efficiency from automated systems and better focus to customer value added activities and improving customer experience.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Burcu TURNA, Hakan Tarik MERIC, Leyla Aktas, Serdar DILMEN, Yavuz KAYA, Zulal SENOL

Title: Lunch payment by ID card (Berger)
Description: As employees have their ID cards with them at all times anyway, it would be convenient to link ID cards into canteen's cashier system. ID card is scanned and the price of lunch would be charged directly from next salary (possibly before taxes?).
Problem it Solves: Employees carrying their cash / bank card with them. Occupation of canteen staff.
Benefits: Quicker and more streamlined payment process, ease of workload on canteen staff, data availability for canteen utilization reporting, possibly cheaper for employees?
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Hubs & Gateways, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Others, Pricing, Sales

Title: DWC App
Description: The Mobile App is realized with Power App, connected to automated data flows which generates daily plan refresh and end-of-day reporting. An email notification is automatically sent to the LRT approvers on a daily basis.
Problem it Solves: The DWC (Digi Workforce Capture)  App helps Supervisors to review daily activities plans and avoid paperwork, saving time (2-3 hours a day) in the manual data entry to LRT and increasing data visibility and data quality of the reporting.
Benefits: The Mobile App ensures a more efficient and faster process for the reporting of daily activities. It is user friendly and simple and increase data quality and data visibility via automated flows and pre-filled information.

Title: Using Digital Signatures
Description: Once the PDF file is emailed to the recipient, a digital signature is applied to the employee and manager signing location. The date can also be added. The signed PDF is saved and emailed back to the sender. No paper to post (paperless)or risk of the paper getting lost / delayed.
Problem it Solves: In HR we need all sorts of documents to be signed - from Employment Contracts to letters confirming changes in Employee status. Using digital signatures on PDFs speeds up the signature process in a safe, fast and secure way - especially into the future when more staff will be remote working.
Benefits: A more professional and quicker service is offered to the employee. Makes signing documents easier for managers who are managing remote teams. More safe, secure and efficient way of managing documents that require signatures.

Title: ePre-Invoice (Duty)
Description: By submitting an electronic pre-Invoice to customers, the process of preparing the documentation required for import customs clearance has been faster. Pre-Invoice is created from local DUTY application.
Problem it Solves: Our objective was to improve customer experience by sending all Pre-Invoices electronically, for customs clearance purposes.
Benefits: No printed Pre-Invoices. Preparation of documentation for customs clearance is faster.

Title: Dashboard PLT
Description: Dashboard for real-time monitor of data manifest in the facility with special focus on WPX and paperless trade shipments.
Problem it Solves: Pro active monitoring on customer data manifest and expected quantities. Automatic check of quality and completeness of shipments to improve operational management and rework. Operational efficiency.
Benefits: Fasten and ease decision making on customer's shipments by monitoring completeness of information and readiness for sorting.

Title: GEMA Auto Closure For Customs Clearence
Description: On this area one improvement areas requested by the team was either auto closure  of customs GEMA files whenever a shipments get delivered. As a prototype tried with Robotic Process Automation(UiPath),and then we applied the automation  applied this as a browser interaction through Excel VBA.
Problem it Solves: Due to customs changes on TR for deminimus for imports to 0, that increased workload hugely on Customer Contact Center Group responses to customers and we have looked to opportunities how we can eliminate some redundant/repeating tasks and convert these to value adding tasks.
Benefits: User supply GEMA request Ids to then application and then application closes files wigh given closure reason codes. The gain is more than 1 - 1,30 hour/agent.

Title: Online Competency Assessment
Description: Project use out of box iShare lists and Sharepoint 2013 Designer workflows as a no code solution, to adhere to above security considerations,default views / edit pages disabled  and the viewing /editing functionalities  hasve been delivered with additional security filters through iShare list views.
Problem it Solves: As a recent request from Human resources, to shift  non-managerial individual competency assessments for whole company from a paper based platform  to a digital platform - iShare has been selected as the preferred platform to deliver this given the delivery timelines were short.
Benefits: End to end full visibility of process, digitalisation of process has been led to complete competency assessment process period before its targets and full visibility of the process at what stage each user competency assessment.

Title: Automated FTB (First Time Buyer) OnBoarding
Description: Campaign delivered through a use of mix of standart technologies with a minimum coding approach: •	A START report to determine in scope customers for above criterias. •	An iShare library to retrive data •	And a client application to communicate Dotmailer (Dotdigital) APIs for campaign triggers
Problem it Solves: Recently we have automated whole FTB pipeline from account opening to first shipment and to first invoice. As started on April 2020,  FTB Onboarding Program helped us with customer loyalty especially during Covid 19 uncertainty times on a very competitive market.
Benefits: Onboarding customer from account opening to first shipment and first  invoicing with automation and introduction of services of DHL Express like MyDHL+,MyBill etc.
Tags: api, commercial, covid, firsttimebuyer, focus, ftb, sales

Title: Self Service Complaints Application
Description: The project has been started to fulfil governmental requirements , as an opportunity we have enhanced customer experience e.g. through CRM service management like functionalities in the background as application runs on Dynamics 365 CRM Service Management with data flow from GEMA.
Problem it Solves: Self service claims management by customers and two way flow/visibility/reporting of claims between customer, DHL Express Turkey and  Turkey Information and Communication Technologies Authority and visibility at all levels during flow.
Benefits: End to end claims visibility and help to on-time resolution as claims tracked by government information technology authorities
Members: Beyza KOC, Senol SAHIN, Zulal SENOL

Title: Digital Coach Ride
Description: Survalyzer setup to automize Coachride OPS (Gembarides). Form can be filled on scanner or phone and is digitally saved in the personal files.
Problem it Solves: Manual work on coacht ride forms. It saves paper, time and reduces errors
Benefits: digitalization of coachride

Title: Navigation App (Routigo)
Description: Route planning software used for creating optimal delivery routes and navigation on this route.
Problem it Solves: inefficient deliveries
Benefits: most efficient route created with delivery remarks included (for example ODD). New drivers have easy access to correct navigation information

Title: Feedback app for couriers
Description: App on the courier device to give feedback on experiences during their route
Problem it Solves: Feedback was never captured structured  No day-to-day feedbakc/improvement possible
Benefits: Feedback from couriers is captured structured and adjustments on the process/software etc can be done directly when necessarily.  This creates employee satisfaction and a more efficient PU and delivery proces

Title: Intelligent geocoding (inc address cleansing)
Description: Navigation requires geocodes and this  requires clean data
Problem it Solves: unknow addresses, undeliverables
Benefits: no manual address updates needed deliveries at the correct location

Title: Cloud-based queue management software for DHL serv
Description: This cloud-based solution aims to help DHL staff to streamline walk-in customers flow in service centres as well as help them to feel more comfortable while waiting in a line. Built-in digital signage features can also give customers some useful additional information while they are waiting - widget
Problem it Solves: Queuing process become totally transparent to visitors and, thus, very comfortable Customer and staff keep necessary distanсing - no need to form physical queue
Benefits: 1. More comfort and useful information (regulatory, marketing) on big screens for customers while they are waiting 2. CS/OPS managers have better control and statistics on walk-in customers allowing to allocate resources better
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Andrey Sinyakov, Sergey Pozharsky, Stanislav Yukhanson

Title: DHL SPT - Service Point Tool
Description: Web Page for use by Service Points or any Physical Customer Contact Points.  Web page contains all information and tools for customer interaction in a single location.
Problem it Solves: Reduces paperwork, delays in customer handling, incorrect information (Shipping Times etc),
Benefits: One location for all information a staff member would need,  no need for paper work, can have many additional features. Information will be up-to date, has the ability to integrate with some EGAP systems in future ( Shipment data for booking or collecting shipments)

Title: ODD phone validation tool
Description: ODD PHONE VALIDATION TOOL provides with quick visualisationof which shpmts have invalid mobile phone # and it also shows the true nature of the problem (e.g. whether the phone # was the fixedline, invalid/incorrectnumbers, fakenumbers, paidlines, personal/employeenumbers, etc.)
Problem it Solves: Quality of ODD phone numbers
Benefits: It helps to quickly identify wrong receiver's phone numbers (and root cause) for the appropriate AWBs. It is benefitial for OPS and Sales to find shippers and ask them for correction. Finally it improves ODD efficiency.

Title: DPSS Portal
Description: Portal for customers to upload documentation required to release shipments intercepted by DPSS. Automatically elimination of documentation once the shipment is released.
Problem it Solves: Delay in exporting shipments due to lack of documentation on time to send as proof of authenticity to the central team controlling DPSS to release shipments faster. Also avoids manual work from the CS agents, which need every evening to contact the customers asking for documentation.
Benefits: Less delays in exports, less manual work. GDPR compliance.

Title: Particulate Matters
Description: Use Aircleaner systems and make use of brand new particulate sensor tech from Corporate Development to control the air condition in the meeting rooms & office spaces
Problem it Solves: Corona times - coming back to the offices might be not that easy. In addition to CO2 Monitoring the particulate matters in the air are a significant topic for sickness / spreading of virus
Benefits: Less sickness rate Safely coming back to the office
Tags: air, aircleaner, corporatedevelopment, covid, employeewellbeing, greatplacetowork, iotplaform

Title: Digitalisation Motiv8
Description: the process is done in digital form in existing payroll application
Problem it Solves: current manual process is time consuming, transparency is missing, reporting is only manually and data security is low
Benefits: quality, data security  improvements, less workload

Title: ServicePoint CRM
Description: This initiative is to explore different options in terms of solutions (eg. SalesForce, SugarCRM, Zoho CRM, etc) in order to determine the best value solution.
Problem it Solves: ServicePoint Partner Management in terms of partner data management, communication with the partner, sales and commissions produced by the partner, pipeline of new service point partnerships, forecasting sales , etc.
Benefits: It provides a better and improved client/customer relationship. It supports improved cross-functionality and thereby increases team collaboration. CRM offers strong efficiency in serving clients and more staff satisfaction. It reduces cost and manual efforts.
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Customer experience

Title: Multimedia Library
Description: Organized repository of information, presentations or videos (assets) with the objective of promoting and publicizing the company from Marketing, CS, OPS, FIN to provide consistent information about services and processes from the customer perspective.
Problem it Solves: Avoid different departments to create, organize, search several areas (network drives, intranet/extranet, email, etc) by using an intelligent content management system.
Benefits: Fast response to customers, mobile productivity, brand image.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: EU H&G Scanning Compliance Program - StopScanBeam
Description: Development and implementation of Scan control software that transmits trigger criteria from AHS to the scanner to disrupt the scanning beam. Implementation and deployment of first version in LEJ completed, H&G rollout ongoing.
Problem it Solves: Scanning compliance defects cause a lot of business damage. Objective is to mitigate financial and compliance impact caused by missing reload scan and optimize the work process compliance by an IT driven solution to support that the agent needs to perform any kind of failure handling in AHS.
Benefits: Foreseen benefits after project completion & deployment: Increase DF compliance from 99,6% to 99,8%,  reduce costs for penalties

Title: Making office phone extensions 100% mobile archive
Description: 1. Currently we are using short extensions fore office numbers. 2. We use wired phones as well as radio (DECT) phones 3. Most of users work remotely nowadays. Proposed solution adds "office extension" functionalities to normal mobile phones,  we replace two devices with one giving more flexibility
Problem it Solves: 1 Increased mobility of staff 2 increased reliability 3 cost saving and cost effectiveness
Benefits: 1 Office extension can be used anywhere - more mobility 2 No additional cabling, base stations etc - cost saving 3 Fast and cheap new office setup 4 Transparence between office and mobile phone numbers
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Hubs & Gateways, IT, Network Operations, Others

Title: NPA and Voice of Customer - reporting and analysis
Description: Reporting and analysis of NPA data and other voice of customer data sources in the MyBI PowerBI environment.
Problem it Solves: The types of reports and analysis we do are not currently available in the global platform. Incorporation of other data sources is unfortunately not possible in the global platform. The flexibility of the tool allows for new reports and analysis to be generated very quickly.
Benefits: Powerful, fast and flexible reporting and analysis on NPA and Voice of Customer data. Additional data from other data sources is incorporated in allow for more analysis opportunities.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Customs, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, General Management, Network Operations, Sales

Title: Customer Pricing Factsheet in PowerBI
Description: We brought all our reporting files into a modern Power BI Platform where we combined several data sources. The Dashboard is showing the crucial KPI's like NPC, WpS, RpK, RpS etc. in different break downs (per lane, weightband, productline). You can see the S&S Compliance  + implemented charge in GRE
Problem it Solves: In past years we had several different reporting files in Pricing to show our KPI's. To get all important KPI's for one customer we had to tap into several data sources and run the reports manually and complex in excel. This was not up to date and we needed a solution.
Benefits: Benefit for Sales: Average preparation time for customer meetings or TRB sessions reduced from 45min to 10min and they see all crucial KPI's in 10sec. Benefit for Pricing: Less admin work and more time for advisor role. Benefit for Mgmt: More transparency in TRB for faster decision making
Benefit Category: Employee experience, Operational efficiency, Customer experience

Title: Marketing Intelligence Insight
Description: Quarterly Int'l Market Analysis by industries and territories. Analysis of industrial context by companies, industries and territories, analyzing the distribution of VAT and their features   Analysis and Monitor campaign and intitiative development based on marketing  and business rules
Problem it Solves: Identify market potential and initiative through a data driven approach in order to develop business, strategies, support OPS in choice investement and Sales sizing
Benefits: Identifing objectively potential business to be more competitivite, efficency and efficacy.  Guarantee integrity and security data.  Share the data easily within DHL
Members: Emanuele Leonardi, Marco FERIOLI, Valerio RUSSO

Title: Network Operations Phone list
Description: A central phone list reflecting the contact details for key ops positions and couriers, updated on daily basis. With shortcut buttons to phone and SMS. Click on a position/route to see historical data from days back. Quick, easy and user friendly to update.
Problem it Solves: Customer Service and Courier dispatch (as well as other coworkers) can easily see who is scheduled to do what task today or who drives which route, with their name and phone number one click away.
Benefits: Dispatch can quickly reach the couriers with special instructions or check progress. Central management staff can easily identify who can help them with special queries, testing or warehouse searches.

Title: Country Local Data Secured Server
Description: Local reporting data and local development source data stored on  a dedicated server hosted by ITS with backup capabilities.   Backend data processing & reporting is done by SSIS & SSRS.  (Sql Server Integration Services & Sql Server Reporting Services)  Backend database = SQL Server Database
Problem it Solves: Stop the use of Access & Excel large unsecured data dumps / pivot tables / reports with not tracking. Stop the use of VBA processes or stand-alone development. Secure data and provide single backend source. Purge data at same level as our backend systems (GDPR) Manage user security on Ldap
Benefits: data Security: data access based on Ldap account. -Job agents: processing data jobs on server side with SSIS packages.  -backup: backup on server sides -single source: no multiple copies of data, single source with indexes and relations. -manage stored data(GDPR): Purge data same as SourceSystems
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Finance, Human Resources, IT, Network Operations, Pricing
Members: Bart Van de Walle, Dimitri De Wulf

Title: Collection of HR data from employees for payroll
Description: Till now we used 'xls' to inform HR department about data of each and every employee for payroll preparation. With upgrading of our already implemented system for entrance access and attendance (local vendor SPICA) we gain automatic data collection as well as approval via mail for FTEs HR requests
Problem it Solves: remove paper based reporting to digital platform and allowing approvals to be done via e-mail (for holiday, sick leave, smart working, etc)
Benefits: reducing HR time invested in preparation of data for payroll. Employees can now request holiday, smart working, sick leave via this system – no more mails and manual evidence about who takes what and when, Online accessibility for supervisors and managers for their people – daily visibility and adju

Title: Electronic Personnel File Management System (eAkte
Description: With eAKTE, all existing documents from basic and partial files are digitized and made digitally accessible in a central archive for the responsible HR deps. At the same time, previous time-consuming filing and research processes are digitalized and thus become much simpler and more efficient.
Problem it Solves: In addition to the important topic of GO Green and our responsibility in the area of digitization we will avoid Fines for data protection violations (Penalty for data protection violations in case of documents are above the retention period in the file)
Benefits: The new digital personnel file management system will gain the following main benefits: Compliance with current data protection regulations, through scheduling solution Commitment to Strategy 2025. Free up archives rooms for other usage. Remote access and simultaneous working possible (i.e. LEJHub).

Title: GEMA Upload
Description: Trace Request mass upload in GEMA via an RPA process ( Initially developped for SG ).
Problem it Solves: In France used for uploading  Customs Trace Request
Benefits: Gain of Time for Trace request creation.

Title: C360 dev and promotion
Description: We are using C360 appli within CS which is a very great tool, we  would like to extand to other functions and add more informations coming from CS, SALES, OPS...
Problem it Solves: We are using C360 appli within CS which is a very great tool, we  would like to extand to other functions and add more informations coming from CS, SALES, OPS...
Benefits: Employee experience, all of the department can know any specific customer profile...

Title: MCT deployment to all CS
Description: MCT deployment to all CS
Problem it Solves: move all of the emails & chat mgt to MCT
Benefits: CS benefits, emails mgt, chat mgt

Title: Boeing Toolbox Mobile Librar‪y
Description: Toolbox Mobile Library provides mobile access to the documents hosted in Maintenance Performance Toolbox Library for even more efficient maintenance and repair operations. Next to Boeing manufacturer documents Airbus documents can be handled as well. Document authoring.
Problem it Solves: Technical publications are provided today via different sources with weak user convenience and no mobile app available that can be deployed to the "Electronic Maintenance Bags" of Aircraft Mechanics. No authoring capability to maintain document changes by Engineering.
Benefits: OEM documents (Airbus and Boeing) centralized in Boeing Toolbox and provided to users via an mobile application. Boeing documents can be customized. Retrieve aircraft tail-specific information from the Aircraft Maintenance Manual. Navigate via logical hyperlinks and specialized searches.

Description: FR Has been pilot for DGA= success with around 3000 users per day on average using website chatbot and 500 users per day using whatsapp

Description: MCT deployment chat Mgt

Description: emails mgt for KAD has been deployed

Description: IVR Non express detection and automatic transfert to corrects teams
