Title: ODD integration in IVR
Description: ODD integration in IVR we deployed for France and we want to increase success of this project, ODD volumes managed by IVR
Problem it Solves: Volumes are still low and we want to boost these volumes
Benefits: impacts +on calls, customers satisfaction & experience, OPS impacts + for ODD

Title: Paperless Customs clearance resolution via EIS
Description: Enhance the local application for Electronic Information Sheet (EIS) to manage customs clearance resolutions fully electronically. This includes uploading emails with attached paperwork to EGAP tool Global Imaging Archive (GIA).
Problem it Solves: Currently communications to resolve customs clearance issues between Customers and Swiss Customs is done via physical paper and flat bed scanners. Manual processes are needed to upload these communications and paperwork to the network.
Benefits: Increases operational efficiency, reduces cost of paper and flat bed scanners, and eliminates physical handling of paperwork exchanged with Customers and Swiss Customs.
Members: Bernard Schmitt, Christophe DUPERTUIS, Djamel Djedid, Elvis RUDAZ

Title: NOEP OPS KPI Tree
Description: Interactive dashboard with main Ground Operations Financials and NOEP Productivity KPIs
Problem it Solves: The model helps Country Operations Directors to run a faster diagnostic analysis of the OCPM behavior, through an overview of current and historic information to assess the performance of different Direct Functions
Benefits: Enhanced visibility: provides greater visibility with information available by combining different data sources.  Timesaving efficiency:  Data is transformed by a centralized and automated process; and displayed as an easy and interactive online format, accessible at any time from any device

Title: UCR (ULD Control Receipt) Automation
Description: Replacing the old paper UCR process, data is now captured through a mobile device by  the collecting/returning driver, which then improves commercial ULD utilisation and therefore drives cost efficiency.
Problem it Solves: The digital copy has improved data accuracy, therefore improving the commercial ULD location details. Real time processing of the data improves the utilisation of the ULD, therefore ensures we aren't billed for unused ULDs. Digital record retention.
Benefits: Data accuracy - digital rather than often illegible hand written copy. Real time data transfer, improves driver and cost efficiency. Zero lost copies. Old hard copies used to require bulk scanning/upload and physical retention for record keeping purposes, this is now all digital.
Members: Cassandra Perrin, Chris HARRISON, Duncan Peake, Jack Tew, James Hall, Lorenzo Catalano, Maciej Orlicz, Sam Collins, Scott Bradford, Scott Muggleton, Thomas Gayner

Title: eAvizer
Description: Digital assistant for better  connecting  customs brokers and  physical persons / customers  for making easier process of customs import
Problem it Solves: Commuznication with duty customers
Benefits: Customer benefit is that customer can solve all problems regarding import on his mobile device.   Employee  benefit is that all history of communication with customer  is on one place
Members: Denis KAHLIC, Krunoslav Damjanovic, Zvonko KOSTELIC

Title: ArchiveThis (stop printing to scan/archive)
Description: A desktop utility which provides a quick interface to archive documents to Global Imaging and/or CIA by a simple drag and drop from explorer or email, providing documenttype and reference value in a pop up form, before submitting it to be archived in GIA/CIA.
Problem it Solves: Remove wasting time, money and paper to print just to scan the documents. No  more image quality loss when printing and then scanning. Any document type that can be scanned with CIA scanner can be archived with ArchiveThis directly instead.
Benefits: Save printing paper and cost.  This is a real time saver for the users, since they no longer need to print out documents just to scan them via CIA.  ArchiveThis also enables easy archiving of other document type, like customer communication and contracts/agreements.

Title: Maintenance management software
Description: Using a Maintenance management software will allow us to get efficiently access to all our data and improve our efficiency, save our data only one time in one file, save time
Problem it Solves: Managing a lot of files and directories for data storage, maintenance managing,  out of stock advises, maintenance planning, and another tasks.
Benefits: No longer need to save or search data in multiple files, better interface and user experience, data reliability improvement

Title: DISCO Sort (Tier1) for small facilities
Description: DISCO in Norway started off as a Tier1 solution controlling the MHE in OSL. It is now a highly configurable Tier1 module in our local DISCO, both in OSL and BGO, integrated directly with the respective Tier2 platforms via webservices.
Problem it Solves: No need to have a separate Tier1 between DISCO and the Tier2, i.e. reduced risk of system failures overall.  Save cost, no need for extra HW or software.  User actions in DISCO have almost immediate effect on the sorter, no need to wait for MQ transfer and import in Tier1.
Benefits: Reduced system complexity, reduced configuration complexity (the sort plan has to be configured in DISCO in any case, but no longer need to be configured in SATS/LT1 as well). Also reduced risk of system failures(one less component and also no MQ interfaces). And of course, greatly reduced cost.

Title: PPWK Check In tool
Description: A check in tool where debrief worker quickly scans the barcodes on the ppwk sets that couriers hands over after offload. The ppwk checkins are compared to PU checkpoints, and if every ppwk set is present then courier don't need to wait for image capturing process in CIA including IA checkpoint.
Problem it Solves: Uneccessary waiting for the couriers in the debrief process.
Benefits: The PPWK Check In Tool creates an overview of the shipments with PU, and shows the check in status of the ppwk. Couriers can be dismissed earlier if all ppwk is accounted for and checked in. After a long day on the road this is really welcomed.

Title: Digital Information walldisplays
Description: Present content in digital format using large displays scattered across different locations using a central repository of videos, streaming contents, widgets, etc to provide a replacement of the traditional wallboards.
Problem it Solves: Information delays, information gaps, manual work, expense of paper and tonner.
Benefits: Provides a much more efficient way of communicating with the employees, increasing the Digitalization EOS KPI.

Title: Eureka
Description: Tool to capture innovative ideas and solutions to simple problems in the business.  The ideas are approved by function responsible, evaluated by the functions which need to provide the solution, approved by the SMT and finally followed thru the implementation.
Problem it Solves: Digitalization of process currently made in paper and excel files.
Benefits: Speed, better management of the proposed ideas, follow-up of implementation.

Title: Employee Incentives - Capture/Approve/Pay
Description: Today around 350 employees receive an extra values in their payroll, based on achieving KPIS for each function. The projects consists of a workflow solution to capture, approve and integrate directly into the payroll application the amounts to pay each employee per month or quarter.
Problem it Solves: Manual work, delays, errors, no history view, not-digital solution.
Benefits: Optimize process, reduce costs and improve the employees satisfaction by allowing more time to

Title: VIT - Brussels Shipments Automation
Description: Shipments with origin VIT and destination Brussels Hub, are currently locally manifested in DCVS tool and when shipment is dispatched in Customs, and delivery note and export number created, those are MANUALLY entered back in DCVS before shipment arrives to Brussels Hub as legally required.
Problem it Solves: Customs system automation with DCVS would allow that no more manual data would need to be entered back in DCVS. Currently about 150 shipments/day require this manual data entry only in Spain although probably the rest of the countries in Europe are facing same issue
Benefits: Cost saving as manual entry requires approximately 2-3hrs/day of data entry with corresponding chances also that some error might occur

Title: eApproval system for customers and suppliers
Description: Implementation oа web-based approval system for customers and suppliers contracts
Problem it Solves: Currently all contracts are approved by e-mails and physically stamped before signing at least by tree departments (legal, finance, procurement).  Images of signed contracts are stored in different data base or share drives w/o contract details. Contracts with expiration date are managed inconsisten
Benefits: Reduce time for contract review and approval – faster supplier implementation & shorter sales cycle. E-approval by stakeholders - less administrative / sales efforts  Better control for expiring contracts, timely renewal.  Single source with information about all contracts.
Members: Dmitry Sautenkov, Evgeny Krivoruchko, Vitaly Berezhnoy

Title: Customers supply process automatization
Description: Customers supply process automatization by improving the link among customer request interface (OSO) and Easyship
Problem it Solves: Manual handling of files and manual data entry in the process of preparing shipments to customers
Benefits: Operational efficiency through digitalization of the process, avoiding manual errors and increasing the speed of shipment preparation

Title: Speeding up B2C Customs process
Description: FI Customs Authorities require specific information from B2C receivers to be submitted to them in the customs declaration process. Also additional docs (e.g. order confirmation) are required in order to validate the shipment actual value
Problem it Solves: half manual process currently to obtain info from the customer and eventually feed docs to GIA
Benefits: removing the process to obtain order confirmations from the customer by email, instead getting that automatically via a portal and fed to GIA. Improving the customer communication and experience on the information required
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency
Members: Jari JOUTSENLAHTI, Linda Jokivuori, Tomas Lehtinen

Title: Customs Document automated scanning
Description: Customs team used to print/scan ppwk through printers after receiving docs from customer by email. Implemented IRIS document handling solution where all this can be done electronically and automatically feed to CIA/GIA
Problem it Solves: Manual paper handling, errors in scanning quality, export customs team workflow improvement
Benefits: Complete removal of manual piles of paper, reduction of errors (e.g. some scannings incomplete, paper getting stuck etc)

Title: Dynamic Service Point partner setup
Description: DHL Express Finland started a co-operation with a nationwide service point partner with +600 service points coverage. Setup enabling OPS to deliver shipments to servicepoints even adhoc/proactively if needed. Data through DHL standard webservices but integrated to the partner POS. Scalable solution.
Problem it Solves: Couriers not being able to perform adhoc/proactive deliveries to service points. Not having extensive enough service point network in the country.
Benefits: Improved customer experience, reduced NH deliveries

Title: IL RPA - ID Capture to LCA
Description: Using RPA platform from UiPATH We Capture customer ID which is sent via email and insert to LCA - Local  Customs Application
Problem it Solves: Eliminate Data Entry
Benefits: Saves aprox 4 hour of data entry per day . Speed up the import process thus increasing customer satisfaction
Members: Elad Kuzi, Neomi Grubin, Or Zaharia, Shahak Shaked

Title: IL RPA - Data Entry to LCA
Description: Using RPA platform from UiPATH We Capture the approval of the customer which is sent via email and insert it to LCA - Local  Customs Application.  We create a stage of personal food import in LCA and added the mail with the confirmation to the LCA.
Problem it Solves: Eliminate Data Entry and saved reference of the agreement's customer.
Benefits: Saves approximately  5 hour of data entry per day . Speed up the import process thus increasing customer satisfaction
Members: Elad Kuzi, Neomi Grubin, Shlomo Markuse

Title: DHLpro
Description: A web site that helps customer to navigate into MyDHL+ world. DHLpro has libraries with videos, documents, guides, tips and hints and howtos.
Problem it Solves: Mitigates drammatically requests of help from customers by the techline.
Benefits: Its large library and an awesome glossary turns every newby customer into a DHL Pro. A gamification inside the site makes the experience fun and entertaining.

Title: Welcome Pack for new Customers
Description: Auto generated welcome email for newly onboarded customers. It uses data generated from OMS integrated with Account information, providing to the customer also relevant STC contact informations and related Courier Base data
Problem it Solves: A precious instrument to provide in a nutshell basic info on DHL world, products, services and other useful info to start shipping
Benefits: Onboarding of the customer, great welcome package, facilitate the relation with DHL; improve the access to shipment process
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Network Operations

Title: Manual Cash invoice Reduction
Description: Automated process to recover, on a daily base, the missing Cash invoice that elsewhere would be needed to be created manually during the month closure. The recovery is based on manifested data, it checks managed  CASH shipments (based on checkpoints) and automatically creates the invoice if missing
Problem it Solves: Avoid manual data entry to create missing invoice. More accuracy on cash invoices, data driven submitted instead of manual work submission
Benefits: The percentage of manual invoices has been reduced from the 12,5% of the 2016 to the 0,28% for the current year (2020);on a total of 400000 invoices for 2020, it means more than 6000 manual invoices , 62,5 fte saved
Members: Claudio VISCIONE, Daria TIRABOSCHI, Luca BELLOTTI

Title: eCom 4 You
Description: DHL ECOM4YOU is a free web platform that allows merchants to manages orders from eCommerce sites and marketplaces.
Problem it Solves: Even if the merchant is not used with orders, shipments, logistics and marketplaces, with this tool he/she can automates the most common tasks with ease, and avoid callings to techline/helpdesk.
Benefits: Automates all backoffice activities from order to shipment. Improve the number of B2C shipments created in a "self-service" way.

Title: KART3 Chat Promotion
Description: Promote & increase the number of Customers using Chat within KART3
Problem it Solves: Still high volumes of CS calls related to KART info & reports
Benefits: Decreasing of calls, costs benefits, increasing of customer experience & satisfaction and as part of the digitalization strat

Title: Service Partner Dashboard
Description: The Dashboard gives a full overview of the performance of all service partner routes and couriers, allowing us to have better dialogues with the service partners about performance.
Problem it Solves: Gathers all KPIs and performance data in one  place. The data can be easily reviewed and analysed.
Benefits: Saves preparation time for the PUD supervisor before the weekly Service Partner meetings. User friendly and interactive.

Title: SPI - Service Partner Interface
Description: Integration of SPST and DHL24 data with an autoinvoice tool for partners to invoice DHL, that produces automatically the invoices for the partners commissions and loads into Oracle AP directly.
Problem it Solves: Manual work, errors, speed in paying to partners.
Benefits: Partners and DHL have minimal work for the finance work related to the DHL-3r party partnerships.

Title: OSO extension
Description: Shipping of supplies to customers, service points, etc.  Automates label production of shipments with supplies to customers and service points. Interfaces with OSO. Assists management of supplies stocks.
Problem it Solves: Manual work and delays in shipping supplies to customers.
Benefits: Speed, quality, cost reduction.
Most impacted Functions: Customer Service, Electronic Shipping Solutions, Network Operations

Title: HR Portal
Description: HR portal to automate absence, payroll, holiday, extra-hours work, personal data maintenance, etc. Interfaces local payroll system.
Problem it Solves: Paper workflow. GDPR concerns. Manual work.
Benefits: Efficiency. Employee satisfaction.

Title: Invoice Connector
Description: Adapter to interface standard ERP systems (like SAP, Oracle, etc) in order to automate shipment and customs data (label, invoice upload, etc).
Problem it Solves: Manual entry in ESS system or extra development by customers.
Benefits: Customer satisfaction, customer loyalty, speed & cost of processing, data quality.

Title: Customs Portal
Description: Customs Portal for customers to submit clearance data and paperwork to automate the clearance process in the inbound, based on pre-alert shipment data.
Problem it Solves: Manual work, delays, space consumed by bond, customer calls
Benefits: Improve COA, BOS, cost of operation.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Operations Training Portal
Description: Ground and Air Operations have specific training courses required in order to have freight and security certifications (eg. TAPA). In order to control training, who, what, when, expiration date, etc we have created a portal for Operations to do this.
Problem it Solves: Risk of missing training for critical functions
Benefits: Centralized management of training actions, alerts, planning actions.

Title: Customs Clearance Mass Tool
Description: Provide massive shippers exporting WPX shipments to send customer invoice data  via an XML file which automatically creates export declaration to be sent to customs authorities.
Problem it Solves: Manual declarations, which consume many resources and delay shipment processing
Benefits: Customers shipping, for example, 1000 shipments per day see the export declaration processed in a matter of minutes, without errors.
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Portal for Dangerous Goods Stopped
Description: DG incidents are registered in RCIR. Our portal receives msgs from RCIR in order to create a process for the DG incident. CS will manage the portal workflow. CS operates the portal to inform the customer that needs to fill in information and send to DHL to continue processing of customer shipment.
Problem it Solves: Stopped DG shipments. Automate CS management of DGs stopped.
Benefits: Speed & quality of information.

Title: Local Service Point locator (local reference data)
Description: Works like GSPL, but with the ability to search on local reference data and perform free text searches on ServicePoint names, addresses, cities, delivery route etc.
Problem it Solves: GSPL searches are limited to map and zipcode locations. When ops staff needs to find what Service Points are located on a specific route, or needs to find a Service Point based on a partial name or SPID it becomes harder. This solution can map every Service Point on a specific route etc.
Benefits: Much more versatile tool for Ops staff and Customer Service that can do more than just identify Service Points around a specific location. Tool will also give current space availability in Swipboxes.

Title: Low Value enhancement
Description: enhanced status information for Low Value clearance via LEJ to update pre-advised data after departure
Problem it Solves: list needed before departure, but there is a compliance issue, when not all shipments are departed, so correction is provided after departure
Benefits: compliance

Title: BREXIT DDI multi piece handling
Description: Shipment status provided on piece level to customs clearance, so only full shipments are cleared in export process; it replaces current manual process
Problem it Solves: only complete shipments are cleared
Benefits: less workload; compliance

Title: Export customs release automation
Description: Interface between local sorter and local clearance application to automatically exchange shipment status in export
Problem it Solves: manual scans are replaced with sorter interface
Benefits: less workload

Title: Lead Crawler
Description: Script to search for keywords in websites for potential target customers
Problem it Solves: saving time and finding a lot more potential customers
Benefits: less workload  and potential customers can be contacted in a shorter time

Title: Cash Invoicing Application
Description: Development of an application in order to generate cash customers invoices for outbound shipments easily and in a quick way
Problem it Solves: Currently there is no way to provide the customer with an invoice when he/she leaves DHL the shipment; Customer insatisfaction as DHL is not able to provide the invoice
Benefits: Customer satisfaction as customer can immediately get the invoice of the shipment

Title: Label request
Description: Sales can create a form to request labels to be sent to a customer. The form is sent to OPS supply and the request is automatically closed
Problem it Solves: managed supply request without ESS involvement
Benefits: visibility and less workload

Title: ESS eRequest automation
Description: There is a formula used between Sales and ESS for new customer onboarding in ESS. This is supported by some  automation, like providing MyDHL+ access or  preparing mail to customer.
Problem it Solves: Manage ESS part of customer onboarding/changes. It makes sure, that all needed information is captured and some of the process is automated
Benefits: visibility and less workload

Title: Macro for pre-cleared shipments in export
Description: Pre-cleared shipments are placed on a movement with releases status, so that shipments can be loaded without waiting for customs authority response
Problem it Solves: shipments can be loaded without waiting for approval;
Benefits: quicker process by OPS GW loading

Title: CIS ULD Build Up Tablet Training
Description: CIS ULD Build Up manuals converted to Tablet Training
Problem it Solves: No more carrying around of separate manuals
Benefits: reduction of waste (manuals) improved employee experience

Title: Dig It Work Instructions
Description: Digitalized set up in Ishare to store and update work instructions for the DHL Brussels Hub Environment, standardized across all functions.
Problem it Solves: one way to store work instructions + automated alert if work instructions updated + version control work instructions
Benefits: information available to employees - certainty of Accuracy of information - efficient way of communicating / alerting on updates - less paper

Title: Contract management tool
Description: Develop an IT Solution that facilitates the creation, maintenance, viewing and archiving of contracts for new and existing Strategic and BDM customers.
Problem it Solves: The development of the Contract Management tool is required because we do not have a centralized overview or logging of all relevant business agreements that DHL has made historically with their customers. Therefore during handovers specific knowledge is lost, creating potential issues.
Benefits: Create overview and insight in customer contracts

Title: Cashless delivery with QR code
Description: Surge in B2C volumes results in increasing amounts of cash with couriers with risks of theft, fraud, missing cash etc.  Cash in Service Center is partially used as ‘Petty Cash’ to do small local purchases with limited control. Covid-19 crisis added the risk of infection by cash money exchange
Problem it Solves: no need for cash in the PU and delivery process
Benefits: User friendly for customer and courier. removes cash from the process completely

Title: Capacity Planning Framework (Forecasting)
Description: Create a solution to enable more efficient planning of staff, recruitment & resources for the direct functions to enable accurate forecasting on a daily basis for individual facilities and departments.
Problem it Solves: Operational forecasting is time consuming and inaccurate
Benefits: Accurate planning for OPS creates more efficient resources planning and improves performance. It also saves time on the for forecasting employees.

Title: PL White Book
Description: A repository of information about Polish Service Partners and their couriers: Relations (Service Parnter - courier), Service areas, cars used, CIS, DGR  trainings completed. It also has dedicated module enabling enrollment to CIS trainings done by OPS training team.
Problem it Solves: In Poland all service partners and couriers are not employees but rather cooperating companies / subcontractors. There is a need to keep full registry of information about couriers and service partners
Benefits: Reduce paperwork in maintaining one source of truth about couriers and service partners.

Title: ACrobot
Description: Automatic contact of customer via e-mail / SMS to ask for additional information for import shipments requiring custom process. Maintaining the feedbacks and uploading into Customs Management Tool
Problem it Solves: Custom contacts productivity
Benefits: Less Custom contact calls; atomize routines

Title: Virtual PD Board
Description: A virtual PD board created for SMART working and / or remote teams, for use over Skype or Zoom.
Problem it Solves: Provides the ability to run PDs virtually, in the correct, standard format, capturing details of every PD online.
Benefits: This has proved to be an essential Employee Engagement and performance tool this year, with the high number of our people smart working.
Members: Christian Ludlam, Daniel Vowles, Mark Atherton

Title: Warehouse Robot
Description: Warehouse agents have to enter shelf location one by one for all ETGB shipments. This takes around 1 hour to complete. Warehouse Robot make it happen in less than 5 minute. It takes all AWB list from user and update their shelf location instantly.
Problem it Solves: It eliminates 1 hour time waste and resources. And remove the possible human errors.
Benefits: Elimimate time, resource waste. Fasten the process. No human error.

Title: Invoice Robot
Description: Sales team needs to send invoices to their customers so that they can start their customs process. This should be done quickly and earlier. Invoice Robot make it work! It sends invoices for some key account customers once their invoices are generated.
Problem it Solves: One dedicated person have to sit and spend 1 hour to send all invoices by e-mail manually. This takes time and resources. And also open to human errors.
Benefits: Eliminates time, resource waste. Fasten the process. Fully automated invoicing for key customers. Human error free. And more importantly customers receive their invoices on time!

Title: Personnel Request Approval System
Description: PRF (Personnel Request Form) help employees to submit their new employee needs/requirements to HR. It goes through an approval system and it is fully automated.
Problem it Solves: HR needs to physically meet the submitter and also approvers (HR HEAD, CFO, CEO) to get the approval for new employee requests. And everything is done on paper. So reporting is difficult. This whole process take a lot of time and resources.
Benefits: Eliminate paperwork. Fasten the process. Full visibility. Flexible reporting. Easy to search.

Title: Customs Web Portal
Description: Customs web portal allow our customers to query customs related information such as; e-paperwork, declaration number. It also allow our customers to calculate warehouse fees.
Problem it Solves: Instant and fast solution for customs related information requests.
Benefits: Customers don't need to call us, they can get their information online instantly 7/24. Decrease workload on Customs CS agents. Electronic paperwork eliminate papers which supports our GoGreen initiatives.
Members: Alpay UTKU, Leyla Aktas, Zulal SENOL

Title: One2One Portal
Description: Online portal for the completion of One2Ones for all H&G UK employees.
Problem it Solves: Standardises the One2One format. Provides the ability to track completion rates across all management levels. Moves the old paper process to an online solution (Digitalization, Go-Green).  Includes IDPs and appraisal forms for staff not on MTW.
Benefits: The standard format increases Employee Engagement, and covers all employees including those not on MTW. It is aligned with our Coaching culture and tracks opportunities within our organisation. It supports Go-Green by reducing paper usage, and promotes accountability by tracking agreed actions.
Members: Claire Morris, Felicia Azzolina, Laura Pegg, Maria Lukyanenka, Mark Atherton

Title: OTRS
Description: OTRS is a ticketing tool for a group of Polish customs agents responsible for gathering data necessary for the clearing process.
Problem it Solves: The inefficiency of gathering necessary data for the customs clearance process
Benefits: Gathering data necessary for customs clearing process in an efficient and transparent way so all agents and their managers can quickly check the status of the data bundle and can also transfer a ticket between agents. Process speed increased thanks to email templates and automatic reminders (SMS)
Benefit Category: Customer experience, Employee experience, Operational efficiency

Title: Huawei booking preparation
Description: It helps to book Huawei shipments with less manual work.
Problem it Solves: Customer Huawei send booking details in a messy XLS file. It needs lots of manual work to clease the addresses, and other shipment details before record it manually at MyDHL+. This project will help for Huawei agents at DHL Customer Service to books shipments easies and faster.
Benefits: Booking process will be faster and more accurate directly to MyDHL+.

Title: eInvoice (transportation)
Description: All Invoices for transportation are digitally signed and sent electronically to customers.
Problem it Solves: Our objective was to send all Invoices for transportation services digitally signed and sent electronically to customers, without printing invoices.
Benefits: no costs of printing paper invoices - no costs for sending invoices to customers by local post  - Faster debt collection

Title: eInvoice (Duty)
Description: All Duty Invoices will be digitally signed and send electronically. E-Invoice (Duty) is created in local DUTY application.
Problem it Solves: Our objective was to send all Duty Invoices electronically and digitally signed.
Benefits: no costs of printing paper invoices - no costs for sending invoices to customers by local post  - Faster debt collection

Title: EXP EE declaration upload to GIA
Description: Script will read inside the pdf file for AWB number and renames the file according to GIA file name convention and will upload the file to GIA.
Problem it Solves: Customs declarants will save time.
Benefits: Customs declarants will save time.

Title: DCE in-country archive data processing
Description: Create a local MS SQL archive database  and process of automatic import DCE Archive XML files to the database. This will made historical data structured and available for reporting/extraction in country.
Problem it Solves: This initiative solves a problem of historical DCE data availability and quality for end users.  Currently the data comes in XML files and it is not usable for internal customers in raw format. Users have to download/create historical reports manually and it takes a lot of time to handle.
Benefits: Supplier contracts duration monitoring and timely management

Title: Employee Chatbot
Description: Re-use Global Chatbot to publish content on UK MyNet pages
Problem it Solves: Help employees knowledge and understanding
Benefits: Make it easier for employees to find answers to their questions, knowledge sharing.

Title: HR Case Management-EXP UK
Description: Ticketing and workflow tool to manage HR employee cases (disciplinary, performance and sickness)
Problem it Solves: UK manages 4,519 employees with ~100 new cases each month; 16,800 process steps each year.  Case data currently  held in multiple locations (email, spreadsheets, shared drive & SAP).
Benefits: Improved collaboration through secure sharing of confidential documents and tasks with the virtual team investigating each case.  Process, SLA and GDPR compliance.

Title: Shadow IT killer
Description: To avoid people launching SQL sentences against a variety of systems and technologies (iSeries, Oracle, Informix, MSSQL). The solution is based on MSSQL Reporting Services and linked servers.
Problem it Solves: Shadow IT, unsupported extractions by IT, performance issues in live systems, issues when changing the release of the standard software (MSExcel, MSAccess)
Benefits: all data flows into IT control, a single point of failure/recovery in case of problems, to introduce the change management processes in the new requests

Title: GlobalAviation ACS FNZ - ACMEDI_2_SAP
Description: new interface between ACMEDI and SAP for those ACS complementary services not covered by GlobalAviation TGV/Falcon suite.
Problem it Solves: replacing the legacy ACMEDI_2_JDE sunset time ago. Solution based on Mulesoft Middleware and XML messages.
Benefits: since JDE was decomissioned, manual update of SAP with information from ACMEDI. ACMEDI/ACS/FNZ in use in ES, PT, FR, IT, DK
Members: Alejandro Alvarez Garrido, Alicia MARBAN INGELMO, Alvaro COLLADO, Beatriz Algaba Martin, Carmen HERRERO, Daniel Montalban Citalan, Elena Domenech Natal, Elena RUIZ DE LARREA, Gemma Burgueno Gallego, Hodei Zarrabeitia Lorite, Javier RODRIGUEZ REVILLA, Jose GORDILLO, Jose LOPEZ, Juan Carlos CARRETERO, Judit Sanchez Salvador, Lorena Alonso Castro, Maria Simon Tudanca, Milena TODOROVA, Paula Encabo Valdeolivas, Sonia Garcia Espinosa, Susana BARRIO, Tomas HOLGADO

Title: Customs Declaration for Low-Value Consignments
Description: Optimization of customs declaration filing due to abolishment of 22 EUR De minimis threshold as of Jan ’21, i.e. with reduced dataset
Problem it Solves: Reduce number of additional people needed to manage additional workload resulting from the regulation change.
Benefits: Reduce errors and required manual effort for customs classifications, taking away a share of the additional repetitive work caused by the legislation change
